Pinging Red Orbs also has a chance to trigger <color=#D91414>Lightning Lure</color>. After triggering <color=#D91414>Lightning Lure</color> for <color=#D91414>4</color> times, the next <color=#D91414>Lightning Lure</color> will summon <color=#D91414>EX Lightning Lure</color>, dealing Lightning DMG and healing allies in the area.\\n- Basic Attacks have a <color=#D91414>30%</color> chance to trigger <color=#D91414>Lightning Lure</color> when they hit marked enemies.\\n- Pinging Red Orbs has a <color=#D91414>30/60/100%</color> chance to trigger <color=#D91414>Lightning Lure</color> based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- <color=#D91414>Lightning Lure</color> deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG.\\n- <color=#D91414>EX Lightning Lure</color> deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Lightning DMG and heals allies in the area for <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> of Lux's ATK each time."}

Title: {1: 'Core Passive: <color=#0d70bc>Last hit of Basic Attack/Any 3-Ping/Cast Signature Move/Cast QTE + Pick up Energy Ball</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Sophia: Silverfang drops an Energy Ball after any of the following: the last hit of Basic Attack, dealing damage with a 3-Ping skill, casting Signature Move, or casting QTE. Picking up an Energy Ball heals all the allies within range and grants <color=#D91414>Fire Tempered</color>, increasing Fire DMG. Whenever an Energy Ball is picked up, Sophia: Silverfang gains Energy and Heat. Her ATK increases based on the current Heat.'}
SpecificDes: {1: "Sophia: Silverfang drops an Energy Ball after any of the following: the last hit of Basic Attack, dealing damage with a 3-Ping skill, casting Signature Move, or casting QTE. Picking up an Energy Ball heals all the allies within range and grants <color=#D91414>Fire Tempered</color>, increasing Fire DMG. Whenever an Energy Ball is picked up, Sophia: Silverfang gains Energy and Heat. Her ATK increases based on the current Heat.\\n- Picking up an Energy Ball heals all allies within range for HP equal to <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> of Sophia: Silverfang's ATK.\\n- <color=#D91414>Fire Tempered</color> increases the Fire DMG of the character who picked up the Energy Ball by <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> for <color=#D91414>5</color>s.\\n- Whenever an Energy Ball is picked up, Sophia: Silverfang gains <color=#D91414>4</color> Energy and <color=#D91414>75</color> Heat.\\n- Sophia: Silverfang's ATK increases by <color=#D91414>5/10/15%</color> when her Heat is over <color=#D91414>0/100/200</color>."}

SpecificDes: {1: 'Darts at the target and strikes twice, dealing Physical DMG.\\n- Each hit deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.', 2: 'In <color=#D91414>Arctic Form</color>, leaps mid-air and smashes at the target, dealing Ice DMG twice.\\n- Each hit deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Ice DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.'}

Title: {1: 'Blue Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Blue Orb</color>', 2: 'Blue Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Arctic Form + Ping Blue Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Whirls vertically while moving, then smashes downward to deal Physical DMG.', 2: 'In <color=#D91414>Arctic Form</color>, unleashes a tornado toward the front that deals Ice DMG 5 times, then quickly pulls the target in and deals Ice DMG once.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Whirls vertically while moving, then smashes downward to deal Physical DMG.\\n- Each hit deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- The downward slash deals <color=#D91414>{3}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{4}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{5}%</color> Physical DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.', 2: 'In <color=#D91414>Arctic Form</color>, unleashes a tornado toward the front that deals Ice DMG 5 times, then quickly pulls the target in and deals Ice DMG once.\\n- Each hit of the tornado deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Ice DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{3}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{4}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{5}%</color> Ice DMG based on the number of orbs pinged while pulling back.'}

Title: {1: 'Basic Attack: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Basic Attack</color>', 2: 'Basic Attack: <color=#0d70bc>Arctic Form + Tap Basic Attack</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Cuts at the target quickly with a katana, dealing Physical DMG.', 2: 'In <color=#D91414>Arctic Form</color>, attacks the target with a katana and thruster interchangeably, dealing Physical DMG and Ice DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Cuts at the target quickly with a katana, dealing Physical DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG in total.', 2: 'In <color=#D91414>Arctic Form</color>, attacks the target with a katana and thruster interchangeably, dealing Physical DMG and Ice DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG and <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Ice DMG in total.'}

Title: {1: 'Signature Move: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Signature</color>', 2: 'Signature Move: <color=#0d70bc>Arctic Form + More than 1 Signature Point + Tap Signature</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Can be cast any time in Normal Form. Quickly switches into <color=#D91414>Arctic Form</color>. Becomes invincible while switching. Form switch has a cooldown of <color=#D91414>3</color>s. If energy is full when switching, all Signal Orbs will be rearranged into 3-Pings.', 2: 'Available in <color=#D91414>Arctic Form</color> when there is more than 1 Signature Point. Leaps mid-air and hurls left-hand weapon at the ground, causing a massive AOE Ice DMG and slowing the enemies temporarily before switching back to Normal Form. Form switch has a cooldown of <color=#D91414>3</color>s.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Can be cast any time in Normal Form. Quickly switches into <color=#D91414>Arctic Form</color>. Becomes invincible while switching. Form switch has a cooldown of <color=#D91414>3</color>s. If energy is full when switching, all Signal Orbs will be rearranged into 3-Pings.', 2: 'Available in <color=#D91414>Arctic Form</color> when there is more than 1 Signature Point. Leaps mid-air and hurls left-hand weapon at the ground, causing a massive AOE Ice DMG and slowing the enemies temporarily before switching back to Normal Form. Form switch has a cooldown of <color=#D91414>3</color>s.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{3}%</color> Ice DMG based on the number of Signature Points accumulated.'}

BriefDes: {1: 'Dashes at the enemy, dealing Physical DMG and Ice DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Dashes at the enemy, dealing Physical DMG and Ice DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG and <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Ice DMG.'}

Title: {1: 'Core Passive: <color=#0d70bc>Any 3-Ping</color>', 2: 'Core Passive: <color=#0d70bc>Arctic Form + Any 3-Ping</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'In Normal Form, every 3-Ping grants Energy and Signature Point (up to <color=#D91414>2</color> Points in Normal Form).', 2: "In <color=#D91414>Arctic Form</color>, Energy decreases over time. While there is still Energy, Ice DMG increases and every 3-Ping grants <color=#D91414>1</color> Signature Point (up to 4 in Arctic Form). When casting the Signature Move, it can still benefit from the Core Passive's DMG Bonus if there is still Energy left."}
SpecificDes: {1: 'In Normal Form, every 3-Ping grants Energy and Signature Point (up to <color=#D91414>2</color> Points in Normal Form).\\n- Every 3-Ping grants <color=#D91414>50%</color> Energy and <color=#D91414>1</color> Signature Point.', 2: "In <color=#D91414>Arctic Form</color>, Energy decreases over time. While there is still Energy, Ice DMG increases and every 3-Ping grants <color=#D91414>1</color> Signature Point (up to 4 in Arctic Form). When casting the Signature Move, it can still benefit from the Core Passive's DMG Bonus if there is still Energy left.\\n- Ice DMG increases by <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> when there is still Energy."}

Title: {1: 'Blue Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Blue Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Releases a close-range shockwave forward that deals Physical Damage (Dark DMG instead on a 3-Ping) and marks the first target hit. The marked target will deal Dark DMG to all enemies including itself and heal all ally units per second in an area. Only 1 mark can exist at a time.'}
SpecificDes: {1: "Releases a close-range shockwave forward that deals Physical Damage (Dark DMG instead on a 3-Ping) and marks the first target hit. The marked target will deal Dark DMG to all enemies including itself and heal all ally units per second in an area. Only 1 mark can exist at a time.\\n- The shockwave deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- The marked target deals <color=#D91414>{3}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{4}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{5}%</color> Dark DMG and heals the ally units for <color=#D91414>{6}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{7}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{8}%</color> of Vera: Rozen's ATK per second in an area based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- The mark lasts <color=#D91414>5</color>s."}

Title: {1: 'Signature Move: <color=#0d70bc>100 Energy + Tap Signature</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Creates a <color=#D91414>dark field</color>, dealing Dark DMG to nearby enemies. The <color=#D91414>dark field</color> also deals Dark DMG every second and heals the ally units within. Ally units inside the <color=#D91414>dark field</color> also gain the <color=#D91414>Dark Radiation</color> effect and bonus movement speed. The <color=#D91414>dark field</color> always moves with the character.'}
SpecificDes: {1: "Creates a <color=#D91414>dark field</color>, dealing Dark DMG to nearby enemies. The <color=#D91414>dark field</color> also deals Dark DMG every second and heals the ally units within. Ally units inside the <color=#D91414>dark field</color> also gain the <color=#D91414>Dark Radiation</color> effect and bonus movement speed. The <color=#D91414>dark field</color> always moves with the character.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> AOE Dark DMG upon casting.\\n- The dark field deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Dark DMG and heals the ally units within for HP equal to <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> of Vera: Rozen's ATK every second.\\n- Ally units within the dark field gain the <color=#D91414>Dark Radiation</color> effect that increases their Dark DMG by <color=#D91414>10%</color> and <color=#D91414>{3}%</color> bonus movement speed.\\n- The dark field lasts <color=#D91414>6</color>s."}

Title: {1: 'QTE: <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>'}

Title: {1: 'Core Passive: <color=#0d70bc>Ping any orb</color>', 2: 'Core Passive: <color=#0d70bc>Sufficient Overclock Points + Press and hold Basic Attack + Tap Basic Attack repeatedly</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Gains additional Overclock Points from pinging orbs. Automatically restores Overclock Points every second.', 2: "With enough Overclock Points, when pressing and holding the Basic Attack button to unleash Vera's core attack, repeatedly tapping Basic Attack will also unleash her follow-up core attacks. Core attack deals AOE Dark DMG and deals additional Physical DMG to targets in melee range. Casting core attacks will consume Overclock Points and return energy."}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Gains additional Overclock Points from pinging orbs. Automatically restores Overclock Points every second.\\n- Gains additional <color=#D91414>3/7/12</color> Overclock Points based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- Automatically restores <color=#D91414>2</color> Overclock Points every second.\\n- Overclock Points are capped at <color=#D91414>60</color>.', 2: "With enough Overclock Points, when pressing and holding the Basic Attack button to unleash Vera's core attack, repeatedly tapping Basic Attack will also unleash her follow-up core attacks. Core attack deals AOE Dark DMG and deals additional Physical DMG to targets in melee range. Casting core attacks will consume Overclock Points and return energy.\\n- Each hit of core attack deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{3}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{4}%</color> AOE Dark DMG.\\n- Deals additional <color=#D91414>{5}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{6}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{7}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{8}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{9}%</color> Physical DMG to targets in melee range.\\n- Casting core attack will consume <color=#D91414>12</color> Overclock Points and return <color=#D91414>6</color> energy."}

SpecificDes: {1: 'Spins and slashes nearby enemies, then knocks them into the air, dealing 2 hits of Physical DMG (Dark DMG instead on a 3-Ping).\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG in total based on the number of orbs pinged.', 2: 'In <color=#D91414>Berserk Form</color>, launches 2 swift attacks that deal Dark DMG, followed by a heavy attack that deals Dark DMG.\\n- The 2 swift attacks deal <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG in total, and the heavy attack deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Dark DMG.'}

Title: {1: 'Signature Move: <color=#0d70bc>80 Energy + Tap Signature</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Enters <color=#D91414>Berserk Form</color> and gains a <color=#D91414>Dark Impulse</color> gauge. Becomes invincible while entering this form. In <color=#D91414>Berserk Form</color>, Crocotta gains Super Armor and his Dark DMG increases. Red, Yellow, and Blue Orbs are replaced by special orbs. Only <color=#D91414>1</color> special orb of each color exists at a time. Each ping is treated as a 3-Ping. Pinged orbs will regenerate in <color=#D91414>2</color>s (up to <color=#D91414>3</color> orbs will regenerate during <color=#D91414>Berserk Form</color>). <color=#D91414>Dark Impulse</color> is consumed over time except in Matrix. Whenever Crocotta would take DMG, <color=#D91414>Dark Impulse</color> is consumed instead to negate the incoming DMG. Crocotta exits <color=#D91414>Berserk Form</color> when <color=#D91414>Dark Impulse</color> is empty.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Enters <color=#D91414>Berserk Form</color> and gains a <color=#D91414>Dark Impulse</color> gauge. Becomes invincible while entering this form. Only <color=#D91414>1</color> special orb of each color exists at a time. Each ping is treated as a 3-Ping. Pinged orbs will regenerate in <color=#D91414>2</color>s (up to <color=#D91414>3</color> orbs will regenerate during <color=#D91414>Berserk Form</color>). <color=#D91414>Dark Impulse</color> is consumed over time except in Matrix. Whenever Crocotta would take DMG, <color=#D91414>Dark Impulse</color> is consumed instead to negate the incoming DMG. Crocotta exits <color=#D91414>Berserk Form</color> when <color=#D91414>Dark Impulse</color> is empty.\\n- Dark DMG increases by <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> in <color=#D91414>Berserk Form</color>.'}

Title: {1: 'Yellow Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Yellow Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Rosetta: Rigor smashes an enemy with her shield, then thrusts her lance forward, dealing Physical DMG and gaining Shield. Gains Super Armor while using this skill.'}

Title: {1: 'Blue Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Blue Orb</color>'}

SpecificDes: {1: "Throws a shield to drag an enemy closer, dealing Physical DMG and inflicting <color=#D91414>Piercing Blow</color> that reduces the target's Physical DEF.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG in total based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- <color=#D91414>Piercing Blow</color> reduces the target's Physical DEF by <color=#D91414>20%</color> for <color=#D91414>8</color>s."}

Title: {1: 'Basic Attack: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Basic Attack</color>', 2: 'Basic Attack: <color=#0d70bc>Press and hold Basic Attack</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Rosetta: Rigor strikes the enemy with her lance and shield, dealing Physical DMG.', 2: 'Press and hold Basic Attack to charge up her power. Fires Low/Mid-power Electromagnetic Cannon based on the charging time, dealing Physical DMG. Extra DMG Reduction increases while charging up.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Rosetta: Rigor strikes the enemy with her lance and shield, dealing Physical DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG in total.', 2: 'Press and hold Basic Attack to charge up her power. Title: {1: 'Signature Move: <color=#0d70bc>80 Energy + Tap Signature</color>'}

SpecificDes: {1: 'Rosetta: Rigor rises into the air and aims her ion cannon toward the ground. While charging up energy, nearby enemies will be dragged in and damaged. Once the cannon is fully charged, it fires a large area blast that deals Physical DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG in total.'}

Title: {1: 'QTE: <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Rosetta: Rigor spins with her lance, dealing Physical DMG to nearby enemies.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Rosetta: Rigor spins with her lance, dealing Physical DMG to nearby enemies.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG in total.'}

Title: {1: 'Core Passive: <color=#0d70bc>Has Energy Points + Any 3-Ping</color>', 2: 'Core Passive: <color=#0d70bc>Has Energy Points + Tap Signature</color>', 3: 'Core Passive: <color=#0d70bc>Full Burst Form + Press and hold Basic Attack</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Rosetta: Rigor has <color=#D91414>3</color> Energy Points. When performing a 3-Ping, she consumes <color=#D91414>1</color> Energy Point to enhance the skill and gain Extra DMG Bonus.', 2: 'Rosetta: Rigor has <color=#D91414>3</color> Energy Points. When performing a Signature, she consumes up to <color=#D91414>2</color> Energy Points to gain Physical DMG Bonus.', 3: 'When all Energy Points are used up, Rosetta: Rigor enters <color=#D91414>Full Burst Form</color>. Press and hold the Basic Attack button in this form to charge and fire the <color=#D91414>Wide-area Electromagnetic Cannon</color> once the charging reaches maximum, dealing Physical DMG while restoring Signature Energy, and inflicting the target with <color=#D91414>Piercing Blow</color>. While charging, her Extra DMG Reduction increases. Energy Points will be restored after firing the <color=#D91414>Wide-area Electromagnetic Cannon</color>.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Rosetta: Rigor has <color=#D91414>3</color> Energy Points. When performing a 3-Ping, she consumes <color=#D91414>1</color> Energy Point to enhance the skill and gain Extra DMG Bonus.\\n- Enhances the skill and gains <color=#D91414>100%</color> Extra DMG Bonus.', 2: 'Rosetta: Rigor has <color=#D91414>3</color> Energy Points. When performing a Signature, she consumes up to <color=#D91414>2</color> Energy Points to gain Physical DMG Bonus.\\n- Gains <color=#D91414>40%/80%</color> Physical DMG Bonus based on the Energy Points consumed.', 3: 'When all Energy Points are used up, Rosetta: Rigor enters <color=#D91414>Full Burst Form</color>. Press and hold the Basic Attack button in this form to charge and fire the <color=#D91414>Wide-area Electromagnetic Cannon</color> once the charging reaches maximum, dealing Physical DMG while restoring Energy, and inflicting the target with <color=#D91414>Piercing Blow</color>. While charging, her Extra DMG Reduction increases. Energy points will be restored after firing the <color=#D91414>Wide-Area Electromagnetic Cannon</color>.\\n- <color=#D91414>Wide-area Electromagnetic Cannon</color> deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG.\\n- <color=#D91414>Wide-area Electromagnetic Cannon</color> restores <color=#D91414>8</color> Signature Energy.\\n-<color=#D91414>Piercing Blow</color> lasts <color=#D91414>20</color>s.\\n- While charging, her Extra DMG Reduction increases by <color=#D91414>90%</color>.\\n- <color=#D91414>3</color> Energy will be restored in <color=#D91414>8</color>s after firing the <color=#D91414>Wide-area Electromagnetic Cannon</color>.'}

BriefDes: {1: 'Increases DEF of all members. Increases ATK of all Tanks in the team.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Increases DEF of all members by <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>. Increases ATK of all Tanks in the team by <color=#D91414>{1}%</color>.'}

SpecificDes: {1: 'Gains 3 Signal Orbs when entering battle.'}

Title: {1: 'Red Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Red Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Leaps up and cleaves downward with the weapon in hand, dealing Physical DMG. Enemies hit by the shockwave emitted from the strike take Physical DMG. Gains Super Armor while using this skill.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Leaps up and cleaves downward with the weapon in hand, dealing Physical DMG. Enemies hit by the shockwave emitted from the strike take Physical DMG. Gains Super Armor while using this skill.\\n- The leap strike deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- The shockwave deals <color=#D91414>{3}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{4}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{5}%</color> Physical DMG to the enemies hit based on the number of orbs pinged.'}

Title: {1: 'Yellow Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Yellow Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Performs a 3-hit strike when approaching the target, dealing Physical DMG. When Qu: Pavo is far away from the target or no targets are locked-on, she will sprint at high speed, during which if tapping a Basic Attack button, or when the sprint ends, she will launch a 3-hit strike to the nearest target. The color of the circle under her feet will change based on the distance between her and her nearest target. When sprinting, gains Super Armor.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Performs a 3-hit strike when approaching the target, dealing Physical DMG. When Qu: Pavo is far away from the target or no targets are locked-on, she will sprint at high speed, during which if tapping a Basic Attack button, or when the sprint ends, she will launch a 3-hit strike to the nearest target. The color of the circle under her feet will change based on the distance between her and her nearest target. When sprinting, gains Super Armor.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG in total to the target based on the number of orbs pinged.'}

Title: {1: 'Blue Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Blue Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Swipes the enemies twice with the weapon, dealing Physical DMG and gaining Super Armor. This skill can interrupt enemy attacks as long as Qu: Pavo is not knocked down.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Swipes the enemies twice with the weapon, dealing Physical DMG and gaining Super Armor. This skill can interrupt enemy attacks as long as Qu: Pavo is not knocked down.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG in total based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- Super Armor lasts <color=#D91414>3</color>s.'}

BriefDes: {1: 'Launches consecutive attacks with a Glaive, dealing Physical DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Launches consecutive attacks with a Glaive, dealing Physical DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG in total.'}

WeaponSkillDes: Increases Physical DMG by 20% and Huiyu's attack frequency by 50%. Huiyu gains a new skill: Curse Incarnate. <color=#FF6347>Curse Incarnate</color>: Huiyu becomes a curse attached to the target, dealing up to <color=#D91414>210%</color> Physical DMG. It explodes after a short while to deal <color=#D91414>240%</color> Physical DMG. The DMG varies based on Qu's Signature Move level.
Title: {1: 'Signature Move: <color=#0d70bc>100 Energy + Tap Signature</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Calls upon Huiyu to perform a combination attack that deals Physical DMG and grants Sync Rate. Qu: Pavo enters the <color=#D91414>Concentrated Will State</color>, and Huiyu will attack enemies (prioritizing locked-on targets) continuously to deal Physical DMG. The Signature Move cannot be cast again when Huiyu exists.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Calls upon Huiyu to perform a combination attack that deals Physical DMG and grants Sync Rate. Qu: Pavo enters the <color=#D91414>Concentrated Will State</color>, and Huiyu will attack enemies (prioritizing locked-on targets) continuously to deal Physical DMG. The Signature Move cannot be cast again when Huiyu exists.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG in total.\\n- Casting the Signature grants <color=#D91414>60</color> Sync Rate.\\n- Huiyu exists for <color=#D91414>7</color>s and deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Physical DMG in total.'}

Title: {1: 'QTE: <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>'}

SpecificDes: {1: "Appears in the air and unleashes 2 quick shockwaves in the target's direction, dealing Physical DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG in total."}

Title: {1: 'Core Passive: <color=#0d70bc>Ping any orb</color>', 2: 'Core Passive: <color=#0d70bc>Concentrated Will State</color>', 3: 'Core Passive: <color=#0d70bc>Concentrated Will State + Ping Red Orb</color>', 4: 'Core Passive: <color=#0d70bc>Concentrated Will State + Ping Yellow Orb</color>', 5: 'Core Passive: <color=#0d70bc>Concentrated Will State + Ping Blue Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Gains Sync Rate from pinging orbs. When the Sync Rate is at maximum, Signal Orbs are enhanced, and Qu: Pavo enters the <color=#D91414>Concentrated Will State</color> once an orb is pinged.', 2: 'In the <color=#D91414>Concentrated Will State</color>, Signal Orbs can only be pinged individually. Pinging an orb consumes Sync Rate and triggers the corresponding 3-Ping skill and <color=#D91414>Concentrated Will</color>, and will consume Sync Rate but generates no energy. In the <color=#D91414>Concentrated Will State</color>, Sync Rate goes down over time. Once Sync Rate is empty, the <color=#D91414>Concentrated Will State</color> will end and Signal Orbs are no longer enhanced.', 3: 'Red Concentration: Bashes the ground to deal Physical DMG.', 4: 'Yellow Concentration: Unleashes a shockwave forward to deal Physical DMG.', 5: 'Blue Concentration: Releases a whirlwind that follows Qu: Pavo around, dealing Physical DMG to nearby enemies.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Gains Sync Rate from pinging orbs. When the Sync Rate is at maximum, Signal Orbs are enhanced, and Qu: Pavo enters the <color=#D91414>Concentrated Will State</color> once an orb is pinged.\\n- Every <color=#D91414>1</color> orb pinged grants <color=#D91414>10</color> Sync Rate, up to <color=#D91414>60</color>.', 2: 'In the <color=#D91414>Concentrated Will State</color>, Signal Orbs can only be pinged individually. Pinging an orb consumes Sync Rate and triggers the corresponding 3-Ping skill and <color=#D91414>Concentrated Will</color>, and will consume Sync Rate but generates no energy. In the <color=#D91414>Concentrated Will State</color>, Sync Rate goes down over time. Once Sync Rate is empty, the <color=#D91414>Concentrated Will State</color> will end and Signal Orbs are no longer enhanced.\\n- Each enhanced Signal Orb pinged consumes <color=#D91414>20</color> Sync Rate. In the <color=#D91414>Concentrated Will State</color>, Sync Rate goes down by <color=#D91414>5</color> per second.', 3: 'Red Concentration: Bashes the ground to deal Physical DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG in total.', 4: 'Yellow Concentration: Unleashes a shockwave forward to deal Physical DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG in total.', 5: 'Blue Concentration: Releases a whirlwind that follows Qu: Pavo around, dealing Physical DMG to nearby enemies.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG in total.'}

SpecificDes: {1: 'Increases Physical DMG of all members by <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>. Increases ATK of all Vanguard Uniframes in the team by <color=#D91414>{1}%</color>.'}

Title: {1: 'Red Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Red Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Launches 2 quick attacks forward to deal Physical DMG. Upon a 3-Ping, Changyu: Qilin will charge up for a short while to launch a heavy blow after 2 quick attacks, dealing Ice DMG and slowing the enemies.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Launches 2 quick attacks forward to deal Physical DMG. Upon a 3-Ping, Changyu: Qilin will charge up for a short while to launch a heavy blow after 2 quick attacks, dealing Ice DMG and slowing the enemies.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- The heavy blow deals <color=#D91414>{3}%</color> Ice DMG.'}

Title: {1: 'Yellow Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Yellow Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Dashes toward the target and throws an upper kick to knock it airborne, dealing Physical DMG (Ice DMG instead on a 3-Ping).'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Dashes toward the target and throws an upper kick to knock it airborne, dealing Physical DMG (Ice DMG instead on a 3-Ping).\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.'}

Title: {1: 'Blue Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Blue Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Hammers the ground to deal Physical DMG (Ice DMG instead on a 3-Ping) to all enemies within 4m. The palm strike will leave a <color=#D91414>Crystal Ice Mirror</color> on the ground. The enemies inside the <color=#D91414>Crystal Ice Mirror</color> have their movement speed decreased, and are affected by <color=#D91414>Frost Corrosion</color> which reduces their Ice Resistance. A new <color=#D91414>Crystal Ice Mirror</color> will replace the old one.'}
SpecificDes: {1: "Hammers the ground to deal Physical DMG (Ice DMG instead on a 3-Ping) to all enemies within 4m. The palm strike will leave a <color=#D91414>Crystal Ice Mirror</color> on the ground. The enemies inside the <color=#D91414>Crystal Ice Mirror</color> have their movement speed decreased, and are affected by <color=#D91414>Frost Corrosion</color> which reduces their Ice Resistance. A new <color=#D91414>Crystal Ice Mirror</color> will replace the old one.\\n- The slam deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG to the enemies based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- Enemies inside the <color=#D91414>Crystal Ice Mirror</color> have their movement speed reduced by <color=#D91414>30%</color>.\\n- <color=#D91414>Crystal Ice Mirror</color> lasts <color=#D91414>4/6/8</color>s based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- <color=#D91414>Frost Corrosion</color> reduces the enemy's Ice Resistance by <color=#D91414>5%</color> and lasts <color=#D91414>8</color>s (the duration will refresh as long as the enemies are inside the Crystal Ice Mirror)."}

Title: {1: 'Basic Attack: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Basic Attack</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Proficient in martial arts, Changyu: Qilin pummels the enemies with his Gauntlets to deal Physical DMG and Ice DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Proficient in martial arts, Changyu: Qilin pummels the enemies with his Gauntlets to deal Physical DMG and Ice DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG and <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Ice DMG in total.'}

Title: {1: 'Signature Move: <color=#0d70bc>60 Energy + Tap Signature</color>', 2: 'Sonic Blast: <color=#0d70bc>Selfless State + Tap Follow-Up Orb</color>', 3: 'Flowing Whirlpool: <color=#0d70bc>Selfless State + After the 3rd/4th hit of Basic Attack + Tap Follow-Up Orb repeatedly</color>', 4: 'Signature Move: <color=#0d70bc>Selfless State + 60 Energy + Tap Signature</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Once activated, enters the <color=#D91414>Selfless State</color>. In this state, removes all Signal Orbs (no more orbs will be generated) except the Follow-Up Orb and restores Signature Energy for each orb removed. The Follow-Up Orb will not be grayed out. DEF and Ice DMG increase. Triggering Matrix and successful dodge during <color=#D91414>Selfless State</color> recover Dodge Gauge. Ice DMG increases when in Matrix.', 2: 'In <color=#D91414>Selfless State</color>, tap the Follow-Up Orb to consume Signature Energy and cast <color=#D91414>Sonic Blast</color>, dealing Ice DMG. <color=#D91414>Sonic Blast</color> and Basic Attack after dodge will start from the 4th hit.', 3: 'After the 3rd or 4th hit of Basic Attack, tap the Follow-Up Orb repeatedly to perform <color=#D91414>Flowing Whirlpool</color>, a storm of quick attacks that strike the area in front. The attacks consume Signature Energy and deal Ice DMG. Gains Super Armor while casting <color=#D91414>Flowing Whirlpool</color>.', 4: 'Tapping the Signature button again in <color=#D91414>Selfless State</color> will consume Signature Energy to return random Signal Orbs, gray out the Follow-Up Orb, and leave <color=#D91414>Selfless State</color>.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Once activated, enters the <color=#D91414>Selfless State</color>. In this state, removes all Signal Orbs (no more orbs will be generated) except the Follow-Up Orb and restores Signature Energy for each orb removed. The Follow-Up Orb will not be grayed out. DEF and Ice DMG increase. Triggering Matrix and successful dodge during <color=#D91414>Selfless State</color> recover Dodge Gauge. Ice DMG increases when in Matrix.\\n- During <color=#D91414>Selfless State</color>, DEF and Ice DMG increase by <color=#D91414>20%</color>.\\n- Triggering Matrix and successful dodge during <color=#D91414>Selfless State</color> recover <color=#D91414>100</color> Dodge Gauge.\\n- During <color=#D91414>Selfless State</color>, Ice DMG increases by <color=#D91414>20%</color> in Matrix.', 2: 'In <color=#D91414>Selfless State</color>, tap the Follow-Up Orb to consume Signature Energy and cast <color=#D91414>Sonic Blast</color>, dealing Ice DMG. <color=#D91414>Sonic Blast</color> and Basic Attack after dodge will start from the 4th hit.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ice DMG in total.\\n- Casting <color=#D91414>Sonic Blast</color> consumes <color=#D91414>15</color> Signature Energy.', 3: 'After the 3rd or 4th hit of Basic Attack, tap the Follow-Up Orb repeatedly to perform <color=#D91414>Flowing Whirlpool</color>, a storm of quick attacks that strike the area in front. The attacks consume Signature Energy and deal Ice DMG. Gains Super Armor while casting <color=#D91414>Flowing Whirlpool</color>.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ice DMG in total.\\n- Each hit of <color=#D91414>Flowing Whirlpool</color> consumes <color=#D91414>7/7/7/7/10</color> Signature Energy respectively.', 4: 'Tapping the Signature button again in <color=#D91414>Selfless State</color> will consume Signature Energy to return random Signal Orbs, gray out the Follow-Up Orb, and leave <color=#D91414>Selfless State</color>.\\n- Consumes <color=#D91414>60</color> Signature Energy to leave <color=#D91414>Selfless State</color> and returns <color=#D91414>4</color> random Signal Orbs.'}

Title: {1: 'QTE: <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Appears above the target and smashes the ground with a charged-up punch, dealing 5 hits of Ice DMG in total and slowing the target temporarily.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Appears above the target and smashes the ground with a charged-up punch, dealing 5 hits of Ice DMG in total and slowing the target temporarily.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ice DMG in total.'}

Title: {1: 'Core Passive: <color=#0d70bc>Any 3-Ping + Ping Follow-Up Orb</color>', 2: 'Core Passive: <color=#0d70bc>Red 3-Ping + Ping Follow-Up Orb</color>', 3: 'Core Passive: <color=#0d70bc>Blue 3-Ping + Ping Follow-Up Orb</color>', 4: 'Core Passive: <color=#0d70bc>Yellow 3-Ping + Ping Follow-Up Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'At the start of battle, gains a grayed-out Follow-Up Orb (cannot be tapped or pinged). The Follow-Up Orb will light up upon a 3-Ping. Tap it to perform different follow-up skills based on the color of orbs pinged.', 2: 'Red Follow-Up: Use an overhead kick to deal Ice DMG. Basic Attack after Red Follow-Up starts from the 4th hit.', 3: 'Blue Follow-Up: Conjures ice lances from the ground around to deal AOE Ice DMG and slow the enemies temporarily, leaving a <color=#D91414>Crystal Ice Mirror</color>.', 4: 'Yellow Follow-Up: Leaps backward and conjures ice pieces to pull nearby enemies together. The ice pieces then explode to deal AOE Ice DMG.'}

Title: {1: 'Core Passive: <color=#0d70bc>Yellow 3-Ping + Any 3-Ping</color>', 2: 'Core Passive: <color=#0d70bc>Battle Stance + Tap Basic Attack/Ping Yellow Orb</color>', 3: 'Core Passive: <color=#0d70bc>Battle Stance + Ping Red Orb</color>', 4: 'Core Passive: <color=#0d70bc>Battle Stance + Ping Blue Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Any 3-Ping after a Yellow 3-Ping grants 2B <color=#D91414>Stability</color>. <color=#D91414>Stability</color> decreases over time (re-triggering does not refresh the duration). While 2B has <color=#D91414>Stability</color>, she enters <color=#D91414>Battle Stance</color>. Once 2B exits <color=#D91414>Battle Stance</color>, all <color=#D91414>Data Correction</color> stacks will be removed. Obtaining additional stacks or unleashing Signature Move will refresh the duration of <color=#D91414>Data Correction</color>. While Signature Move is active, <color=#D91414>Stability</color> will not decrease.', 2: 'In <color=#D91414>Battle Stance</color>, Basic Attacks and Yellow Orbs also launch Swordwaves that deal Physical DMG.', 3: 'In <color=#D91414>Battle Stance</color>, Red Orbs also launch Swordwaves that deal Physical DMG and add <color=#D91414>Data Correction</color>, granting Physical DMG Bonus.', 4: 'In <color=#D91414>Battle Stance</color>, Blue Orbs can interrupt enemy attacks.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Any 3-Ping after a Yellow 3-Ping grants 2B <color=#D91414>Stability</color>. <color=#D91414>Stability</color> decreases over time (re-triggering does not refresh the duration). While 2B has <color=#D91414>Stability</color>, she enters <color=#D91414>Battle Stance</color>. Once 2B exits <color=#D91414>Battle Stance</color>, all <color=#D91414>Data Correction</color> stacks will be removed. Obtaining additional stacks or unleashing Signature Move will refresh the duration of <color=#D91414>Data Correction</color>. While Signature Move is active, <color=#D91414>Stability</color> will not decrease.\\n- Any 3-Ping after a Yellow 3-Ping grants 2B <color=#D91414>160</color> <color=#D91414>Stability</color>.\\n- 2B loses <color=#D91414>20</color> <color=#D91414>Stability</color> per second.', 2: 'In <color=#D91414>Battle Stance</color>, Basic Attacks and Yellow Orbs also launch Swordwaves that deal Physical DMG.\\n- Each Swordwave deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG.', 3: 'In <color=#D91414>Battle Stance</color>, Red Orbs also launch Swordwaves that deal Physical DMG and add <color=#D91414>Data Correction</color>, granting Physical DMG Bonus.\\n- Each Swordwave deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG.\\n- <color=#D91414>2/3</color>-Ping Red Orbs will add <color=#D91414>1/2</color> stacks of <color=#D91414>Data Correction</color> that last <color=#D91414>8</color>s, stacking up to <color=#D91414>3</color> times.\\n- Each stack of <color=#D91414>Data Correction</color> grants <color=#D91414>2%</color> Physical DMG Bonus (if 9S and A2 are also in the team, this effect increases to <color=#D91414>4%</color>).', 4: 'In <color=#D91414>Battle Stance</color>, Blue Orbs can interrupt enemy attacks.'}

WeaponSkillDes: Leader Skill effect doubled. A2 is allowed to <color=#FF6347>enter Berserk Mode</color> once <color=#FF6347>POD: Shield</color> increased to 40%. Additionally, A2 will obtain ATK Bonus by <color=#FF6347>10%</color> under <color=#FF6347>Berserk Mode</color>. In <color=#FF6347>2</color>s upon entering Matrix and evading, hold Attack button to unleash one enhanced attack to deal <color=#D91414>180%</color> Physical DMG. If the enemy was hit, hold the Attack button again to pursue the enemy, dealing a total of <color=#D91414>350%</color> Physical DMG (DMG changes with the level of Basic Attack). Charging will consume <color=#FF6347>all Yellow Orbs</color> for charging the lance, and each consumption of a Yellow Orb will deal <color=#FF6347>100%</color> extra DMG (up to <color=#FF6347>300%</color>), and provide A2 with <color=#FF6347>POD: Shield</color> of <color=#FF6347>3%</color> Max. HP. Additionally, consuming any amount of Yellow Orb by Charge Attack will grant A2 with <color=#FF6347>10%</color> Physical DMG Bonus for 15s.

Title: {1: 'Signature Move: <color=#0d70bc>POD: Shield full + Tap Signature</color>', 2: 'Signature Move: <color=#0d70bc>Berserk Mode + Tap Basic Attack</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: "Signature Move: Once <color=#D91414>POD: Shield</color> is fully charged, unleashes <color=#D91414>Berserk Mode</color> to grant A2 Super Armor and increase her Extra DMG Reduction, movement speed, and Extra DMG Bonus. <color=#D91414>Berserk Mode</color> will consume max HP every second (prioritizing <color=#D91414>POD: Shield</color> if <color=#D91414>POD: Shield</color> is present). <color=#D91414>Berserk Mode</color> can be deactivated manually or will automatically deactivate once A2's current HP falls to a certain level. Once deactivated, it cannot be activated again for a certain duration. If A2 leaves the field while <color=#D91414>Berserk Mode</color> is active, <color=#D91414>POD: Shield</color> will continue to diminish until fully depleted. While A2 is on standby, <color=#D91414>Berserk Mode</color> will deactivate if <color=#D91414>POD: Shield</color> is fully depleted.", 2: 'During <color=#D91414>Berserk Mode</color>, Basic Attacks gain increased attack speed. Pinging orbs will trigger electricity, dealing additional Physical DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: "Signature Move: Once <color=#D91414>POD: Shield</color> is fully charged, unleashes <color=#D91414>Berserk Mode</color> to grant A2 Super Armor and increase her Extra DMG Reduction, movement speed, and Extra DMG Bonus. <color=#D91414>Berserk Mode</color> will consume max HP every second (prioritizing <color=#D91414>POD: Shield</color> if <color=#D91414>POD: Shield</color> is present). <color=#D91414>Berserk Mode</color> can be deactivated manually or will automatically deactivate once A2's current HP falls to a certain level. Once deactivated, it cannot be activated again for a certain duration. If A2 leaves the field while <color=#D91414>Berserk Mode</color> is active, <color=#D91414>POD: Shield</color> will continue to diminish until fully depleted. While A2 is on standby, <color=#D91414>Berserk Mode</color> will deactivate if <color=#D91414>POD: Shield</color> is fully depleted.\\n- In <color=#D91414>Berserk Mode</color>, Extra DMG Reduction increases by <color=#D91414>60%</color>.\\n- In <color=#D91414>Berserk Mode</color>, Extra DMG Bonus increases by <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>{0}%</color></color>.\\n- <color=#D91414>Berserk Mode</color> consumes <color=#D91414>4%</color> of max HP per second.\\n- <color=#D91414>Berserk Mode</color> will be automatically deactivated when current HP falls below <color=#D91414>60%</color> of max HP, and cannot be activated again in <color=#D91414>10</color>s.", 2: 'During <color=#D91414>Berserk Mode</color>, Basic Attacks gain increased attack speed. SpecificDes: {1: 'Uses the POD to unleash Slow to create a circular region to deal Physical DMG to enemies within and slow them.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG in total based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- Slows the enemies for <color=#D91414>0.6/1.2/2.4</color>s based on the number of orbs pinged.'}

Title: {1: 'Blue Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Blue Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Uses the POD to unleash Wave, creating an expanding electric wave in front that deals Physical DMG to enemies and heals the allies it hits.'}
SpecificDes: {1: "Uses the POD to unleash Wave, creating an expanding electric wave in front that deals Physical DMG to enemies and heals the allies it hits.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG in total based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- Heals the allies for <color=#D91414>{3}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{4}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{5}%</color> of 9S's ATK based on the number of orbs pinged."}

Title: {1: 'Basic Attack: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Basic Attack</color>', 2: 'Sprinting State: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Dodge, then move</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Unleashes a series of attacks forward, dealing Physical DMG. While sprinting, tap Basic Attack to release Sprint Attack, dealing Physical DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Unleashes a series of attacks forward, dealing Physical DMG. SpecificDes: {1: 'Attempts to hack the enemy. Upon successful hacking, deals Physical DMG to the target.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG in total.'}

BriefDes: {1: "Hacks into an ally target on the battlefield to heal and repair, restoring the ally's HP."}
SpecificDes: {1: "Hacks into an ally target on the battlefield to heal and repair, restoring the ally's HP.\\n- Restores HP equal to <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> of 9S's ATK."}

Title: {1: 'Core Passive: <color=#0d70bc>At least 50 Overclock Energy + Any 3-Ping</color>', 2: 'Core Passive: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Overclock Indicator</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Gains <color=#D91414>Overclock Energy</color> at the start of the battle. During a 3-Ping, if there is sufficient <color=#D91414>Overclock Energy</color>, consumes <color=#D91414>Overclock Energy</color> to generate <color=#D91414>Overclock Indicator</color> of the corresponding color (up to 1) on the right of the Signal Orb bar. <color=#D91414>Overclock Energy</color> regenerates over time.', 2: 'Tapping the <color=#D91414>Overclock Indicator</color> will consume all orbs of the same color and summon a POD to unleash multiple projectiles that deal Physical DMG (pinging <color=#D91414>Overclock Indicator</color> is not considered a ping). If the <color=#D91414>Overclock Indicator</color> effect pings more than 3 Signal Orbs, gains a number of random Signal Orbs equal to the excess number of orbs pinged. When 9S leaves the field, reduces his swap cooldown according to how many times <color=#D91414>Overclock Indicator</color> has been triggered.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Gains <color=#D91414>Overclock Energy</color> at the start of the battle. During a 3-Ping, if there is sufficient <color=#D91414>Overclock Energy</color>, consumes <color=#D91414>Overclock Energy</color> to generate <color=#D91414>Overclock Indicator</color> of the corresponding color (up to 1) on the right of the Signal Orb bar. <color=#D91414>Overclock Energy</color> regenerates over time.\\n- Gains <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Overclock Energy</color> at the start of the battle.\\n- During a 3-Ping, if there is more than <color=#D91414>50</color> <color=#D91414>Overclock Energy</color>, consumes <color=#D91414>50</color> <color=#D91414>Overclock Energy</color> to gain <color=#D91414>Overclock Indicator</color>.\\n- <color=#D91414>Overclock Energy</color> regenerates by 20 every second (max 100).', 2: 'Tapping the <color=#D91414>Overclock Indicator</color> will consume all orbs of the same color and summon a POD to unleash multiple projectiles that deal Physical DMG (pinging <color=#D91414>Overclock Indicator</color> is not considered a ping). If the <color=#D91414>Overclock Indicator</color> effect pings more than 3 Signal Orbs, gains a number of random Signal Orbs equal to the excess number of orbs pinged. When 9S leaves the field, reduces his swap cooldown according to how many times <color=#D91414>Overclock Indicator</color> has been triggered.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG in total based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- Each <color=#D91414>Overclock Indicator</color> triggered reduces his swap cooldown by <color=#D91414>1</color>s, up to <color=#D91414>4</color>s.'}

BriefDes: {1: 'On the team, Physical DMG and Extra DMG Reduction of 2B, 9S, and A2 increase.'}

Title: {1: 'Core Passive: <color=#0d70bc>At least 15 Annihilation Pts + Press and hold Basic Attack</color>', 2: 'Core Passive: <color=#0d70bc>Annihilation State + Ping Annihilation Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Luna: Laurel gains Annihilation Pts after every 3-Ping. Her next ping will be counted as a 3-Ping. 3-Pings generated by the Matrix will be consumed first. When there are a certain amount of Annihilation Pts, press and hold the Basic Attack button to enter <color=#D91414>Annihilation State</color>, deal AOE Dark DMG, hide the original Signal Orbs, and gain <color=#D91414>Annihilation Orbs</color> based on the current Annihilation Pts. When this skill is cast, Luna will become invincible, and QTEs not in cooldown will be activated. In <color=#D91414>Annihilation State</color>, entering the Matrix will grant <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Annihilation Orb</color>, launching Basic Attacks will consume Annihilation Pts. When the Annihilation Pts drop to <color=#D91414>0</color> or when another character is switched in, Luna will exit <color=#D91414>Annihilation State</color>. Switching to another character will consume all Annihilation Pts. Exiting <color=#D91414>Annihilation State</color> will rearrange the Signal Orbs into 3-Pings.', 2: 'In <color=#D91414>Annihilation State</color>, pinging the <color=#D91414>Annihilation Orb</color> will cast 4 targeted spikes, dealing Dark DMG and granting Energy.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Luna: Laurel gains Annihilation Pts after every 3-Ping. Her next ping will be counted as a 3-Ping. 3-Pings generated by the Matrix will be consumed first. When there are a certain amount of Annihilation Pts, press and hold the Basic Attack button to enter <color=#D91414>Annihilation State</color>, deal AOE Dark DMG, hide the original Signal Orbs, and gain <color=#D91414>Annihilation Orbs</color> based on the current Annihilation Pts. When this skill is cast, Luna will become invincible, and QTEs not in cooldown will be activated. In <color=#D91414>Annihilation State</color>, entering the Matrix will grant <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Annihilation Orb</color>, launching Basic Attacks will consume Annihilation Pts. When the Annihilation Pts drop to <color=#D91414>0</color> or when another character is switched in, Luna will exit <color=#D91414>Annihilation State</color>. Switching to another character will consume all Annihilation Pts. Exiting <color=#D91414>Annihilation State</color> will rearrange the Signal Orbs into 3-Pings.\\n- Every 3-Ping grants <color=#D91414>15</color> Annihilation Pts, up to <color=#D91414>60</color>.\\n- When there are at least 15 Annihilation Pts, press and hold the Basic Attack button to enter <color=#D91414>Annihilation State</color> and deal <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> AOE Dark DMG.\\n- Gains up to <color=#D91414>4</color> <color=#D91414>Annihilation Orbs</color> based on the current Annihilation Pts.\\n- Every Basic Attack will consume <color=#D91414>5</color> Annihilation Pts.', 2: 'In <color=#D91414>Annihilation State</color>, pinging the <color=#D91414>Annihilation Orb</color> will cast 4 targeted spikes, dealing Dark DMG and granting Energy.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG in total and grants <color=#D91414>10</color> Energy.'}

Title: {1: 'Signature Move: <color=#0d70bc>Has Tune + 60 Energy + Tap Signature</color>', 2: 'Signature Move: <color=#0d70bc>Chaotic M.I.N.D. Form + Tap Basic Attack/Ping Staccato Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'When Selena has <color=#D91414>Tune</color>, she can consume Signature Energy to activate <color=#D91414>Chaotic M.I.N.D.</color>, and renew the duration of <color=#D91414>Solo</color> if Solo is active. Once activated, she gains <color=#D91414>Staccato</color> based on the amount of <color=#D91414>Tune</color>, increasing her movement speed and Extra DMG Reduction. <color=#D91414>Chaotic M.I.N.D.</color> lasts until all <color=#D91414>Staccato</color> Orbs are consumed, or when its duration has ended.', 2: 'When <color=#D91414>Chaotic M.I.N.D.</color> is activated, use Basic Attack or ping <color=#D91414>Staccato</color> Orbs directly to unleash two sonic waves, causing Lightning DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'When Selena has <color=#D91414>Tune</color>, she can consume Signature Energy to activate <color=#D91414>Chaotic M.I.N.D.</color>, and renew the duration of <color=#D91414>Solo</color> if Solo is active. Once activated, she gains <color=#D91414>Staccato</color> based on the amount of <color=#D91414>Tune</color>, increasing her movement speed and Extra DMG Reduction. <color=#D91414>Chaotic M.I.N.D.</color> lasts until all <color=#D91414>Staccato</color> Orbs are consumed, or when its duration has ended.\\n- Increases movement speed by <color=#D91414>30%</color> and Extra DMG Reduction by <color=#D91414>50%</color> for <color=#D91414>6</color>s.', 2: 'When <color=#D91414>Chaotic M.I.N.D.</color> is activated, use Basic Attack or ping <color=#D91414>Staccato</color> Orbs directly to unleash two sonic waves, causing Lightning DMG.\\n- The two sonic waves deal <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG in total.'}

Title: {1: 'Chord: <color=#0d70bc>Any 3-Ping + Ping any orb</color>', 2: 'Concerto: <color=#0d70bc>Any 3-Ping + Ping orbs with the same color as the 3-Ping</color>', 3: 'Solo: <color=#0d70bc>Any 3-Ping + Ping orbs with a different color from the 3-Ping</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: '3-Ping will generate a <color=#D91414>Triad</color> of the same color, and the next Orb pinged will trigger <color=#D91414>Chord</color>. Title: {1: 'Core Passive: <color=#0d70bc>Energy full + Press and hold Basic Attack</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: "During battle, Chrome: Glory's HP is compressed to <color=#D91414>40%</color>, with the remaining <color=#D91414>60%</color> filled with <color=#D91414>Glorious Shield</color> that automatically regenerates over time. When he has full Energy, press and hold Basic Attack to empty the <color=#D91414>Glorious Shield</color> capacity and activate <color=#D91414>Frost Spirit</color> Form, rearranging all Signal Orbs. All 3-Pings made in this form will gain <color=#D91414>Condensed Frost</color> without consuming <color=#D91414>Glorious Shield</color>, but <color=#D91414>Glorious Shield</color> cannot automatically regenerate while <color=#D91414>Frost Spirit</color> Form is active. Chrome: Glory creates <color=#D91414>Eroding Chill</color> around himself, dealing Ice DMG to enemies periodically and inflicting them with <color=#D91414>Frost Corrosion</color> that reduces their Ice Resistance."}
SpecificDes: {1: "During battle, Chrome: Glory's HP is compressed to <color=#D91414>40%</color>, with the remaining <color=#D91414>60%</color> filled with <color=#D91414>Glorious Shield</color> that automatically regenerates over time. When he has full Energy, press and hold Basic Attack to empty the <color=#D91414>Glorious Shield</color> capacity and activate <color=#D91414>Frost Spirit</color> Form, rearranging all Signal Orbs. All 3-Pings made in this form will gain <color=#D91414>Condensed Frost</color> without consuming <color=#D91414>Glorious Shield</color>, but <color=#D91414>Glorious Shield</color> cannot automatically regenerate while <color=#D91414>Frost Spirit</color> Form is active. Chrome: Glory creates <color=#D91414>Eroding Chill</color> around himself, dealing Ice DMG to enemies periodically and inflicting them with <color=#D91414>Frost Corrosion</color> that reduces their Ice Resistance.\\n- <color=#D91414>Frost Corrosion</color>: Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ice DMG to enemies every <color=#D91414>0.5</color>s and reduces their Ice Resistance by <color=#D91414>15%</color> for <color=#D91414>8</color>s. Triggering this effect again will renew its duration."}

Title: {1: 'Yellow Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Yellow Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: "Leaps in the direction of the joystick and releases a Dusk Bladewheel that deals Physical DMG (Dark DMG instead on a 3-Ping), and No. 21: XXI will stay in the air briefly, during which an Instant Dodge will release <color=#D91414>3</color> Twilight Matrices on the target's location."}
SpecificDes: {1: "Leaps in the direction of the joystick and releases a Dusk Bladewheel that deals Physical DMG (Dark DMG instead on a 3-Ping), and No. 21: XXI will stay in the air briefly, during which an Instant Dodge will release <color=#D91414>3</color> Twilight Matrices on the target's location.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG in total based on the number of orbs pinged."}

Title: {1: 'Blue Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Blue Orb</color>', 2: 'Blue Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Co-Bot + Ping Blue Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Enters the Hyperposition state and copies the following Basic Attacks and Shadow Prism Attacks. The effect does not stack.', 2: 'Co-Bot: Immediately launches a dash attack at the current target, dealing Physical DMG and reducing the DMG the target deals.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Enters the Hyperposition state and copies the following Basic Attacks and Shadow Prism Attacks. The effect does not stack.\\n- Copies the following <color=#D91414>1/2/4</color> Basic Attacks and Shadow Prism Attacks based on the number of orbs pinged.', 2: 'Co-Bot: Immediately launches a dash attack at the current target, dealing Physical DMG and reducing the DMG the target deals.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG in total.\\n- Reduces the DMG the enemy deals by <color=#D91414>20%</color> for <color=#D91414>5</color>s. This effect can only be triggered once every <color=#D91414>2</color>s.'}

Title: {1: 'Basic Attack: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Basic Attack</color>', 2: 'Basic Attack: <color=#0d70bc>Co-Bot + Tap Basic Attack</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Attacks with laser beams to deal Physical DMG.', 2: 'Co-Bot: Automatically attacks the current target, dealing Physical DMG. The Co-Bot always stays on the field.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Attacks with laser beams to deal Physical DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG in total.', 2: 'Co-Bot: Automatically attacks the current target, dealing Physical DMG. The Co-Bot always stays on the field.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG in total.'}

Title: {1: 'Signature Move: <color=#0d70bc>120 Energy + Tap Signature + Quickly ping Blue Orb + Quickly tap Basic Attack</color>', 2: 'Signature Move: <color=#0d70bc>Co-Bot + Signature active</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: "When there is at least 120 energy, <color=#D91414>Signature - Shadow Prism Collapse</color> can be cast to unleash <color=#D91414>Enhanced Duskglow Realm</color> on the target's location, consuming all energy to enter the Quick Attack mode. Spends all Signal Orbs and Shadow Prism Energy to get unlimited Blue Orbs and extreme attack speed for 3s. When Quick Attack mode ends, the realm explodes to deal Dark DMG and empty No. 21: XXI's Energy, Blue Orbs and buffs. Creating Twilight Matrices during the Signature Move will increase the explosion's Extra DMG Bonus. Co-Bot: It will not perform other skills while the Signature Move is being cast. When Quick Attack mode ends, it releases a Force Wave to detonate all Twilight Matrices.", 2: 'Co-Bot: It will not perform other skills while the Signature Move is being cast. When Quick Attack mode ends, it releases a Force Wave to detonate all Twilight Matrices.'}
SpecificDes: {1: "When there is at least 120 energy, <color=#D91414>Signature - Shadow Prism Collapse</color> can be cast to unleash <color=#D91414>Enhanced Duskglow Realm</color> on the target's location, consuming all energy to enter the Quick Attack mode. Spends all Signal Orbs and Shadow Prism Energy to get unlimited Blue Orbs and extreme attack speed for 3s. When Quick Attack mode ends, the realm explodes to deal Dark DMG and empty No. 21: XXI's Energy, Blue Orbs and buffs. Creating Twilight Matrices during the Signature Move will increase the explosion's Extra DMG Bonus. Co-Bot: It will not perform other skills while the Signature Move is being cast. When Quick Attack mode ends, it releases a Force Wave to detonate all Twilight Matrices.\\n- During Signature Move, every Basic Attack deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG.\\n- The realm explosion deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Dark DMG.\\n- While casting the Signature Move, creating <color=#D91414>1/2/3/4/5</color> Twilight Matrices will increase the explosion's Extra DMG Bonus by <color=#D91414>40/80/120/160/200%</color>.\\n- When there are <color=#D91414>6</color> Twilight Matrices, the Signature Move will achieve an <color=#D91414>S</color> Rank, increasing the explosion DMG by <color=#D91414>300%</color>.", 2: 'Co-Bot: It will not perform other skills while the Signature Move is being cast. When Quick Attack mode ends, it releases a Force Wave to detonate all Twilight Matrices.'}

Title: {1: 'QTE: <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: "Expands a <color=#D91414>Duskglow Realm</color> on the target's location to deal Dark DMG, creates <color=#D91414>3</color> Twilight Matrices, and triggers a realm collapse."}
SpecificDes: {1: "Expands a <color=#D91414>Duskglow Realm</color> on the target's location to deal Dark DMG, creates <color=#D91414>3</color> Twilight Matrices, and triggers a realm collapse.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG."}

WeaponSkillDes: Wide-Energy Pressure Core: Whenever No. 21: XXI performs Shadow Prism attacks, a QTE, or disrupts incoming enemy attacks, the Co-Bot unleashes a <color=#FF6347>Force Wave</color> that deals <color=#FF6347>50%</color> AOE Dark DMG to enemies (only triggers once per second). Energy Suppression Unit: Hitting allies with Force Wave will grant them <color=#FF6347>Energy Suppression</color> for 3s. Energy Suppression: Dark DMG reduces the enemy's healing received by <color=#FF6347>100%</color> for 3s. Impulse Fort Module: When the Force Wave detonates <color=#FF6347>6</color> Twilight Matrices at once, the Co-Bot enters Fortification mode, unleashing a hyper-pulse that deals Dark DMG equal to <color=#D91414>200%</color> of No. 21: XXI's ATK (DMG scales with Core Passive level). Inver-Resonance Unit 2.0: Increases the Extra DMG Bonus of No. 21: XXI's Twilight Matrix and <color=#FF6347>Resonance Pulse</color> by <color=#FF6347>15%</color>.
Title: {1: 'Shadow Prism Attack: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Basic Attack consecutively</color>', 2: 'Resonance Pulse: <color=#0d70bc>Co-Bot + Twilight Matrix present</color>', 3: 'Instant Dodge: <color=#0d70bc>Uncontrollable state + Tap Dodge</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: "No. 21: XXI's Basic Attack will generate <color=#D91414>Shadow Prism Energy</color>. Upon reaching a certain level of <color=#D91414>Shadow Prism Energy</color>, the next Basic Attack will empty all <color=#D91414>Shadow Prism Energy</color> to cast a <color=#D91414>Shadow Prism Attack</color> and create <color=#D91414>1</color> Twilight Matrix on the target's location that deals Dark DMG and knocks the target down. When generated, the Twilight Matrix grants No. 21: XXI Signature Energy and Dodge Energy.", 2: "When the Co-Bot's Force Wave destroys a Twilight Matrix, it will trigger a <color=#D91414>Resonance Pulse</color>, dealing Dark DMG to nearby enemies.", 3: "When No. 21: XXI is uncontrollable (when attacked, downed, or in mid-air), press the Dodge button to perform Instant Dodge with extra Dodge Energy to negate all uncontrollable states and create <color=#D91414>1</color> Twilight Matrix on the target's location. Instant Dodge grants No. 21: XXI Super Armor and Shield."}
SpecificDes: {1: "No. 21: XXI's Basic Attack will generate <color=#D91414>Shadow Prism Energy</color>. Upon reaching a certain level of <color=#D91414>Shadow Prism Energy</color>, the next Basic Attack will empty all <color=#D91414>Shadow Prism Energy</color> to cast a <color=#D91414>Shadow Prism Attack</color> and create <color=#D91414>1</color> Twilight Matrix on the target's location that deals Dark DMG and knocks the target down. When generated, the Twilight Matrix grants No.21: XXI Signature Energy and Dodge Energy.\\n- Each Basic Attack generates <color=#D91414>1</color> Shadow Prism Energy. Upon reaching <color=#D91414>4</color> Shadow Prism Energy, <color=#D91414>Shadow Prism Attack</color> will be unleashed.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG.\\n- Twilight Matrix lasts <color=#D91414>3</color>s. When generated, it grants No.21: XXI <color=#D91414>2</color> Signature Energy and <color=#D91414>50</color> Dodge Energy.", 2: "When the Co-Bot's Force Wave destroys a Twilight Matrix, it will trigger a <color=#D91414>Resonance Pulse</color>, dealing Dark DMG to nearby enemies.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG to nearby enemies.", 3: "When No. 21: XXI is uncontrollable (when attacked, downed, or in mid-air), press the Dodge button to perform Instant Dodge with extra Dodge Energy to negate all uncontrollable states and create <color=#D91414>1</color> Twilight Matrix on the target's location. Instant Dodge grants No. 21: XXI Super Armor and Shield.  \\n- Instant Dodge costs <color=#D91414>1.2</color>x Dodge Energy (<color=#D91414>300</color>).\\n- Instant Dodge grants No. 21: XXI Super Armor for <color=#D91414>2</color>s and Shield equal to <color=#D91414>15%</color> of max HP."}

BriefDes: {1: 'Dodge Gauge limit and Extra DMG Bonus of team members increase.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Dodge Gauge limit and Extra DMG Bonus of team members increase by <color=#D91414>250</color> and <color=#D91414>5%</color> respectively.'}

BriefDes: {1: "Attacks reduce the target's Extra DMG Reduction."}
SpecificDes: {1: "Attacks reduce the target's Extra DMG Reduction by <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> for <color=#D91414>5</color>s."}

BriefDes: {1: 'Gains 3 Signal Orbs when entering battle.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Gains 3 Signal Orbs when entering battle.'}

BriefDes: {1: 'When No. 21: XXI has Shield, her Extra DMG Bonus increases. If not, her Extra DMG Reduction increases. A Blue 3-Ping will fully restore Shadow Prism Energy (inactive when performing her Signature Move).'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'When No. 21: XXI has Shield, her Extra DMG Bonus increases by <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>. If not, her Extra DMG Reduction increases by <color=#D91414>{1}%</color>. A Blue 3-Ping will fully restore Shadow Prism Energy (inactive when performing her Signature Move).'}

BriefDes: {1: 'When creating a Twilight Matrix, grants allies on the field Extra DMG Reduction and Extra Dodge Gauge Recovery Speed. Enemies in the <color=#D91414>Duskglow Realm</color> will be afflicted with <color=#D91414>Chain Fusion</color> (Dark Resistance decreases) over time.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'When creating a Twilight Matrix, grants allies on the field <color=#D91414>20%</color> Extra DMG Reduction and <color=#D91414>25%</color> Extra Dodge Gauge Recovery Speed for <color=#D91414>2</color>s. This effect can stack up to <color=#D91414>3</color> times. The duration will not reset when it is re-triggered. Enemies in the <color=#D91414>Duskglow Realm</color> will be afflicted with <color=#D91414>Chain Fusion</color> (Dark Resistance decreases by <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>) for <color=#D91414>5</color>s.'}

BriefDes: {1: "When her Signature Move achieves an S rank, the Extra DMG Bonus of the explosion from <color=#D91414>Duskglow Realm</color> increases. The Co-Bot's attacks will grant all allies on the field Shield."}
SpecificDes: {1: "When her Signature Move achieves an S rank, the Extra DMG Bonus of the explosion from <color=#D91414>Duskglow Realm</color> increases by <color=#D91414>210%</color>. The Co-Bot's attacks will grant all allies on the field Shield equal to <color=#D91414>2%</color> (stacking up to <color=#D91414>10%</color>) of No. 21: XXI's max HP."}
