SpecificDes: {1: 'Launches multiple attacks using the Chain Blade, dealing Physical DMG. Tap the white Signal Orb before the end of the <color=#D91414>2nd/3rd/4th</color> hit to connect with combo <color=#D91414>1/2/3</color>.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG in total.', 2: 'Turns around and kicks the target up, dealing Physical DMG and generating <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color>.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>110%</color> Physical DMG in total.\\n- Generates <color=#D91414>10</color> <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color>.', 3: 'Dashes forward and spins multiple times, dealing Physical DMG and generating <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color>. Gains Super Armor while casting this combo.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>135%</color> Physical DMG in total.\\n- Generates <color=#D91414>20</color> <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color>.', 4: 'Leaps up to launch multiple attacks with the gun and Chain Blade, dealing Fire DMG and generating <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color>.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>170%</color> Fire DMG in total.\\n- Generates <color=#D91414>30</color> <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color>.', 5: 'While in the <color=#D91414>Apex of Trickery</color> state, attacks multiple times with the ignited blade, dealing Fire DMG with <color=#D91414>Trickery Points</color>.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG with <color=#D91414>25</color> <color=#D91414>Trickery Points</color>.'}

Title: {1: 'Signature Move: <color=#0d70bc>100 Energy + Tap Signature</color>', 2: 'Signature Move: <color=#0d70bc>Apex of Trickery state</color>', 3: 'Incinerating Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Incinerating Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Launches multiple area attacks with the Chain Blade to deal Fire DMG and enter the <color=#D91414>Apex of Trickery</color> state, gaining <color=#D91414>Trickery Points</color> and <color=#D91414>Incinerating Orb</color>.', 2: 'During <color=#D91414>Apex of Trickery</color>, <color=#D91414>Trickery Points</color> are consumed every second. Basic Attacks and Signal Orb skills are enhanced but cost extra <color=#D91414>Trickery Points</color>. Once all <color=#D91414>Trickery Points</color> are used up, Roland leaves <color=#D91414>Apex of Trickery</color> and the <color=#D91414>Incinerating Orb</color> also disappears.', 3: 'Fires multiple incinerating bullets forward, dealing Fire DMG with 1 <color=#D91414>Incinerating Orb</color>. Gains Super Armor while casting this move.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Launches multiple area attacks with the Chain Blade to deal Fire DMG and enter the <color=#D91414>Apex of Trickery</color> state, gaining <color=#D91414>Trickery Points</color> and <color=#D91414>Incinerating Orb</color>.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG in total.\\n- Enters the <color=#D91414>Apex of Trickery</color> state, gaining <color=#D91414>150</color> <color=#D91414>Trickery Points</color> and <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Incinerating Orb</color>.', 2: 'During <color=#D91414>Apex of Trickery</color>, <color=#D91414>Trickery Points</color> are consumed every second. Basic Attacks and Signal Orb skills are enhanced but cost extra <color=#D91414>Trickery Points</color>. Once all <color=#D91414>Trickery Points</color> are used up, Roland leaves <color=#D91414>Apex of Trickery</color> and the <color=#D91414>Incinerating Orb</color> also disappears.\\n- While in the <color=#D91414>Apex of Trickery</color> state, <color=#D91414>5</color> <color=#D91414>Trickery Points</color> are consumed every second.', 3: 'Fires multiple incinerating bullets forward, dealing Fire DMG with 1 <color=#D91414>Incinerating Orb</color>. Gains Super Armor while casting this move.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG in total.'}

Title: {1: 'QTE: <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Hangs on the Chain Blade and swings across the battlefield, launching 4 incendiary bombs toward the ground that deal Fire DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Hangs on the Chain Blade and swings across the battlefield, launching 4 incendiary bombs toward the ground that deal Fire DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG in total.'}

Title: {1: 'Core Passive: <color=#0d70bc>Trigger valid combos</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: "The Basic Attack combo DMG ratio is adjusted. Gains <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color> based on the combo type upon triggering <color=#D91414>valid combos</color>. Roland's Red/Yellow/Blue Orbs are unlocked when there are a certain amount of <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color>. Each time the 1st or 2nd hit of a Signal Orb skill is cast, <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color> will be consumed to generate Energy. The combos of Basic Attacks and Signal Orb skills can be viewed in the description of each skill. <color=#D91414>Valid combos</color>: The Basic Attack combo launched within 1s after dealing DMG from Basic Attacks. Upon triggering Matrix, the next Signal Orb skill cast does not consume any <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color> or <color=#D91414>Trickery Points</color>. Roland cannot gain Signal Orbs from Basic Attacks. When he is switched off battle, he gains <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color>. Signal Orbs gained from any other source would be directly converted into <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color> or Energy, prioritizing <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color>."}
SpecificDes: {1: "The Basic Attack combo DMG ratio is adjusted. Gains <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color> based on the combo type upon triggering <color=#D91414>valid combos</color>. Roland's Red/Yellow/Blue Orbs are unlocked when there are a certain amount of <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color>. Each time the 1st or 2nd hit of a Signal Orb skill is cast, <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color> will be consumed to generate Energy. The combos of Basic Attacks and Signal Orb skills can be viewed in the description of each skill. <color=#D91414>Valid combos</color>: The Basic Attack combo launched within 1s after dealing DMG from Basic Attacks. Upon triggering Matrix, the next Signal Orb skill cast does not consume any <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color> or <color=#D91414>Trickery Points</color>. Roland cannot gain Signal Orbs from Basic Attacks. When he is switched off battle, he gains <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color>. Signal Orbs gained from any other source would be directly converted into <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color> or Energy, prioritizing <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color>.\\n- The Basic Attack combo DMG ratio changes to <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>.\\n- Gains <color=#D91414>10/20/30</color> <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color> (up to <color=#D91414>90</color>) based on the combo type.\\n- Red/Yellow/Blue Orbs are unlocked when there are at least <color=#D91414>30</color> <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color>.\\n- Each time the 1st or 2nd hit of a Signal Orb skill is cast, <color=#D91414>30</color> <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color> will be consumed to generate <color=#D91414>10</color> Energy.\\n- Upon triggering Matrix, the next Signal Orb skill cast within <color=#D91414>10s</color> does not consume any <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color> or <color=#D91414>Trickery Points</color>.\\n- Gains <color=#D91414>60</color> <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color> when switched off battle.\\n- Signal Orbs gained from any other source would be directly converted into <color=#D91414>10</color> <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color> or <color=#D91414>5</color> Energy."}

BriefDes: {1: 'Increases Fire DMG of all members. Increases ATK of all Vanguard Uniframes in the team.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Increases Fire DMG of all members by <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>. Increases ATK of all Vanguard Uniframes in the team by <color=#D91414>{1}%</color>.'}

BriefDes: {1: 'Gains Extra DMG Bonus and Shield when the character enters the battlefield.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Gains <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Extra DMG Bonus and Shield that absorbs damage up to <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> of max HP for <color=#D91414>10</color>s when the character enters the battlefield.'}

BriefDes: {1: 'Immediately gains 30 <color=#D91414> Deception Points</color> upon entering battle for the first time.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Immediately gains 30 <color=#D91414> Deception Points</color> upon entering battle for the first time.'}

BriefDes: {1: 'The Extra DMG Bonus of regular Signal Orb skills increases. Gains <color=#D91414>2</color> extra enhanced Signal Orbs when triggering Matrix in the regular form.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'The Extra DMG Bonus of regular Signal Orb skills increases by <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>. Gains <color=#D91414>2</color> extra enhanced Signal Orbs when triggering Matrix in the regular form.'}

BriefDes: {1: 'The <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color> limit increases. Gains bonus <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color> each time entering the battlefield. Gains bonus Energy after casting a basic Signal Orb skill. The Extra DMG Bonus of Signature Move increases.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'The <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color> limit increases by <color=#D91414>60</color>. Gains <color=#D91414>30</color> bonus <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color> each time entering the battlefield. Gains <color=#D91414>5</color> bonus Energy after casting a basic Signal Orb skill. The Extra DMG Bonus of Signature Move increases by <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>.'}

BriefDes: {1: 'During <color=#D91414>Apex of Trickery</color>, Fire DMG increases and the Extra DMG Bonus of Signal Orb skills increases. After casting a Signature Move, the cooldown of Matrix is reset.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'During <color=#D91414>Apex of Trickery</color>, Fire DMG increases by <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> and the Extra DMG Bonus of Signal Orb skills increases by <color=#D91414>{1}%</color>. After casting a Signature Move, the cooldown of Matrix is reset.'}

Title: {1: 'Red Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Red Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Liv: Empyrea unleashes an energy beam, pulling enemies in a large area and dealing Physical DMG (Fire DMG instead on a 3-Ping) to them.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Liv: Empyrea unleashes an energy beam, pulling enemies in a large area and dealing Physical DMG (Fire DMG instead on a 3-Ping) to them.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.'}

Title: {1: 'Yellow Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Yellow Orb + Hold the joystick</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Liv: Empyrea dashes in the direction of the joystick and strikes with her glowing feathers, dealing Physical DMG (Fire DMG instead on a 3-Ping) to the target and its nearby units.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Liv: Empyrea dashes in the direction of the joystick and strikes with her glowing feathers, dealing Physical DMG (Fire DMG instead on a 3-Ping) to the target and its nearby units.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.'}

Title: {1: 'Blue Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Blue Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Liv: Empyrea creates an energy matrix to deal Physical DMG (Fire DMG instead on a 3-Ping) to enemies in a rectangular area and imprison them based on the number of orbs pinged.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Liv: Empyrea creates an energy matrix to deal Physical DMG (Fire DMG instead on a 3-Ping) to enemies in a rectangular area and imprison them based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- Imprisons for <color=#D91414>1.5/2/2.5</color>s based on the number of orbs pinged.'}

Title: {1: 'Basic Attack: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Basic Attack</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Performs beam attacks with her Scepter and drones, dealing Physical DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Performs beam attacks with her Scepter and drones, dealing Physical DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG in total.'}

Title: {1: 'Signature Move: <color=#0d70bc>80 Energy + Tap Signature</color>', 2: 'Empyrea State: <color=#0d70bc>Empyreal Prayer + Ping any orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'When there is at least 80 energy, Liv: Empyrea can cast <color=#D91414>Signature - Sea of Sangharama</color> to consume all energy and enter <color=#D91414>Empyreal State</color> with her M.I.N.D. plunged into a corrupted data space, gaining full <color=#D91414>Prayer</color> and <color=#D91414>6</color> random Signal Orbs (with a guaranteed set of 3-Ping orbs) while triggering <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color>.', 2: 'While in <color=#D91414>Empyreal State</color>, double tapping the Dodge button will trigger <color=#D91414>Empyreal Prayer</color>, during which <color=#D91414>Empyreal Prayer</color> can be amplified by pinging <color=#D91414>3 sets</color> of orbs of any color. When <color=#D91414>Empyreal Prayer</color> ends, Liv performs <color=#D91414>Empyreal Oath</color>, dealing Fire DMG to targets in an extremely large area while triggering <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color>. If <color=#D91414>Empyreal Prayer</color> is not triggered, <color=#D91414>Empyreal Oath</color> will be performed without any amplification when <color=#D91414>Empyreal State</color> ends.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'When there is at least 80 energy, Liv: Empyrea can cast <color=#D91414>Signature - Sea of Sangharama</color> to consume all energy and enter <color=#D91414>Empyreal State</color> with her M.I.N.D. plunged into a corrupted data space, gaining full <color=#D91414>Prayer</color> and <color=#D91414>6</color> random Signal Orbs (with a guaranteed set of 3-Ping orbs) while triggering <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color>.', 2: 'While in <color=#D91414>Empyreal State</color>, double tapping the Dodge button will trigger <color=#D91414>Empyreal Prayer</color>, during which <color=#D91414>Empyreal Prayer</color> can be amplified by pinging <color=#D91414>3 sets</color> of orbs of any color. When <color=#D91414>Empyreal Prayer</color> ends, Liv performs <color=#D91414>Empyreal Oath</color>, dealing Fire DMG to targets in an extremely large area while triggering <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color>. If <color=#D91414>Empyreal Prayer</color> is not triggered, <color=#D91414>Empyreal Oath</color> will be performed without any amplification when <color=#D91414>Empyreal State</color> ends.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG.\\n- <color=#D91414>1/2/3</color>-Ping grants <color=#D91414>Empyreal Prayer</color> <color=#D91414>1/2/4</color> stack(s) of amplification and each stack increases the base multiplier by <color=#D91414>0.5</color>.'}

Title: {1: 'QTE: <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Dives into battle and releases an energy blast in the air, dealing Fire DMG and restoring HP.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Dives into battle and releases an energy blast in the air, dealing Fire DMG and restoring HP.\\n- Deals a total of <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG and restores HP equal to <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> of her ATK.'}

Title: {1: 'Divine Prayer: <color=#0d70bc>Double tap Dodge</color>', 2: 'Purity Oath: <color=#0d70bc>Divine Prayer + Same-colored 3-Pings</color>', 3: 'Chaos Oath: <color=#0d70bc>Divine Prayer + Different-colored 3-Pings</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Basic Attacks and pinging orbs accumulate Prayer. When it is full, <color=#D91414>double tapping</color> the Dodge button triggers <color=#D91414>Divine Prayer</color> that grants DMG Reduction. While in Divine Prayer, it is allowed to ping 2 sets of orbs. The orbs pinged during the prayer will amplify it and increase the base multiplier. Each time orbs are pinged, triggers <color=#D91414>Prayer Ripple</color> that deals Fire DMG to enemies, imprisons them, and heals allies. When <color=#D91414>Core Passive - Ode for Everlight</color> reaches Lv.22, entering <color=#D91414>Divine Prayer</color> will grant <color=#D91414>1</color> random Signal Orb, and casting Oaths will restore Dodge Energy.', 2: 'If both sets of Signal Orbs are of the same color, triggers <color=#D91414>Purity Oath</color> that deals AOE Fire DMG.', 3: 'If the two sets of Signal Orbs have different colors, triggers <color=#D91414>Chaos Oath</color> that pulls enemies in an extremely large area, dealing Fire DMG to them and <color=#D91414>a small amount of dodgeable DMG to Liv: Empyrea</color>.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Basic Attacks and pinging orbs accumulate Prayer. When it is full, <color=#D91414>double tapping</color> the Dodge button triggers <color=#D91414>Divine Prayer</color> that grants DMG Reduction. While in Divine Prayer, it is allowed to ping 2 sets of orbs. The orbs pinged during the prayer will amplify it and increase the base multiplier. Each time orbs are pinged, triggers <color=#D91414>Prayer Ripple</color> that deals Fire DMG to enemies, imprisons them, and heals allies. When <color=#D91414>Core Passive - Ode for Everlight</color> reaches Lv.22, entering <color=#D91414>Divine Prayer</color> will grant <color=#D91414>1</color> random Signal Orb, and casting Oaths will restore Dodge Energy.\\n- <color=#D91414>Divine Prayer</color> grants <color=#D91414>70%</color> DMG Reduction.\\n- During the prayer, <color=#D91414>1/2/3</color>-Ping grants <color=#D91414>1/2/4</color> stack(s) of amplification to the prayer, and each stack increases the base multiplier by <color=#D91414>0.5</color>.\\n- <color=#D91414>Prayer Ripple</color> deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG to the enemies, imprisons them for <color=#D91414>2</color>s, and heals allies for <color=#D91414>7.5%</color> of their max HP.\\n- When <color=#D91414>Core Passive - Ode for Everlight</color> reaches Lv.22, entering <color=#D91414>Divine Prayer</color> will grant <color=#D91414>1</color> random Signal Orb, and casting Oaths will restore <color=#D91414>100</color> Dodge Energy.', 2: 'If both sets of Signal Orbs are of the same color, triggers <color=#D91414>Purity Oath</color> that deals AOE Fire DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG.', 3: 'If the two sets of Signal Orbs have different colors, triggers <color=#D91414>Chaos Oath</color> that pulls enemies in an extremely large area, dealing Fire DMG to them and <color=#D91414>a small amount of dodgeable DMG to Liv: Empyrea</color>.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG.'}

Title: {1: 'Divine Prayer: <color=#0d70bc>Press and hold Dodge</color>', 2: 'Purity Oath: <color=#0d70bc>Divine Prayer + Same-colored 3-Pings</color>', 3: 'Chaos Oath: <color=#0d70bc>Divine Prayer + Different-colored 3-Pings</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Basic Attacks and pinging orbs accumulate Prayer. When it is full, <color=#D91414>press and hold</color> the Dodge button to trigger <color=#D91414>Divine Prayer</color> that grants DMG Reduction. While in <color=#D91414>Divine Prayer</color>, it is allowed to ping 2 sets of orbs. The orbs pinged during the prayer will amplify it and increase the base multiplier. Each time orbs are pinged, triggers <color=#D91414>Prayer Ripple</color> that deals Fire DMG to enemies, imprisons them, and heals allies. When <color=#D91414>Core Passive - Ode for Everlight</color> reaches Lv.22, entering <color=#D91414>Divine Prayer</color> will grant <color=#D91414>1</color> random Signal Orb, and casting Oaths will restore Dodge Energy.', 2: 'If both sets of Signal Orbs are of the same color, triggers <color=#D91414>Purity Oath</color> that deals AOE Fire DMG.', 3: 'If the two sets of Signal Orbs have different colors, triggers <color=#D91414>Chaos Oath</color> that pulls enemies in an extremely large area, dealing Fire DMG to them and <color=#D91414>a small amount of dodgeable DMG to Liv: Empyrea</color>.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Basic Attacks and pinging orbs accumulate Prayer. When it is full, <color=#D91414>press and hold</color> the Dodge button to trigger <color=#D91414>Divine Prayer</color> that grants DMG Reduction. While in <color=#D91414>Divine Prayer</color>, it is allowed to ping 2 sets of orbs. The orbs pinged during the prayer will amplify it and increase the base multiplier. Each time orbs are pinged, triggers <color=#D91414>Prayer Ripple</color> that deals Fire DMG to enemies, imprisons them, and heals allies. When <color=#D91414>Core Passive - Ode for Everlight</color> reaches Lv.22, entering <color=#D91414>Divine Prayer</color> will grant <color=#D91414>1</color> random Signal Orb, and casting Oaths will restore Dodge Energy.\\n- <color=#D91414>Divine Prayer</color> grants <color=#D91414>70%</color> DMG Reduction.\\n- During the prayer, <color=#D91414>1/2/3</color>-Ping grants <color=#D91414>1/2/4</color> stack(s) of amplification to the prayer, and each stack increases the base multiplier by <color=#D91414>0.5</color>.\\n- <color=#D91414>Prayer Ripple</color> deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG to the enemies, imprisons them for <color=#D91414>2</color>s, and heals allies for <color=#D91414>7.5%</color> of their max HP.\\n- When <color=#D91414>Core Passive - Ode for Everlight</color> reaches Lv.22, entering <color=#D91414>Divine Prayer</color> will grant <color=#D91414>1</color> random Signal Orb, and casting Oaths will restore <color=#D91414>100</color> Dodge Energy.', 2: 'If both sets of Signal Orbs are of the same color, triggers <color=#D91414>Purity Oath</color> that deals AOE Fire DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG.', 3: 'If the two sets of Signal Orbs have different colors, triggers <color=#D91414>Chaos Oath</color> that pulls enemies in an extremely large area, dealing Fire DMG to them and <color=#D91414>a small amount of dodgeable DMG to Liv: Empyrea</color>.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG.'}

BriefDes: {1: 'Increases ATK of all members. Increases Extra DMG of all Amplifiers in the team.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Increases ATK of all members by <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>. Increases Extra DMG of all Amplifiers in the team by <color=#D91414>{1}%</color>.'}

BriefDes: {1: "All switched-in members gain extra ATK and Elemental DMG Bonus of the Amplifier's element."}
SpecificDes: {1: "All switched-in members gain an extra <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> ATK and <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Elemental DMG Bonus of the Amplifier's element for <color=#D91414>10</color>s."}

BriefDes: {1: 'Gains 3 Signal Orbs when entering battle.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Gains 3 Signal Orbs when entering battle.'}

BriefDes: {1: 'Entering Matrix outside of <color=#D91414>Empyreal State</color> automatically triggers <color=#D91414>Divine Prayer</color> with <color=#D91414>4</color> stacks of amplification based on the color of currently available orbs. When Liv: Empyrea heals her allies, grants <color=#D91414>Fire Tempered</color> to them. <color=#D91414>Fire Tempered</color>: Fire DMG Bonus increases.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Entering Matrix outside of <color=#D91414>Empyreal State</color> automatically triggers <color=#D91414>Divine Prayer</color> with <color=#D91414>4</color> stacks of amplification based on the color of currently available orbs. When Liv: Empyrea heals her allies, grants <color=#D91414>Fire Tempered</color> to them for <color=#D91414>8</color>s. <color=#D91414>Fire Tempered</color>: Fire DMG Bonus increases by <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>.'}

BriefDes: {1: "Amplifiers' Class Skill effect increases, <color=#D91414>Core Passive - Ode for Everlight</color> charges faster, and the Fire DMG Bonus granted by <color=#D91414>Fire Tempered</color> increases. While performing <color=#D91414>Signature - Sea of Sangharama</color>, reaching <color=#D91414>8</color> stacks of amplification within the first 2 pings during <color=#D91414>Empyreal Prayer</color> will grant 3 random Signal Orbs of the same color."}
SpecificDes: {1: "Amplifiers' Class Skill effect increases by <color=#D91414>100%</color>, <color=#D91414>Core Passive - Ode for Everlight</color> charges <color=#D91414>100%</color> faster, and the Fire DMG Bonus granted by <color=#D91414>Fire Tempered</color> increases to <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>. While performing <color=#D91414>Signature - Sea of Sangharama</color>, reaching <color=#D91414>8</color> stacks of amplification within the first 2 pings during <color=#D91414>Empyreal Prayer</color> will grant 3 random Signal Orbs of the same color."}

BriefDes: {1: 'Liv: Empyrea gains Signature Energy when switched in. If the amplification stacks are maximized during <color=#D91414>Empyreal Prayer</color> while casting <color=#D91414>Signature - Sea of Sangharama</color>, <color=#D91414>Empyreal Oath</color> will deal <color=#D91414>1.5x</color> DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Liv: Empyrea gains <color=#D91414>40</color> Signature Energy when switched in. Upon a 3-Ping, deals Dark DMG instead and gains Super Armor while casting this skill.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.'}

Title: {1: 'Realm of Capriccio: <color=#0d70bc>80 Energy + Tap Signature</color>', 2: 'Shooting Star: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Shooting Star Orb</color>', 3: 'Reprise: Twin Stars: <color=#0d70bc>All Shooting Star Orbs consumed</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Signature Move: Consumes 80 Energy to activate <color=#D91414>Realm of Capriccio</color>, gaining Extra DMG Reduction. Selena: Capriccio gains 5 <color=#D91414>Shooting Stars</color>. At the end of <color=#D91414>Realm of Capriccio</color>, all Signal Orbs will be rearranged in the order of Red-Blue-Yellow.', 2: 'Each time a <color=#D91414>Shooting Star</color> is cast, Selena: Capriccio will dash toward the target, dealing Dark DMG.', 3: 'When all <color=#D91414>Shooting Stars</color> are consumed, Selena: Capriccio will control all phantoms to launch a follow-up attack to cast <color=#D91414>Reprise: Twin Stars</color> again, then she will play her Flute Sword to trigger <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> and order all phantoms to attack the enemy with the phantom dealing Dark DMG. Meanwhile, Realm of Capriccio will be detonated, dealing Dark DMG while leaving a phantom behind, healing ally units within the range every second.'}
SpecificDes: {1: "Signature Move: Consumes 80 Energy to activate <color=#D91414>Realm of Capriccio</color>, gaining Extra DMG Reduction. Selena: Capriccio gains 5 <color=#D91414>Shooting Stars</color>. At the end of <color=#D91414>Realm of Capriccio</color>, all Signal Orbs will be rearranged in the order of Red-Blue-Yellow.\\n- Selena: Capriccio's Extra DMG Reduction increases by <color=#D91414>50%</color> in <color=#D91414>Realm of Capriccio</color>.", 2: 'Each time a <color=#D91414>Shooting Star</color> is cast, Selena: Capriccio will dash toward the target, dealing Dark DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG.', 3: "When all <color=#D91414>Shooting Stars</color> are consumed, Selena: Capriccio will control all phantoms to launch a follow-up attack to cast <color=#D91414>Reprise: Twin Stars</color> again, then she will play her Flute Sword to trigger <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> and order all phantoms to attack the enemy with the phantom dealing Dark DMG. Meanwhile, Realm of Capriccio will be detonated, dealing Dark DMG while leaving a phantom behind, healing ally units within the range every second.\\n- Every phantom deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG.\\n- The realm explosion deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Dark DMG in total.\\n- The phantom heals ally units within the range for HP equal to <color=#D91414>30%</color> of Selena: Capriccio's ATK per second over <color=#D91414>5</color>s."}

Title: {1: 'QTE: <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Selena: Capriccio leaps into battle and plays her Flute Sword, dealing Dark DMG and restoring HP.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Selena: Capriccio leaps into battle and plays her Flute Sword, dealing Dark DMG and restoring HP.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG and heals for HP equal to <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> of her ATK.'}

Title: {1: 'Core Passive: <color=#0d70bc>Any 3-Ping + Hold the joystick</color>', 2: 'Core Passive: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Shooting Star Orb + Hold the joystick</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Upon a 3-Ping, moving the joystick will cause Selena: Capriccio to summon a phantom. The phantom will continue to cast the original skill, and Selena herself will gain Super Armor and cast <color=#D91414>Reprise: Echo</color> instead.', 2: 'When casting a <color=#D91414>Shooting Star</color>, moving the joystick will cause Selena: Capriccio to cast an additional <color=#D91414>Reprise: Twin Stars</color>, dealing Dark DMG while summoning a phantom at the original location.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Upon a 3-Ping, moving the joystick will cause Selena: Capriccio to summon a phantom. The phantom will continue to cast the original skill, and Selena herself will gain Super Armor and cast <color=#D91414>Reprise: Echo</color> instead.\\n- Each <color=#D91414>Reprise: Echo</color> cast by pinging Red/Yellow/Blue Orbs deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Dark DMG.', 2: 'When casting a <color=#D91414>Shooting Star</color>, moving the joystick will cause Selena: Capriccio to cast an additional <color=#D91414>Reprise: Twin Stars</color>, dealing Dark DMG while summoning a phantom at the original location.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG.'}

BriefDes: {1: 'Gains 3 Signal Orbs when entering battle.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Gains 3 Signal Orbs when entering battle.'}

BriefDes: {1: 'Upon entering battle, Selena: Capriccio heals herself. When Selena: Capriccio casts <color=#D91414>Realm of Capriccio</color> to heal ally units, the excess healing will be converted into <color=#D91414>Song of Protection</color>. When Selena: Capriccio is within <color=#D91414>Realm of Capriccio</color>, she deals additional Dark DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Upon entering battle, Selena: Capriccio heals herself for HP equal to <color=#D91414>30%</color> of her ATK. When Selena: Capriccio is within <color=#D91414>Realm of Capriccio</color>, she deals <color=#D91414>10%</color> additional Dark DMG.'}

BriefDes: {1: 'The effect of Amplifier Class Skill increases and the Dark DMG Bonus of <color=#D91414>Dark Radiation</color> increases. The Extra DMG Bonus of <color=#D91414>Core Passive - Phantasia</color> increases. The healing duration of <color=#D91414>Realm of Capriccio</color> is extended.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'The effect of Amplifier Class Skill increases by <color=#D91414>100%</color>, and the Dark DMG Bonus of <color=#D91414>Dark Radiation</color> is increased to <color=#D91414>20%</color>. The Extra DMG Bonus of <color=#D91414>Core Passive - Phantasia</color> increases by <color=#D91414>20%</color>. The healing duration of <color=#D91414>Realm of Capriccio</color> is extended by <color=#D91414>5</color>s.'}

BriefDes: {1: 'While Selena: Capriccio is on standby, she gains Signature Energy each time a team member casts a 3-Ping. The Extra DMG Bonus of <color=#D91414>Signature Move - Dream Cosmos Suite</color> increases.'}

Title: {1: 'Core Passive: <color=#0d70bc>Whenever catching Dragon Axe</color>', 2: 'Core Passive: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Basic Attack/Ping any orb</color>', 3: 'Core Passive: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Any Orb + Catch Dragon Axe + Spend Dragon Force + Tap Basic Attack</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Whenever Pulao: Dragontoll catches Dragon Axe, she will throw it again, dealing the same effect as <color=#D91414>Spirit Blade: Dragon Throw</color>.', 2: 'Basic Attacks or pinging orbs will generate <color=#D91414>Dragon Force</color>.', 3: 'If Pulao: Dragontoll catches Dragon Axe when performing her Red/Blue/Yellow Orb skill, consumes <color=#D91414>Dragon Force</color> to unleash <color=#D91414>Dragon Force Combo</color>, with which tapping the Basic Attack button repeatedly will perform a follow-up combo that deals Physical DMG. While performing <color=#D91414>Dragon Force Combo</color> and the follow-up combo, Pulao: Dragontoll gains Super Armor and Extra DMG Reduction.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Whenever Pulao: Dragontoll catches Dragon Axe, she will throw it again, dealing the same effect as <color=#D91414>Spirit Blade: Dragon Throw</color>.', 2: 'Basic Attacks or pinging orbs will generate <color=#D91414>Dragon Force</color>.\\n- Basic Attacks generate <color=#D91414>3</color> <color=#D91414>Dragon Force</color>.\\n- <color=#D91414>3/6/12</color> <color=#D91414>Dragon Force</color> will be generated based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- Up to <color=#D91414>50</color> <color=#D91414>Dragon Force</color> can be stored.', 3: 'If Pulao: Dragontoll catches Dragon Axe when performing her Red/Blue/Yellow Orb skill, consumes <color=#D91414>Dragon Force</color> to unleash <color=#D91414>Dragon Force Combo</color>, with which tapping the Basic Attack button repeatedly will perform a follow-up combo that deals Physical DMG. While performing <color=#D91414>Dragon Force Combo</color> and the follow-up combo, Pulao: Dragontoll gains Super Armor and Extra DMG Reduction.\\n- <color=#D91414>Dragon Force Combo</color> consumes <color=#D91414>25</color> <color=#D91414>Dragon Force</color>.\\n- If Pulao: Dragontoll catches Dragon Axe when performing her Red/Blue/Yellow Orb skill and casts <color=#D91414>Dragon Force Combo</color>, tapping the Basic Attack button repeatedly can perform a follow-up combo that deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG in total.\\n- While performing <color=#D91414>Dragon Force Combo</color> and the follow-up combo, Pulao: Dragontoll gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>80%</color> Extra DMG Reduction.'}

Title: {1: 'Basic Attack: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Basic Attack</color>', 2: 'Basic Attack: <color=#0d70bc>Press and hold Basic Attack</color>', 3: 'Ironsoul Slice: <color=#0d70bc>"Rumbling" Mode + Tap Basic Attack</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Launches a multiple-hit attack with the Mega Saw to deal Fire DMG.', 2: 'Press and hold to keep slashing the enemy with the Mega Saw, dealing Fire DMG.', 3: 'When Nanami: Starfarer is in the <color=#D91414>"Rumbling" Mode</color>, tap Basic Attack to cast <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice I</color>, <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice II</color>, and <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice III</color> in a loop, dealing Fire DMG. <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice I</color> will also pull the targets in.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Launches a multiple-hit attack with the Mega Saw to deal Fire DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG in total.', 2: 'Press and hold to keep slashing the enemy with the Mega Saw, dealing Fire DMG.\\n- Each hit deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG.', 3: 'When Nanami: Starfarer is in the <color=#D91414>"Rumbling" Mode</color>, tap Basic Attack to cast <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice I</color>, <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice II</color>, and <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice III</color> in a loop, dealing Fire DMG. <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice I</color> will also pull the targets in.\\n- <<color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice I</color>, <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice II</color>, and <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice III</color> deal <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Fire DMG respectively.'}

Title: {1: 'Blade Flash: <color=#0d70bc>80 Energy + Tap Signature</color>', 2: 'Gigabyte Star Strike: <color=#0d70bc>"Rumbling" Mode + 80 Energy + Tap Signature</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'When in Normal Form, Nanami: Starfarer casts <color=#D91414>Blade Flash</color> to use the left-arm flame saw to launch a powerful slash and detonate, dealing Fire DMG and entering the <color=#D91414>"Rumbling" Mode</color> immediately afterward.', 2: 'When in the <color=#D91414>"Rumbling" Mode</color>, Nanami: Starfarer casts <color=#D91414>Gigabyte Star Strike</color>, dealing AOE Fire DMG and triggering <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color>. After casting, <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice</color> will be reset and Nanami will exit the <color=#D91414>"Rumbling" Mode</color>.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'When in Normal Form, Nanami: Starfarer casts <color=#D91414>Blade Flash</color> to use the left-arm flame saw to launch a powerful slash and detonate, dealing Fire DMG and entering the <color=#D91414>"Rumbling" Mode</color> immediately afterward.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG in total.', 2: 'When in the <color=#D91414>"Rumbling" Mode</color>, Nanami: Starfarer casts <color=#D91414>Gigabyte Star Strike</color>, dealing AOE Fire DMG and triggering <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color>. After casting, <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice</color> will be reset and Nanami will exit the <color=#D91414>"Rumbling" Mode</color>.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> AOE Fire DMG.'}

Title: {1: 'QTE: <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Nanami: Starfarer comes down from above and smashes the ground, dealing AOE Fire DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Nanami: Starfarer comes down from above and smashes the ground, dealing AOE Fire DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> AOE Fire DMG.'}

Title: {1: 'Slide Mode: <color=#0d70bc>Press and hold Dodge/Cast Quantum Compression Shot/Flame Bombing</color>', 2: 'Bzzz Mode: <color=#0d70bc>"Rumbling" Mode + Cast Ironsoul Slice + Press and hold Basic Attack</color>', 3: 'Oops! Missed it!: <color=#0d70bc>"Bzzz" Mode + Press and hold Basic Attack, then release when charging halfway</color>', 4: 'Perfect!: <color=#0d70bc>"Bzzz" Mode + Press and hold Basic Attack, then release when charging more than halfway</color>', 5: 'Burning Blow: <color=#0d70bc>At least 200 Pressure + "Bzzz" Mode + Press and hold Basic Attack, then release when charging to the limit</color>', 6: 'Mirage Flash: <color=#0d70bc>"Bzzz" Mode + Release Basic Attack + Successful Dodge</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: "Press and hold Dodge or cast <color=#D91414>Quantum Compression Shot</color>/<color=#D91414>Flame Bombing</color> to trigger Nanami: Starfarer's Slide Mode, during which the above skills can be cast without intervals.", 2: 'When in the <color=#D91414>"Rumbling" Mode</color>, Nanami: Starfarer will gain a Pressure Gauge. When <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice</color> hits an enemy, press and hold Basic Attack to trigger the <color=#D91414>"Bzzz" Mode</color>, during which releasing the Basic Attack button at different timings will trigger <color=#D91414>"Oops! Missed it!"</color> or <color=#D91414>"Perfect!"</color>.', 3: '<color=#D91414>"Oops! Missed it!"</color> will grant Pressure and Signature Energy, during which time Nanami will gain Super Armor and Extra DMG Reduction. The <color=#D91414>"Oops! Missed it!"</color> variants triggered from <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice I</color>, <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice II</color>, and <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice III</color> all deal Fire DMG.', 4: '<color=#D91414>"Perfect!"</color> will grant Pressure and Signature Energy, during which time Nanami will gain Super Armor and Extra DMG Reduction. The <color=#D91414>"Perfect!"</color> variants triggered from <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice I</color>, <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice II</color>, and <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice III</color> all deal Fire DMG.', 5: 'When there is enough Pressure, press and hold Basic Attack to the limit to consume all Pressure and cast <color=#D91414>Burning Blow</color> to restore Signature Energy and grant the damage multiplier of <color=#D91414>"Perfect!"</color> plus a DMG Bonus based on the Pressure consumed to the corresponding <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice</color>. The Base DMG of this skill is increased based on the amount of Pressure consumed. Once the total damage is calculated, it will be recorded. When Nanami: Starfarer casts <color=#D91414>Gigabyte Star Strike</color>, she will become temporarily invincible and deal a portion of the recorded damage again, after which the record will be reset.', 6: 'Nanami: Starfarer is able to dodge incoming attacks during a brief period when she starts to cast <color=#D91414>"Oops! Missed it!"</color> and <color=#D91414>"Perfect!"</color>. Upon a successful dodge, she will cast <color=#D91414>Mirage Flash</color>, dealing Fire DMG and generating Pressure.'}
SpecificDes: {1: "Press and hold Dodge or cast <color=#D91414>Quantum Compression Shot</color>/<color=#D91414>Flame Bombing</color> to trigger Nanami: Starfarer's Slide Mode, during which the above skills can be cast without intervals.", 2: 'When in the <color=#D91414>"Rumbling" Mode</color>, Nanami: Starfarer will gain a Pressure Gauge. When <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice</color> hits an enemy, press and hold Basic Attack to trigger the <color=#D91414>"Bzzz" Mode</color>, during which releasing the Basic Attack button at different timings will trigger <color=#D91414>"Oops! Missed it!"</color> or <color=#D91414>"Perfect!"</color>.\\n- The Pressure Gauge has a limit of <color=#D91414>200</color>.', 3: '<color=#D91414>"Oops! Missed it!"</color> will grant Pressure and Signature Energy, during which time Nanami will gain Super Armor and Extra DMG Reduction. The <color=#D91414>"Oops! Missed it!"</color> variants triggered from <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice I, II, III</color> all deal Fire DMG.\\n- <color=#D91414>"Oops! Missed it!"</color> grants <color=#D91414>80</color> Pressure and <color=#D91414>32</color> Signature Energy.\\n- When casting <color=#D91414>"Oops! Missed it!"</color>, Nanami: Starfarer gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>50%</color> Extra DMG Reduction.\\n- The <color=#D91414>"Oops! Missed it!"</color> of <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice I</color> deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG.\\n- The <color=#D91414>"Oops! Missed it!"</color> of <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice II</color> deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Fire DMG.\\n- The <color=#D91414>"Oops! Missed it!"</color> of <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice III</color> deals <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Fire DMG.', 4: '<color=#D91414>"Perfect!"</color> will grant Pressure and Signature Energy, during which time Nanami will gain Super Armor and Extra DMG Reduction. The <color=#D91414>"Perfect!"</color> variants triggered from <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice I, II, III</color> all deal Fire DMG.\\n- <color=#D91414>"Perfect!"</color> grants <color=#D91414>120</color> Pressure and <color=#D91414>48</color> Signature Energy.\\n- When casting <color=#D91414>"Perfect!"</color>, Nanami: Starfarer gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>50%</color> Extra DMG Reduction.\\n- The <color=#D91414>"Perfect!"</color> of <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice I</color> deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG.\\n- The <color=#D91414>"Perfect!"</color> of <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice II</color> deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Fire DMG.\\n- The <color=#D91414>"Perfect!"</color> of <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice III</color> deals <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Fire DMG.', 5: 'When there is enough Pressure, press and hold Basic Attack to the limit to consume all Pressure and cast <color=#D91414>Burning Blow</color> to restore Signature Energy and grant the damage multiplier of <color=#D91414>"Perfect!"</color> plus a DMG Bonus based on the Pressure consumed to the corresponding <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice</color>. The Base DMG of this skill is increased based on the amount of Pressure consumed. Once the total damage is calculated, it will be recorded. When Nanami: Starfarer casts <color=#D91414>Gigabyte Star Strike</color>, she will become temporarily invincible and deal a portion of the recorded damage again, after which the record will be reset.\\n- <color=#D91414>Burning Blow</color> can be cast when there is at least <color=#D91414>200</color> Pressure.\\n- Casting <color=#D91414>Burning Blow</color> will restore <color=#D91414>60</color> Signature Energy.\\n- <color=#D91414>Burning Blow</color> grants the damage multiplier of <color=#D91414>"Perfect!"</color> plus a DMG Bonus based on the Pressure consumed to the corresponding <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice</color>. Its Base DMG increases by <color=#D91414>0.25%</color> for every point of Pressure consumed.\\n- Casting <color=#D91414>Gigabyte Star Strike</color> will deal <color=#D91414>50%</color> of the recorded damage again, after which the record will be reset.', 6: 'Nanami: Starfarer is able to dodge incoming attacks during a brief period when she starts to cast <color=#D91414>Oops! Missed it!"</color> and <color=#D91414>"Perfect!""</color>. Upon a successful dodge, she will cast <color=#D91414>Mirage Flash</color>, dealing Fire DMG and generating Pressure.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> AOE Fire DMG.\\n- Generates <color=#D91414>40</color> Pressure upon a successful Mirage Flash.'}

SpecificDes: {1: 'Increases Fire DMG of all members by <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>. Increases DMG of all Tank Omniframes in the team by <color=#D91414>{1}%</color>.'}

BriefDes: {1: 'Gains 3 Signal Orbs when entering battle.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Gains 3 Signal Orbs when entering battle.'}

BriefDes: {1: 'After casting <color=#D91414>Gigabyte Star Strike</color>, switch Nanami: Starfarer out of battle to trigger <color=#D91414>Missile Support</color>, dealing Fire DMG. <color=#D91414>"Oops! Missed it!"/"Perfect!"/Burning Blow</color> will come with the <color=#D91414>Scorching Invasion</color> effect that reduces the enemy\'s Fire Resistance. Casting <color=#D91414>Burning Blow</color> will trigger the QTEs that are not in cooldown yet.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'After casting <color=#D91414>Gigabyte Star Strike</color>, switch Nanami: Starfarer out of battle to trigger <color=#D91414>Missile Support</color>, dealing Fire DMG. <color=#D91414>"Oops! Missed it!"/"Perfect!"/Burning Blow</color> will come with the <color=#D91414>Scorching Invasion</color> effect that reduces the enemy\'s Fire Resistance. Casting <color=#D91414>Burning Blow</color> will trigger the QTEs that are not in cooldown yet.\\n- <color=#D91414>Missile Support</color> fires <color=#D91414>4</color> missiles every <color=#D91414>3</color>s for <color=#D91414>12</color>s, dealing <color=#D91414>800%</color> Fire DMG in total.\\n- <color=#D91414>Scorching Invasion</color> reduces the enemy\'s Fire Resistance by <color=#D91414>15%</color> for <color=#D91414>8</color>s.'}

BriefDes: {1: 'Nanami: Starfarer\'s <color=#D91414>Scorching Invasion</color> effect increases. The Extra DMG Bonuses of <color=#D91414>Burning Blow</color> and <color=#D91414>Signature - Ace Star</color> increase. When Nanami is in the <color=#D91414>"Bzzz" Mode</color>, press and hold until the charge limit to automatically trigger <color=#D91414>"Perfect!"</color>. When Nanami is in the Slide Mode or the <color=#D91414>"Bzzz" Mode</color>, she restores Shield.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Nanami: Starfarer\'s <color=#D91414>Scorching Invasion</color> effect increases. The Extra DMG Bonuses of <color=#D91414>Burning Blow</color> and <color=#D91414>Signature - Ace Star</color> increase. When Nanami is in the <color=#D91414>"Bzzz" Mode</color>, press and hold until the charge limit to automatically trigger <color=#D91414>"Perfect!"</color>. When Nanami is in the Slide Mode or the <color=#D91414>"Bzzz" Mode</color>, she restores Shield.\\n- <color=#D91414>Scorching Invasion</color>\'s effect increases by <color=#D91414>10%</color>.\\n- The Extra DMG Bonus of <color=#D91414>Burning Blow</color> increases by <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>.\\n- The Extra DMG Bonus of <color=#D91414>Signature - Ace Star</color> increases by <color=#D91414>{1}%</color>.\\n- When Nanami is in the Slide Mode or the <color=#D91414>"Bzzz" Mode</color>, she restores Shield equal to <color=#D91414>10%</color> of max HP per second, up to <color=#D91414>50%</color>.'}

BriefDes: {1: 'The damage recorded by <color=#D91414>Soul of Molten Steel</color> increases. Max Pressure increases. The <color=#D91414>"Rumbling" Mode</color> grants Pressure every second. <color=#D91414>"Oops! Missed it!"</color>/<color=#D91414>"Perfect!"</color> grants bonus Pressure.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'The damage recorded by <color=#D91414>Soul of Molten Steel</color> increases. Max Pressure increases. Missed it!"</color>/<color=#D91414>"Perfect!"</color> grants bonus Pressure.\\n- The damage recorded by <color=#D91414>Soul of Molten Steel</color> increases to <color=#D91414>100%</color>.\\n- Max Pressure increases to <color=#D91414>999</color>.\\n- The <color=#D91414>"Rumbling" Mode</color> grants <color=#D91414>50</color> Pressure every second. <color=#D91414>"Oops! Missed it!"</color>/<color=#D91414>"Perfect!"</color> grants <color=#D91414>80</color> more Pressure.'}

Title: {1: 'Frost-Treated Blade: Critical Point: <color=#0d70bc>30 Energy + Tap Signature</color>', 2: 'Frost-Treated Blade: Quench: <color=#0d70bc>Has Froststream Level + Tap Signature</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Casts <color=#D91414>Frost-Treated Blade: Critical Point</color>, imbuing her weapon and turning all DMG she deals into Ice DMG. In this state, Signature Energy does not recover, but all attacks increase the <color=#D91414>Froststream Level</color>.', 2: 'Tap the Signature button again to cast <color=#D91414>Frost-Treated Blade: Quench</color>, dealing DMG and giving all enemies <color=#D91414>Frozen Status</color> for a period of time based on the <color=#D91414>Froststream Level</color>. Remove <color=#D91414>Frozen Status</color> from enemies when damaging affected enemies with <color=#D91414>Bitter Frost</color>.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Casts <color=#D91414>Frost-Treated Blade: Critical Point</color>, imbuing her weapon and turning all DMG she deals into Ice DMG. In this state, Signature Energy does not recover, but all attacks increase the <color=#D91414>Froststream Level</color>.', 2: 'Tap the Signature button again to cast <color=#D91414>Frost-Treated Blade: Quench</color>, dealing DMG and giving all enemies <color=#D91414>Frozen Status</color> for a period of time based on the <color=#D91414>Froststream Level</color>. Remove <color=#D91414>Frozen Status</color> from enemies when damaging affected enemies with <color=#D91414>Bitter Frost</color>.\\n- Deals up to <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> DMG based on the <color=#D91414>Froststream Level</color>.\\n- <color=#D91414>Frozen Status</color> lasts up to <color=#D91414>5</color>s.'}

SpecificDes: {1: 'Comes down from above and creates a Frost Terrain, dealing Ice DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ice DMG.'}

Title: {1: 'Bitter Frost: <color=#0d70bc>Press and hold Dodge</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Press and hold Dodge to activate and charge <color=#D91414>Bitterfrost Level</color>. Release Dodge when <color=#D91414>Bitterfrost Level</color> is fully charged to release <color=#D91414>Bitter Frost</color>, dealing Ice DMG. Releasing Dodge before fully charged will result in no attacks, and <color=#D91414>Bitterfrost Level</color> will gradually decrease. Getting hit while charging will deduct Dodge Gauge and performs Flash if there is enough Dodge Gauge available. Gains Super Armor and bonus Extra DMG Reduction when <color=#D91414>Bitterfrost Level</color> is activated.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Press and hold Dodge to activate and charge <color=#D91414>Bitterfrost Level</color>. Release Dodge when <color=#D91414>Bitterfrost Level</color> is fully charged to release <color=#D91414>Bitter Frost</color>, dealing Ice DMG. Releasing Dodge before fully charged will result in no attacks, and <color=#D91414>Bitterfrost Level</color> will gradually decrease. Getting hit while charging will deduct Dodge Gauge and performs Flash if there is enough Dodge Gauge available. Gains Super Armor and bonus Extra DMG Reduction when <color=#D91414>Bitterfrost Level</color> is activated.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ice DMG.\\n- Flash has a <color=#D91414>1.5</color>s cooldown.\\n- When <color=#D91414>Bitterfrost Level</color> is activated, Extra DMG Reduction increases by <color=#D91414>50%</color>.'}

Title: {1: 'Red Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Red Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Karenina: Scire wields the Blast Hammer to release Anti-gravity Energy and push herself forward, dealing Dark DMG to the enemies before her.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Karenina: Scire wields the Blast Hammer to release Anti-gravity Energy and push herself forward, dealing Dark DMG to the enemies before her.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Dark DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.'}

Title: {1: 'Yellow Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Yellow Orb</color>', 2: 'Yellow Orb: <color=#0d70bc>While casting Yellow Orb skills + Ping Yellow/Blue Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Karenina: Scire jumps up into the air for the Blast Hammer to transform into a cannon to fire a gravity shot against the ground to temporarily pull enemies around her and slow them down, dealing Dark DMG and inflicting <color=#D91414>Chain Fusion</color> on them to reduce their Dark Resistance. Meanwhile, Karenina gains an Anti-gravity Shield. If any Blue or Yellow Orb is pinged while Karenina is launching an attack, she will stay in the attack status and attack again, dealing DMG based on the number of the orbs pinged.', 2: 'When pinging any Blue or Yellow Orb while launching this attack, Karenina: Scire will stay in the attack status and shoot again, dealing damage based on the number of the orbs pinged.'}
SpecificDes: {1: "Karenina: Scire jumps up into the air for the Blast Hammer to transform into a cannon to fire a gravity shot against the ground to temporarily pull enemies around her and slow them down, dealing Dark DMG and inflicting <color=#D91414>Chain Fusion</color> on them to reduce their Dark Resistance. Meanwhile, Karenina gains an Anti-gravity Shield. If any Blue or Yellow Orb is pinged while Karenina is launching an attack, she will stay in the attack status and attack again, dealing DMG based on the number of the orbs pinged.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Dark DMG based on the number of the orbs pinged.\\n- <color=#D91414>Chain Fusion</color> reduces the target's Dark Resistance by <color=#D91414>15%</color> for <color=#D91414>3</color>s.\\n- Karenina gains an Anti-gravity Shield equal to <color=#D91414>3/6/10%</color> of her max HP based on the number of orbs pinged. This Anti-gravity Shield can be stacked up to <color=#D91414>50%</color> of her max HP.", 2: 'When pinging any Blue or Yellow Orb while launching this attack, Karenina: Scire will stay in the attack status and shoot again, dealing damage based on the number of the orbs pinged.'}

Title: {1: 'Blue Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Blue Orb</color>', 2: 'Blue Orb: <color=#0d70bc>While casting Blue Orb skills + Ping Yellow/Blue Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Karenina: Scire transforms the Blast Hammer into a cannon and fires a gravity shot forward to pull the enemies on the path, dealing Dark DMG.', 2: 'When pinging any Blue or Yellow Orb while launching this attack, Karenina: Scire will stay in the attack status and shoot again, dealing damage based on the number of the orbs pinged.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Karenina: Scire transforms the Blast Hammer into a cannon and fires a gravity shot forward to pull the enemies on the path, dealing Dark DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Dark DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.', 2: 'When pinging any Blue or Yellow Orb while launching this attack, Karenina: Scire will stay in the attack status and shoot again, dealing damage based on the number of the orbs pinged.'}

Title: {1: 'Basic Attack: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Basic Attack</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Deals Dark DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG in total.'}

Title: {1: 'Signature Move: <color=#0d70bc>160 Energy + Tap Signature</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Karenina: Scire leaps toward the ground and hits the enemy with the Blast Hammer, triggering <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> meanwhile. <color=#D91414>Starshatter Horizon</color> deals Dark DMG. If Karenina: Scire is in the Anti-gravity status when this is cast, she will exit the status right after it is cast.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Karenina: Scire leaps toward the ground and hits the enemy with the Blast Hammer, triggering <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> meanwhile. <color=#D91414>Starshatter Horizon</color> deals Dark DMG. If Karenina: Scire is in the Anti-gravity status when this is cast, she will exit the status right after it is cast.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG.'}

Title: {1: 'QTE: <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Karenina: Scire hammers the ground, dealing Dark DMG to enemies within the area and inflicting the <color=#D91414>Chain Fusion</color> effect on them to reduce their Dark Resistance.'}
SpecificDes: {1: "Karenina: Scire hammers the ground, dealing Dark DMG to enemies within the area and inflicting the <color=#D91414>Chain Fusion</color> effect on them to reduce their Dark Resistance.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG.\\n- <color=#D91414>Chain Fusion</color> reduces the target's Dark Resistance by <color=#D91414>15%</color> for <color=#D91414>12</color>s."}

Title: {1: 'Leap Attack: <color=#0d70bc>3-Ping available + Press and hold Basic Attack</color>', 2: 'Anti-gravity Status: <color=#0d70bc>Cast Leap Attack</color>', 3: 'Radiant Whirlwind: <color=#0d70bc>Character is airborne + Tap Basic Attack repeatedly</color>', 4: 'Gravity Overload: <color=#0d70bc>Triggered when character lands</color>', 5: 'Kinetic Energy: <color=#0d70bc>Automatically accumulated when casting Radiant Whirlwind/Basic Attack speed-up</color>', 6: 'Airborne Spin: <color=#0d70bc>Anti-gravity status + Tap Dodge</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: "When Karenina: Scire has at least a set of 3-Ping Orbs among up to 8 Signal Orbs, holding the Basic Attack button will start charging and consume 3-Ping Orbs (up to 2 sets can be consumed), each set granting Anti-gravity Energy. While charging, Karenina cannot dodge but gains Super Armor and Extra DMG Reduction. After that, Karenina leaps up into the air with <color=#D91414>Leap Attack</color> that deals Dark DMG (its Base DMG increases if 2 sets of 3-Ping Orbs have been consumed) and activates the Anti-gravity status. When Karenina enters Matrix, holding the Basic Attack button will start charging and automatically consume Matrix's orb pinging effect (which is considered to consume a set of 3-Ping Orbs).", 2: 'Gains Super Armor and Extra DMG Reduction while in the Anti-gravity status.', 3: "While in the Anti-gravity status, tapping the Basic Attack button repeatedly will cast <color=#D91414>Radiant Whirlwind</color> that deals Dark DMG (each Basic Attack increases Karenina: Scire's airborne duration and spin speed).", 4: 'Upon landing, <color=#D91414>Gravity Overload</color> will be triggered to grant Signature Energy and deal Dark DMG. If Karenina: Scire has sufficient Anti-gravity Energy, she will automatically leap up into the air again by consuming certain Anti-gravity Energy. Once Anti-gravity Energy is insufficient, she will exit the Anti-gravity status with empty Anti-gravity Energy.', 5: 'Each <color=#D91414>Radiant Whirlwind</color> cast and Basic Attack speed-up will grant Kinetic Energy. Casting <color=#D91414>Starshatter Horizon</color> will consume all the Kinetic Energy with each point consumed granting bonus Base DMG.', 6: 'When the Anti-gravity status is activated, tapping Dodge casts <color=#D91414>Airborne Spin</color> by consuming double Dodge Gauge to pull and knock nearby enemies into the air, dealing Dark DMG while restoring Anti-gravity Energy and Signature Energy. Upon a successful dodge, <color=#D91414>Returning Repulsion</color> will be cast to pull and knock nearby enemies into the air, dealing Dark DMG and restoring additional Dodge Gauge.'}
SpecificDes: {1: "When Karenina: Scire has at least a set of 3-Ping Orbs among up to 8 Signal Orbs, holding the Basic Attack button will start charging and consume 3-Ping Orbs (up to 2 sets can be consumed), each set granting Anti-gravity Energy. While charging, Karenina cannot dodge but gains Super Armor and Extra DMG Reduction. After that, Karenina leaps up into the air with <color=#D91414>Leap Attack</color> that deals Dark DMG (its Base DMG increases if 2 sets of 3-Ping Orbs have been consumed) and activates the Anti-gravity status. When Karenina enters Matrix, holding the Basic Attack button will start charging and automatically consume Matrix's orb pinging effect (which is considered to consume a set of 3-Ping Orbs).\\n- Every set of 3-Ping Orbs consumed grants <color=#D91414>20</color> Anti-gravity Energy.\\n- While charging, gains <color=#D91414>50/80/90%</color> Extra DMG Reduction based on the number of 3-Pings made.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG when leaping into the air.\\n- When two sets of 3-Ping Orbs are consumed during the charging, the <color=#D91414>Leap Attack</color> will deal <color=#D91414>200%</color> more Base DMG.", 2: 'Gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>50%</color> Extra DMG Reduction while in the Anti-gravity status.', 3: "While in the Anti-gravity status, tapping the Basic Attack button repeatedly will cast <color=#D91414>Radiant Whirlwind</color> that deals Dark DMG (each Basic Attack increases Karenina: Scire's airborne duration and spin speed).\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG.", 4: 'Upon landing, <color=#D91414>Gravity Overload</color> will be triggered to grant Signature Energy and deal Dark DMG. If Karenina: Scire has sufficient Anti-gravity Energy, she will automatically leap up into the air again by consuming certain Anti-gravity Energy. Once Anti-gravity Energy is insufficient, she will exit the Anti-gravity status with empty Anti-gravity Energy.\\n- Triggering <color=#D91414>Gravity Overload</color> grants <color=#D91414>20</color> Signature Energy.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG.\\n- When there is no less than <color=#D91414>20</color> Anti-gravity Energy, Karenina: Scire will automatically leap up into the air again by consuming <color=#D91414>20</color> Anti-gravity Energy.', 5: 'Each <color=#D91414>Radiant Whirlwind</color> cast and Basic Attack speed-up will grant Kinetic Energy. Casting <color=#D91414>Starshatter Horizon</color> will consume all the Kinetic Energy with each point consumed granting bonus Base DMG.\\n- Every <color=#D91414>Radiant Whirlwind</color> cast grants <color=#D91414>7</color> Kinetic Energy.\\n- Every Basic Attack speed-up grants <color=#D91414>21</color> Kinetic Energy.\\n- The limit of Kinetic Energy is <color=#D91414>999</color>.\\n- Casting <color=#D91414>Starshatter Horizon</color> will consume all the Kinetic Energy with each point consumed granting <color=#D91414>0.12%</color> more Base DMG, up to <color=#D91414>100%</color>.', 6: 'When the Anti-gravity status is activated, tapping Dodge casts <color=#D91414>Airborne Spin</color> by consuming double Dodge Gauge to pull and knock nearby enemies into the air, dealing Dark DMG while restoring Anti-gravity Energy and Signature Energy. Upon a successful dodge, <color=#D91414>Returning Repulsion</color> will be cast to pull and knock nearby enemies into the air, dealing Dark DMG and restoring additional Dodge Gauge.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG.\\n- Restores <color=#D91414>20</color> Anti-gravity Energy and <color=#D91414>20</color> Signature Energy (can be triggered once per 10s only).\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Dark DMG.\\n- Restores additional <color=#D91414>500</color> Dodge Gauge value (can be triggered once per 10s only).'}

BriefDes: {1: 'Increases Dark DMG of all members. Increases DMG of all Tank Omniframes in the team.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Increases Dark DMG of all members by <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>. Increases DMG of all Tank Omniframes in the team by <color=#D91414>{1}%</color>.'}

BriefDes: {1: "Attacks reduce the target's Extra DMG Reduction."}
SpecificDes: {1: "Attacks reduce the target's Extra DMG Reduction by <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> for <color=#D91414>5</color>s."}

BriefDes: {1: 'Gains 3 Signal Orbs when entering battle.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Gains 3 Signal Orbs when entering battle.'}

Title: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.1: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SS3 Rank</color></color>', 2: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.2: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SSS Rank</color></color>'}
BriefDes: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Gains an extra 3-Ping chance triggered by pressing and holding Basic Attack to charge (up to three times). Upon the third 3-Ping, the corresponding Leap Attack and Radiant Whirlwind will deal more Base DMG. Upon casting Starshatter Horizon, Karenina: Scire will generate a Thermal Field, dealing Dark DMG once to targets entering the field and inflicting them with Chain Fusion that reduces Dark Resistance.</color>', 2: "<color=#99a3b1>When in the Anti-gravity status, Karenina: Scire deals more Dark DMG. Dealing damage will reduce the target's Extra DMG Reduction. Press and hold Basic Attack to start charging and immediately activate QTEs that are not in cooldown. Radiant Whirlwind's spin speed will automatically increase.</color>"}
SpecificDes: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Gains an extra 3-Ping chance triggered by pressing and holding Basic Attack to charge (up to three times). Upon the third 3-Ping, the corresponding Leap Attack will deal 400% more Base DMG, and Radiant Whirlwind will deal 75% more Base DMG. Upon casting Starshatter Horizon, Karenina: Scire will generate a 15s Thermal Field, dealing 75% Dark DMG once to targets entering the field and inflicting them with Chain Fusion that reduces Dark Resistance by 15% for 10s.</color>', 2: "<color=#99a3b1>When in the Anti-gravity status, Karenina: Scire deals 10% more Dark DMG. Dealing damage will reduce the target's Extra DMG Reduction by 5% for 8s. Triggering this effect again will renew its duration. Press and hold Basic Attack to start charging and immediately activate QTEs that are not in cooldown. Radiant Whirlwind's spin speed will automatically increase.</color>"}

Title: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.1: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SSS3 Rank</color></color>', 2: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.2: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SSS6 Rank</color></color>', 3: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.3: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SSS+ Rank</color></color>'}
BriefDes: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>When a teammate casts their Signature Move, it will provide a set of 3-Ping Orbs to Karenina: Scire who is on standby. SpecificDes: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>When a teammate casts their Signature Move, it will provide a set of 3-Ping Orbs to Karenina: Scire who is on standby. Title: {1: 'Red Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Red Orb</color>'}

SpecificDes: {1: 'Rapidly charges forward while performing a spinning attack, dealing Physical DMG (Lightning DMG instead on a 3-Ping).\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.'}

Title: {1: 'Yellow Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Yellow Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Leaps backward and flings a magnetic storm generator, dealing Physical DMG (Lightning DMG instead on a 3-Ping) and pulling in nearby enemies when the magnetic field contracts.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Leaps backward and flings a magnetic storm generator, dealing Physical DMG (Lightning DMG instead on a 3-Ping) and pulling in nearby enemies when the magnetic field contracts.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.'}

Title: {1: 'Blue Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Blue Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Swings across the ground with Rev Blade, causing an energy explosion and generating several plasma torrents along its path that deal Physical DMG (Lightning DMG instead on a 3-Ping).'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Swings across the ground with Rev Blade, causing an energy explosion and generating several plasma torrents along its path that deal Physical DMG (Lightning DMG instead on a 3-Ping).\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.'}

Title: {1: 'Basic Attack: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Basic Attack</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Delivers a barrage of slashes with Rev Blade, dealing Physical DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Delivers a barrage of slashes with Rev Blade, dealing Physical DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG in total.'}

Title: {1: 'Signature Move: <color=#0d70bc>80 Energy + Tap Signature</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Noan: Arca advances swiftly and comes to an abrupt halt, unleashing all the energy in Rev Blade to perform a powerful strike. <color=#D91414>End of Night</color> deals Lightning DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Noan: Arca advances swiftly and comes to an abrupt halt, unleashing all the energy in Rev Blade to perform a powerful strike. <color=#D91414>End of Night</color> deals Lightning DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG in total.'}

Title: {1: 'QTE: <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Plunges from the air and slashes enemies at high speed, dealing Lightning DMG to enemies within range.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Plunges from the air and slashes enemies at high speed, dealing Lightning DMG to enemies within range.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG in total.'}

Title: {1: 'Charge Engine: <color=#0d70bc>Any 3-Ping + Tap Basic Attack repeatedly</color>', 2: 'Gear-Break Combo: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Basic Attack repeatedly to trigger a Combo Strike</color>', 3: 'Assault-Rising Combo: <color=#0d70bc>Gear Lv.3 + Trigger Combo Strike</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'After casting a 3-Ping, tap Basic Attack repeatedly to charge up the Rising Engine. When the tapping stops or goes over a certain period of time, Noan: Arca will perform <color=#D91414>Gear-Break Combo</color> based on the color of Signal Orbs pinged, and its DMG will depend on the current <color=#D91414>Gear Level</color>. Triggering a Combo Strike also consumes all <color=#D91414>Rising Energy</color> charged to increase its DMG dealt. The <color=#D91414>Rising Energy</color> consumed will be converted into <color=#D91414>Rotational Speed</color>.', 2: 'The next time <color=#D91414>Gear-Break Combo</color> is triggered, if the current <color=#D91414>Rising Energy</color> exceeds <color=#D91414>Rotational Speed</color>, <color=#D91414>Gear Level</color> will go up by 1.', 3: 'If <color=#D91414>Gear-Break Combo</color> is triggered at Gear Lv.3, Noan: Arca will perform <color=#D91414>Assault-Rising Combo</color> instead with an increased Extra DMG Bonus. <color=#D91414>Rotational Speed</color> and <color=#D91414>Gear Level</color> will be reset afterward.'}
SpecificDes: {1: "After casting a 3-Ping, tap Basic Attack repeatedly to charge up the Rising Engine. When the tapping stops or goes over a certain period of time, Noan: Arca will perform <color=#D91414>Gear-Break Combo</color> based on the color of Signal Orbs pinged, and its DMG will depend on the current <color=#D91414>Gear Level</color>. Triggering a Combo Strike also consumes all <color=#D91414>Rising Energy</color> charged to increase its DMG dealt. The <color=#D91414>Rising Energy</color> consumed will be converted into <color=#D91414>Rotational Speed</color>.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{3}%</color> Lightning DMG based on the current <color=#D91414>Gear Level</color>.\\n- The Rising Energy charged will increase a Combo Strike's DMG. Each tap increases Base DMG by <color=#D91414>15%</color>.", 2: 'The next time <color=#D91414>Gear-Break Combo</color> is triggered, if the current <color=#D91414>Rising Energy</color> exceeds <color=#D91414>Rotational Speed</color>, <color=#D91414>Gear Level</color> will go up by 1.', 3: 'If <color=#D91414>Gear-Break Combo</color> is triggered at Gear Lv.3, Noan: Arca will perform <color=#D91414>Assault-Rising Combo</color> instead with an increased Extra DMG Bonus. <color=#D91414>Rotational Speed</color> and <color=#D91414>Gear Level</color> will be reset afterward.\\n- The Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Assault-Rising Combo</color> increases by <color=#D91414>50%</color>.'}

BriefDes: {1: 'Increases Lightning DMG of all members. Increases ATK of all Vanguard Uniframes in the team.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Increases Lightning DMG of all members by <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>. Increases ATK of all Vanguard Uniframes in the team by <color=#D91414>{1}%</color>.'}

BriefDes: {1: 'Gains Extra DMG Bonus and Shield when the character enters the battlefield.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Gains <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Extra DMG Bonus and Shield that absorbs damage up to <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> of max HP for <color=#D91414>10</color>s when the character enters the battlefield.'}

BriefDes: {1: 'Gains 3 Signal Orbs when entering battle.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Gains 3 Signal Orbs when entering battle.'}
