Title: {1: 'Red Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Red Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Performs piercing attacks that deal Physical DMG to the target. (2 attacks when 1 or 2 orbs are pinged; 5 attacks upon a 3-Ping.)'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Performs piercing attacks that deal Physical DMG to the target. (2 attacks when 1 or 2 orbs are pinged; 5 attacks upon a 3-Ping.)\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG in total based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- Grants <color=#D91414>2/3/4</color> <color=#D91414>Afterglow Points</color> based on the number of orbs pinged.'}

Title: {1: 'Yellow Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Yellow Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Dashes forward to launch a horizontal slash, followed by an upward thrust that knocks the enemy into the air, dealing Physical DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Dashes forward to launch a horizontal slash, followed by an upward thrust that knocks the enemy into the air, dealing Physical DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG in total based on the number of orbs pinged. Deals additional <color=#D91414>{3}%</color> Physical DMG upon a 3-Ping.\\n- Grants <color=#D91414>2/3/4</color> <color=#D91414>Afterglow Points</color> based on the number of orbs pinged.'}

Title: {1: 'Blue Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Blue Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Launches a spinning slash that deals Physical DMG to the target and briefly pulls enemies within range, then throws the Swordstaff out to generate a sword shadow that continuously spins and slashes nearby enemies, dealing Physical DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Launches a spinning slash that deals Physical DMG to the target and briefly pulls enemies within range, then throws the Swordstaff out to generate a sword shadow that continuously spins and slashes nearby enemies, dealing Physical DMG.\\n- Based on the number of orbs pinged, the spinning slash deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG and the sword shadow deals <color=#D91414>{3}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{4}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{5}%</color> Physical DMG.\\n- Grants <color=#D91414>2/3/4</color> <color=#D91414>Afterglow Points</color> based on the number of orbs pinged.'}

Title: {1: 'Basic Attack: <color=#0d70bc>Staff Form + Tap Basic Attack</color>', 2: 'Basic Attack: <color=#0d70bc>Sword Form + Tap Basic Attack</color>', 3: 'Sword Dance: <color=#0d70bc>Sword Form + Resolution active + Press and hold Basic Attack</color>', 4: 'Afterglow Shadow — <color=#0d70bc> Sword Form + Afterglow Enhancement + Triggered passively by any attack</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Unleashes 5 hits of attack toward the target with the Swordstaff.', 2: 'Unleashes 5 hits of attack toward the target with the Swordstaff.', 3: 'After a successful dodge or the 4th hit of Basic Attack, Bianca: Stigmata will activate <color=#D91414>Resolution</color>. When <color=#D91414>Resolution</color> is active, press and hold Basic Attack to unleash a thrusting attack, then continue to press and hold Basic Attack to launch a 3-hit <color=#D91414>Sword Dance</color> that deals Physical DMG to the target. During <color=#D91414>Sword Dance</color>, Bianca: Stigmata is invincible, her position can be adjusted by moving the joystick.', 4: 'When Bianca: Stigmata is under the effect of <color=#D91414>Afterglow Enhancement</color>, every hit of her Basic Attack and <color=#D91414>Sword Dance</color> generates extra <color=#D91414>Afterglow Shadow</color> that deals Physical DMG to the target.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Unleashes 5 hits of attack toward the target with the Swordstaff.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG in total.', 2: 'Unleashes 5 hits of attack toward the target with the Swordstaff.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG in total.\\n- Every hit of Basic Attack in <color=#D91414>Sword Form</color> generates <color=#D91414>4</color> Signature Energy.', 3: 'After a successful dodge or the 4th hit of Basic Attack, Bianca: Stigmata will activate <color=#D91414>Resolution</color>. When <color=#D91414>Resolution</color> is active, press and hold Basic Attack to unleash a thrusting attack, then continue to press and hold Basic Attack to launch a 3-hit <color=#D91414>Sword Dance</color> that deals Physical DMG to the target. During <color=#D91414>Sword Dance</color>, Bianca: Stigmata is invincible, her position can be adjusted by moving the joystick.\\n- The thrusting attack deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG.\\n- <color=#D91414>Sword Dance</color> deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Physical DMG in total.\\n- Every hit of <color=#D91414>Sword Dance</color> generates <color=#D91414>4</color> Signature Energy.', 4: 'When Bianca: Stigmata is under the effect of <color=#D91414>Afterglow Enhancement</color>, every hit of her Basic Attack and <color=#D91414>Sword Dance</color> generates extra <color=#D91414>Afterglow Shadow</color> that deals Physical DMG to the target.\\n- Each hit of <color=#D91414>Afterglow Shadow</color> deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG.\\n- Each hit of <color=#D91414>Afterglow Shadow</color> generates <color=#D91414>1</color> Signature Energy.'}

Title: {1: 'Bright Candle: <color=#0d70bc>Staff Form + 60 Energy + Tap Signature</color>', 2: 'Illuminated Abyss: <color=#0d70bc>Sword Form + 60 Energy + Tap Signature</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: "Casts <color=#D91414>Bright Candle</color> to damage enemies within a certain range, triggering <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> and activating the weapon's <color=#D91414>Sword Form</color>. Orbs cannot be pinged in <color=#D91414>Sword Form</color>. When <color=#D91414>Sword Form</color> is activated, the Afterglow Points from Bianca's Core Passive are converted into <color=#D91414>Afterglow Enhancement</color>. Basic Attacks, Sword Dance and Afterglow Shadow in <color=#D91414>Sword Form</color> will accumulate <color=#D91414>Stigmata Will</color> upon dealing DMG. Gains Super Armor during <color=#D91414>Sword Form</color>.", 2: 'While in <color=#D91414>Sword Form</color>, consumes Energy and all stacks of <color=#D91414>Stigmata Will</color> to unleash <color=#D91414>Illuminated Abyss</color>, dealing Physical DMG to the target while triggering <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color>. Each stack of <color=#D91414>Stigmata Will</color> increases the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Illuminated Abyss</color>.'}
SpecificDes: {1: "Casts <color=#D91414>Bright Candle</color> to damage enemies within a certain range, triggering <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> and activating the weapon's <color=#D91414>Sword Form</color>. Orbs cannot be pinged in <color=#D91414>Sword Form</color>. When <color=#D91414>Sword Form</color> is activated, the Afterglow Points from Bianca's Core Passive are converted into <color=#D91414>Afterglow Enhancement</color>. Basic Attacks, Sword Dance and Afterglow Shadow in <color=#D91414>Sword Form</color> will accumulate <color=#D91414>Stigmata Will</color> upon dealing DMG. Gains Super Armor during <color=#D91414>Sword Form</color>.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG to the enemies within range.\\n- Each <color=#D91414>Afterglow Point</color> can be converted into <color=#D91414>0.5s</color> of <color=#D91414>Afterglow Enhancement</color>.", 2: 'While in <color=#D91414>Sword Form</color>, consumes Energy and all stacks of <color=#D91414>Stigmata Will</color> to unleash <color=#D91414>Illuminated Abyss</color>, dealing Physical DMG to the target while triggering <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color>. Each stack of <color=#D91414>Stigmata Will</color> increases the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Illuminated Abyss</color>.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG to the target.\\n- Each stack of <color=#D91414>Stigmata Will</color> increases the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Illuminated Abyss</color> by <color=#D91414>6%</color>.\\n- <color=#D91414>Stigmata Will</color> can be stacked up to <color=#D91414>40</color> times.'}

Title: {1: 'QTE: <color=#0d70bc>Staff Form + Tap QTE</color>', 2: 'QTE: <color=#0d70bc>Sword Form + Tap QTE</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Leaps into the air and hurls the Swordstaff to the ground, dealing Physical DMG.', 2: 'Slashes the target twice to deal Physical DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Leaps into the air and hurls the Swordstaff to the ground, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG.', 2: 'Slashes the target twice to deal <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG.'}

Title: {1: 'Afterglow Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Upon entering battle or when entering Staff Form</color>', 2: 'Simulated Matrix: <color=#0d70bc>Press and hold Dodge to enter Luminous Realm</color>', 3: 'Glowing Lanternlight: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Signal Orbs of the same color as Afterglow Orbs while in Luminous Realm</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'When Bianca: Stigmata enters battle or enters <color=#D91414>Staff Form</color>, a set of <color=#D91414>Afterglow Orbs</color> will be generated above the Signal Orb bar.', 2: 'Bianca: Stigmata is unable to trigger Matrix via Dodge. When her weapon is in <color=#D91414>Staff Form</color>, press and hold Dodge to perform <color=#D91414>Simulated Matrix</color> and activate <color=#D91414>Luminous Realm</color>.', 3: 'Pinging a set of Signal Orbs in <color=#D91414>Luminous Realm</color> can also consume the <color=#D91414>Afterglow Orbs</color> that are of the same color and aligned directly above them. Upon successful pinging of Afterglow Orbs, Bianca: Stigmata will launch <color=#D91414>Glowing Lanternlight</color> to deal Physical DMG to targets within range. Pinging Signal Orbs and <color=#D91414>Afterglow Orbs</color> in <color=#D91414>Luminous Realm</color> will both generate <color=#D91414>Afterglow Points</color>.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'When Bianca: Stigmata enters battle or enters <color=#D91414>Staff Form</color>, a set of <color=#D91414>Afterglow Orbs</color> will be generated above the Signal Orb bar.', 2: 'Bianca: Stigmata is unable to trigger Matrix via Dodge. When her weapon is in <color=#D91414>Staff Form</color>, press and hold Dodge to perform <color=#D91414>Simulated Matrix</color> and activate <color=#D91414>Luminous Realm</color>.\\n- <color=#D91414>Luminous Realm</color> lasts <color=#D91414>4s</color> and has a <color=#D91414>12s</color> cooldown.\\n- Upon activation of Simulated Matrix, <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> is also triggered and it ends when Luminous Realm is activated.', 3: 'Pinging a set of Signal Orbs in <color=#D91414>Luminous Realm</color> can also consume the <color=#D91414>Afterglow Orbs</color> that are of the same color and aligned directly above them. Upon successful pinging of Afterglow Orbs, Bianca: Stigmata will launch <color=#D91414>Glowing Lanternlight</color> to deal Physical DMG to targets within range. Pinging Signal Orbs and <color=#D91414>Afterglow Orbs</color> in <color=#D91414>Luminous Realm</color> will both generate <color=#D91414>Afterglow Points</color>.\\n- <color=#D91414>Glowing Lanternlight</color> deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG based on the total number of Signal Orbs and Afterglow Orbs pinged.\\n- Generates <color=#D91414>1/2/3/6/7/8</color> <color=#D91414>Afterglow Points</color> based on the total number of Signal Orbs and Afterglow Orbs pinged.'}

SpecificDes: {1: 'Increases Physical DMG of all members by <color=#D91414>10%</color>. Increases ATK of all Attacker Omniframes in the team by <color=#D91414>10%</color>.'}

Title: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.1: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SS3 Rank</color></color>', 2: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.2: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SSS Rank</color></color>'}
BriefDes: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Basic Attack - Sword Dance and its Afterglow Shadow generate extra Signature Energy. Immediately gains a random set of 3-Ping Orbs upon entering battle. Entering Sword Form grants Stigmata Will instantly.</color>', 2: '<color=#99a3b1>Signature - Bright Candle will record a certain DMG multiplier of the Signal Orbs pinged and Core Passive - Glowing Lanternlight cast in Luminous Realm. When it is unleashed, an attack will deal the recorded multiplier of Physical DMG to all the units within range. This will not deal CRIT DMG, and Bianca: Stigmata will gain Stigmata Will instantly. When launching Basic Attack - Sword Dance, the first 2 hits of Basic Attack - Sword Dance can be performed additionally before landing.</color>'}
SpecificDes: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Basic Attack - Sword Dance generates 7 extra Signature Energy and its Afterglow Shadow generates 2 extra Signature Energy. Immediately gains a random set of 3-Ping Orbs upon entering battle. Entering Sword Form grants 20 stacks of Stigmata Will instantly.</color>', 2: '<color=#99a3b1>Signature - Bright Candle will record a 100% DMG multiplier of the Signal Orbs pinged and Core Passive - Glowing Lanternlight cast in Luminous Realm. When Signature - Bright Candle is unleashed, an attack will deal the recorded multiplier of Physical DMG to all the units within range. This will not deal CRIT DMG, and Bianca: Stigmata will gain 20 stacks of Stigmata Will instantly. When launching Basic Attack - Sword Dance, the first 2 hits of Basic Attack - Sword Dance can be performed additionally before landing.\\n-When dealing DMG to multiple targets at the same time by pinging Signal Orbs or Core Passive - Glowing Lanternlight in Luminous Realm, only the highest DMG dealt to a single target will be recorded. No record will be made if no DMG is dealt.</color>'}

SpecificDes: {1: 'Steps forward and hurls a large number of threads to deal Physical DMG to enemies within a small area (Ice DMG instead on a 3-Ping).\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.'}

Title: {1: 'Yellow Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Yellow Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Swiftly glides toward the enemy and slashes them, dealing Physical DMG (Ice DMG instead on a 3-Ping).'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Swiftly glides toward the enemy and slashes them, dealing Physical DMG (Ice DMG instead on a 3-Ping).\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.'}

Title: {1: 'Blue Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Blue Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Leaps into the air and performs 2 spinning attacks, dealing Physical DMG (Ice DMG instead on a 3-Ping).'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Leaps into the air and performs 2 spinning attacks, dealing Physical DMG (Ice DMG instead on a 3-Ping). \\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.'}

Title: {1: 'Basic Attack: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Basic Attack</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Unleashes multiple hits of kicks and thread attacks, dealing Physical DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Unleashes multiple hits of kicks and thread attacks, dealing Physical DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG in total.'}

Title: {1: 'Signature Move: <color=#0d70bc>50 Energy + Tap Signature</color>', 2: 'Signature Move: <color=#0d70bc> 3 stacks of Pact of Memory + 50 Energy + Tap Signature</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Bambinata: Vitrum unfolds her Mantis Blades and rapidly dashes around the enemy to slash them multiple times, dealing Ice DMG.', 2: 'Bambinata: Vitrum unfolds her Mantis Blades and rapidly dashes around the enemy to slash them multiple times to deal Ice DMG, then leaps into the air and unleashes a powerful strike that deals bonus Ice DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Bambinata: Vitrum unfolds her Mantis Blades and rapidly dashes around the enemy to slash them multiple times, dealing Ice DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ice DMG in total.', 2: 'Bambinata: Vitrum unfolds her Mantis Blades and rapidly dashes around the enemy to slash them multiple times to deal Ice DMG, then leaps into the air and unleashes a powerful strike that deals bonus Ice DMG.\\n- The slashes deal <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ice DMG in total.\\n- The powerful strike deals bonus <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Ice DMG.'}

Title: {1: 'QTE: <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Bambinata: Vitrum spins and dances to deal Ice DMG to enemies within range.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Bambinata: Vitrum spins and dances to deal Ice DMG to enemies within range.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ice DMG in total.'}

Title: {1: 'Strings On Me: <color=#0d70bc>Jete Points + Press and hold Basic Attack</color>', 2: 'Solitary Dancer: <color=#0d70bc>Strings On Me + Take Hit/Release Basic Attack</color>', 3: 'Pas De Chat: <color=#0d70bc>Solitary Dancer + Ping</color>', 4: 'Pas De Chat: <color=#0d70bc>Successful Dodge + Solitary Dancer + Ping</color>', 5: 'Pact of Memory: <color=#0d70bc>Solitary Dancer + 3-Ping</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'When <color=#D91414>Jete Points</color> are greater than <color=#D91414>0</color>, press and hold Basic Attack to activate <color=#D91414>Strings On Me</color>, performing Basic Attacks continuously.', 2: 'When Bambinata: Vitrum is attacked while <color=#D91414>Strings On Me</color> is activated, she will consume all <color=#D91414>Jete Points</color> to automatically dodge the attack and leap into the air, entering the <color=#D91414>Solitary Dancer</color> Form. When <color=#D91414>Strings On Me</color> is activated at full <color=#D91414>Jete Points</color>, release the Basic Attack button to consume all <color=#D91414>Jete Points</color> and leap up to enter the <color=#D91414>Solitary Dancer</color> Form. During the leap, Bambinata: Vitrum dodges incoming attacks.', 3: 'Consuming Signal Orbs in the <color=#D91414>Solitary Dancer</color> Form will trigger <color=#D91414>Pas De Chat</color>, dealing Ice DMG. During <color=#D91414>Pas De Chat</color>, Bambinata: Vitrum is invincible and pulls the enemies in.', 4: 'If Bambinata: Vitrum has entered the <color=#D91414>Solitary Dancer</color> Form by successfully dodging an attack, pinging Signal Orbs will trigger the more powerful <color=#D91414>Pas De Chat</color> that deals Ice DMG. During <color=#D91414>Pas De Chat</color>, Bambinata: Vitrum is invincible and pulls the enemies in.', 5: 'Triggering <color=#D91414>Pas De Chat</color> with a 3-Ping in the <color=#D91414>Solitary Dancer</color> Form will grant 1 stack of <color=#D91414>Pact of Memory</color> (up to <color=#D91414>3</color> stacks), causing Bambinata: Vitrum to forget the color of this 3-Ping and no longer gain orbs of this color. All orbs of this color will be converted to other orbs that have not been forgotten yet. At <color=#D91414>3</color> stacks of <color=#D91414>Pact of Memory</color>, all the remaining orbs will be forgotten and Bambinata can no longer gain Signal Orbs. Casting <color=#D91414>Signature - Stringless Cage</color> will remove all stacks of <color=#D91414>Pact of Memory</color> and refund the forgotten orbs. For each <color=#D91414>1</color> stack of <color=#D91414>Pact of Memory</color>, the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Signature - Stringless Cage</color> increases.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'When <color=#D91414>Jete Points</color> are greater than <color=#D91414>0</color>, press and hold Basic Attack to activate <color=#D91414>Strings On Me</color>, performing Basic Attacks continuously.\\n- <color=#D91414>Jete Points</color> increase by <color=#D91414>40/80/160</color> based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- The maximum limit of <color=#D91414>Jete Points</color> is <color=#D91414>160</color>.\\n- While <color=#D91414>Strings On Me</color> is activated, <color=#D91414>20</color> <color=#D91414>Jete Points</color> are consumed every <color=#D91414>0.1s</color>.', 2: 'When Bambinata: Vitrum is attacked while <color=#D91414>Strings On Me</color> is activated, she will consume all <color=#D91414>Jete Points</color> to automatically dodge the attack and leap into the air, entering the <color=#D91414>Solitary Dancer</color> Form. When <color=#D91414>Strings On Me</color> is activated at full <color=#D91414>Jete Points</color>, release the Basic Attack button to consume all <color=#D91414>Jete Points</color> and leap up to enter the <color=#D91414>Solitary Dancer</color> Form. During the leap, Bambinata: Vitrum dodges incoming attacks.', 3: 'Consuming Signal Orbs in the <color=#D91414>Solitary Dancer</color> Form will trigger <color=#D91414>Pas De Chat</color>, dealing Ice DMG. During <color=#D91414>Pas De Chat</color>, Bambinata: Vitrum is invincible and pulls the enemies in.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Ice DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.', 4: 'If Bambinata: Vitrum has entered the <color=#D91414>Solitary Dancer</color> Form by successfully dodging an attack, pinging Signal Orbs will trigger the more powerful <color=#D91414>Pas De Chat</color> that deals Ice DMG. During <color=#D91414>Pas De Chat</color>, Bambinata: Vitrum is invincible and pulls the enemies in.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Ice DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.', 5: 'Triggering <color=#D91414>Pas De Chat</color> with a 3-Ping in the <color=#D91414>Solitary Dancer</color> Form will grant 1 stack of <color=#D91414>Pact of Memory</color> (up to <color=#D91414>3</color> stacks), causing Bambinata: Vitrum to forget the color of this 3-Ping and no longer gain orbs of this color. All orbs of this color will be converted to other orbs that have not been forgotten yet.\\n- At <color=#D91414>3</color> stacks of <color=#D91414>Pact of Memory</color>, all the remaining orbs will be forgotten and Bambinata can no longer gain Signal Orbs. Casting <color=#D91414>Signature - Stringless Cage</color> will remove all stacks of <color=#D91414>Pact of Memory</color> and refund the forgotten orbs.\\n- For each <color=#D91414>1</color> stack of <color=#D91414>Pact of Memory</color>, the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Signature - Stringless Cage</color> increases by <color=#D91414>20%</color>, up to <color=#D91414>60%</color>.'}

BriefDes: {1: 'Ice DMG of all party members increases.'}

Title: {1: 'Red Orb — <color=#0d70bc>Ping Red Orb</color>', 2: 'Hypermatrix Strike: Explosion — <color=#0d70bc>Hypermatrix + Red 3-Ping</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Performs a sliding shot that will pull enemies nearby. It will be followed by an additional back-step spray attack upon a 3-Ping. This slide has the same effect as dodging.', 2: 'While in <color=#D91414>Hypermatrix</color>, Lee slams his firearm case down during a leap and summons his alternative selves from other worldlines to create a blast, dealing Fire DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>Sight Points</color>.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Performs a sliding shot that will pull enemies nearby. It will be followed by an additional back-step spray attack upon a 3-Ping. This slide has the same effect as dodging.\\n- Deals a total of <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Fire DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- The back-step spray attack additionally deals <color=#D91414>{3}%</color> Fire DMG.', 2: 'While in <color=#D91414>Hypermatrix</color>, Lee slams his firearm case down during a leap and summons his alternative selves from other worldlines to create a blast, dealing Fire DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>Sight Points</color>.\\n- The blast deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG.\\n- Grants <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Sight Point</color> each time it is cast.'}

Title: {1: 'Yellow Orb — <color=#0d70bc>Ping Yellow Orb</color>', 2: 'Hypermatrix Strike: Shadow — <color=#0d70bc>Hypermatrix + Yellow 3-Ping</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: "Glides to the enemy's back while unleashing a rain of shots. An additional turnaround kick will be triggered upon a 3-Ping. This glide has the same effect as dodging.", 2: 'While in <color=#D91414>Hypermatrix</color>, Lee performs a quick strafe with his alternative selves from other worldlines, dealing Fire DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>Sight Points</color>.'}
SpecificDes: {1: "Glides to the enemy's back while unleashing a rain of shots. An additional turnaround kick will be triggered upon a 3-Ping. This glide has the same effect as dodging.\\n- Deals a total of <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Fire DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- The turnaround kick additionally deals <color=#D91414>{3}%</color> Fire DMG.", 2: 'While in <color=#D91414>Hypermatrix</color>, Lee performs a quick strafe with his alternative selves from other worldlines, dealing Fire DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>Sight Points</color>.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG.\\n- Grants <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Sight Point</color> each time it is cast.'}

Title: {1: 'Blue Orb — <color=#0d70bc>Ping Blue Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Throws the firearm case at the enemy and unleashes a blast after catching it back in mid-air, dealing Fire DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: "Throws the firearm case at the enemy and unleashes a blast after catching it back in mid-air, dealing Fire DMG.\\n- Deals a total of <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Fire DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- When <color=#D91414>Hypermatrix</color>'s cooldown is over, holding the Basic Attack button when casting the skill will directly trigger <color=#D91414>Core - Realm Travel</color>."}

Title: {1: 'Basic Attack — <color=#0d70bc>Tap Basic Attack</color>', 2: 'Retribution — <color=#0d70bc>Hypermatrix + Tap Basic Attack</color>', 3: 'Intense Sniping — <color=#0d70bc>Hypermatrix + Sight Point(s) + Press and Hold Basic Attack</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Launches a 5-hit attack with the submachine gun and firearm case.', 2: 'While in <color=#D91414>Hypermatrix</color>, tapping Basic Attack will trigger sniping attacks that deal Fire DMG, pull enemies, and return the Red and Yellow Signal Orbs pinged in the original worldline. If there are no Signal Orbs recorded, sniping attacks will generate Signal Orbs as Basic Attack does.', 3: 'While in <color=#D91414>Hypermatrix</color>, pressing and holding Basic Attack will spend <color=#D91414>Sight Point(s)</color> to deal AOE Fire DMG and extend the duration of <color=#D91414>Hypermatrix</color>.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Launches a 5-hit attack with the submachine gun and firearm case.\\n- Deals a total of <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG.', 2: 'While in <color=#D91414>Hypermatrix</color>, tapping Basic Attack will trigger sniping attacks that deal Fire DMG, pull enemies, and return the Red and Yellow Signal Orbs pinged in the original worldline. If there are no Signal Orbs recorded, sniping attacks will generate Signal Orbs as Basic Attack does.\\n- Each sniping attack deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG.\\n- The duration countdown of <color=#D91414>Hypermatrix</color> will be paused when Lee is in his sniping mode.\\n- Lee cannot move when he is in his sniping mode, but this state has the same effect as dodging.', 3: 'While in <color=#D91414>Hypermatrix</color>, pressing and holding Basic Attack will spend <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Sight Point</color> to deal AOE Fire DMG and extend the duration of <color=#D91414>Hypermatrix</color>.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG.\\n- Every time <color=#D91414>Intense Sniping</color> is triggered, it extends the duration of <color=#D91414>Hypermatrix</color> by <color=#D91414>2</color>s.'}

Title: {1: 'End of Time — <color=#0d70bc>Outside Hypermatrix + 90 Energy + Tap Signature</color>', 2: 'Collapsing Realm — <color=#0d70bc>Hypermatrix + Sight Point(s) + Tap Signature</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Transforms the Composite Armaments into an ultra-area ion cannon, dealing AOE Fire DMG to the target. <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> will be triggered when performing this Signature Move.', 2: 'While in <color=#D91414>Hypermatrix</color>, tapping Signature will consume all <color=#D91414>Sight Points</color> to merge the worldlines, dealing Fire DMG to all enemies in <color=#D91414>Hypermatrix</color>. <color=#D91414>Hypermatrix</color> will end afterward and return a set of 3-Ping Orbs of a random color.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Transforms the Composite Armaments into an ultra-area ion cannon, dealing AOE Fire DMG to the target. <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> will be triggered when performing this Signature Move.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG.', 2: 'While in <color=#D91414>Hypermatrix</color>, tapping Signature will consume all <color=#D91414>Sight Points</color> to merge the worldlines, dealing Fire DMG to all enemies in <color=#D91414>Hypermatrix</color>. <color=#D91414>Hypermatrix</color> will end afterward and return a set of 3-Ping Orbs of a random color.\\n- Deals a total of <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{3}%</color> Fire DMG based on the <color=#D91414>Sight Points</color> consumed.'}

Title: {1: 'QTE — <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Appears and snipes the target for Fire DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Fires a sniping shot, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG.'}

Title: {1: 'Fate Records', 2: 'Realm Travel — <color=#0d70bc>Full Core Gauge + Press and Hold Basic Attack</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'All 3-Ping Orbs pinged outside <color=#D91414>Hypermatrix</color> will be recorded and returned by performing <color=#D91414>Basic Attack - Retribution</color> in <color=#D91414>Hypermatrix</color>.', 2: "When <color=#D91414>Hypermatrix</color>'s cooldown is over, press and hold Basic Attack to attack the enemy in front with a high-power sniper rifle, dealing Fire DMG and triggering <color=#D91414>Hypermatrix</color>. Upon entering Hypermatrix, Blue Orbs will be converted into Red or Yellow Orbs."}
SpecificDes: {1: 'All 3-Ping Orbs pinged outside <color=#D91414>Hypermatrix</color> will be recorded and returned by performing <color=#D91414>Basic Attack - Retribution</color> in <color=#D91414>Hypermatrix</color>.', 2: "When <color=#D91414>Hypermatrix</color>'s cooldown is over, press and hold Basic Attack to attack the enemy in front with a high-power sniper rifle, dealing Fire DMG and triggering <color=#D91414>Hypermatrix</color>. Upon entering Hypermatrix, Blue Orbs will be converted into Red or Yellow Orbs.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG.\\n- <color=#D91414>Hypermatrix</color> lasts <color=#D91414>5</color>s. When the duration ends, <color=#D91414>Signature - Collapsing Realm</color> will be automatically performed with all <color=#D91414>Sight Points</color>. Lee: Hyperreal will exit <color=#D91414>Hypermatrix</color> afterward.\\n- The cooldown of <color=#D91414>Hypermatrix</color> is <color=#D91414>8</color>s."}

BriefDes: {1: 'Increases Fire DMG of all members. Increases ATK of all Attacker Omniframes in the team.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Increases Fire DMG of all members by <color=#D91414>10%</color>. Increases ATK of all Attacker Omniframes in the team by <color=#D91414>10%</color>.'}

Title: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.1: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at S5 Rank</color></color>', 2: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.2: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SS Rank</color></color>'}
BriefDes: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Triggering Hypermatrix and casting Signature - End of Time will activate all available QTEs.</color>', 2: '<color=#99a3b1>Lee: Hyperreal gains an Extra DMG Bonus in Hypermatrix. Every time he enters Hypermatrix for the first time after being switched in, his alternative self from another worldline will perform a Red or Yellow 3-Ping skill and return a set of recorded 3-Ping Orbs. Performing Signature - Collapsing Realm restores Signature Energy. If he is switched out after performing Signature - End of Time, Covering Fire will be triggered when other members perform their Signature Moves, dealing Fire DMG.</color>'}
SpecificDes: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Triggering Hypermatrix and casting Signature - End of Time will activate all available QTEs.</color>', 2: '<color=#99a3b1>Lee: Hyperreal gains a 25% Extra DMG Bonus in Hypermatrix. Every time he enters Hypermatrix for the first time after being switched in, his alternative self from another worldline will perform a Red or Yellow 3-Ping skill and return a set of recorded 3-Ping Orbs. Performing Signature - Collapsing Realm restores 10 Signature Energy (20 instead if 4 Sight Points are consumed). If he is switched out after performing Signature - End of Time, Covering Fire will be triggered (up to 4 times) with 3 sniping shots when other members perform their Signature Moves, each dealing 400% Fire DMG.</color>'}

Title: {1: 'Red Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Red Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Slides around the target once and deals Ice DMG to the targets encircled.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Slides around the target once and deals Ice DMG to the targets encircled.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Ice DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.'}

Title: {1: 'Yellow Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Yellow Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Fires "Yellow Paint" forward, dealing Ice DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Fires "Yellow Paint" forward, dealing Ice DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Ice DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.'}

Title: {1: 'Blue Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Blue Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Throws the Beam Gunlance before flipping forward and kicking the tail of the lance, spinning it to splash "Blue Paint" ahead and dealing Ice DMG to targets in the front.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Throws the Beam Gunlance before flipping forward and kicking the tail of the lance, spinning it to splash "Blue Paint" ahead and dealing Ice DMG to targets in the front.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Ice DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.'}

Title: {1: 'Basic Attack: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Basic Attack</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Swings the Beam Gunlance continuously to perform a multi-hit attack against the target.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Swings the Beam Gunlance continuously to perform a multi-hit attack against the target.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ice DMG in total.'}

Title: {1: 'Color Rendering: <color=#0d70bc>80 Energy + Tap Signature</color>', 2: "Finishing Touch: <color=#0d70bc>Painter's Realm + Tap Signature</color>"}
BriefDes: {1: "Injects Coolant into the Beam Gunlance and consumes <color=#D91414>80 Signature Energy</color> to gain a set of random 3-Ping to and expand the <color=#D91414>Painter's Realm</color>, dealing Ice DMG to surrounding enemies. Signal Orbs will rearrange based on 3-Ping rules. <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> will be triggered when performing this Signature Move.", 2: 'Rides the Beam Gunlance into the air and throws the Beam Gunlance, dealing Ice DMG and leaving behind an <color=#D91414>Improvisation</color> that lasts for 5s. <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> will be triggered when performing this Signature Move.'}
SpecificDes: {1: "Injects Coolant into the Beam Gunlance and consumes <color=#D91414>80 Signature Energy</color> to gain a set of random 3-Ping to and expand the <color=#D91414>Painter's Realm</color>, dealing Ice DMG to surrounding enemies. Signal Orbs will rearrange based on 3-Ping rules. <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> will be triggered when performing this Signature Move.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ice DMG.\\n- All Energy is converted into Coolant when Painter's Realm is expanded. Pinging Signal Orbs or performing Basic Attacks does not recover Signature Energy.", 2: "Rides the Beam Gunlance into the air and throws the Beam Gunlance, dealing Ice DMG and leaving behind an <color=#D91414>Improvisation</color> that lasts for 5s. <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> will be triggered when performing this Signature Move.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ice DMG.\\n- <color=#D91414>Improvisation</color> restores HP equal to <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> of Ayla's ATK to all allies within range every second."}

Title: {1: 'QTE: <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Ayla paints around the target with beautiful colors, dealing Ice DMG and restoring HP for teammates on the field.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Ayla paints around the target with beautiful colors, dealing Ice DMG and restoring HP for teammates on the field.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ice DMG and heals for HP equal to <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> of her ATK.'}

Title: {1: 'Converging Expression: <color=#0d70bc>3-Ping</color>', 2: 'Color Mix: Clash of Concepts: <color=#0d70bc>Main Color is different from Secondary Color + Press and Hold Basic Attack</color>', 3: 'Pure Color: Theme Emphasis: <color=#0d70bc>Main Color is the same as Secondary Color + Press and Hold Basic Attack</color>', 4: "Vibrant Brushstroke: <color=#0d70bc>Painter's Realm + Any Orb Ping</color>", 5: 'Hued Splash: <color=#0d70bc>Pure Color: Theme Emphasis/Color Mix: Clash of Concepts</color>', 6: 'Art Influence: <color=#0d70bc>Receive Healing</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'The <color=#D91414>Main Color</color> is filled with a Signal Orb color by default. Upon a 3-Ping, Coolant in the 3-Ping color will fill the <color=#D91414>Secondary Color</color> (max <color=#D91414>1</color> type of Coolant). Subsequent Coolant will replace the previous Coolant.', 2: 'Performs 2 consecutive sweep attacks, dealing Ice DMG and gaining an extra buff. Gains Super Armor in the skill duration.', 3: 'Dashes forward before turning around for a sweep attack, dealing Ice DMG and gaining an extra buff. Gains Super Armor in the skill duration.', 4: 'Rides the Beam Gunlance and draws a colorful trail, causing an explosion upon hitting the enemy for the first time and dealing Ice DMG to enemies within the area. Gains DMG Reduction and Super Armor in the skill duration.', 5: 'Ayla: Kaleido restores <color=#D91414>15</color> Signature Energy to herself and heals her allies within the area every time she casts <color=#D91414>Pure Color: Theme Emphasis</color> or <color=#D91414>Color Mix: Clash of Concepts</color>, storing <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>"Backup Paint"</color> of the <color=#D91414>Main Color</color> (max <color=#D91414>3</color>). When <color=#D91414>Vibrant Brushstroke</color> deals DMG, spends 1 <color=#D91414>"Backup Paint"</color> to gain 1 set of 3-Ping Orbs in the same color as the <color=#D91414>"Backup Paint"</color>.', 6: 'Healed allies gain <color=#D91414>Frost Crystal</color>, which increases Ice DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'The <color=#D91414>Main Color</color> is filled with a Signal Orb color by default. Upon a 3-Ping, Coolant in the 3-Ping color will fill the <color=#D91414>Secondary Color</color> (max <color=#D91414>1</color> type of Coolant). Subsequent Coolant will replace the previous Coolant.', 2: 'Performs 2 consecutive sweep attacks, dealing Ice DMG and gaining an extra buff. Gains Super Armor in the skill duration.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ice DMG.\\n- Gains an extra buff, which increases Extra DMG Bonus by <color=#D91414>10%</color> for <color=#D91414>6</color>s. Triggering the buff again resets its duration.\\n- The <color=#D91414>Main Color</color> does not change. Clears the <color=#D91414>Secondary Color</color>.', 3: 'Dashes forward before turning around for a sweep attack, dealing Ice DMG and gaining an extra buff. Gains Super Armor in the skill duration.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ice DMG.\\n- Gains an extra buff, which increases Ice DMG Bonus by <color=#D91414>10%</color> for <color=#D91414>6</color>s. Triggering the buff again resets its duration.\\n- Replaces the Signal Orbs of the <color=#D91414>Main Color</color> with those of another color and clears those of the <color=#D91414>Secondary Color</color>.', 4: 'Rides the Beam Gunlance and draws a colorful trail, causing an explosion upon hitting the enemy for the first time and dealing Ice DMG to enemies within the area. Gains <color=#D91414>30%</color> DMG Reduction and Super Armor in the skill duration.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Ice DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- Increases the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Signature - Finishing Touch by 20%</color> for <color=#D91414>every</color> set of 3-Ping performed. Can stack up to <color=#D91414>5</color> times.\\n- Press and hold Dodge to end sliding in advance.', 5: 'Ayla: Kaleido restores <color=#D91414>15</color> Signature Energy to herself and heals her allies within the area every time she casts <color=#D91414>Pure Color: Theme Emphasis</color> or <color=#D91414>Color Mix: Clash of Concepts</color>, storing <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>"Backup Paint"</color> of the <color=#D91414>Main Color</color> (max <color=#D91414>3</color>). When <color=#D91414>Vibrant Brushstroke</color> deals DMG, spends 1 <color=#D91414>"Backup Paint"</color> to gain 1 set of 3-Ping Orbs in the same color as the <color=#D91414>"Backup Paint"</color>.\\n- All allies within the area restore HP equal to <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>{0}%</color></color> of her ATK.', 6: 'Healed allies gain <color=#D91414>Frost Crystal</color>, which increases Ice DMG by <color=#D91414>10%</color> for <color=#D91414>8</color>s. The duration resets every time it is triggered.'}

BriefDes: {1: "All members' ATK increases. All Amplifiers' Ice DMG increases."}
SpecificDes: {1: "All members' ATK increases by <color=#D91414>10%</color> and all Amplifiers' Ice DMG increases by <color=#D91414>5%</color>."}

BriefDes: {1: "All switched-in members gain an extra ATK and Elemental DMG Bonus of the Amplifier's element."}
SpecificDes: {1: "All switched-in members gain an extra <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> ATK and <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Elemental DMG Bonus of the Amplifier's element for <color=#D91414>10</color>s."}

SpecificDes: {1: 'Gains 3 Signal Orbs when entering battle.'}

Title: {1: 'Red Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Odachi in Hand + Ping Red Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Charges and thrusts the enemy, dealing Lightning DMG to targets in the area.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Charges and thrusts the enemy, dealing Lightning DMG to targets in the area.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Lightning DMG in total based on the number of orbs pinged.'}

Title: {1: 'Yellow Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Odachi in Hand + Ping Yellow Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Sweeps and slashes the enemy continuously, dealing Lightning DMG to targets in a large area.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Sweeps and slashes the enemy continuously, dealing Lightning DMG to targets in a large area.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Lightning DMG in total based on the number of orbs pinged.'}

Title: {1: 'Blue Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Kodachi in Hand + Ping Blue Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: "Slashes the enemy rapidly and deals Lightning DMG. Performing a Blue Orb 2-Ping/3-Ping again will change Alpha's move into jumping up before slashing the enemy."}
SpecificDes: {1: "Slashes the enemy rapidly and deals Lightning DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Lightning DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- Performing a Blue Orb 2-Ping/3-Ping again will change Alpha's move into jumping up before slashing the enemy, dealing <color=#D91414>{3}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{4}%</color> Lightning DMG."}

Title: {1: 'Slash: Dispel Shadow: <color=#0d70bc>Kodachi in Hand + Tap Basic Attack</color>', 2: 'Slash: Annihilate: <color=#0d70bc>Odachi in Hand + Tap Basic Attack</color>', 3: 'Blading Radiance: <color=#0d70bc>After the 4th Basic Attack/Dodge + Blade Lights Up + Tap Basic Attack</color>', 4: 'Unquenchable Flare: <color=#0d70bc>Odachi in Hand + Activate Selfless Stance + Press and Hold Basic Attack</color>', 5: 'Shatter All Scourges: <color=#0d70bc>Red/Yellow Orb 3-Ping + Tap Basic Attack</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Unleashes 5 hits of attack toward the target using the kodachi and techniques.', 2: 'Unleashes 5 hits of attack toward the target using the odachi.', 3: 'When the blade lights up after the 4th Basic Attack/Dodge, tap Basic Attack to trigger <color=#D91414>Blading Radiance</color>, then tap Basic Attack continuously to unleash swordwaves, dealing Lightning DMG.', 4: 'When Alpha is <color=#D91414>holding the odachi</color> with <color=#D91414>Selfless Stance</color> activated, press and hold Basic Attack to launch <color=#D91414>Leaping Thrust</color> and jump up to perform <color=#D91414>Thunderous Bash</color> in midair, pulling enemies in the area and dealing Lightning DMG. When casting <color=#D91414>Unquenchable Flare</color>, Alpha becomes invincible but is unable to cast <color=#D91414>Signature - Weave: Karmic Inferno</color>.', 5: "Alpha's next Basic Attack after a Red/Yellow Orb 3-Ping will launch a follow-up attack and deal Lightning DMG."}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Unleashes 5 hits of attack toward the target using the kodachi and techniques.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG in total.', 2: 'Unleashes 5 hits of attack toward the target using the odachi.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG in total.', 3: 'When the blade lights up after the 4th Basic Attack/Dodge, tap Basic Attack to trigger <color=#D91414>Blading Radiance</color>, then tap Basic Attack continuously to unleash swordwaves for up to <color=#D91414>2.5s</color>, dealing Lightning DMG.\\n- <color=#D91414>When Alpha holds the kodachi</color>, each swordwave deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG.\\n- <color=#D91414>When Alpha holds the odachi</color>, each swordwave deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Lightning DMG.', 4: 'When Alpha is <color=#D91414>holding the odachi</color> with <color=#D91414>Selfless Stance</color> activated, press and hold Basic Attack to launch <color=#D91414>Leaping Thrust</color> and jump up to perform <color=#D91414>Thunderous Bash</color> in midair, pulling enemies in the area and dealing Lightning DMG. When casting <color=#D91414>Unquenchable Flare</color>, Alpha becomes invincible but is unable to cast <color=#D91414>Signature - Weave: Karmic Inferno</color>.\\n- <color=#D91414>Leaping Thrust</color> deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG.\\n- <color=#D91414>Thunderous Bash</color> deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Lightning DMG in total.', 5: "Alpha's next Basic Attack after a Red/Yellow Orb 3-Ping will launch a follow-up attack and deal Lightning DMG.\\n- The follow-up attack after the Red/Yellow Orb 3-Ping will deal <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Lightning DMG."}

Title: {1: 'Weave: Splashing Thunder: <color=#0d70bc>20 Energy + Tap Signature</color>', 2: 'Weave: Karmic Inferno: <color=#0d70bc>70 Energy + Tap Signature</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Slowly pulls out the odachi and summons thunder to deal Lightning DMG to nearby targets in a large area, then <color=#D91414>holds the odachi in hand</color>. Triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> when casting the skill.', 2: 'When Alpha is <color=#D91414>holding the odachi</color>, tap Signature to consume Signature Energy and deal Lightning DMG to enemies in a large area. Alpha then puts the odachi away and <color=#D91414>holds the kodachi in hand</color>. Triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> when casting the skill.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Slowly pulls out the odachi and summons thunder to deal Lightning DMG to nearby targets in a large area, then <color=#D91414>holds the odachi in hand</color>. Triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> when casting the skill.\\n -Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG in total.', 2: 'When Alpha is <color=#D91414>holding the odachi</color>, tap Signature to consume Signature Energy and deal Lightning DMG to enemies in a large area. Alpha then puts the odachi away and <color=#D91414>holds the kodachi in hand</color>. Triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> when casting the skill.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG in total.'}

Title: {1: 'QTE: <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Slashes multiple times to deal Lightning DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Slashes multiple times to deal <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG.'}

Title: {1: 'Formless Confrontation', 2: 'Sundered Delusion: <color=#0d70bc>Press and hold Dodge to enter Foresight Charge</color>', 3: 'Resolute Blow: <color=#0d70bc>Foresight Charge + Release Dodge</color>', 4: 'Aphotic Points: <color=#0d70bc>Gained automatically when casting Signal Orb Skills/Blading Radiance/Resolute Blow</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'When <color=#D91414>wielding the kodachi</color>, Alpha can only use Blue Orb Skills. Her Basic Attacks will only grant Blue Orbs, which will be arranged in front of other orbs by default. When <color=#D91414>wielding the odachi</color>, Alpha can only use Red or Yellow Orb Skills. Her Basic Attacks will only grant Red or Yellow Orbs, and Blue Orbs will be randomly converted into Red or Yellow Orbs.', 2: 'Press and hold Dodge to enter <color=#D91414>Foresight Charge</color>, gaining <color=#D91414>Blade Aura</color> over time. During this time, Lucia: Crimson Weave gets Super Armor and DMG Reduction, is unable to restore the Dodge Gauge, and enters the Parry Stance. Pinging Signal Orbs can also increase <color=#D91414>Blade Aura</color>.', 3: 'Press and hold Dodge to enter <color=#D91414>Foresight Charge</color>. Afterward, release Dodge to perform a powerful slash and deal Lightning DMG, during which Alpha gains Super Armor and DMG Reduction and is unable to restore the Dodge Gauge. Performing a powerful slash when <color=#D91414>Blade Aura</color> is full will make Alpha Invincible, clear <color=#D91414>Blade Aura</color>, activate <color=#D91414>Selfless Stance</color>, and restore Signature Energy.', 4: "Gains <color=#D91414>Aphotic Points</color> every time when casting a Signal Orb Skill, <color=#D91414>Blading Radiance</color>, or <color=#D91414>Resolute Blow</color>. Casting <color=#D91414>Unquenchable Flare</color> will consume all <color=#D91414>Aphotic Points</color> to increase the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Unquenchable Flare's</color> <color=#D91414>Thunderous Bash</color> based on the <color=#D91414>Aphotic Points</color> consumed."}
SpecificDes: {1: 'When <color=#D91414>wielding the kodachi</color>, Alpha can only use Blue Orb Skills. Her Basic Attacks will only grant Blue Orbs, which will be arranged in front of other orbs by default. When <color=#D91414>wielding the odachi</color>, Alpha can only use Red or Yellow Orb Skills. Her Basic Attacks will only grant Red or Yellow Orbs, and Blue Orbs will be randomly converted into Red or Yellow Orbs.', 2: 'Press and hold Dodge to enter <color=#D91414>Foresight Charge</color>, gaining <color=#D91414>Blade Aura</color> over time. During this time, Lucia: Crimson Weave gets Super Armor and <color=#D91414>30%</color> DMG Reduction, is unable to restore the Dodge Gauge, and enters the Parry Stance. Pinging Signal Orbs can also increase <color=#D91414>Blade Aura</color>.\\n- Restores <color=#D91414>4 Blade Aura</color> every <color=#D91414>0.1</color>s in <color=#D91414>Foresight Charge</color> Mode.\\n- Gains <color=#D91414>10/20/40 Blade Aura</color> based on the number of the orbs pinged.\\n- <color=#D91414>Blade Aura</color> Limit: <color=#D91414>120</color>.\\n- When taking DMG in the Parry Stance, increases DMG Reduction to <color=#D91414>70%</color>. Can parry up to 3 times.', 3: 'Press and hold Dodge to enter <color=#D91414>Foresight Charge</color>. Afterward, release Dodge at <color=#D91414>0/60/120</color> <color=#D91414>Blade Aura</color> to perform a powerful slash and deal Lightning DMG, during which Alpha gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>50%</color> DMG Reduction and is unable to restore the Dodge Gauge.\\n- When <color=#D91414>holding the kodachi</color>, Alpha deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Lightning DMG.\\n- When <color=#D91414>holding the odachi</color>, Alpha deals <color=#D91414>{3}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{4}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{5}%</color> Lightning DMG.\\n- Performing a powerful slash when <color=#D91414>Blade Aura</color> is full will make Alpha Invincible, clear <color=#D91414>Blade Aura</color>, activate <color=#D91414>Selfless Stance</color>, and restore <color=#D91414>25</color> Signature Energy.\\n- Alpha will automatically perform a powerful slash 1.5s after <color=#D91414>Blade Aura</color> reaches the upper limit.', 4: "Gains <color=#D91414>Aphotic Points</color> every time when casting a Signal Orb Skill, <color=#D91414>Blading Radiance</color>, or <color=#D91414>Resolute Blow</color>. Casting <color=#D91414>Unquenchable Flare</color> will consume all <color=#D91414>Aphotic Points</color> to increase the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Unquenchable Flare's</color> <color=#D91414>Thunderous Bash</color> based on the <color=#D91414>Aphotic Points</color> consumed.\\n- <color=#D91414>Aphotic Points</color> limit: <color=#D91414>300</color>. Each <color=#D91414>Aphotic Point</color> increases the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Unquenchable Flare's</color> <color=#D91414>Thunderous Bash by 1%.</color>\\n- Casting <color=#D91414>Resolute Blow</color> at full <color=#D91414>Blade Aura</color> will grant <color=#D91414>40 Aphotic Points</color>.\\n- Gains <color=#D91414>10/20/40 Aphotic Points</color> based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- When unleashing swordwaves through <color=#D91414>Blading Radiance</color>, restores <color=#D91414>20 Aphotic Points</color> every <color=#D91414>0.5</color>s."}

BriefDes: {1: 'Increases Lightning DMG of all members. Increases ATK of all Attacker Omniframes in the team.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Increases Lightning DMG of all members by <color=#D91414>10%</color>. Increases ATK of all Attacker Omniframes in the team by <color=#D91414>10%</color>.'}

Title: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.1: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SS3 Rank</color></color>', 2: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.2: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SSS Rank</color></color>'}
BriefDes: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Upon entering battle, the first Resolute Blow cast will restore bonus Signature Energy. Base DMG of Signal Orb Skills and Resolute Blow increases.</color>', 2: "<color=#99a3b1>When Alpha is holding the odachi, making a 3-Ping will grant her Extra DMG Bonus. The Base DMG of both Signature - Weave: Karmic Inferno and Unquenchable Flare's Leaping Thrust increase. Alpha's swordwave becomes enhanced when casting Blading Radiance for the first time after entering the battlefield.</color>"}
SpecificDes: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Upon entering battle, the first Resolute Blow cast will restore an addition of 20 Signature Energy. Base DMG of Signal Orb Skills and Resolute Blow increases by 50%.</color>', 2: "<color=#99a3b1>When Alpha is holding the odachi, making a 3-Ping will grant her a 15% Extra DMG Bonus. The Base DMG of Signature - Weave: Karmic Inferno and Unquenchable Flare's Leaping Thrust increase by 60% and 50% respectively. Alpha's swordwave becomes enhanced when casting Blading Radiance for the first time after entering the battlefield.\\n- When enhanced, swordwave's Base DMG increases by 100%. Casting enhanced swordwaves also restores 3 Signature Energy every 0.3s and 25 Aphotic Points every 0.5s.</color>"}

Title: {1: 'Blue Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Blue Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Leaps into the air and spins, dealing DMG to the surrounding enemies and restoring the HP of nearby allies. Activates the <color=#D91414>Ultralimit Torque</color> effect that increases Physical DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: "Leaps into the air and spins, dealing DMG to the surrounding enemies and restoring the HP of nearby allies. Activates the <color=#D91414>Ultralimit Torque</color> effect that increases Physical DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- Restores HP equal to <color=#D91414>{3}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{4}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{5}%</color> of Hanying's attack based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- <color=#D91414>Ultralimit Torque</color>: Increases Physical DMG by <color=#D91414>10%</color> for <color=#D91414>8</color>s. Duration refreshes when stacks overlap."}

SpecificDes: {1: 'Swings the fans and dances, dealing multiple hits to the enemy. Title: {1: 'QTE: <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Leaps into the air and spins, dealing DMG to the surrounding enemies and restoring the HP of nearby allies. Activates the <color=#D91414>Ultralimit Torque</color> effect that increases Physical DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: "Leaps into the air and spins, dealing DMG to the surrounding enemies and restoring the HP of nearby allies. Activates the <color=#D91414>Ultralimit Torque</color> effect that increases Physical DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG in total.\\n- Restores HP of allies in a large area equal to <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> of Hanying's attack \\n- <color=#D91414>Ultralimit Torque</color>: Increases Physical DMG by <color=#D91414>10%</color> for <color=#D91414>8</color>s. Duration refreshes when stacks overlap."}

Title: {1: 'Spring of Emerald Flow: <color=#0d70bc>Any 3-Ping</color>', 2: 'Dance of Emerald Flow: <color=#0d70bc>At least 1 [Dancer Point] + Tap Dodge</color>', 3: 'Ballad of Wilting Bamboos: <color=#0d70bc>[Dancer Stance] + Ping Red [Dance Orb]</color>', 4: 'Coda of Scattering Butterflies: <color=#0d70bc>[Dancer Stance] + Ping Yellow [Dance Orb]</color>', 5: 'Verse of Singing Breeze: <color=#0d70bc>[Dancer Stance] + Ping Blue [Dance Orb]</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Hanying gains <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Dancer Point</color> after any 3-Ping, up to <color=#D91414>4</color> Points.', 2: 'After spending 1 <color=#D91414>Dancer Point</color>, Hanying will perform a <color=#D91414>Choreography</color>, entering <color=#D91414>Dancer Stance</color>, recovering <color=#D91414>16</color> Signature Energy, and gaining <color=#D91414>1</color> stack of <color=#D91414>Emerald Flow</color>. In <color=#D91414>Dancer Stance</color>, all Signal Orbs will be converted into <color=#D91414>Dance Orbs</color> (with color unchanged) that cast <color=#D91414>Poise of Emerald Flow</color> when pinged, and Hanying can only perform 1-Pings. Hanying gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>50%</color> DMG Reduction while casting Poise of Emerald Flow. Each stack of <color=#D91414>Emerald Flow</color> will increase the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Poise of Emerald Flow</color> or <color=#D91414>Vision of Mountains</color> by <color=#D91414>20%</color> (max <color=#D91414>4</color> stacks). Exiting <color=#D91414>Dancer Stance</color> will reset <color=#D91414>Emerald Flow</color> to <color=#D91414>0</color>. Performing 4 consecutive <color=#D91414>Choreographies</color> will leave behind a healing zone that restores the HP of allies in the area and grants <color=#D91414>Ultralimit Torque</color>, which increases Physical DMG.', 3: '<color=#D91414>Poise of Emerald Flow</color> - Red: Swings the fan to deal DMG, exiting <color=#D91414>Dancer Stance</color> afterward.', 4: '<color=#D91414>Poise of Emerald Flow</color> - Yellow: Steps on the airborne fan and dashes forward, gathering surrounding enemies and dealing DMG. Exits <color=#D91414>Dancer Stance</color> afterward.', 5: '<color=#D91414>Poise of Emerald Flow</color> - Blue: Dances at her location, gathering surrounding enemies and dealing DMG. Exits <color=#D91414>Dancer Stance</color> afterward.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Hanying gains <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Dancer Point</color> after any 3-Ping, up to <color=#D91414>4</color> Points.', 2: "After spending 1 <color=#D91414>Dancer Point</color>, Hanying will perform a <color=#D91414>Choreography</color>, entering <color=#D91414>Dancer Stance</color>, recovering <color=#D91414>16</color> Signature Energy, and gaining <color=#D91414>1</color> stack of <color=#D91414>Emerald Flow</color>. In <color=#D91414>Dancer Stance</color>, all Signal Orbs will be converted into <color=#D91414>Dance Orbs</color> (with color unchanged) that cast <color=#D91414>Poise of Emerald Flow</color> when pinged, and Hanying can only perform 1-Pings. Hanying gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>50%</color> DMG Reduction while casting Poise of Emerald Flow. Each stack of <color=#D91414>Emerald Flow</color> will increase the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Poise of Emerald Flow</color> or <color=#D91414>Vision of Mountains</color> by <color=#D91414>20%</color> (max <color=#D91414>4</color> stacks). Exiting <color=#D91414>Dancer Stance</color> will reset <color=#D91414>Emerald Flow</color> to <color=#D91414>0</color>. Performing 4 consecutive <color=#D91414>Choreographies</color> will leave behind a healing zone that restores the HP of allies in the area and grants <color=#D91414>Ultralimit Torque</color>, which increases Physical DMG.\\n- <color=#D91414>Choreography</color> deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG.\\n- The healing zone restores allies' HP equal to <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> of Hanying's ATK for <color=#D91414>4</color>s.\\n- <color=#D91414>Ultralimit Torque</color>: Increases Physical DMG by <color=#D91414>10%</color> for <color=#D91414>8</color>s. Recasting will refresh the duration.", 3: '<color=#D91414>Poise of Emerald Flow</color> - Red: Swings the fan to deal DMG, exiting <color=#D91414>Dancer Stance</color> afterward.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG.', 4: '<color=#D91414>Poise of Emerald Flow</color> - Yellow: Steps on the airborne fan and dashes forward, gathering surrounding enemies and dealing DMG. Exits <color=#D91414>Dancer Stance</color> afterward.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG.', 5: '<color=#D91414>Poise of Emerald Flow</color> - Blue: Dances at her location, gathering surrounding enemies and dealing DMG. Exits <color=#D91414>Dancer Stance</color> afterward.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG.'}

Title: {1: 'Sky-ripping Arcflash: <color=#0d70bc>110 Energy + Tap Signature</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Leaps into the air and uses the speed of her fall to smash the target on the ground, dealing Lightning DMG. <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> will be triggered when performing this Signature Move.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Leaps into the air and uses the speed of her fall to smash the target on the ground, dealing Lightning DMG. <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> will be triggered when performing this Signature Move.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG in total.'}

Title: {1: 'QTE: <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'No. 21: Feral launches a descending attack on the target, dealing Lightning DMG and restoring HP.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'No. 21: Feral launches a descending attack on the target, dealing Lightning DMG and restoring HP.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG and heals for HP equal to <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> of her ATK.'}

Title: {1: 'Fledgling Wings: <color=#0d70bc>3-Ping</color>', 2: 'Dusk Fluorescence: <color=#0d70bc>3-Ping + Tap Basic Attack</color>', 3: 'Forest Predator: <color=#0d70bc>During a 3-Ping + Ping Signal Orb</color>', 4: 'Wolfspirit Release: <color=#0d70bc>Press and Hold Basic Attack/Press and Hold Basic Attack and Then Tap Basic Attack Repeatedly</color>', 5: 'Critical Arclight', 6: 'Sheltering Wolves: <color=#0d70bc>Receive Healing</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'No. 21: Feral generates a Shield at the cost of her HP when casting a 3-Ping Skill. No. 21 gains Super Armor when having Shield.', 2: 'After casting a 3-Ping Skill, No. 21 will enter the <color=#D91414>Predator Stance</color>. Tap Basic Attack in this stance to cast <color=#D91414>Forceful Pounce</color> to deal Lightning DMG, gain <color=#D91414>Wolfspirit Points</color>, and restore HP to allies within range. When a <color=#D91414>purple mark</color> appears, immediately tapping Basic Attack will cast a more powerful <color=#D91414>Dead-on Pounce</color> and gain more <color=#D91414>Wolfspirit Points</color>. During <color=#D91414>Forceful Pounce</color> and <color=#D91414>Dead-on Pounce</color>, No. 21 will gain Super Armor and DMG Reduction.', 3: "Every time entering the battlefield or casting <color=#D91414>Signature - Sky-ripping Arcflash</color>, No. 21: Feral will activate <color=#D91414>Forest Predator</color>, during which extra Signal Orbs can be pinged when casting a 3-Ping Skill to generate a <color=#D91414>Deceleration Field</color> and add additional Lightning DMG to <color=#D91414>Dusk Fluorescence</color>. When there is a <color=#D91414>Deceleration Field</color>, No. 21 will be invincible, the enemies will be slowed down temporarily, and <color=#D91414>Dusk Fluorescence's purple mark</color> will last until the <color=#D91414>Deceleration Field</color> is gone. Casting <color=#D91414>Dusk Fluorescence</color> will deactivate the <color=#D91414>Deceleration Field</color>. When No. 21 casts <color=#D91414>Dusk Fluorescence</color> and deals Lightning DMG, the Signal Orbs will be rearranged into 3-Ping sets.", 4: 'With max <color=#D91414>Wolfspirit Points</color>, press and hold Basic Attack to enter <color=#D91414>Wolfspirit Form</color>. When continuously holding or repeatedly tapping Basic Attack, <color=#D91414>Growling Wolfspirit</color> will be cast with <color=#D91414>Wolfspirit Points</color>. It will end with <color=#D91414>Scratch Reap</color> once all <color=#D91414>Wolfspirit Points</color> are depleted. <color=#D91414>Growling Wolfspirit</color> and <color=#D91414>Scratch Reap</color> will pull targets within range and deal Lightning DMG, granting Signature Energy to No. 21 and restoring HP to her allies within range. No. 21 can adjust her position by dodging with Super Armor and DMG Reduction granted in <color=#D91414>Wolfspirit Form</color>.', 5: "<color=#D91414>Wolfspirit Release</color> attacks grant <color=#D91414>Critical Arclight</color>. Casting <color=#D91414>Signature - Sky-ripping Arcflash</color> will consume all <color=#D91414>Critical Arclight</color> and increase <color=#D91414>Signature - Sky-ripping Arcflash's</color> Base DMG.", 6: 'Allies gain <color=#D91414>Lightning Surge</color> which increases their Lightning DMG after being healed.'}
SpecificDes: {1: "No. 21: Feral generates a Shield equal to <color=#D91414>50%</color> of Max HP for <color=#D91414>12</color>s at the cost of <color=#D91414>25%</color> of her current HP when casting a 3-Ping Skill. Triggering this again will refresh the duration and increase the Shield value up to <color=#D91414>100%</color> of No. 21's Max HP. No. 21 gains Super Armor when having Shield.", 2: "After casting a 3-Ping Skill, No. 21 will enter the <color=#D91414>Predator Stance</color>. Tap Basic Attack in this stance to cast <color=#D91414>Forceful Pounce</color> to deal Lightning DMG, gain <color=#D91414>Wolfspirit Points</color>, and restore HP to allies within range. When a <color=#D91414>purple mark</color> appears, immediately tapping Basic Attack will cast a more powerful <color=#D91414>Dead-on Pounce</color> and gain more <color=#D91414>Wolfspirit Points</color>. During <color=#D91414>Forceful Pounce</color> and <color=#D91414>Dead-on Pounce</color>, No. 21 will gain Super Armor and <color=#D91414>70%</color> DMG Reduction.\\n- Red Orb 3-Ping: <color=#D91414>Forceful Pounce</color> deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG in total. <color=#D91414>Dead-on Pounce</color> deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Lightning DMG in total.\\n- Yellow Orb 3-Ping: <color=#D91414>Forceful Pounce</color> deals <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Lightning DMG in total. <color=#D91414>Dead-on Pounce</color> deals <color=#D91414>{3}%</color> Lightning DMG in total.\\n- Blue Orb 3-Ping: <color=#D91414>Forceful Pounce</color> deals <color=#D91414>{4}%</color> Lightning DMG in total. <color=#D91414>Dead-on Pounce</color> deals <color=#D91414>{5}%</color> Lightning DMG in total.\\n- <color=#D91414>Wolfspirit Points</color> are capped at <color=#D91414>240</color>.\\n- Casting <color=#D91414>Forceful Pounce</color> grants <color=#D91414>80 Wolfspirit Points</color> while casting <color=#D91414>Dead-on Pounce</color> grants <color=#D91414>160 Wolfspirit Points</color>.\\n- Casting <color=#D91414>Forceful Pounce</color> and <color=#D91414>Dead-on Pounce</color> will restore HP equal to <color=#D91414>{6}%</color> of No. 21's ATK to her allies within range.", 3: "Every time entering the battlefield or casting <color=#D91414>Signature - Sky-ripping Arcflash</color>, No. 21: Feral will activate <color=#D91414>Forest Predator</color>, during which extra Signal Orbs can be pinged when casting a 3-Ping Skill to generate a <color=#D91414>Deceleration Field</color> and add additional Lightning DMG to <color=#D91414>Dusk Fluorescence</color>. When there is a <color=#D91414>Deceleration Field</color>, No. 21 will be invincible, the enemies will be slowed down temporarily, and <color=#D91414>Dusk Fluorescence's purple mark</color> will last until the <color=#D91414>Deceleration Field</color> is gone. Casting <color=#D91414>Dusk Fluorescence</color> will deactivate the <color=#D91414>Deceleration Field</color>. When No. 21 casts <color=#D91414>Dusk Fluorescence</color> and deals Lightning DMG, the Signal Orbs will be rearranged into 3-Ping sets.\\n- Up to <color=#D91414>3</color> extra Signal Orbs can be pinged when casting Forest Predator. The record will be reset when <color=#D91414>Forest Predator</color> is cast again.\\n- <color=#D91414>Each</color> Signal Orb pinged will trigger a <color=#D91414>Deceleration Field</color> for <color=#D91414>0.5s</color>. The Deceleration Field can be stacked.\\n- <color=#D91414>Each</color> Signal Orb pinged will deal an additional <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG <color=#D91414>1</color> more time when casting <color=#D91414>Dusk Fluorescence</color>.", 4: 'With max <color=#D91414>Wolfspirit Points</color>, press and hold Basic Attack to enter <color=#D91414>Wolfspirit Form</color>. When continuously holding or repeatedly tapping Basic Attack, <color=#D91414>Growling Wolfspirit</color> will be cast with <color=#D91414>Wolfspirit Points</color>. It will end with <color=#D91414>Scratch Reap</color> once all <color=#D91414>Wolfspirit Points</color> are depleted. <color=#D91414>Growling Wolfspirit</color> and <color=#D91414>Scratch Reap</color> will pull targets within range and deal Lightning DMG, granting Signature Energy to No. 21 and restoring HP to her allies within range. No. 21 can adjust her position by dodging with Super Armor and <color=#D91414>30%</color> DMG Reduction granted in <color=#D91414>Wolfspirit Form</color>.\\n- Each <color=#D91414>Growling Wolfspirit</color> consumes <color=#D91414>15 Wolfspirit Points</color>, deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG, grants No. 21 <color=#D91414>2</color> Signature Energy, and restores HP equal to <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> of her ATK to her allies within range.\\n- <color=#D91414>Scratch Reap</color> deals <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Lightning DMG, grants No. 21 <color=#D91414>20</color> Signature Energy, and restores HP equal to <color=#D91414>{3}%</color> of her ATK to her allies within range.', 5: "<color=#D91414>Wolfspirit Release</color> attacks grant <color=#D91414>Critical Arclight</color>. Casting <color=#D91414>Signature - Sky-ripping Arcflash</color> will consume all <color=#D91414>Critical Arclight</color> and increase <color=#D91414>Signature - Sky-ripping Arcflash's</color> Base DMG.\\n- <color=#D91414>Critical Arclight</color> is capped at <color=#D91414>100</color> points with each <color=#D91414>Critical Arclight</color> point increasing <color=#D91414>Signature - Sky-ripping Arcflash's</color> Base DMG by <color=#D91414>1%</color>.\\n- In the <color=#D91414>Wolfspirit Form</color>, each <color=#D91414>Growling Wolfspirit</color> grants <color=#D91414>5 Critical Arclight</color>, while each <color=#D91414>Scratch Reap</color> grants <color=#D91414>20 Critical Arclight</color>.", 6: 'Allies gain <color=#D91414>Lightning Surge</color> which increases their Lightning DMG by <color=#D91414>10%</color> for <color=#D91414>8</color>s after being healed. The duration resets every time it is triggered.'}

BriefDes: {1: "All members' ATK increases. All Amplifiers' Lightning DMG increases."}
SpecificDes: {1: "All members' ATK increases by <color=#D91414>10%</color>. All Amplifiers' Lightning DMG increases by <color=#D91414>5%</color>."}

BriefDes: {1: "All switched-in members gain an extra ATK and Elemental DMG Bonus of the Amplifier's element."}
SpecificDes: {1: "All switched-in members gain an extra <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> ATK and <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Elemental DMG Bonus of the Amplifier's element for <color=#D91414>10</color>s."}

BriefDes: {1: 'Gains 3 Signal Orbs when entering battle.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Gains 3 Signal Orbs when entering battle.'}

Title: {1: 'Red Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Red Orb</color>', 2: 'Lightning Smash: <color=#0d70bc>Thunder Burst Form + During a Red Orb 3-Ping + Press and hold Basic Attack</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Dashes in and throws a punch to knock the target into mid-air, dealing Lightning DMG.', 2: 'Leaps up in a follow-up and strikes before smashing downward, dealing Lightning DMG. Noctis gains Super Armor during the attack.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Dashes in and throws a punch to knock the target into mid-air, dealing Lightning DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Lightning DMG in total based on the number of orbs pinged.', 2: 'Leaps up in a follow-up and strikes before smashing downward, dealing Lightning DMG. Noctis gains Super Armor during the attack.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG in total based on the number of orbs pinged.'}

Title: {1: 'Yellow Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Yellow Orb</color>', 2: 'Lightning Punch: <color=#0d70bc>Thunder Burst Form + During a Yellow Orb 3-Ping + Press and hold Basic Attack</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Leaps up and thrusts forward before striking down, dealing Lightning DMG to the target in front.', 2: 'Punches upward in a follow-up, dealing Lightning DMG. Noctis gains Super Armor during the attack.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Leaps up and thrusts forward before striking down, dealing Lightning DMG to the target in front.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Lightning DMG in total based on the number of orbs pinged.', 2: 'Punches upward in a follow-up, dealing Lightning DMG. BriefDes: {1: 'Kicks forward twice, dealing Lightning DMG to the target in front.', 2: 'Performs a sliding strike at the target in a follow-up, dealing Lightning DMG. Noctis gains Super Armor during the attack.'}
