Title: {1: 'Basic Attack: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Basic Attack</color>', 2: 'Revving Charge: <color=#0d70bc>Press and hold Basic Attack to charge</color>', 3: 'Revving Burst: <color=#0d70bc>Charge + Release Basic Attack</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Noctis strikes the target multiple times with martial arts, dealing Lightning DMG.', 2: 'Press and hold Basic Attack to <color=#D91414>charge</color> and gain Energy. Getting attacked while charging will trigger <color=#D91414>Arm Block</color> automatically.', 3: 'Releasing Basic Attack while <color=#D91414>charging</color> will hit the enemy in front with a powerful punch, dealing Lightning DMG based on the charge level. Noctis can dodge during the attack, and dodging successfully will trigger <color=#D91414>Perfect Arm Block</color>.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Noctis strikes the target multiple times with martial arts, dealing Lightning DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG in total.', 2: 'Press and hold Basic Attack to <color=#D91414>charge</color> and gain Energy. Getting attacked while charging will trigger <color=#D91414>Arm Block</color> automatically.\\n- Gains 30 Energy every second while <color=#D91414>charging</color>.', 3: 'Releasing Basic Attack while <color=#D91414>charging</color> will hit the enemy in front with a powerful punch, dealing Lightning DMG based on the charge level. Noctis can dodge during the attack, and dodging successfully will trigger <color=#D91414>Perfect Arm Block</color>.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG with an incomplete charge.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Lightning DMG with a complete charge.'}

Title: {1: 'Signature Move: <color=#0d70bc>120 Energy + Tap Signature</color>', 2: 'Skull Crush: <color=#0d70bc>Thunder Burst Form + Engine Points + Tap Signature</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: "Throws out an explosive grenade that deals Lightning DMG to the targets within range, then enters <color=#D91414>Thunder Burst Form</color> for <color=#D91414>10</color>s. Press and hold Basic Attack when Noctis performs any 3-Ping Skill in the <color=#D91414>Thunder Burst Form</color> to execute a follow-up attack, casting <color=#D91414>Lightning Smash</color>, <color=#D91414>Lightning Punch</color>, or <color=#D91414>Lightning Sweep</color> based on the color of the orbs and resetting <color=#D91414>Thunder Burst Form's</color> duration.", 2: 'Gathers power and strikes, dealing Lightning DMG to enemies within a large area. Amplifies the damage based on <color=#D91414>Engine Points</color>. Exits the <color=#D91414>Thunder Burst Form</color> afterward.'}
SpecificDes: {1: "Throws out an explosive grenade that deals Lightning DMG to the targets within range, then enters <color=#D91414>Thunder Burst Form</color> for <color=#D91414>10</color>s. Press and hold Basic Attack when Noctis performs any 3-Ping Skill in the <color=#D91414>Thunder Burst Form</color> to execute a follow-up attack, casting <color=#D91414>Lightning Smash</color>, <color=#D91414>Lightning Punch</color>, or <color=#D91414>Lightning Sweep</color> based on the color of the orbs and resetting <color=#D91414>Thunder Burst Form's</color> duration.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG in total.\\n- Unable to gain Energy in the <color=#D91414>Thunder Burst Form</color>.", 2: 'Gathers power and strikes, dealing Lightning DMG to enemies within a large area. Amplifies the damage based on <color=#D91414>Engine Points</color>. Exits the <color=#D91414>Thunder Burst Form</color> afterward.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG in total.\\n- Each stack of <color=#D91414>Engine Points</color> amplifies <color=#D91414>Base DMG of Skull Crush by 80%</color>. Engine Points can be stacked up to <color=#D91414>3</color> times.'}

Title: {1: 'QTE: <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Throws a punch to knock the target into mid-air, dealing Lightning DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Throws a punch to knock the target into mid-air, dealing Lightning DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG in total.'}

Title: {1: 'Impact Nullification: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Dodge</color>', 2: 'Heat Blast: <color=#0d70bc>Thunder Burst Form + A Single Orb</color>', 3: 'Energy Overload: <color=#0d70bc>Thunder Burst Form + A Single Orb + Ping Overload Orb</color>', 4: 'Thunderous Fury: <color=#0d70bc>Thunder Burst Form + Ping Blast Orb</color>', 5: 'Thunderclap Strike: <color=#0d70bc>During Thunderous Fury + Press and hold Basic Attack</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Noctis enters a defense stance and can dodge attacks in this state. Dodging successfully will trigger <color=#D91414>Arm Block</color>. When performing a precise dodge, Noctis will trigger <color=#D91414>Perfect Arm Block</color> to counterattack.', 2: 'In the <color=#D91414>Thunder Burst Form</color>, the rightmost single orb will be converted into an <color=#D91414>Overload Orb</color>. The <color=#D91414>Overload Orb</color> will be converted into a <color=#D91414>Blast Orb</color> 2.5s later.', 3: 'The <color=#D91414>Overload Orb</color> will mark a single orb. Pinging the <color=#D91414>Overload Orb</color> will ping the marked orb as well and cast <color=#D91414>Thunderous Fury</color> afterward, dealing Lightning DMG.', 4: 'Launches a violent attack at the target in front, dealing Lightning DMG.', 5: 'Press and hold Basic Attack while casting <color=#D91414>Thunderous Fury</color> to perform <color=#D91414>Thunderclap Strike</color>, gaining Super Armor, dealing Lightning DMG, and receiving 1 <color=#D91414>Engine Point</color>. <color=#D91414>Engine Points</color> will amplify Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Skull Crush</color>.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Noctis enters a defense stance and can dodge attacks in this state. Dodging successfully will trigger <color=#D91414>Arm Block</color>. When performing a precise dodge, Noctis will trigger <color=#D91414>Perfect Arm Block</color> to counterattack.\\n- Restores <color=#D91414>60</color> Energy after triggering <color=#D91414>Arm Block</color>.\\n- Restores <color=#D91414>120</color> Energy after triggering <color=#D91414>Perfect Arm Block</color>, entering Matrix and gaining 1 random Signal Orb.\\n- The counterattack deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG.', 2: 'In the <color=#D91414>Thunder Burst Form</color>, the rightmost single orb will be converted into an <color=#D91414>Overload Orb</color>. The <color=#D91414>Overload Orb</color> will be converted into a <color=#D91414>Blast Orb</color> 2.5s later.', 3: 'The <color=#D91414>Overload Orb</color> will mark a single orb. Pinging the <color=#D91414>Overload Orb</color> will ping the marked orb as well and cast <color=#D91414>Thunderous Fury</color> afterward, dealing Lightning DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG in total.', 4: 'Launches a violent attack at the target in front, dealing Lightning DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG in total.', 5: 'Press and hold Basic Attack while casting <color=#D91414>Thunderous Fury</color> to perform <color=#D91414>Thunderclap Strike</color>, gaining Super Armor, dealing Lightning DMG, and receiving 1 <color=#D91414>Engine Point</color>. <color=#D91414>Engine Points</color> will amplify the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Skull Crush</color>.\\n- Each stack of <color=#D91414>Engine Points</color> amplifies Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Skull Crush by 80%</color>. Stacks up to <color=#D91414>3</color> times.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG in total.'}

SpecificDes: {1: 'Lightning DMG of all team members increases by <color=#D91414>10%</color>.'}

SpecificDes: {1: 'Leaps up and turns around, shooting arrows at the enemy in mid-air and dealing Physical DMG. Gains Super Armor while using this skill.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG in total based on the number of orbs pinged.'}

Title: {1: 'Blue Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Blue Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Crouches down to shoot multiple arrows upward, dealing Physical DMG to targets in a small area ahead.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Crouches down to shoot multiple arrows upward, dealing Physical DMG to targets in a small area ahead.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG in total based on the number of orbs pinged.'}

Title: {1: 'Basic Attack: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Basic Attack</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Rapidly fires arrows at the target, dealing Physical DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Rapidly fires arrows at the target, dealing Physical DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG in total.'}

Title: {1: 'Signature Move: <color=#0d70bc>90 Energy + Tap Signature</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Echo and <color=#D91414>Cecily</color> attack at the same time, dealing Physical DMG and triggering <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color>. Afterward, Echo gains <color=#D91414>Soul Shatter Mark</color>.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Echo and <color=#D91414>Cecily</color> attack at the same time, dealing Physical DMG and triggering <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color>. Afterward, Echo gains <color=#D91414>Soul Shatter Mark</color>.\\n- Deal <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG in total.'}

Title: {1: 'QTE: <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Fires multiple arrows at the enemy, dealing Physical DMG and healing HP.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Fires multiple arrows at the enemy, dealing Physical DMG and healing HP.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG and heals for <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> of ATK in total.'}

Title: {1: 'Cipher of Synergy: <color=#0d70bc>Press and hold Basic Attack</color>', 2: "Sinbreaker's Judgment: <color=#0d70bc>During Tactical Cipher + Ping Cipher Orbs consecutively</color>", 3: 'Majestic Splendor: <color=#0d70bc>In Judgment Zone + Ping Orbs</color>', 4: 'Swift Archery: <color=#0d70bc>In Judgment Zone + Tap Dodge</color>', 5: 'Judgment Co-Strike: <color=#0d70bc>In Judgment Zone + 90 Splendor Points + Ping One Specific Signal Orb</color>', 6: 'Blessing of Fortitude: <color=#0d70bc>Upon receiving Healing</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: '<color=#D91414>Cecily</color> fights alongside Echo. Press and hold Basic Attack to make Echo enter <color=#D91414>Tactical Cipher</color>. In <color=#D91414>Tactical Cipher</color>, Signal Orbs will be temporarily replaced by <color=#D91414>Cipher Orbs</color>. Pinging a <color=#D91414>Cipher Orb</color> will make <color=#D91414>Cecily</color> fire a swordwave at the enemy, dealing Physical DMG. <color=#D91414>Cecily</color> will then act based on the color of the <color=#D91414>Cipher Orbs</color> pinged.', 2: "Upon entering <color=#D91414>Tactical Cipher</color>, Echo starts charging, during which time <color=#D91414>Cecily</color> will prevent enemies from attacking her and repel them. Afterward, Echo gains Super Armor for 1.5s and <color=#D91414>40%</color> DMG Reduction. Cooldown: <color=#D91414>5</color>s. Keep pinging <color=#D91414>Cipher Orbs</color> or drag the joystick to keep charging. When orbs are no longer pinged or when the joystick is released, Echo will stop charging and fire a <color=#D91414>Sinbreaker's Arrow</color>, dealing Physical DMG. Echo can dodge attacks when performing this move. <color=#D91414>Cecily</color> will then attack in the order of the <color=#D91414>Cipher Orbs</color> pinged, with each attack consuming one <color=#D91414>Cipher Orb</color>. After Echo exits the battlefield, <color=#D91414>Cecily</color> will stay and continue to attack enemies until all <color=#D91414>Cipher Orbs</color> are consumed.", 3: 'Each orb pinged inside <color=#D91414>Judgment Zone</color> will generate <color=#D91414>10</color> <color=#D91414>Splendor Points</color>, max <color=#D91414>90</color>.', 4: 'Tapping Dodge inside <color=#D91414>Judgment Zone</color> will trigger <color=#D91414>Swift Archery</color>, dealing Physical DMG.', 5: 'At max <color=#D91414>Splendor Points</color>, pinging a Signal Orb that matches the color of <color=#D91414>Cipher Orb</color> inside <color=#D91414>Judgment Zone</color> will trigger a <color=#D91414>Co-Strike</color>. The first <color=#D91414>Co-Strike</color> after <color=#D91414>Judgment Zone</color> is activated will cast <color=#D91414>Imprisoning Co-Strike</color>. If Echo has <color=#D91414>Soul Shatter Mark</color>, she can trigger another <color=#D91414>Co-Strike</color> afterward while the <color=#D91414>Judgment Zone</color> is still active to cast <color=#D91414>Soulbreaking Co-Strike</color>.', 6: 'Allies are granted <color=#D91414>Ultralimit Torque</color> which increases their Physical DMG by <color=#D91414>10%</color> for <color=#D91414>8</color>s after being healed. The duration resets every time it is triggered.'}
SpecificDes: {1: "<color=#D91414>Cecily</color> fights alongside Echo. Press and hold Basic Attack to make Echo enter <color=#D91414>Tactical Cipher</color>. In <color=#D91414>Tactical Cipher</color>, Signal Orbs will be temporarily replaced by <color=#D91414>Cipher Orbs</color>. Pinging a <color=#D91414>Cipher Orb</color> will make <color=#D91414>Cecily</color> fire a swordwave at the enemy, dealing Physical DMG. <color=#D91414>Cecily</color> will then act based on the color of the <color=#D91414>Cipher Orbs</color> pinged.\\n- Each swordwave deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG.\\n- <color=#D91414>Red Cipher</color>: Launches a thrust attack at the enemy, dealing <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Physical DMG.\\n- <color=#D91414>Yellow Cipher</color>: Launches a downward thrust from above, pulling in nearby enemy units and dealing <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG.\\n- <color=#D91414>Blue Cipher</color>: Slashes the target, restoring HP equal to <color=#D91414>{3}%</color> of Echo's ATK to allies and dealing <color=#D91414>{4}%</color> Physical DMG.", 2: "Upon entering <color=#D91414>Tactical Cipher</color>, Echo starts charging, during which time <color=#D91414>Cecily</color> will prevent enemies from attacking her and repel them. Echo gains Super Armor for 1.5s and <color=#D91414>40%</color> DMG Reduction. Cooldown: <color=#D91414>5</color>s. Keep pinging <color=#D91414>Cipher Orbs</color> or drag the joystick to keep charging. When orbs are no longer pinged or when the joystick is released, Echo will stop charging and fire a <color=#D91414>Sinbreaker's Arrow</color>, dealing Physical DMG. Echo can dodge attacks when performing this move. <color=#D91414>Cecily</color> will then attack in the order of the <color=#D91414>Cipher Orbs</color> pinged, with each attack consuming one <color=#D91414>Cipher Orb</color>. After Echo exits the battlefield, <color=#D91414>Cecily</color> will stay and continue to attack enemies until all <color=#D91414>Cipher Orbs</color> are consumed.\\n- When fully charged, <color=#D91414>Sinbreaker's Arrow</color> deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG, rearranges all Signal Orbs into 3-Pings, and activates <color=#D91414>Judgment Zone</color>, which heals allies within for <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> of Echo's ATK for <color=#D91414>8</color>s and grants Echo <color=#D91414>6</color> Signature Energy.\\n- If <color=#D91414>Sinbreaker's Arrow</color> is not fully charged, it will only deal <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG without activating Judgment Zone.", 3: 'Each orb pinged inside <color=#D91414>Judgment Zone</color> will generate <color=#D91414>10</color> <color=#D91414>Splendor Points</color>, max <color=#D91414>90</color>.', 4: 'Tapping Dodge inside <color=#D91414>Judgment Zone</color> will trigger <color=#D91414>Swift Archery</color>, dealing Physical DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG.', 5: 'At max <color=#D91414>Splendor Points</color>, pinging a Signal Orb that matches the color of <color=#D91414>Cipher Orb</color> inside <color=#D91414>Judgment Zone</color> will trigger a <color=#D91414>Co-Strike</color>. The first <color=#D91414>Co-Strike</color> after <color=#D91414>Judgment Zone</color> is activated will cast <color=#D91414>Imprisoning Co-Strike</color>. If Echo has <color=#D91414>Soul Shatter Mark</color>, she can trigger another <color=#D91414>Co-Strike</color> afterward while the <color=#D91414>Judgment Zone</color> is still active to cast <color=#D91414>Soulbreaking Co-Strike</color>.\\n- <color=#D91414>Imprisoning Co-Strike</color>: Consumes all <color=#D91414>Splendor Points</color> to imprison and pull in nearby enemies, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG and restoring <color=#D91414>36</color> Signature Energy.\\n- <color=#D91414>Soulbreaking Co-Strike</color>: Consumes <color=#D91414>Soul Shatter Mark</color> to leap and shoot the target, dealing <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Physical DMG and restoring <color=#D91414>20</color> Signature Energy.\\n- Echo becomes invincible during a <color=#D91414>Co-Strike</color> but cannot cast <color=#D91414>Signature - Celestial Edge</color>.\\n- Echo gains <color=#D91414>Soul Shatter Mark</color> after casting <color=#D91414>Signature - Celestial Edge</color>.', 6: 'Allies are granted <color=#D91414>Ultralimit Torque</color> which increases their Physical DMG by <color=#D91414>10%</color> for <color=#D91414>8</color>s after being healed. The duration resets every time it is triggered.'}

BriefDes: {1: 'Uses Halberd Blade to direct multiple undercurrents to strike enemies ahead, dealing Dark DMG while gaining <color=#D91414>Fathomless Points</color> and a small number of <color=#D91414>Abyssal Points</color>. Enters <color=#D91414>Tidal Form</color> after pinging 3 Signal Orbs.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Uses Halberd Blade to direct multiple undercurrents to strike enemies ahead, dealing Dark DMG while gaining <color=#D91414>Fathomless Points</color> and a small number of <color=#D91414>Abyssal Points</color>. Enters <color=#D91414>Tidal Form</color> after pinging 3 Signal Orbs.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Dark DMG in total based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- Gains <color=#D91414>10</color>/<color=#D91414>20</color>/<color=#D91414>30</color> Fathomless Points based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- Gains <color=#D91414>15</color> Abyssal Points upon a 3-Ping.'}

Title: {1: 'Yellow Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Primary Form + Ping Yellow Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Upon a 1-Ping or 2-Ping, glides along waves to deal Dark DMG to enemies ahead. Upon a 3-Ping, rides up a tide to leap into the air, then glides downward to launch a large-area slash, dealing Dark DMG. Making a Yellow 3-Ping after a Yellow 1/2-Ping allows Lamia to directly perform the slash attack. While casting this skill, Lamia gains <color=#D91414>Fathomless Points</color> and a small amount of <color=#D91414>Abyssal Points</color>.'}

Title: {1: 'Basic Attack: <color=#0d70bc>Primary Form + Tap Basic Attack</color>', 2: 'Basic Attack: <color=#0d70bc>Dark Tide Form + Tap Basic Attack</color>', 3: "Abyssal Currents: <color=#0d70bc>Dark Tide Form + Ocean's Scar + Press and Hold Basic Attack</color>"}
BriefDes: {1: 'Launches melee attacks and ranged water elemental attacks with Halberd Blade, dealing Dark DMG to the target. When the weather is <color=#D91414>Downpour</color> or <color=#D91414>Storm</color>, bonus attacks are launched at certain Basic Attack sequences.', 2: "Launches fierce melee attacks, dealing Dark DMG to the target. When <color=#D91414>Ocean's Scar</color> is present, <color=#D91414>Abyssal Points</color> can be consumed to enhance Basic Attacks, dealing increased DMG while granting bonus Signature Energy. When Lamia is in <color=#D91414>Tidal Form</color>, casting Basic Attacks grants her Extra DMG Bonus, Super Armor and DMG Reduction, after which she will leave <color=#D91414>Tidal Form</color>.", 3: "When <color=#D91414>Ocean's Scar</color> is present, press and hold Basic Attack to cast <color=#D91414>Abyssal Currents</color>, consuming all <color=#D91414>Abyssal Points</color> and dealing DMG. Each <color=#D91414>Abyssal Point</color> consumed also increases the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Abyssal Currents</color>. While casting <color=#D91414>Abyssal Currents</color>, Lamia is invincible but is unable to cast <color=#D91414>Signature - Sunken Finale</color>."}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Launches melee attacks and ranged water elemental attacks with Halberd Blade, dealing Dark DMG to the target. When the weather is <color=#D91414>Downpour</color> or <color=#D91414>Storm</color>, additional attacks are launched at certain hits of Basic Attack.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG in total.\\n- In <color=#D91414>Downpour</color>, each hit of the 4th sequence of Basic Attack deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> bonus Dark DMG.\\n- In <color=#D91414>Storm</color>, each hit of the 5th sequence of Basic Attack deals <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> bonus Dark DMG.', 2: "Launches fierce melee attacks, dealing Dark DMG to the target. When <color=#D91414>Ocean's Scar</color> is present, <color=#D91414>Abyssal Points</color> can be consumed to enhance Basic Attacks, dealing increased DMG while granting bonus Signature Energy. When Lamia is in <color=#D91414>Tidal Form</color>, casting Basic Attacks grants her Extra DMG Bonus, after which she will leave <color=#D91414>Tidal Form</color>.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG in total.\\n- Enhanced Basic Attacks have <color=#D91414>20%</color> increased Base DMG.\\n- While enhanced, <color=#D91414>20</color> <color=#D91414>Abyssal Points</color> are consumed every <color=#D91414>0.5</color>s.\\n- While enhanced, Lamia gains <color=#D91414>5</color> Signature Energy every <color=#D91414>0.5</color>s.\\n- Casting one full cycle of Basic Attacks in <color=#D91414>Tidal Form</color> grants <color=#D91414>30%</color> Extra DMG Bonus, Super Armor, and <color=#D91414>70%</color> DMG Reduction.", 3: "When <color=#D91414>Ocean's Scar</color> is present, press and hold Basic Attack to cast <color=#D91414>Abyssal Currents</color>, consuming all <color=#D91414>Abyssal Points</color> and dealing Dark DMG. Each <color=#D91414>Abyssal Point</color> consumed also increases the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Abyssal Currents</color>. While casting <color=#D91414>Abyssal Currents</color>, Lamia is invincible but is unable to cast <color=#D91414>Signature - Sunken Finale</color>.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG in total.\\n- <color=#D91414>Abyssal Points</color> have a maximum of <color=#D91414>350</color>. Each <color=#D91414>Abyssal Point</color> increases Base DMG by <color=#D91414>1%</color>."}

Title: {1: 'Raging Prelude: <color=#0d70bc>Primary Form + 70 Energy + Tap Signature</color>', 2: 'Sunken Finale: <color=#0d70bc>Dark Tide Form + 70 Energy + Tap Signature</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Lamia summons nearby water to engulf the surroundings and plunge the battlefield into a nameless ocean, dealing Dark DMG to the target. She then enters <color=#D91414>Dark Tide Form</color> and gains Signal Orbs based on the weather. <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> is triggered while she casts this move.', 2: 'Lamia stirs up and pulls together several whirlpools, then detonates them to annihilate enemies in the ocean, dealing Dark DMG to the target. After casting this move, she enters <color=#D91414>Primary Form</color>. <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> is triggered while she casts this move.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Lamia summons nearby water to engulf the surroundings and plunge the battlefield into a nameless ocean, dealing Dark DMG to the target. She then enters <color=#D91414>Dark Tide Form</color> and gains Signal Orbs based on the weather. <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> is triggered while she casts this move.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG in total.\\n- Gains <color=#D91414>1</color> set of 3-Ping Orbs in <color=#D91414>Downpour</color>.\\n- Gains <color=#D91414>2</color> sets of 3-Ping Orbs in <color=#D91414>Storm</color>.\\n- <color=#D91414>Downpour</color> and <color=#D91414>Storm</color> will cease after casting this move.', 2: 'Lamia stirs up and pulls together several whirlpools, then detonates them to annihilate enemies in the ocean, dealing Dark DMG to the target. After casting this move, she enters <color=#D91414>Primary Form</color>. <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> is triggered while she casts this move.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG in total.'}

Title: {1: 'QTE: <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Swings Halberd Blade at the target, dealing Dark DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Swings Halberd Blade at the target, dealing Dark DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG in total.'}

Title: {1: 'Antinomy', 2: 'Wave Illusions', 3: 'Drowned Conformation: <color=#0d70bc>Primary Form + Ping Torrent Orb/Tidal Orb</color>', 4: 'Dark Flux: <color=#0d70bc>Dark Tide Form + Ping Torrent Orb/Tidal Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'When Lamia is in <color=#D91414>Primary Form</color>, she can only cast Yellow or Blue Orb skills, and her Basic Attacks only generate Yellow or Blue Orbs. When she is in <color=#D91414>Dark Tide Form</color>, she can only cast Red or Blue Orb skills, and her Basic Attacks only generate Red or Blue Orbs. Yellow Orbs will be randomly converted into Red or Blue Orbs.', 2: 'When Lamia casts a 3-Ping skill in <color=#D91414>Primary Form</color>, there is a short window of time in which she can consecutively cast another 3-Ping, <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color>, or <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb</color> skill. After Lamia casts a Red Orb skill in <color=#D91414>Dark Tide Form</color>, consecutively pinging Red Orbs allows her to cast the skill again directly during the skill action. After Lamia casts a Blue Orb skill in <color=#D91414>Dark Tide Form</color>, she will start swimming in water, during which she can cast the skill again to rapidly fire water spheres to attack the target.', 3: "When Lamia casts skills through orb pings in <color=#D91414>Primary Form</color>, she will gain <color=#D91414>Fathomless Points</color>. For every <color=#D91414>30</color> <color=#D91414>Fathomless Points</color>, she will gain a <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color>. When two <color=#D91414>Torrent Orbs</color> are present, they will merge into a <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb</color>. At full <color=#D91414>Fathomless Points</color>, pinging a <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color> or <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb</color> will deplete all <color=#D91414>Fathomless Points</color>. When a <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color> is pinged, Lamia will cast <color=#D91414>Crushing Wave</color>, dealing Dark DMG to enemies in front while also dealing a small amount of DMG to herself. When a <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb</color> is pinged, she will cast <color=#D91414>Suffocating Tide</color> to pull in surrounding enemies, then detonate the undercurrents to deal Dark DMG. After casting <color=#D91414>Crushing Wave</color> or <color=#D91414>Suffocating Tide</color>, Lamia gains <color=#D91414>Ocean's Scar</color>. Pinging a <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color> will change the weather to <color=#D91414>Downpour</color>. Pinging a <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb</color> or two <color=#D91414>Torrent Orbs</color> will change the weather to <color=#D91414>Storm</color>. Lamia gains Super Armor and DMG Reduction while casting <color=#D91414>Crushing Wave</color> or <color=#D91414>Suffocating Tide</color>.", 4: "When Lamia casts skills through orb pings in <color=#D91414>Dark Tide Form</color>, she will gain <color=#D91414>Fathomless Points</color>. For every <color=#D91414>30</color> <color=#D91414>Fathomless Points</color>, she will gain a <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color>. When two <color=#D91414>Torrent Orbs</color> are present, they will merge into a <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb</color>. When <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color> and <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb</color> are both present, <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color> will be pinged to enhance <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb</color>, turning it into <color=#D91414>Riptide Orb</color>. At full <color=#D91414>Fathomless Points</color>, pinging a <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color>, <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb</color>, or <color=#D91414>Riptide Orb</color> will deplete all <color=#D91414>Fathomless Points</color>. When a <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color> is pinged, Lamia will cast <color=#D91414>Crushing Torrent</color>, slashing to create powerful airflows, dealing Dark DMG to enemies in front, and entering <color=#D91414>Tidal Form</color>. When a <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb</color> or <color=#D91414>Riptide Orb</color> is pinged, Lamia will cast <color=#D91414>Tidal Vortex</color>, dealing Dark DMG. If Lamia is not in <color=#D91414>Tidal Form</color> when casting <color=#D91414>Tidal Vortex</color>, she will ascend to the highest point to cast <color=#D91414>Tidal Vortex</color> and then exit <color=#D91414>Tidal Form</color>. Lamia gains <color=#D91414>Ocean's Scar</color> after casting <color=#D91414>Crushing Torrent</color> or <color=#D91414>Tidal Vortex</color>. Lamia gains Super Armor and DMG Reduction when casting <color=#D91414>Crushing Torrent</color> or <color=#D91414>Tidal Vortex</color>."}
SpecificDes: {1: 'When Lamia is in <color=#D91414>Primary Form</color>, she can only cast Yellow or Blue Orb skills, and her Basic Attacks only generate Yellow or Blue Orbs. When she is in <color=#D91414>Dark Tide Form</color>, she can only cast Red or Blue Orb skills, and her Basic Attacks only generate Red or Blue Orbs. Yellow Orbs will be randomly converted into Red or Blue Orbs.', 2: 'When Lamia casts a 3-Ping skill in <color=#D91414>Primary Form</color>, there is a short window of time in which she can consecutively cast another 3-Ping, <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color>, or <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb</color> skill. After Lamia casts a Red Orb skill in <color=#D91414>Dark Tide Form</color>, consecutively pinging Red Orbs allows her to cast the skill again directly during the skill action. After Lamia casts a Blue Orb skill in <color=#D91414>Dark Tide Form</color>, she will start swimming in water, during which she can cast the skill again to rapidly fire water spheres to attack the target.', 3: "When Lamia casts skills through orb pings in <color=#D91414>Primary Form</color>, she will gain <color=#D91414>Fathomless Points</color>. For every <color=#D91414>30</color> <color=#D91414>Fathomless Points</color>, she will gain a <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color>. When two <color=#D91414>Torrent Orbs</color> are present, they will merge into a <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb</color>. At full <color=#D91414>Fathomless Points</color>, pinging a <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color> or <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb</color> will deplete all <color=#D91414>Fathomless Points</color>. When a <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color> is pinged, Lamia will cast <color=#D91414>Crushing Wave</color>, dealing Dark DMG to enemies in front while also dealing a small amount of DMG to herself. When a <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb</color> is pinged, she will cast <color=#D91414>Suffocating Tide</color> to pull in surrounding enemies, then detonate the undercurrents to deal Dark DMG. After casting <color=#D91414>Crushing Wave</color> or <color=#D91414>Suffocating Tide</color>, Lamia gains <color=#D91414>Ocean's Scar</color>. Pinging a <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color> will change the weather to <color=#D91414>Downpour</color>. Pinging a <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb</color> or two <color=#D91414>Torrent Orbs</color> will change the weather to <color=#D91414>Storm</color>. Lamia gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>70%</color> DMG Reduction while casting <color=#D91414>Crushing Wave</color> or <color=#D91414>Suffocating Tide</color>.\\n- <color=#D91414>Fathomless Points</color> has a maximum of <color=#D91414>60</color>.\\n- Pinging a <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color> will cast <color=#D91414>Crushing Wave</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG in total.\\n- Pinging a <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb</color> will cast <color=#D91414>Suffocating Tide</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Dark DMG in total.\\n- Each <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color> pinged grants <color=#D91414>25</color> Abyssal Points and <color=#D91414>15</color> Signature Energy.\\n- Each <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb</color> pinged grants <color=#D91414>60</color> Abyssal Points and <color=#D91414>30</color> Signature Energy.", 4: "When Lamia casts skills through orb pings in <color=#D91414>Dark Tide Form</color>, she will gain <color=#D91414>Fathomless Points</color>. For every <color=#D91414>30</color> <color=#D91414>Fathomless Points</color>, she will gain a <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color>. When two <color=#D91414>Torrent Orbs</color> are present, they will merge into a <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb</color>. When <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color> and <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb</color> are both present, <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color> will be pinged to enhance <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb</color>, turning it into <color=#D91414>Riptide Orb</color>. At full <color=#D91414>Fathomless Points</color>, pinging a <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color>, <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb</color>, or <color=#D91414>Riptide Orb</color> will deplete all <color=#D91414>Fathomless Points</color>. When a <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color> is pinged, Lamia will cast <color=#D91414>Crushing Torrent</color>, slashing to create powerful airflows, dealing Dark DMG to enemies in front, and entering <color=#D91414>Tidal Form</color>. When a <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb</color> or <color=#D91414>Riptide Orb</color> is pinged, Lamia will cast <color=#D91414>Tidal Vortex</color>, dealing Dark DMG. If Lamia is not in <color=#D91414>Tidal Form</color> when casting <color=#D91414>Tidal Vortex</color>, she will ascend to the highest point to cast <color=#D91414>Tidal Vortex</color> and then exit <color=#D91414>Tidal Form</color>. Lamia gains <color=#D91414>Ocean's Scar</color> after casting <color=#D91414>Crushing Torrent</color> or <color=#D91414>Tidal Vortex</color>. Lamia gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>70%</color> DMG Reduction when casting <color=#D91414>Crushing Torrent</color> or <color=#D91414>Tidal Vortex</color>.\\n- <color=#D91414>Fathomless Points</color> has a maximum of <color=#D91414>90</color>.\\n- Pinging a <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color> will cast <color=#D91414>Crushing Torrent</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG in total.\\n- Pinging a <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb</color> will cast <color=#D91414>Tidal Vortex</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Dark DMG in total.\\n- Pinging a <color=#D91414>Riptide Orb</color> will cast an even more powerful <color=#D91414>Tidal Vortex</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Dark DMG in total.\\n- Each <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color> pinged grants <color=#D91414>25</color> Abyssal Points and <color=#D91414>15</color> Signature Energy.\\n- Each <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb</color> pinged grants <color=#D91414>60</color> Abyssal Points and <color=#D91414>30</color> Signature Energy.\\n- Each <color=#D91414>Riptide Orb</color> pinged grants <color=#D91414>105</color> Abyssal Points and <color=#D91414>35</color> Signature Energy."}

Title: {1: 'Red Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Red Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Quickly slashes forward multiple times, dealing Fire DMG in a large area. Upon a 3-Ping, automatically follows up with <color=#D91414>Flare Strike</color>, dealing Extra Fire DMG. Gains Super Armor and DMG Reduction while casting <color=#D91414>Flare Strike</color>.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Quickly slashes forward multiple times, dealing Fire DMG in a large area. Upon a 3-Ping, automatically follows up with <color=#D91414>Flare Strike</color>, dealing Extra Fire DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Fire DMG in total based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- <color=#D91414>Flare Strike</color> deals <color=#D91414>{3}%</color> Fire DMG.\\n- Gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>70%</color> DMG Reduction while casting <color=#D91414>Flare Strike</color>.'}

Title: {1: 'Yellow Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Yellow Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Charges toward the target and rapidly bombards the area in front, dealing Fire DMG. Upon a 3-Ping, automatically follows up with <color=#D91414>Starry Bayonet</color>, dealing bonus Fire DMG. Gains Super Armor and DMG Reduction while casting <color=#D91414>Starry Bayonet</color>.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Charges toward the target and rapidly bombards the area in front, dealing Fire DMG. Upon a 3-Ping, automatically follows up with <color=#D91414>Starry Bayonet</color>, dealing bonus Fire DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Fire DMG in total based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- <color=#D91414>Starry Bayonet</color> deals <color=#D91414>{3}%</color> Fire DMG.\\n- Gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>70%</color> DMG Reduction while casting <color=#D91414>Starry Bayonet</color>.'}

Title: {1: 'Blue Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Blue Orb automatically pinged upon casting Signature - Ethereal Star</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'When casting <color=#D91414>Signature - Ethereal Star</color>, deals extra Fire DMG once based on the number of Blue Orbs present.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'When casting <color=#D91414>Signature - Ethereal Star</color>, deals extra Fire DMG once based on the number of Blue Orbs present.\\n- When casting <color=#D91414>Signature - Ethereal Star</color>, Blue Orbs are converted into <color=#D91414>Entangled Hearts</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG.\\n- The Base DMG of this attack increases by 100% for every <color=#D91414>Entangled Heart</color> consumed.\\n- Blue Orbs <color=#D91414>cannot</color> be manually pinged.'}

Title: {1: 'Photon Hurricane: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Basic Attack</color>', 2: 'Photon Strike: <color=#0d70bc>Blazing Heart + Press and hold Basic Attack</color>', 3: "Photon Cannon: <color=#0d70bc>Upon Photon Strike landing + Upon releasing Basic Attack or at the end of Basic Attack's 3rd Hit + Tap Basic Attack</color>", 4: 'Skycrushing Blade: <color=#0d70bc>During post-action of Burst Drive + Tap Basic Attack</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Attacks the target with the Bladed Cannon, dealing Fire DMG while gaining <color=#D91414>Blazing Heart</color>.', 2: 'Consumes <color=#D91414>Blazing Heart</color> to quickly slash the target before leaping into the air to fire the cannon, dealing Fire DMG. When there is sufficient Dodge Gauge, consumes <color=#D91414>250</color> Dodge Gauge to dodge incoming attacks during the slash.', 3: 'Charges briefly to fire a powerful blast toward the target, dealing Fire DMG, gaining additional Signature Energy, and gaining Super Armor for a short duration. <color=#D91414>While BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER is airborne during Photon Strike</color>, she gains DMG Reduction briefly and is able to block incoming attacks when Basic Attack is released. Upon a successful block, she immediately jumps back and casts <color=#D91414>Basic Attack - Photon Cannon</color>, gaining DMG Reduction during so.', 4: 'Leaps into the air and hurls the giant blade forward. After charging for a brief moment, pulls the blade out to deal Fire DMG to all targets within the area. Gains Super Armor and DMG Reduction while charging.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Attacks the target with the Bladed Cannon, dealing Fire DMG while gaining <color=#D91414>Blazing Heart</color>.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG in total.\\n- Gains <color=#D91414>Blazing Heart</color> when dealing the 4th and 5th hits of the Basic Attack, casting <color=#D91414>Basic Attack - Photon Cannon</color>, or dodging successfully.', 2: 'Consumes <color=#D91414>Blazing Heart</color> to quickly slash the target before leaping into the air to fire the cannon, dealing Fire DMG. When there is sufficient Dodge Gauge, consumes <color=#D91414>250</color> Dodge Gauge to dodge incoming attacks during the slash.\\n- The slash deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG.\\n- Hold Basic Attack while firing the cannon to fire up to <color=#D91414>10</color> additional shots, each shot dealing <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Fire DMG.', 3: 'Charges briefly to fire a powerful blast toward the target, dealing Fire DMG, gaining additional Signature Energy, and gaining Super Armor for a short duration. <color=#D91414>While BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER is airborne during Photon Strike</color>, she gains DMG Reduction briefly and is able to block incoming attacks when Basic Attack is released.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG to enemies along the path.\\n- Gains an extra <color=#D91414>3</color> Signature Energy.\\n- <color=#D91414>While BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER is airborne during Photon Strike</color>, she gains <color=#D91414>70%</color> DMG Reduction briefly and is able to block incoming attacks when Basic Attack is released. Upon a successful block, she immediately jumps back and casts <color=#D91414>Basic Attack - Photon Cannon</color>, gaining <color=#D91414>50%</color> DMG Reduction during so.', 4: 'Leaps into the air and hurls the giant blade forward. After charging for a brief moment, pulls the blade out to deal Fire DMG to all targets within the area.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG when hurling the giant blade.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Fire DMG when pulling the blade out.\\n- Gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>50%</color> DMG Reduction while charging.'}

Title: {1: 'Burst Drive: <color=#0d70bc>10 Signature Energy + Tap Signature</color>', 2: 'Ethereal Star: <color=#0d70bc>Azure Awakening + Blue Orbs available + Press and hold/tap Signature</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Unleashes a powerful thrust toward the target in front, dealing Fire DMG and activating <color=#D91414>Azure Awakening</color>. Becomes invincible when casting <color=#D91414>Signature - Burst Drive</color>.', 2: 'Charges the Rock Cannon and automatically consumes all <color=#D91414>Entangled Hearts</color> and Signature Energy to fire a powerful blast toward the target area, dealing Fire DMG and exiting <color=#D91414>Azure Awakening</color>. Becomes Invincible when casting <color=#D91414>Signature - Ethereal Star</color>.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Unleashes a powerful thrust toward the target in front, dealing Fire DMG and activating <color=#D91414>Azure Awakening</color>. Becomes invincible when casting <color=#D91414>Signature - Burst Drive</color>.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG.\\n- Fire DMG increases by <color=#D91414>15%</color> in <color=#D91414>Azure Awakening</color>.\\n- <color=#D91414>Azure Awakening</color> lasts <color=#D91414>10</color>s.', 2: 'Charges the Rock Cannon and automatically consumes all <color=#D91414>Entangled Hearts</color> and Signature Energy to fire a powerful blast toward the target area, dealing Fire DMG and exiting <color=#D91414>Azure Awakening</color>.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG in total. Becomes Invincible when casting <color=#D91414>Signature - Ethereal Star</color>.\\n- <color=#D91414>Signature - Ethereal Star</color> cannot be cast while casting <color=#D91414>Flare Strike</color>, <color=#D91414>Starry Bayonet</color>, or <color=#D91414>Basic Attack - Skycrushing Blade</color>.'}

Title: {1: 'QTE: <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Quickly launches powerful slashes toward the target area, dealing Fire DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Quickly launches powerful slashes toward the target area, dealing Fire DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG in total.'}

Title: {1: 'Reflective Nebula', 2: 'Limit Released', 3: 'Enhanced Blast'}
BriefDes: {1: 'While performing a Red/Yellow Orb 3-Ping, pinging Red/Yellow Orbs again can interrupt it and recast the skill, dealing DMG based on the number of orbs pinged in the interruption, as well as gaining Blue Orbs equal to the number of orbs pinged when casting <color=#D91414>Flare Strike</color> or <color=#D91414>Starry Bayonet</color>.', 2: 'While casting <color=#D91414>Flare Strike</color> or <color=#D91414>Starry Bayonet</color>, deals Extra Fire DMG based on the total number of orbs pinged during the entire action sequence (including both the original skill and the recast skill after interruption).', 3: 'Casting <color=#D91414>Basic Attack - Photon Hurricane, Basic Attack - Photon Strike, Basic Attack - Photon Cannon, Astral Edge, and Stellar Cross</color> will accumulate Blast Energy. When Blast Energy is full, casting <color=#D91414>Flare Strike</color> and <color=#D91414>Starry Bayonet</color> will deplete the Blast Energy and deal increased Base DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'While performing a Red/Yellow Orb 3-Ping, pinging Red/Yellow Orbs again can interrupt it and recast the skill, dealing DMG based on the number of orbs pinged in the interruption, as well as gaining Blue Orbs equal to the number of orbs pinged when casting <color=#D91414>Flare Strike</color> or <color=#D91414>Starry Bayonet</color>.\\n- Blue Orbs are located above the Red/Yellow Orbs and <color=#D91414>cannot be manually pinged</color>.\\n- Blue Orbs cannot be generated through any other source. Basic Attacks can only generate Red/Yellow Orbs.\\n- Each Red/Yellow 3-Ping can be interrupted up to <color=#D91414>2 times</color>.\\n- Blue Orbs are still generated if a 3-Ping, <color=#D91414>Flare Strike</color>, or <color=#D91414>Starry Bayonet</color> is interrupted by dodging.', 2: 'While casting <color=#D91414>Flare Strike</color> or <color=#D91414>Starry Bayonet</color>, deals Extra Fire DMG based on the total number of orbs pinged during the entire action sequence (including both the original skill and the recast skill after interruption).\\n- Deals one extra hit of DMG for every orb pinged.\\n- Each extra hit deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG while casting <color=#D91414>Flare Strike</color>.\\n- Each extra hit deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Fire DMG while casting <color=#D91414>Starry Bayonet</color>.', 3: 'Casting <color=#D91414>Basic Attack - Photon Hurricane, Basic Attack - Photon Strike, Basic Attack - Photon Cannon, Astral Edge, and Stellar Cross</color> will accumulate Blast Energy. When Blast Energy is full, casting <color=#D91414>Flare Strike</color> and <color=#D91414>Starry Bayonet</color> will deal increased Base DMG.\\n- Blast Energy has a maximum value of <color=#D91414>1000</color>.\\n- Each Basic Attack grants <color=#D91414>14</color> Blast Energy. Each <color=#D91414>shot</color> fired in <color=#D91414>Basic Attack - Photon Strike</color> grants <color=#D91414>21</color> Blast Energy. <color=#D91414>Basic Attack - Photon Cannon</color> grants <color=#D91414>74</color> Blast Energy.\\n- When casting <color=#D91414>Astral Edge</color>, <color=#D91414>Stellar Cross</color>, or when triggering <color=#D91414>Core Passive - Reflective Nebula</color>, gains <color=#D91414>100/200/334</color> Blast Energy based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- When Blast Energy is full, casting <color=#D91414>Flare Strike</color> or <color=#D91414>Starry Bayonet</color> will deplete the Blast Energy and increase the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Flare Strike</color> or <color=#D91414>Starry Bayonet</color> by <color=#D91414>100%</color>.'}

BriefDes: {1: 'Increases Fire DMG of all members.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Increases Fire DMG of all members by <color=#D91414>10%</color>.'}

Title: {1: 'Red Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Red Orb</color>', 2: 'Thermal Erosion: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Blaze Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: "Leaps into the air using a grappling hook, then slashes the enemy to deal Fire DMG. Gains Super Armor while using this skill. If this skill is cast precisely at the moment of an incoming attack, Watanabe will <color=#D91414>Parry</color> the attack and be immune to the DMG. Tapping Basic Attack during this skill immediately triggers <color=#D91414>Flaming Bombardment</color>. Upon a 3-Ping, triggers <color=#D91414>Fortified Shield</color>, granting a Shield equal to <color=#D91414>30%</color> of Max HP. Triggering <color=#D91414>Fortified Shield</color> again replenishes the Shield's capacity.", 2: 'Swings the blade consecutively to unleash fire and pull in nearby enemy units, dealing Fire DMG while inflicting the targets hit with <color=#D91414>Scorching Invasion</color> that reduces their Fire Resistance. If this skill is cast precisely at the moment of an incoming attack, Watanabe will <color=#D91414>Parry</color> the attack and be immune to the DMG. While casting this skill, Watanabe gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>60%</color> DMG Reduction. After casting, gains 1 stack of <color=#D91414>Thermal Superconductivity</color> and <color=#D91414>12</color> Signature Energy. <color=#D91414>Thermal Superconductivity</color> increases the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Signature - Explosive Purge</color>.'}
SpecificDes: {1: "Leaps into the air using a grappling hook, then slashes the enemy to deal Fire DMG. Gains Super Armor while using this skill. If this skill is cast precisely at the moment of an incoming attack, Watanabe will <color=#D91414>Parry</color> the attack and be immune to the DMG. Tapping Basic Attack during this skill immediately triggers <color=#D91414>Flaming Bombardment</color>. Upon a 3-Ping, triggers <color=#D91414>Fortified Shield</color>, granting a Shield equal to <color=#D91414>30%</color> of Max HP. Triggering <color=#D91414>Fortified Shield</color> again replenishes the Shield's capacity.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Fire DMG in total based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- Pinging orbs consecutively will change the actions of this skill: Watanabe uses his grappling hook and Trailblade to perform consecutive slashing attacks, dealing <color=#D91414>{3}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{4}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{5}%</color> Fire DMG in total.", 2: "Swings the blade consecutively to unleash fire and pull in nearby enemy units, dealing Fire DMG while inflicting the targets hit with <color=#D91414>Scorching Invasion</color> that reduces their Fire Resistance. If this skill is cast precisely at the moment of an incoming attack, Watanabe will <color=#D91414>Parry</color> the attack and be immune to the DMG. While casting this skill, Watanabe gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>60%</color> DMG Reduction. After casting, gains 1 stack of <color=#D91414>Thermal Superconductivity</color> and <color=#D91414>12</color> Signature Energy. <color=#D91414>Thermal Superconductivity</color> increases the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Signature - Explosive Purge</color>.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG in total. <color=#D91414>Scorching Invasion</color> reduces the target's Fire Resistance by <color=#D91414>25%</color> for <color=#D91414>8</color>s."}

Title: {1: 'Yellow Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Yellow Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Spins and slashes continuously, pulling in nearby enemy units and dealing Fire DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Spins and slashes continuously, pulling in nearby enemy units and dealing Fire DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Fire DMG in total based on the number of orbs pinged.'}

Title: {1: 'Blue Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Blue Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Kicks the enemy away, then spins and slashes to deal Fire DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Kicks the enemy away, then spins and slashes to deal Fire DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Fire DMG in total based on the number of orbs pinged.'}

Title: {1: 'Basic Attack: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Basic Attack</color>', 2: 'Flaming Bombardment: <color=#0d70bc>Have Shotshell + Tap Basic Attack</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Unleashes a combination of attacks with Trailblade and shotgun, dealing Physical DMG (Fire DMG instead under <color=#D91414>Assault Mode</color>).', 2: 'If <color=#D91414>Shotshell</color> is available when Watanabe performs a Basic Attack, consumes 1 <color=#D91414>Shotshell</color> to shoot at the target, dealing Fire DMG while granting 1 <color=#D91414>Blaze Orb</color> and <color=#D91414>4</color> Signature Energy. If there are already 3 <color=#D91414>Blaze Orbs</color>, this shot will not consume <color=#D91414>Shotshell</color> but will not generate <color=#D91414>Blaze Orb</color> or Signature Energy.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Unleashes a combination of attacks with Trailblade and shotgun, dealing Physical DMG (Fire DMG instead under <color=#D91414>Assault Mode</color>).\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG in total.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Fire DMG in total under <color=#D91414>Assault Mode</color>.', 2: 'If <color=#D91414>Shotshell</color> is available when Watanabe performs a Basic Attack, consumes 1 <color=#D91414>Shotshell</color> to shoot at the target, dealing Fire DMG while granting 1 <color=#D91414>Blaze Orb</color> and <color=#D91414>4</color> Signature Energy. If there are already 3 <color=#D91414>Blaze Orbs</color>, this shot will not consume <color=#D91414>Shotshell</color> but will not generate <color=#D91414>Blaze Orb</color> or Signature Energy.\\n- The shot deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG.'}

Title: {1: 'Core Awakening: <color=#0d70bc>15 Energy + Tap Signature</color>', 2: 'Explosive Purge: <color=#0d70bc>100 Energy + Tap Signature</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Releases the Core Energy to activate <color=#D91414>Assault Mode</color>, dealing Fire DMG to nearby enemy units and inflicting <color=#D91414>Scorching Invasion</color> that reduces their Fire Resistance. <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> is triggered while Watanabe casts this Signature Move.', 2: 'Dashes across enemy units and attacks them, pulling them together and dealing Fire DMG. After the attack, forms a <color=#D91414>Firepower Bulwark</color> that deals continuous DMG, then activates <color=#D91414>Patrol Mode</color>. <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> is triggered while Watanabe casts this Signature Move.'}
SpecificDes: {1: "Releases the Core Energy to activate <color=#D91414>Assault Mode</color>, dealing Fire DMG to nearby enemy units and inflicting <color=#D91414>Scorching Invasion</color> that reduces their Fire Resistance. <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> is triggered while Watanabe casts this Signature Move.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG in total. <color=#D91414>Scorching Invasion</color> reduces the target's Fire Resistance by <color=#D91414>25%</color> for <color=#D91414>10</color>s.", 2: 'Dashes across enemy units and attacks them, pulling them together and dealing Fire DMG. After the attack, forms a <color=#D91414>Firepower Bulwark</color> that deals DMG continuously, then activates <color=#D91414>Patrol Mode</color>. <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> is triggered while Watanabe casts this Signature Move.\\n- The dashing attacks deal <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG in total. Each stack of <color=#D91414>Thermal Superconductivity</color> increases the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Signature - Explosive Purge</color> by <color=#D91414>50%</color>, stacking up to <color=#D91414>3</color> times. <color=#D91414>Firepower Bulwark</color> bombards the target every 3s over 12s, dealing <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Fire DMG each time. Each bombardment leaves behind a fire that deals <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Fire DMG every 0.5s over 3s.'}

Title: {1: 'QTE: <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Spins and slashes continuously to pull in nearby enemy units, dealing Fire DMG to the target while inflicting <color=#D91414>Scorching Invasion</color> that reduces their Fire Resistance.'}
SpecificDes: {1: "Spins and slashes continuously to pull in nearby enemy units, dealing Fire DMG to the target while inflicting <color=#D91414>Scorching Invasion</color> that reduces their Fire Resistance.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG in total. <color=#D91414>Scorching Invasion</color> reduces the target's Fire Resistance by <color=#D91414>25%</color> for <color=#D91414>8</color>s."}

Title: {1: 'Composite Structure', 2: 'Engine Optimization: <color=#0d70bc>Any 3-Ping or upon entering Matrix</color>', 3: 'Fire Walker: <color=#0d70bc>Assault Mode + Press and hold Dodge</color>', 4: 'Resilient Strike: <color=#0d70bc>Trigger Parry</color>', 5: 'Scorching Torrent: <color=#0d70bc>Assault Mode + Have 3 Shotshells + Press and hold Basic Attack</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Under <color=#D91414>Patrol Mode</color>, Watanabe can only use Yellow or Blue Orbs, and his Basic Attacks only generate Yellow or Blue Orbs. When <color=#D91414>Assault Mode</color> is activated, he can only use Red and <color=#D91414>Blaze Orbs</color>, and his Basic Attacks only generate Red Orbs.', 2: 'After any 3-Ping, Watanabe: Epitaph gains <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Shotshell</color>, up to <color=#D91414>3</color>. Upon entering Matrix, he gains 1 <color=#D91414>Blaze Orb</color>. He may have up to <color=#D91414>3</color> <color=#D91414>Blaze Orbs</color> at the same time, and excess <color=#D91414>Blaze Orbs</color> will be converted into random Signal Orbs.', 3: 'Uses the grappling hook to pull in the target from a distance, dealing Fire DMG. If the target cannot be pulled, Watanabe: Epitaph will dash toward the target instead. Gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>40%</color> DMG Reduction while casting this skill. Using Basic Attack or Red Orb skill during the pulling action immediately triggers <color=#D91414>Parry</color>.', 4: "Upon <color=#D91414>Parry</color>, triggers <color=#D91414>Fortified Shield</color> that grants a Shield equal to <color=#D91414>30%</color> of Max HP, deals Fire DMG, and inflicts <color=#D91414>Scorching Invasion</color> that reduces the target's Fire Resistance. Triggering <color=#D91414>Fortified Shield</color> again will replenish the Shield capacity. Enters Matrix if it is not on cooldown when Fortified Shield is triggered.", 5: 'Uses the grappling hook to glide around and descends from above, consuming <color=#D91414>3</color> Shotshells to pull in nearby enemy units and deal Fire DMG. While casting <color=#D91414>Scorching Torrent</color>, Watanabe becomes invincible but is unable to cast <color=#D91414>Signature - Explosive Purge</color>. Gains <color=#D91414>12</color> Signature Energy after casting.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Under <color=#D91414>Patrol Mode</color>, Watanabe can only use Yellow or Blue Orbs, and his Basic Attacks only generate Yellow or Blue Orbs. When <color=#D91414>Assault Mode</color> is activated, he can only use Red and <color=#D91414>Blaze Orbs</color>, and his Basic Attacks only generate Red Orbs.', 2: 'After any 3-Ping, Watanabe: Epitaph gains <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Shotshell</color>, up to <color=#D91414>3</color>. Upon entering Matrix, he gains 1 <color=#D91414>Blaze Orb</color>. He may have up to <color=#D91414>3</color> <color=#D91414>Blaze Orbs</color> at the same time, and excess <color=#D91414>Blaze Orbs</color> will be converted into random Signal Orbs.', 3: 'Uses the grappling hook to pull in the target from a distance, dealing Fire DMG. If the target cannot be pulled, Watanabe: Epitaph will dash toward the target instead. Gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>40%</color> DMG Reduction while casting this skill. Using Basic Attack or Red Orb skill during the pulling action immediately triggers <color=#D91414>Parry</color>.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG in total.', 4: "Upon <color=#D91414>Parry</color>, triggers <color=#D91414>Fortified Shield</color> that grants a Shield equal to <color=#D91414>30%</color> of Max HP, deals Fire DMG, and inflicts <color=#D91414>Scorching Invasion</color> that reduces the target's Fire Resistance. Triggering <color=#D91414>Fortified Shield</color> again will replenish the Shield capacity. Enters Matrix if it is not on cooldown when Fortified Shield is triggered.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG in total. <color=#D91414>Scorching Invasion</color> reduces the target's Fire Resistance by <color=#D91414>25%</color> for <color=#D91414>8</color>s.", 5: 'Uses the grappling hook to glide around and descends from above, consuming <color=#D91414>3</color> Shotshells to pull in nearby enemy units and deal Fire DMG. While casting <color=#D91414>Scorching Torrent</color>, Watanabe becomes invincible but is unable to cast <color=#D91414>Signature - Explosive Purge</color>. Gains <color=#D91414>12</color> Signature Energy after casting.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG in total.'}

BriefDes: {1: 'Increases Fire DMG of all members by <color=#D91414>10%</color>. Increases DMG of all Tank Omniframes in the team by <color=#D91414>5%</color>.'}

Title: {1: 'Red Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Red Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Thrusts toward the target and deals Ice DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Thrusts toward the target and deals Ice DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Ice DMG in total based on the number of orbs pinged.'}

Title: {1: 'Yellow Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Yellow Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Leaps and spins, striking the surrounding targets and dealing Ice DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Leaps and spins, striking the surrounding targets and dealing Ice DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Ice DMG in total based on the number of orbs pinged.'}

Title: {1: 'Blue Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Blue Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Leaps backward and unleashes a swordwave, dealing Ice DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Leaps backward and unleashes a swordwave, dealing Ice DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Ice DMG in total based on the number of orbs pinged.'}

Title: {1: 'Tabula Akasha - Scribe: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Basic Attack</color>', 2: 'Tabula Akasha - Engrave: <color=#0d70bc>Into the Fray + Any 3-Ping + Tap Basic Attack</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Strikes the enemy with her Longsword, dealing Ice DMG.', 2: 'Performs an extra hit of follow-up attack, dealing Ice DMG. Gains Signature Energy and extends the duration of <color=#D91414>Into the Fray</color>.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Strikes the enemy with her Longsword, dealing Ice DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ice DMG in total.', 2: 'Performs an extra hit of follow-up attack, dealing Ice DMG. Gains Signature Energy and extends the duration of <color=#D91414>Into the Fray</color>.\\n- The follow-up attack deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ice DMG upon a 3-Ping.\\n- The duration of <color=#D91414>Into the Fray</color> extends by <color=#D91414>0.5s</color>, up to <color=#D91414>8s</color>.\\n- Gains <color=#D91414>3</color> Signature Energy.'}

Title: {1: 'Enlightened Soul: <color=#0d70bc>70 Energy + Tap Signature</color>', 2: "Sovereign's Presence: <color=#0d70bc>Enthronement + Tap Signature or Cast Automatically When Enthronement Ends</color>"}
BriefDes: {1: 'Begins <color=#D91414>Enthronement</color>, dealing Ice DMG to units in a large surrounding area continuously. Briefly triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> during so. Meanwhile, each <color=#D91414>Glyph</color> is converted into a set of 3-Ping placed at the front of the row. During <color=#D91414>Enthronement</color>, pinging orbs or performing Basic Attacks will summon Tabula Vestige to deal the target Ice DMG. However, Signature Energy cannot be gained, and 3-Pings will grant <color=#D91414>Soul Ripple</color>.', 2: 'Qu: Shukra gathers the Will of Kowloong and consumes all <color=#D91414>Soul Ripples</color>, dealing Ice DMG to enemies in a large area and triggering <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> during so. If this is cast during Into the Fray, Qu: Shukra exits it immediately. If there are fewer than 4 stacks of <color=#D91414>Soul Ripples</color>, clears all Signal Orbs converted from <color=#D91414>Glyphs</color>.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Begins <color=#D91414>Enthronement</color>, dealing Ice DMG to units in a large surrounding area continuously. Briefly triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> during so. Meanwhile, each <color=#D91414>Glyph</color> is converted into a set of 3-Ping placed at the front of the row. During <color=#D91414>Enthronement</color>, pinging orbs or performing Basic Attacks will summon Tabula Vestige to deal the target Ice DMG. However, Signature Energy cannot be gained, and 3-Pings will grant <color=#D91414>Soul Ripple</color>.\\n- During <color=#D91414>Enthronement</color>, deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ice DMG in total to units in a large surrounding area.\\n- During <color=#D91414>Enthronement</color>, pinging orbs deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{3}%</color> Ice DMG based on the number of orbs pinged, and Basic Attack deals <color=#D91414>{4}%</color> Ice DMG.\\n- During <color=#D91414>Enthronement</color>, each 3-Ping grants <color=#D91414>1 stack of Soul Ripple</color>, up to 4.\\n- During <color=#D91414>Enthronement</color>, performs up to <color=#D91414>4</color> pings or Basic Attacks.', 2: "Qu: Shukra gathers the Will of Kowloong and consumes all <color=#D91414>Soul Ripples</color>, dealing Ice DMG to enemies in a large area and triggering <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> during so. If this is cast during Into the Fray, Qu: Shukra exits it immediately. If there are fewer than 4 stacks of <color=#D91414>Soul Ripples</color>, clears all Signal Orbs converted from <color=#D91414>Glyphs</color>.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ice DMG in total.\\n- For <color=#D91414>each stack of Soul Ripple</color> consumed, the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Sovereign's Presence</color> increases by <color=#D91414>20%</color>."}

Title: {1: 'QTE: <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Unleashes a powerful strike, dealing Ice DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Unleashes a powerful strike, dealing Ice DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ice DMG in total.'}

Title: {1: 'Whisper Breaker: <color=#0d70bc>Any 3-Ping + Any Orb Ping</color>', 2: 'Sun Rider', 3: 'Will Bearer: <color=#0d70bc>Into the Fray + During Sunshift + Press and Hold Dodge</color>', 4: 'Snow Drifter: <color=#0d70bc>Into the Fray + Inscription Not Full + Press and Hold Basic Attack</color>', 5: 'Mountain Caller: <color=#0d70bc>Into the Fray + Inscription Full + Press and Hold Basic Attack</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'After a 3-Ping, pings any Signal Orb immediately to cast <color=#D91414>Tabula Akasha - Engrave</color> and summons Huiyu to attack the target, gaining Super Armor and DMG Reduction, rearranging Signal Orbs into 3-Ping sets, entering <color=#D91414>Into the Fray</color>, and gaining 1 <color=#D91414>Inscription</color> and 1 Signal Orb during so. During <color=#D91414>Into the Fray</color>, any 3-Ping will grant <color=#D91414>Inscription</color>, and Huiyu will deal Extra Ice DMG upon a 3-Ping or the 4th-or-5th hit of the Basic Attack.', 2: 'Upon entering a Matrix she has triggered, Qu: Shukra activates <color=#D91414>Sunshift</color> for 4s. Gains <color=#D91414>20</color> Signature Energy every time she is switched in.', 3: 'Immediately exits <color=#D91414>Into the Fray</color> and converts all <color=#D91414>Inscription</color> to <color=#D91414>Glyphs</color>. Qu: Shukra pulls in enemy units and summons feathers to continue attacking the target, dealing Ice DMG and gaining Signature Energy continuously. Qu: Shukra is Invincible during so. The next <color=#D91414>Enlightened Soul</color> cast is enhanced.', 4: 'Qu: Shukra assumes her sword stance and becomes Invincible briefly before dashing toward her target and leaping into the air, striking the target and dealing Ice DMG. Gains Super Armor and DMG Reduction during this skill.', 5: "Immediately exits <color=#D91414>Into the Fray</color> and converts all <color=#D91414>Inscription</color> to <color=#D91414>Glyphs</color>. Qu: Shukra summons an ice mountain that freezes the target briefly before she shatters the mountain, pulling in enemy units, dealing Ice DMG, and gaining Signature Energy continuously. Qu: Shukra is Invincible during so. The next <color=#D91414>Sovereign's Presence</color> cast is enhanced."}
SpecificDes: {1: 'After a 3-Ping, pings any Signal Orb immediately to cast <color=#D91414>Tabula Akasha - Engrave</color> and summons Huiyu to attack the target, gaining Super Armor and <color=#D91414>70%</color> DMG Reduction, rearranging Signal Orbs into 3-Ping sets, entering <color=#D91414>Into the Fray</color>, and gaining 1 <color=#D91414>Inscription</color> and 1 Signal Orb during so. During <color=#D91414>Into the Fray</color>, any 3-Ping will grant <color=#D91414>Inscription</color>, and Huiyu will deal Extra Ice DMG upon a 3-Ping or the 4th-or-5th hit of the Basic Attack.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Ice DMG in total based on the number of orbs pinged when summoning Huiyu.\\n- Huiyu performs a follow-up attack and deals <color=#D91414>{3}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{4}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{5}%</color> Ice DMG upon a Red/Yellow/Blue 3-Ping.\\n- Huiyu performs a follow-up attack and deals <color=#D91414>{6}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{7}%</color> Ice DMG upon the 4th/5th hit of the Basic Attack.\\n- Pings orbs during the Entrance Skill to enter <color=#D91414>Into the Fray</color> immediately.\\n- <color=#D91414>Into the Fray</color> lasts for 8s. Gains up to 3 <color=#D91414>Inscription</color> during so.', 2: 'Upon entering a Matrix she has triggered, Qu: Shukra activates <color=#D91414>Sunshift</color> for 4s. Gains <color=#D91414>20</color> Signature Energy every time she is switched in.', 3: "Immediately exits <color=#D91414>Into the Fray</color> and converts all <color=#D91414>Inscription</color> to <color=#D91414>Glyphs</color>. Qu: Shukra pulls in enemy units and summons feathers to continue attacking the target, dealing Ice DMG and gaining Signature Energy continuously. Qu: Shukra is Invincible during so. The next <color=#D91414>Enlightened Soul</color> cast is enhanced.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ice DMG in total.\\n- Each attack grants <color=#D91414>3</color> Signature Energy.\\n- For the next cast of <color=#D91414>Enlightened Soul</color>, every 3-Ping grants <color=#D91414>2 stacks of Soul Ripples</color> during <color=#D91414>Enthronement</color>. This effect does not stack with the enhancement to <color=#D91414>Sovereign's Presence</color> triggered by <color=#D91414>Mountain Caller</color>.", 4: 'Qu: Shukra assumes her sword stance and becomes Invincible briefly before dashing toward her target and leaping into the air, striking the target and dealing Ice DMG. Gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>50%</color> DMG Reduction during this skill.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ice DMG in total.\\n- Automatically dodges during the dash.', 5: "Immediately exits <color=#D91414>Into the Fray</color> and converts all <color=#D91414>Inscription</color> to <color=#D91414>Glyphs</color>. Qu: Shukra summons an ice mountain that freezes the target briefly before she shatters the mountain, pulling in enemy units, dealing Ice DMG, and gaining Signature Energy continuously. Qu: Shukra is Invincible during so. The next <color=#D91414>Sovereign's Presence</color> cast is enhanced.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ice DMG in total.\\n- Each attack grants <color=#D91414>4</color> Signature Energy.\\n- For the next cast of <color=#D91414>Sovereign's Presence</color>, doubles the Base DMG increase on <color=#D91414>Sovereign's Presence</color> from consuming <color=#D91414>Soul Ripples</color>. This effect does not stack with the enhancement to <color=#D91414>Enlightened Soul</color> triggered by <color=#D91414>Will Bearer</color>."}

BriefDes: {1: 'Increases Ice DMG of all members. Increases ATK of all Attackers in the team.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Increases Ice DMG of all members by <color=#D91414>10%</color>. Increases ATK of all Attackers in the team by <color=#D91414>10%</color>.'}

SpecificDes: {1: 'Extra DMG Bonus increases by <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>{0}%</color></color>.'}

Title: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.1: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at S5 Rank</color></color>', 2: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.2: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SS Rank</color></color>'}
BriefDes: {1: "<color=#99a3b1>Casting Will Bearer, Mountain Caller, or Sovereign's Presence will activate all available QTEs. Activates Into the Fray immediately upon the 4th hit of the Basic Attack after a successful dodge. Qu: Shukra will not gain Inscription when triggering Into the Fray in this way.</color>", 2: "<color=#99a3b1>Immediately gains 1 stack of Soul Ripple when casting Enlightened Soul. After casting Will Bearer, the next cast of Enlightened Soul will have stronger enhancement effects. After casting Mountain Caller, the next cast of Sovereign's Presence will have stronger enhancement effects.</color>"}
SpecificDes: {1: "<color=#99a3b1>Casting Will Bearer, Mountain Caller, or Sovereign's Presence will activate all available QTEs. Activates Into the Fray immediately upon the 4th hit of the Basic Attack after a successful dodge. Qu: Shukra will not gain Inscription when triggering Into the Fray in this way.</color>", 2: "<color=#99a3b1>Immediately gains 1 stack of Soul Ripple when casting Enlightened Soul. For the next cast of Enlightened Soul after casting Will Bearer, every 3-Ping grants 3 stacks of Soul Ripples during Enthronement. After casting Mountain Caller, each stack of Soul Ripple increases the Base DMG of Sovereign's Presence by 45% instead.</color>"}

Title: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.1: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SS3 Rank</color></color>', 2: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.2: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SSS Rank</color></color>'}
BriefDes: {1: "<color=#99a3b1>Qu: Shukra's Extra DMG Bonus increases during Into the Fray.</color>", 2: "<color=#99a3b1>Upon casting Will Bearer or Mountain Caller, increases the Base DMG of the current attack based on the current Inscription. SpecificDes: {1: "<color=#99a3b1>Qu: Shukra's Extra DMG Bonus increases by 25% for 8s during Into the Fray.</color>", 2: "<color=#99a3b1>Upon casting Will Bearer or Mountain Caller, increases the Base DMG of the current attack by 50% for every 1 Inscription.
