Title: {1: 'Red Orb: <color=#0d70bc>No Ping Combo + Ping Red Orb</color>', 2: 'Red Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Complete Ping Combo 1 + Ping Red Orb</color>', 3: 'Red Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Complete Ping Combo 2 + Ping Red Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Ping Combo 1: Smashes the target with the Grizzly Paw before kicking the target toward Decryptor with Grizzly Stomp, dealing Dark DMG.', 2: 'Ping Combo 2: Pulls in targets in the area ahead before riding the Grizzly Paw to scatter musical notes, dealing Dark DMG.', 3: 'Ping Combo 3: Leaps into the air and produces the soundwave conveyor, summoning Grizzly Chomp before throwing it at the target, dealing Dark DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Ping Combo 1: Smashes the target with the Grizzly Paw before kicking the target toward Decryptor with Grizzly Stomp, dealing Dark DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Dark DMG in total based on the number of orbs pinged.', 2: 'Ping Combo 2: Pulls in targets in the area ahead before riding the Grizzly Paw to scatter musical notes, dealing Dark DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Dark DMG in total based on the number of orbs pinged.', 3: 'Ping Combo 3: Leaps into the air and produces the soundwave conveyor, summoning Grizzly Chomp before throwing it at the target, dealing Dark DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Dark DMG in total based on the number of orbs pinged.'}

Title: {1: 'Yellow Orb: <color=#0d70bc>No Ping Combo + Ping Yellow Orb</color>', 2: 'Yellow Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Complete Ping Combo 1 + Ping Yellow Orb</color>', 3: 'Yellow Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Complete Ping Combo 2 + Ping Yellow Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Ping Combo 1: Smashes the target with the Grizzly Paw before kicking the target toward Decryptor with Grizzly Stomp, dealing Dark DMG.', 2: 'Ping Combo 2: Pulls in targets in the area ahead before riding the Grizzly Paw to scatter musical notes, dealing Dark DMG.', 3: 'Ping Combo 3: Leaps into the air and produces the soundwave conveyor, summoning Grizzly Chomp before throwing it at the target, dealing Dark DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Ping Combo 1: Smashes the target with the Grizzly Paw before kicking the target toward Decryptor with Grizzly Stomp, dealing Dark DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Dark DMG in total based on the number of orbs pinged.', 2: 'Ping Combo 2: Pulls in targets in the area ahead before riding the Grizzly Paw to scatter musical notes, dealing Dark DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Dark DMG in total based on the number of orbs pinged.', 3: 'Ping Combo 3: Leaps into the air and produces the soundwave conveyor, summoning Grizzly Chomp before throwing it at the target, dealing Dark DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Dark DMG in total based on the number of orbs pinged.'}

Title: {1: 'Blue Orb: <color=#0d70bc>No Ping Combo + Ping Blue Orb</color>', 2: 'Blue Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Complete Ping Combo 1 + Ping Blue Orb</color>', 3: 'Blue Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Complete Ping Combo 2 + Ping Blue Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Ping Combo 1: Crosses the Grizzly Paws to pierce the target, dealing Dark DMG.', 2: 'Ping Combo 2: Puts the Grizzly Paws together to crush the target, dealing Dark DMG.', 3: 'Ping Combo 3: Creates a cyber tornado with both Grizzly Paws and kicks the target continuously, dealing Dark DMG. Then, summons Grizzly Chomp to fly toward herself, dealing Dark DMG to targets on the path.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Ping Combo 1: Crosses the Grizzly Paws to pierce the target, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG.', 2: 'Ping Combo 2: Puts the Grizzly Paws together to crush the target, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG.', 3: 'Ping Combo 3: Creates a cyber tornado with both Grizzly Paws and kicks the target continuously, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG. Then, summons Grizzly Chomp to fly toward herself, dealing <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Dark DMG to targets on the path.'}

Title: {1: 'Basic Attack: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Basic Attack</color>', 2: 'Basic Attack: <color=#0d70bc>Incoming Grizzly Chomp + Tap Basic Attack</color>', 3: 'Coupling: <color=#0d70bc>At Least 3 Computing Points + Press and Hold Basic Attack</color>', 4: 'Overflow: <color=#0d70bc>During Coupling + Release Basic Attack, or Press and Hold Basic Attack until Coupling Ends to Auto Cast</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Uses the two Grizzly Paws alternatively to launch a 2-hit attack at the target when <color=#D91414>not in Analysis Mode</color>. The 3rd hit will unleash a soundwave, knocking back the target and dealing Dark DMG.\\nThe 3rd hit will form a pulse that pulls in the target instead when <color=#D91414>in Analysis Mode</color>, dealing Dark DMG.', 2: 'Sweeps the target with Grizzly Paws when Grizzly Chomp flies toward Decryptor, dealing Dark DMG.', 3: 'Pressing and holding Basic Attack when there are at least <color=#D91414>3 Computing Points</color> will spend all <color=#D91414>Computing Points</color>, performing <color=#D91414>Coupling</color> on the target, dealing Dark DMG, and restoring HP and Signature Energy to Decryptor. She gains Super Armor and DMG Reduction during so.\\n- Spends <color=#D91414>3-5 Computing Points</color> to cast <color=#D91414>Coupling - Low Frequency</color>.\\n- Spends <color=#D91414>6-8 Computing Points</color> to cast <color=#D91414>Coupling - Medium Frequency</color>.\\n- Spends <color=#D91414>9 Computing Points</color> to cast <color=#D91414>Coupling - High Frequency</color>.', 4: 'During <color=#D91414>Coupling</color>, release Basic Attack in advance to dodge. When an Extreme Dodge is triggered, Decryptor will cast <color=#D91414>Overflow</color> automatically. Releasing Basic Attack with perfect timing during <color=#D91414>Coupling</color> or pressing and holding Basic Attack until <color=#D91414>Coupling</color> ends will also cast <color=#D91414>Overflow</color> automatically. Decryptor gains Super Armor and DMG Reduction during so.\\n- <color=#D91414>Overflow</color> and <color=#D91414>Coupling</color> share the same Frequencies, and <color=#D91414>Computing Points</color> will increase the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Overflow</color> caused by releasing Basic Attack with perfect timing or performing Extreme Dodge.\\n- <color=#D91414>Overflow - Low Frequency</color> unleashes a Grizzly Paws uppercut, dealing Dark DMG.\\n- <color=#D91414>Overflow - Medium Frequency</color> unleashes a Grizzly Paws smash, dealing Dark DMG and restoring Signature Energy.\\n- <color=#D91414>Overflow - High Frequency</color> unleashes a powerful Grizzly Paws smash, dealing Dark DMG, restoring Signature Energy, and generating an <color=#D91414>Integer Overflow Field</color> for <color=#D91414>8s</color>.\\n- The <color=#D91414>Integer Overflow Field</color> restores HP to allies every <color=#D91414>4s</color> and applies <color=#D91414>Dark Radiation</color> and <color=#D91414>Equilibrium Disintegration</color> on them. While <color=#D91414>Dark Radiation</color> is active, allies deal more Dark DMG for <color=#D91414>4s</color>. <color=#D91414>While Equilibrium Disintegration</color> is active, Decryptor deals massive Extra DMG to <color=#D91414>Equilibrium Field</color>, while allies deal a moderate amount of Extra DMG to <color=#D91414>Equilibrium Field</color>.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Uses the two Grizzly Paws alternatively to launch a 2-hit attack at the target when <color=#D91414>not in Analysis Mode</color>. The 3rd hit will unleash a soundwave, knocking back the target and dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG.\\nThe 3rd hit will form a pulse that pulls in the target instead when <color=#D91414>in Analysis Mode</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Dark DMG.', 2: 'Sweeps the target with Grizzly Paws when Grizzly Chomp flies toward Decryptor, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG.', 3: 'Pressing and holding Basic Attack when there are at least <color=#D91414>3 Computing Points</color> will spend all <color=#D91414>Computing Points</color>, performing <color=#D91414>Coupling</color> on the target, dealing Dark DMG, and restoring HP and <color=#D91414>10 Signature Energy to Decryptor</color>. She gains Super Armor and 25% DMG Reduction during so.\\n- Spends <color=#D91414>3-5 Computing Points</color> to cast <color=#D91414>Coupling - Low Frequency</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG and restoring HP equal to <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> of her ATK.\\n- Spends <color=#D91414>6-8 Computing Points</color> to cast <color=#D91414>Coupling - Medium Frequency</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Dark DMG and restoring HP equal to <color=#D91414>{3}%</color> of her ATK.\\n- Spends <color=#D91414>9 Computing Points</color> to cast <color=#D91414>Coupling - High Frequency</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>{4}%</color> Dark DMG and restoring HP equal to <color=#D91414>{5}%</color> of her ATK.', 4: "During <color=#D91414>Coupling</color>, release Basic Attack in advance to dodge. When an Extreme Dodge is triggered, Decryptor will cast <color=#D91414>Overflow</color> automatically. Releasing Basic Attack with perfect timing during <color=#D91414>Coupling</color> or pressing and holding Basic Attack until <color=#D91414>Coupling</color> ends will also cast <color=#D91414>Overflow</color> automatically. Decryptor gains Super Armor and 50% DMG Reduction during so.\\n- <color=#D91414>Overflow</color> and <color=#D91414>Coupling</color> share the same Frequencies, and every <color=#D91414>Computing Point</color> will increase the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Overflow</color> caused by releasing Basic Attack with perfect timing or performing Extreme Dodge by <color=#D91414>20%</color>.\\n- <color=#D91414>Overflow - Low Frequency</color> unleashes a Grizzly Paws uppercut, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG.\\n- <color=#D91414>Overflow - Medium Frequency</color> unleashes a Grizzly Paws smash, dealing <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Dark DMG and restoring <color=#D91414>10</color> Signature Energy.\\n- <color=#D91414>Overflow - High Frequency</color> unleashes a powerful Grizzly Paws smash, dealing <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Dark DMG, restoring <color=#D91414>30</color> Signature Energy, and generating an <color=#D91414>Integer Overflow Field</color> for <color=#D91414>8s</color>.\\n- The <color=#D91414>Integer Overflow Field</color> restores HP equal to <color=#D91414>{3}%</color> of Decryptor's ATK to allies every <color=#D91414>4s</color> and applies <color=#D91414>Dark Radiation</color> and <color=#D91414>Equilibrium Disintegration</color> on them. While <color=#D91414>Dark Radiation</color> is active, allies deal <color=#D91414>10%</color> more Dark DMG for <color=#D91414>4s</color>. While <color=#D91414>Equilibrium Disintegration</color> is active, Decryptor deals <color=#D91414>100%</color> Extra DMG to <color=#D91414>Equilibrium Field</color>, while allies deal <color=#D91414>30%</color> Extra DMG to <color=#D91414>Equilibrium Field</color>."}

Title: {1: 'Thorough Analysis: <color=#0d70bc>Not in Analysis Mode + At Least 200 Signature Energy + Press and Hold Signature</color>', 2: 'Chordal Dissonance: <color=#0d70bc>Analysis Mode + Press and Hold Signature, or Use Up All Signature Energy to Auto Cast</color>', 3: 'Ambient Mix: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Signature</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Decryptor unleashes all her computing power and enters <color=#D91414>Analysis Mode</color>, dealing Dark DMG and gaining up to <color=#D91414>150 Analysis Points</color> based on her moves during so.\\n- In <color=#D91414>Analysis Mode</color>, Decryptor cannot restore Signature Energy and will consume it over time (This effect stops when she leaves the battlefield).', 2: 'Decryptor spends all Signature Energy and exits <color=#D91414>Analysis Mode</color> to cast <color=#D91414>Chordal Dissonance</color>, dealing Dark DMG. When <color=#D91414>Analysis Points</color> reach <color=#D91414>150</color>, <color=#D91414>Chordal Dissonance</color> is <color=#D91414>Played Back</color>, dealing Dark DMG again. <color=#D91414>Analysis Points</color> will increase the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Chordal Dissonance</color> and <color=#D91414>Play Back</color>.\\n- <color=#D91414>Chordal Dissonance</color> also detonates the <color=#D91414>Hacked Mark</color>, dealing Dark DMG to the hacked target.', 3: "Decryptor's attacks charge the Grizzly Stomp. Casting this skill will summon Grizzly Stomp to kick the target with different strengths based on the charge level, dealing Dark DMG before resetting the charge level.\\n- The charge level starts at Lv.0, increasing to level 1, 2, and 3 after 1st, 2nd, and 3rd basic attacks. Increases to Lv.4 every after gaining <color=#D91414>3 Computing Points</color>. Increases to Lv.5 for a limited time after Grizzly Chomp flies toward Decryptor."}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Decryptor unleashes all her computing power and enters <color=#D91414>Analysis Mode</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG and gaining up to <color=#D91414>150 Analysis Points</color> based on her moves during so.\\n- In <color=#D91414>Analysis Mode</color>, Decryptor cannot restore Signature Energy and will consume <color=#D91414>30 Signature Energy</color> every second (This effect stops when she leaves the battlefield).', 2: 'Decryptor spends all Signature Energy and exits <color=#D91414>Analysis Mode</color> to cast <color=#D91414>Chordal Dissonance</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG. When <color=#D91414>Analysis Points</color> reach <color=#D91414>150</color>, <color=#D91414>Chordal Dissonance</color> is <color=#D91414>Played Back</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Dark DMG again. Each <color=#D91414>Analysis Point</color> will increase the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Chordal Dissonance</color> and <color=#D91414>Play Back</color> by <color=#D91414>1%</color>.\\n- <color=#D91414>Chordal Dissonance</color> also detonates the <color=#D91414>Hacked Mark</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Dark DMG to the hacked target.', 3: "Decryptor's attacks charge the Grizzly Stomp. Casting this skill will summon Grizzly Stomp to kick the target with different strengths based on the charge level, dealing Dark DMG before resetting the charge level.\\n- The charge level starts at Lv.0, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG. It increases to Lv.1 after the 1st Basic Attack, dealing <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Dark DMG. It increases to Lv.2 after the 2nd Basic Attack, dealing <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Dark DMG. It increases to Lv.3 after the 3rd Basic Attack, dealing <color=#D91414>{3}%</color> Dark DMG. It increases to Lv.4 every after gaining <color=#D91414>3 Computing Points</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>{4}%</color> Dark DMG. It increases to Lv.5 for a limited time after Grizzly Chomp flies toward Decryptor, dealing <color=#D91414>{5}%</color> Dark DMG."}

Title: {1: 'QTE: <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Decryptor rides the Grizzly Paws to scatter musical notes, dealing Dark DMG. Afterward, generates the <color=#D91414>Integer Overflow Field</color> for <color=#D91414>4s</color>.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Decryptor rides the Grizzly Paws to scatter musical notes, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG. Afterward, generates the <color=#D91414>Integer Overflow Field</color> for <color=#D91414>4s</color>.'}

Title: {1: 'Fraudulent Frequency', 2: 'Hacking: <color=#0d70bc>Any 3-Ping or QTE</color>', 3: 'Programming Stack: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Orb</color>', 4: 'Stress Integration: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Stress Orb</color>', 5: 'Iterative Glitch: <color=#0d70bc>Incoming Grizzly Chomp + Tap Basic Attack or Signature</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Decryptor can only gain and ping Red or Yellow Orbs when she is <color=#D91414>not in Analysis Mode</color>. She gains infinite Blue Orbs and can only ping Blue Orbs when in <color=#D91414>Analysis Mode</color>.', 2: '3-Pings and QTEs will inflict a <color=#D91414>Hacked Mark</color> on the first target hit for <color=#D91414>10s</color>. When the hacked target takes damage, Decryptor will restore Signature Energy over time.\\n- There can only be 1 <color=#D91414>Hacked Mark</color> on the battlefield. When the hacked target is taken down, the <color=#D91414>Hacked Mark</color> will spread to the nearest target with its duration reset.', 3: "Decryptor gains <color=#D91414>1 Computing Point</color> for each orb pinged, storing up to <color=#D91414>9 Computing Points</color> in total. After a 3-Ping, Decryptor will overload her computing power temporarily. During her next 1-Ping or 2-Ping, tap Signature to spend Signature Energy, boosting the ping's damage to a 3-Ping's and gaining <color=#D91414>3 Computing Points</color>.", 4: 'Gains <color=#D91414>1 Stress Orb</color> after obtaining <color=#D91414>9 Computing Points</color>, max 1 <color=#D91414>Stress Orb</color> in total. Upon pinging the <color=#D91414>Stress Orb</color>, Decryptor will leap up and summon the Grizzly Chomp, bombing the target and dealing Dark DMG upon landing plus Extra DMG to <color=#D91414>Equilibrium Field</color>. She gains Super Armor and DMG Reduction during so.\\n- Pinging the <color=#D91414>Stress Orb</color> when Decryptor is <color=#D91414>not in Analysis Mode</color> will restore Signature Energy.', 5: 'Ping Combo 3 will summon Grizzly Chomp to fly toward Decryptor. She can either perform an Extreme Dodge to trigger the Matrix, or knock Grizzly Chomp away with Grizzly Paws or Grizzly Stomp for a follow-up joint attack.\\n- Grizzly Chomp will deal Dark DMG if knocked away by Grizzly Paws.\\n- Grizzly Chomp will deal Dark DMG and restore Signature Energy to Decryptor if knocked away by Grizzly Stomp when Decryptor is <color=#D91414>not in Analysis Mode</color>. If she is in <color=#D91414>Analysis Mode</color>, Grizzly Chomp will deal Dark DMG and extend <color=#D91414>Analysis Mode</color> for <color=#D91414>2s</color>.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Decryptor can only gain and ping Red or Yellow Orbs when she is <color=#D91414>not in Analysis Mode</color>. She gains infinite Blue Orbs and can only ping Blue Orbs when in <color=#D91414>Analysis Mode</color>.', 2: '3-Pings and QTEs will inflict a <color=#D91414>Hacked Mark</color> on the first target hit for <color=#D91414>10s</color>. When the hacked target takes damage, Decryptor will restore <color=#D91414>30 Signature Energy</color> every second.\\n- There can only be 1 <color=#D91414>Hacked Mark</color> on the battlefield. When the hacked target is taken down, the <color=#D91414>Hacked Mark</color> will spread to the nearest target with its duration reset.', 3: "Decryptor gains <color=#D91414>1 Computing Point</color> for each orb pinged, storing up to <color=#D91414>9 Computing Points</color> in total. After a 3-Ping, Decryptor will overload her computing power temporarily. During her next 1-Ping or 2-Ping, tap Signature to spend <color=#D91414>15 Signature Energy</color>, boosting the ping's damage to a 3-Ping's and gaining <color=#D91414>3 Computing Points</color>.", 4: 'Gains <color=#D91414>1 Stress Orb</color> after obtaining <color=#D91414>9 Computing Points</color>, max 1 <color=#D91414>Stress Orb</color> in total. Upon pinging the <color=#D91414>Stress Orb</color>, Decryptor will leap up and summon the Grizzly Chomp, bombing the target and dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG upon landing plus <color=#D91414>150%</color> Extra DMG to <color=#D91414>Equilibrium Field</color>. She gains Super Armor and 50% DMG Reduction during so.\\n- Pinging the <color=#D91414>Stress Orb</color> when Decryptor is <color=#D91414>not in Analysis Mode</color> will restore <color=#D91414>75 Signature Energy</color>.', 5: 'Ping Combo 3 will summon Grizzly Chomp to fly toward Decryptor. She can either perform an Extreme Dodge to trigger the Matrix, or knock Grizzly Chomp away with Grizzly Paws or Grizzly Stomp for a follow-up joint attack.\\n- Grizzly Chomp will deal <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG if knocked away by Grizzly Paws.\\n- Grizzly Chomp will deal <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Dark DMG and restore <color=#D91414>60 Signature Energy</color> to Decryptor if knocked away by Grizzly Stomp when Decryptor is <color=#D91414>not in Analysis Mode</color>. If she is in <color=#D91414>Analysis Mode</color>, Grizzly Chomp will deal <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Dark DMG and extend <color=#D91414>Analysis Mode</color> for <color=#D91414>2s</color>.'}

Title: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.1: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at S5 Rank</color></color>', 2: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.2: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SS Rank</color></color>'}
BriefDes: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>The Base DMG of Coupling increases.\\nChordal Dissonance will rearrange the Red and Yellow Orbs into sets of 3-Pings.</color>', 2: "<color=#99a3b1>Gains 3 Computing Points every time upon entering the battlefield.\\nDecryptor's Dark DMG increases when in Analysis Mode.</color>"}
SpecificDes: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>The Base DMG of Coupling increases by 150%.\\nChordal Dissonance will rearrange the Red and Yellow Orbs into sets of 3-Pings.</color>', 2: "<color=#99a3b1>Gains 3 Computing Points every time upon entering the battlefield.\\nDecryptor's Dark DMG increases by 20% when in Analysis Mode.</color>"}

Title: {1: 'Red Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Red Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Wields the Wingblade to attack the enemy, dealing Nihil DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color> and <color=#D91414>Eclipse Points</color>.'}
SpecificDes: {1: "Wields the Wingblade to attack the enemy, dealing Nihil DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color> and <color=#D91414>Eclipse Points</color>.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Nihil DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- Retrieves the Chakram if it's present on the field.\\n- Gains <color=#D91414>10/20/30 Crescent Points</color> based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- Gains <color=#D91414>5/10/15 Eclipse Points</color> based on the number of orbs pinged."}

Title: {1: 'Yellow Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Yellow Orb Ping</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Leaps up and hurls the Chakram at the enemy, dealing Nihil DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color> and <color=#D91414>Eclipse Points</color>.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Leaps up and hurls the Chakram at the enemy, dealing Nihil DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color> and <color=#D91414>Eclipse Points</color>.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Nihil DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- If the Chakram is present on the field when the skill is cast, slashes the enemy with the Wingblade and retrieves the Chakram instead, dealing <color=#D91414>{3}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{4}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{5}%</color> Nihil DMG.\\n- Gains <color=#D91414>10/20/30 Crescent Points</color> based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- Gains <color=#D91414>5/10/15 Eclipse Points</color> based on the number of orbs pinged.'}

Title: {1: 'Blue Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Blue Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Dashes in and leaps up to launch a spin attack at the enemy, dealing Nihil DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color> and <color=#D91414>Eclipse Points</color>.'}
SpecificDes: {1: "Dashes in and leaps up to launch a spin attack at the enemy, dealing Nihil DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color> and <color=#D91414>Eclipse Points</color>.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Nihil DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- Retrieves the Chakram if it's present on the field.\\n- Gains <color=#D91414>10/20/30 Crescent Points</color> based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- Gains <color=#D91414>5/10/15 Eclipse Points</color> based on the number of orbs pinged."}

Title: {1: 'Basic Attack: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Basic Attack</color>', 2: 'Lunar Assault: <color=#0d70bc>In Main Sequence/Finality + Tap Basic Attack</color>', 3: 'Reaping Moon: <color=#0d70bc>Press and Hold Basic Attack</color>', 4: 'Shattering Moon: <color=#0d70bc>Reaping Moon + Release Basic Attack</color>', 5: 'Gibbous Edge: <color=#0d70bc>2nd hit of Basic Attack/Yellow Orb Skill</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Alternates between the Chakram and the Wingblade to slash the enemy, dealing Nihil DMG. If the Chakram is present on the field, the 5th hit will retrieve the Chakram and restore additional Crescent Points.', 2: 'Alternates between the Chakram and the Wingblade to attack the enemy, dealing Nihil DMG. When in <color=#D91414>Main Sequence</color>, the 4th and 6th hit will restore additional <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color>.', 3: 'Press and hold Basic Attack to activate <color=#D91414>Reaping Moon</color>, continuously pulling in nearby enemies and granting <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color>. During so, Luna: Oblivion gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>50%</color> DMG Reduction, is unable to restore the Dodge Gauge, and triggers Dodge automatically when hit.', 4: 'During <color=#D91414>Reaping Moon</color>, release Basic Attack at <color=#D91414>0/45/90</color> <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color> to cast <color=#D91414>Shattering Moon</color>. Upon casting, Luna: Oblivion slowly ascends into the air to execute a plunging attack, pulling in nearby enemies and dealing Nihil DMG. During so, she gains Super Armor, <color=#D91414>50%</color> DMG Reduction, and is unable to restore the Dodge Gauge.', 5: 'After casting the 2nd hit of Basic Attack or Yellow Orb Skill, the Chakram remains on the field, continuously dealing Nihil DMG. When the Chakram is present, Basic Attack starts from the 3rd hit.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Alternates between the Chakram and the Wingblade to slash the enemy, dealing Nihil DMG. If the Chakram is present on the field, the 5th hit will retrieve the Chakram and restore additional Crescent Points.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Nihil DMG. The 5th hit will retrieve the Chakram and restore additional <color=#D91414>20 Crescent Points</color>.', 2: 'Alternates between the Chakram and the Wingblade to attack the enemy, dealing Nihil DMG. When in <color=#D91414>Main Sequence</color>, the 4th and 6th hit will restore additional <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color>.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Nihil DMG. When in <color=#D91414>Main Sequence</color>, the 4th and 6th hit will restore additional <color=#D91414>20 Crescent Points</color>.', 3: 'Press and hold Basic Attack to activate <color=#D91414>Reaping Moon</color>, continuously pulling in nearby enemies and granting <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color>. During so, Luna: Oblivion gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>50%</color> DMG Reduction, is unable to restore the Dodge Gauge, and triggers Dodge automatically when hit.\\n- During <color=#D91414>Reaping Moon</color>, restores <color=#D91414>40 Crescent Points</color> per second.\\n- Can gain up to <color=#D91414>90</color> <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color>.', 4: 'During <color=#D91414>Reaping Moon</color>, release Basic Attack at <color=#D91414>0/45/90</color> <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color> to cast <color=#D91414>Shattering Moon</color>. Upon casting, Luna: Oblivion slowly ascends into the air to execute a plunging attack, pulling in nearby enemies and dealing Nihil DMG. During so, she gains Super Armor, <color=#D91414>50%</color> DMG Reduction, and is unable to restore the Dodge Gauge.\\n- Casts <color=#D91414>Shattering Moon</color> automatically at max <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color>.\\n- When in <color=#D91414>Nova</color>, <color=#D91414>Shattering Moon</color> deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Nihil DMG.\\n- When in <color=#D91414>Main Sequence</color>/<color=#D91414>Finality</color>, Luna: Oblivion changes her attacks, slashing enemies with the Wingblade in a large area instead and dealing <color=#D91414>{3}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{4}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{5}%</color> Nihil DMG.\\n- Becomes invincible upon casting <color=#D91414>Shattering Moon</color> at max <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color>. This will clear all <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color>, activate <color=#D91414>Eclipse Stance</color>, and restore <color=#D91414>24</color> Signature Energy.', 5: 'After casting the 2nd hit of Basic Attack or Yellow Orb Skill, the Chakram remains on the field, continuously dealing Nihil DMG. When the Chakram is present, Basic Attack starts from the 3rd hit.\\n- The Chakram deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Nihil DMG to nearby enemies every 0.5s for 1.5s.'}

Title: {1: 'Main Sequence: <color=#0d70bc>30 Energy + Tap Signature</color>', 2: 'Finality: <color=#0d70bc>30 Energy + Press and Hold Signature</color>', 3: 'Lunar Downfall: <color=#0d70bc>In Main Sequence/Finality + 70 Energy + Tap Signature</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Crushes spacial dimensions to pull all enemies into the Starfall Dome, dealing Nihil DMG. Triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> in the duration and enters <color=#D91414>Main Sequence</color>.', 2: 'Tears apart dimensional bounds at the cost of all present Signal Orbs to pull all enemies into the Starfall Dome, dealing Nihil DMG and triggering <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color>. After casting this skill, gains <color=#D91414>Eclipse Points</color> based on the number of orbs pinged, increases <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color> to the max limit, activates <color=#D91414>Eclipse Stance</color>, and enters <color=#D91414>Finality</color>.', 3: "Condenses consciousness to implode and obliterate space, dealing Nihil DMG and triggering <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color>. Afterward, exits <color=#D91414>Main Sequence</color>/<color=#D91414>Finality</color> and enters <color=#D91414>Nova</color>. When cast in <color=#D91414>Main Sequence</color>, this skill's damage will be amplified at the cost of all <color=#D91414>Eclipse Points</color>."}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Crushes spacial dimensions to pull all enemies into the Starfall Dome, dealing Nihil DMG. Triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> in the duration and enters <color=#D91414>Main Sequence</color>.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Nihil DMG.', 2: 'Tears apart dimensional bounds at the cost of all present Signal Orbs to pull all enemies into the Starfall Dome, dealing Nihil DMG and triggering <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color>. After casting this skill, gains <color=#D91414>Eclipse Points</color> based on the number of orbs pinged, increases <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color> to the max limit, activates <color=#D91414>Eclipse Stance</color>, and enters <color=#D91414>Finality</color>.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Nihil DMG.\\n- Gains <color=#D91414>10/20/30/60/90/150 Eclipse Points</color> based on the number of orbs pinged.', 3: "Condenses consciousness to implode and obliterate space, dealing Nihil DMG and triggering <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color>. Afterward, exits <color=#D91414>Main Sequence</color>/<color=#D91414>Finality</color> and enters <color=#D91414>Nova</color>. When cast in <color=#D91414>Main Sequence</color>, this skill's damage will be amplified at the cost of all <color=#D91414>Eclipse Points</color>.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Nihil DMG.\\n- When cast in <color=#D91414>Main Sequence</color>, every <color=#D91414>10 Eclipse Points</color> will amplify Base DMG by <color=#D91414>4%</color>."}

Title: {1: 'QTE: <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Slashes the enemy with the Wingblade, dealing Nihil DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Slashes the enemy with the Wingblade, dealing Nihil DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Nihil DMG.'}

Title: {1: 'Waxing Course', 2: 'Eclipse Points: <color=#0d70bc>Gained automatically when casting Signal Orb Skills/casting Shattering Moon at max Crescent Points</color>', 3: 'Incipient Retribution: <color=#0d70bc>Main Sequence + Activated Eclipse Stance + Reaping Moon + Release Basic Attack</color>', 4: 'Final Retribution: <color=#0d70bc>Finality + Activated Eclipse Stance + Press and Hold Basic Attack</color>', 5: 'Serene Advent: <color=#0d70bc>Cast Signature - Finality</color>', 6: 'Agitated Beacon'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Enters <color=#D91414>Nova</color> upon entering the battlefield. When in <color=#D91414>Nova</color>, all Signal Orbs will be converted into Yellow Orbs, and Basic Attacks will only generate Yellow Orbs. After entering <color=#D91414>Main Sequence</color>, all Signal Orbs will be converted into Red and Blue Orbs, and Basic Attacks will only generate Red or Blue Orbs. After entering <color=#D91414>Finality</color>, Basic Attacks will not generate Signal Orbs, and no Signal Orbs can be pinged except for <color=#D91414>Finality Orbs</color>.', 2: 'Gains <color=#D91414>Eclipse Points</color> whenever casting Signal Orb Skills, or casting <color=#D91414>Shattering Moon</color> or <color=#D91414>Incipient Retribution</color> at max <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color>. Eclipse Points will amplify the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Signature - Lunar Downfall</color> in <color=#D91414>Main Sequence</color> and the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Final Retribution</color> in <color=#D91414>Finality</color>.', 3: 'When in <color=#D91414>Main Sequence</color> with <color=#D91414>Eclipse Stance</color> activated, release Basic Attack during <color=#D91414>Reaping Moon</color> to cast <color=#D91414>Incipient Retribution</color>. Upon casting, Luna: Oblivion gathers energy and charges toward the target to pull in nearby enemies and detonate them, dealing Nihil DMG and restoring <color=#D91414>24</color> Signature Energy. She becomes invincible during so, unable to restore the Dodge Gauge or cast <color=#D91414>Signature - Lunar Downfall</color>.', 4: 'When in <color=#D91414>Finality</color> with <color=#D91414>Eclipse Stance</color> activated, press and hold Basic Attack to cast <color=#D91414>Final Retribution</color>. Upon casting, Luna: Oblivion gathers energy and charges toward the target to pull in nearby enemies and detonate them, dealing Nihil DMG and amplifying this damage at the cost of all <color=#D91414>Eclipse Points</color>. She becomes invincible during so, unable to restore the Dodge Gauge or cast <color=#D91414>Signature - Lunar Downfall</color>.', 5: 'When in <color=#D91414>Finality</color>, Luna: Oblivion consumes <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color> continuously but is unable to gain them back through <color=#D91414>Reaping Moon</color>. Gains <color=#D91414>Finality Orbs</color> upon Basic Attacks; restores <color=#D91414>30 Crescent Points</color> and gains 3 <color=#D91414>Finality Orbs</color> upon casting <color=#D91414>Shattering Moon</color>. When the number of <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color> falls to 0, exits <color=#D91414>Finality</color>, and all <color=#D91414>Finality Orbs</color> will disappear.', 6: "When in <color=#D91414>Main Sequence</color>/<color=#D91414>Finality</color>, Luna: Oblivion's Base DMG Efficiency dealt to Equilibrium Field increases by <color=#D91414>100%</color>."}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Enters <color=#D91414>Nova</color> upon entering the battlefield. When in <color=#D91414>Nova</color>, all Signal Orbs will be converted into Yellow Orbs, and Basic Attacks will only generate Yellow Orbs. After entering <color=#D91414>Main Sequence</color>, all Signal Orbs will be converted into Red and Blue Orbs, and Basic Attacks will only generate Red or Blue Orbs. After entering <color=#D91414>Finality</color>, Basic Attacks will not generate Signal Orbs, and no Signal Orbs can be pinged except for <color=#D91414>Finality Orbs</color>.', 2: 'Gains <color=#D91414>Eclipse Points</color> whenever casting Signal Orb Skills, or casting <color=#D91414>Shattering Moon</color> or <color=#D91414>Incipient Retribution</color> at max <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color>. Eclipse Points will amplify the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Signature - Lunar Downfall</color> in <color=#D91414>Main Sequence</color> and the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Final Retribution</color> in <color=#D91414>Finality</color>.\\n- Gains <color=#D91414>5/10/15 Eclipse Points</color> based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- Gains <color=#D91414>45 Eclipse Points</color> upon casting <color=#D91414>Shattering Moon</color> or <color=#D91414>Incipient Retribution</color> at max <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color>.\\n- Can gain up to <color=#D91414>300</color> <color=#D91414>Eclipse Points</color>.', 3: 'When in <color=#D91414>Main Sequence</color> with <color=#D91414>Eclipse Stance</color> activated, release Basic Attack during <color=#D91414>Reaping Moon</color> to cast <color=#D91414>Incipient Retribution</color>. Upon casting, Luna: Oblivion gathers energy and charges toward the target to pull in nearby enemies and detonate them, dealing Nihil DMG and restoring <color=#D91414>24</color> Signature Energy. She becomes invincible during so, unable to restore the Dodge Gauge or cast <color=#D91414>Signature - Lunar Downfall</color>.\\n- When <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color> are not full, <color=#D91414>Incipient Retribution</color> deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Nihil DMG.\\n- When cast at max <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color>, <color=#D91414>Incipient Retribution</color> grants <color=#D91414>45 Eclipse Points</color>, deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Nihil DMG, and clears all <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color>.\\n- Casts <color=#D91414>Incipient Retribution</color> automatically at max <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color>.', 4: 'When in <color=#D91414>Finality</color> with <color=#D91414>Eclipse Stance</color> activated, press and hold Basic Attack to cast <color=#D91414>Final Retribution</color>. Upon casting, Luna: Oblivion gathers energy and charges toward the target to pull in nearby enemies and detonate them, dealing Nihil DMG and amplifying this damage at the cost of all <color=#D91414>Eclipse Points</color>. She becomes invincible during so, unable to restore the Dodge Gauge or cast <color=#D91414>Signature - Lunar Downfall</color>.\\n- <color=#D91414>Final Retribution</color> deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Nihil DMG. Every <color=#D91414>10 Eclipse Points</color> will amplify Base DMG by <color=#D91414>4%</color>.', 5: 'When in <color=#D91414>Finality</color>, Luna: Oblivion consumes <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color> continuously but is unable to gain them back through <color=#D91414>Reaping Moon</color>. Gains <color=#D91414>Finality Orbs</color> upon Basic Attacks; restores <color=#D91414>30 Crescent Points</color> and gains 3 <color=#D91414>Finality Orbs</color> upon casting <color=#D91414>Shattering Moon</color>. When the number of <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color> falls to 0, exits <color=#D91414>Finality</color>, and all <color=#D91414>Finality Orbs</color> will disappear.\\n- In <color=#D91414>Finality</color>, expends <color=#D91414>10 Crescent Points</color> per second.\\n- Casts <color=#D91414>Void Dissipation</color> upon pinging a <color=#D91414>Finality Orb</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Nihil DMG, restoring <color=#D91414>12</color> Signature Energy and <color=#D91414>20 Crescent Points</color>. When <color=#D91414>Eclipse Stance</color> is activated, gains additional <color=#D91414>15 Eclipse Points</color>.', 6: "When in <color=#D91414>Main Sequence</color>/<color=#D91414>Finality</color>, Luna: Oblivion's Base DMG Efficiency dealt to Equilibrium Field increases by <color=#D91414>100%</color>."}

BriefDes: {1: 'Increases Nihil DMG of all members by <color=#D91414>10%</color>. Increases ATK of all Annihilators by <color=#D91414>20%</color>.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Increases Nihil DMG of all members by <color=#D91414>10%</color>. Increases ATK of all Annihilators by <color=#D91414>20%</color>.'}

BriefDes: {1: 'Extra DMG Bonus increases. Elemental Resistance Reduction and DMG Increase applied by any member will become universally effective for all elements.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Extra DMG Bonus increases by <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>. Elemental Resistance Reduction and DMG Increase applied by any member will become universally effective for all elements.'}

Title: {1: 'Gains 3 Signal Orbs when entering battle.'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Gains 3 Signal Orbs when entering battle.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Gains 3 Signal Orbs when entering battle.'}

Title: {1: 'Fearless Fighter: <color=#0d70bc>At Least 1 Red Orb + Press and Hold Red Orb + Release Red Orb</color>', 2: 'Detect and Counter: <color=#0d70bc>Take Hit During Fearless Fighter</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: "Starts charging upon pressing and holding a Red Orb, then performs a shield bash upon releasing it, consuming 1/2/3 Red Orb(s) based on the charging time to deal Fire DMG. Additionally, applies <color=#D91414>Scorching Invasion</color> on the target, reducing the target's Fire Resistance.\\n- Fearless Fighter will convert up to <color=#D91414>50 Fortification Points</color> into <color=#D91414>Flash Points</color> for each Red Orb consumed. Bridget: Ardeo can have up to <color=#D91414>300 Flash Points</color>. Each converted <color=#D91414>Fortification Point</color> increases the Base DMG of Fearless Fighter and restores Signature Energy to Ardeo.\\n- <color=#D91414>Scorching Invasion</color> reduces the target's Fire Resistance by <color=#D91414>10%</color> for <color=#D91414>8</color>s.", 2: "Upon taking a hit during charging, automatically performs a counterattack. Bridget: Ardeo leaps up and smashes the ground, spending up to 3 Red Orbs, recovering <color=#D91414>90 Signature Energy</color>, and dealing Fire DMG. Additionally, applies <color=#D91414>Scorching Invasion</color> on the target, reducing the target's Fire Resistance. Gains Super Armor and DMG Reduction during so.\\nIf she takes a hit during the precast of the charge, the counterattack becomes a rapid assault instead. Bridget unleashes a wave of flame forward, dealing additional Fire DMG. Becomes Invincible during so.\\n- Detect and Counter will convert up to <color=#D91414>150 Fortification Points</color> into <color=#D91414>Flash Points</color>. Bridget can have up to <color=#D91414>300 Flash Points</color>. Each converted <color=#D91414>Fortification Point</color> will increase the Base DMG of Detect and Counter.\\n- Detect and Counter is always considered a 3-Ping.\\n- <color=#D91414>Scorching Invasion</color> reduces the target's Fire Resistance by <color=#D91414>10%</color> for <color=#D91414>8</color>s."}
SpecificDes: {1: "Starts charging upon pressing and holding a Red Orb, then performs a shield bash upon releasing it, consuming 1/2/3 Red Orb(s) based on the charging time to deal <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Fire DMG. Additionally, applies <color=#D91414>Scorching Invasion</color> on the target, reducing the target's Fire Resistance.\\n- Fearless Fighter will convert up to <color=#D91414>50 Fortification Points</color> into <color=#D91414>Flash Points</color> for each Red Orb consumed. Bridget: Ardeo can have up to <color=#D91414>300 Flash Points</color>. Each converted <color=#D91414>Fortification Point</color> increases the Base DMG of Fearless Fighter by <color=#D91414>1.5%</color> and restores <color=#D91414>0.6 Signature Energy</color> to Ardeo.\\n- <color=#D91414>Scorching Invasion</color> reduces the target's Fire Resistance by <color=#D91414>10%</color> for <color=#D91414>8</color>s.", 2: "Upon taking a hit during charging, automatically performs a counterattack. Bridget: Ardeo leaps up and smashes the ground, spending up to 3 Red Orbs, recovering <color=#D91414>90 Signature Energy</color>, and dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG. Additionally, applies <color=#D91414>Scorching Invasion</color> on the target, reducing the target's Fire Resistance. Gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>50%</color> DMG Reduction during so.\\nIf she takes a hit during the precast of the charge, the counterattack becomes a rapid assault instead. Bridget unleashes a wave of flame forward, dealing an additional <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Fire DMG. Becomes Invincible during so.\\n- Detect and Counter will convert up to <color=#D91414>150 Fortification Points</color> into <color=#D91414>Flash Points</color>. Bridget can have up to <color=#D91414>300 Flash Points</color>. Each converted <color=#D91414>Fortification Points</color> will increase the Base DMG of Detect and Counter by <color=#D91414>1.5%</color>.\\n- Detect and Counter is always considered a 3-Ping.\\n- <color=#D91414>Scorching Invasion</color> reduces the target's Fire Resistance by <color=#D91414>10%</color> for <color=#D91414>8</color>s."}

Title: {1: 'Whirlwind Kick', 2: 'Combo 1: <color=#0d70bc>Not in Flying Sparks Combo + Tap Yellow Orb</color>', 3: 'Combo 2: <color=#0d70bc>Complete Combo 1 + Tap Yellow Orb</color>', 4: 'Final Combo: <color=#0d70bc>Complete Combo 2 + Tap Yellow Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Flying Sparks Combos are always considered 1-Pings without consuming Yellow Orbs or restoring Signature Energy.\\n- Upon receiving Yellow Orbs, Ardeo will convert them into Red or Blue Orbs randomly.', 2: 'Kicks the target, dealing Fire DMG. Can combo into Whirling Strike - Combo 3.', 3: 'Leaps and unleashes multiple kicks at the target, dealing Fire DMG. Can combo into Whirling Strike - Final Combo.', 4: 'Swings the tonfas upward with great strength and pulls in targets, dealing Fire DMG and activating all available Yellow QTEs. Gains Super Armor and DMG Reduction during so.\\n- Special Effect: Converts all Red Orbs into Blue Orbs.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Flying Sparks Combos are always considered 1-Pings without consuming Yellow Orbs or restoring Signature Energy.\\n- Upon receiving Yellow Orbs, Ardeo will convert them into Red or Blue Orbs randomly.', 2: 'Kicks the target, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG. Can combo into Whirling Strike - Combo 3.', 3: 'Leaps and unleashes multiple kicks at the target, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG. Can combo into Whirling Strike - Final Combo.', 4: 'Swings the tonfas upward with great strength and pulls in targets, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG and activating all available Yellow QTEs. Gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>30%</color> DMG Reduction during so.\\n- Special Effect: Converts all Red Orbs into Blue Orbs.'}

Title: {1: 'Enthalpy Released: <color=#0d70bc>At Least 1 Blue Orb + Energy Shield in Hand + Ping Blue Orb</color>', 2: 'Enthalpy Merged: <color=#0d70bc>Energy Shield on the Field + Tap Blue Orb</color>', 3: 'Prairie Fire: <color=#0d70bc>At Least 8 Blue Orbs (including Enthalpy Released) + Press and Hold Blue Orb</color>'}

SpecificDes: {1: "Dashes forward and pulls in targets, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG. Title: {1: 'Fortify: <color=#0d70bc>Not Moving + Press and Hold Dodge</color>', 2: 'Discharge', 3: 'Effect: Ignition'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Bridget: Ardeo blocks the attack with her Tactical Tonfas. She cannot move or restore Dodge Gauge during so, and Dodge Gauge is consumed based on the DMG prevented and her max HP when hit (Dodge Gauge is not consumed on a precise block).\\n- If there is enough Dodge Gauge, Bridget: Ardeo is immune to the hit upon a successful block. Otherwise, she gains DMG Reduction for the hit instead.\\n- After a successful block, recovers <color=#D91414>100 Fortification Points</color>, and an additional <color=#D91414>50 Fortification Points</color> on a precise block. Bridget: Ardeo can have up to <color=#D91414>300 Fortification Points</color>.\\n- When she enters the battlefield, restores her <color=#D91414>Fortification Points</color> to <color=#D91414>150</color> if it is below <color=#D91414>150</color>.', 2: 'After being thrown, the Energy Shield will stay on the field and gain 6 Durability.\\n- Flying Sparks and Whirling Strike can launch the Energy Shield, recovering <color=#D91414>50 Fortification Points</color> and consuming 1 Durability.\\n- The Energy Shield can trigger Detect and Counter and Fortify, consuming 1 Durability.\\n- Triggers available Matrix upon an Extreme Dodge on the Energy Shield.\\n- When Bridget: Ardeo recovers the Energy Shield, she receives a shield and gains 1 Blue Orb.', 3: 'Combustible: Combustible Charges will add Combustible stacks, up to 20 stacks.\\nIgnition: Ignited units take Ignition DMG based on the Ignition stacks (Tank Skills will not be triggered) every second for 10s.\\n- The subsequent unit will inherit the Combustible/Ignition status of the last unit on the battlefield upon its death.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Bridget: Ardeo blocks the attack with her Tactical Tonfas. She cannot move or restore Dodge Gauge during so, and Dodge Gauge is consumed based on the DMG prevented and her max HP when hit (Dodge Gauge is not consumed on a precise block).\\n- If there is enough Dodge Gauge, Bridget: Ardeo is immune to the hit upon a successful block. Otherwise, she gains <color=#D91414>50%</color> DMG Reduction for the hit instead.\\n- After a successful block, recovers <color=#D91414>100 Fortification Points</color>, and an additional <color=#D91414>50 Fortification Points</color> on a precise block. Bridget can have up to <color=#D91414>300 Fortification Points</color>.\\n- When she enters the battlefield, restores her <color=#D91414>Fortification Points</color> to <color=#D91414>150</color> if it is below <color=#D91414>150</color>.', 2: 'After being thrown, the Energy Shield will stay on the field and gain 6 Durability.\\n- Flying Sparks and Whirling Strike can launch the Energy Shield, recovering <color=#D91414>50 Fortification Points</color> and consuming 1 Durability.\\n- The Energy Shield can trigger Detect and Counter and Fortify, consuming 1 Durability.\\n- Triggers available Matrix upon an Extreme Dodge on the Energy Shield.\\n- When Bridget: Ardeo recovers the Energy Shield, she receives a shield equal to <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> of her Max HP and gains 1 Blue Orb.', 3: 'Combustible: Every <color=#D91414>250</color> Combustible Charges will add <color=#D91414>1</color> Combustible stack, up to 20 stacks.\\nIgnition: Ignited units take Ignition DMG equal to <color=#D91414>Ignition stacks x30%</color> (Tank Skills will not be triggered) every second for 10s.\\n- The subsequent unit will inherit the Combustible/Ignition status of the last unit on the battlefield upon its death.'}

SpecificDes: {1: 'Quickly plays the chords to deal Physical DMG. When cast in the Matrix, instantly gains 2 White Orbs and triggers a 3-Ping.\\n- Deals a total of <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG.\\n- Once cast, gains <color=#D91414>15 Sonority</color> and <color=#D91414>5 Sharp Reserve</color>.\\n- When cast in the Matrix, gains <color=#D91414>45 Sonority</color> and <color=#D91414>15 Sharp Reserve</color>.'}

If the target has a <color=#D91414>Dream Mark</color>, consumes one <color=#D91414>Dream Mark</color> to guarantee a critical hit and increase Base DMG by <color=#D91414>100%</color>.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG.', 2: 'After a series of dashes, unleashes a final blow, pulling nearby enemies together and dealing Physical DMG. A <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> is triggered during this attack. Once cast, quits <color=#D91414>Lunartone Field</color>.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG.'}

Title: {1: 'Eradication: <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: "Pulls nearby enemies together and deals Physical DMG. Inflicts <color=#D91414>Piercing Blow</color> that reduces the target's Physical Defense and <color=#D91414>Penetrating Pivot</color> that reduces the target's Physical Resistance."}
SpecificDes: {1: "Pulls nearby enemies together and deals Physical DMG. Inflicts <color=#D91414>Piercing Blow</color> that reduces the target's Physical Defense and <color=#D91414>Penetrating Pivot</color> that reduces the target's Physical Resistance.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG.\\n- <color=#D91414>Piercing Blow</color> reduces the target's Physical Defense by <color=#D91414>20%</color> for <color=#D91414>8</color>s.\\n- <color=#D91414>Penetrating Pivot</color> reduces the target's Physical Resistance by <color=#D91414>10%</color> for <color=#D91414>8</color>s."}

Title: {1: 'Ethereal Elegance', 2: 'Open String: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Harmonic Orbs</color>', 3: 'Jade Bloom: <color=#0d70bc>Attacker Mode + 30 Sonority + Tap Signature</color>', 4: 'Ethereal Symphony: <color=#0d70bc>Lunartone Field + Jade Bloom: Full</color>', 5: 'Ringing: <color=#0d70bc>Attacker Mode + Dream Mark + Tap Basic Attack</color>', 6: 'Effect: Ultima Slash'}
BriefDes: {1: 'When in <color=#D91414>Chord Mode</color>, all Signal Orbs transform into White Orbs. When in <color=#D91414>Attacker Mode</color>, all Signal Orbs transform into Blue Orbs. Gains a <color=#D91414>30%</color> DMG Reduction while Hanying: Solacetune has a shield.', 2: 'Gains the <color=#D91414>Harmonic Orb</color> in <color=#D91414>Chord Mode</color> after pinging 6 White Orbs. While a <color=#D91414>Harmonic Orb</color> exists, Red and Yellow Orbs are temporarily hidden. Upon pinging the <color=#D91414>Harmonic Orb</color>, the <color=#D91414>Lunartone Field</color> will unfold. While the <color=#D91414>Lunartone Field</color> exists, it will weaken enemy units within the field and strengthen friendly units. When <color=#D91414>Hanying: Solacetune</color> leaves or casts <color=#D91414>Signature - Moon Chill</color>, exits the <color=#D91414>Lunartone Field</color>.', 3: 'Basic Attack and Signal Orb Skill generate <color=#D91414>Sonority</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#D91414>120 points</color>. In <color=#D91414>Attacker Mode</color>, tapping Signature button consumes <color=#D91414>30 Sonority</color> to cast <color=#D91414>Jade Bloom</color>, dealing Physical DMG to the target. A successful hit triggers <color=#D91414>Ultima Slash</color>. While casting Jade Bloom, gains Super Armor and can dodge attacks. Consecutive casting of Jade Bloom increase its Base DMG by <color=#D91414>50%</color> each time, up to a maximum of <color=#D91414>2</color> stacks. Once the maximum damage is reached, subsequent casting will maintain this highest damage. Each casting grants <color=#D91414>5</color> Signature Energy. Consecutive casting doubles the amount of Signature Energy gained, up to a maximum of <color=#D91414>40</color> Energy per casting.', 4: 'Within the <color=#D91414>Lunartone Field</color>, activating <color=#D91414>Jade Bloom: Full</color> will trigger <color=#D91414>Ethereal Symphony</color>. This will send out shockwaves, drawing nearby enemies, dealing Ultima Slash DMG and applying 1 stack of <color=#D91414>Dream Mark</color> to each target. This mark can stack up to 3 times on a single target. At the same time, gains 1 stack of <color=#D91414>Frost on Bamboo</color>, which can stack up to 3 times. By dodging <color=#D91414>Ethereal Symphony</color>, Hanying: Solacetune enters the Matrix.', 5: 'Basic Attacks against enemies with the <color=#D91414>Dream Mark</color> will cast <color=#D91414>Ringing</color>. Once cast, Super Armor is activated. On hit, all <color=#D91414>Dream Mark</color> stacks on the target and all stacks of inherent <color=#D91414>Frost on Bamboo</color> are consumed. The attack deals Ultima Slash DMG based on the number of <color=#D91414>Dream Mark</color> stacks and restores Signal Orbs based on the number of <color=#D91414>Frost on Bamboo</color> stacks.', 6: 'Certain skills build up <color=#D91414>Sharp Reserve</color>. <color=#D91414>Sharp Reserve</color> can be passed on to the next character affected by Ultima Slash effect, up to a maximum of <color=#D91414>999</color> points.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'When in <color=#D91414>Chord Mode</color>, all Signal Orbs transform into White Orbs. When in <color=#D91414>Attacker Mode</color>, all Signal Orbs transform into Blue Orbs. Gains a <color=#D91414>30%</color> DMG Reduction while Hanying: Solacetune has a shield.', 2: 'Gains the <color=#D91414>Harmonic Orb</color> in <color=#D91414>Chord Mode</color> after pinging 6 White Orbs. While a <color=#D91414>Harmonic Orb</color> exists, Red and Yellow Orbs are temporarily hidden. Upon pinging the <color=#D91414>Harmonic Orb</color>, the <color=#D91414>Lunartone Field</color> will unfold. While the <color=#D91414>Lunartone Field</color> exists, it will weaken enemy units within the field and strengthen friendly units. When <color=#D91414>Hanying: Solacetune</color> leaves or casts <color=#D91414>Signature - Moon Chill</color>, exits the <color=#D91414>Lunartone Field</color>.\\n- While Lunartone Field is unfolding, Super Armor is activated and applies 1 stack of <color=#D91414>Dream Mark</color> to nearby enemies, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>20</color> Signature Energy and <color=#D91414>55 Sharp Reserve</color>.\\n- Inflicts <color=#D91414>Piercing Blow</color> on enemies within the field every second, reducing their Physical Defense by <color=#D91414>20%</color> for <color=#D91414>8</color>s; inflicts <color=#D91414>Penetrating Pivot</color>, reducing their Physical Resistance by <color=#D91414>10%</color> for <color=#D91414>8</color>s. The duration resets every time the effect is triggered again.\\n- Friendly units within the field gain the <color=#D91414>Lamplight & Moonlight</color> effect and gain 1 stack of <color=#D91414>Returning Clouds</color> effect every second.\\n- <color=#D91414>Lamplight & Moonlight</color>: Increases <color=#D91414>Sharp Reserve accumulation speed by 50%</color> for <color=#D91414>8</color>s. The duration resets every time the effect is triggered again.\\n- <color=#D91414>Returning Clouds</color>: Gains a shield equal to 5% of maximum HP of Hanying: Solacetune. Stacks up to 4 times. Each stack lasts for <color=#D91414>3</color>s. The duration resets every time the effect is triggered again.', 3: 'Basic Attack and Signal Orb Skill generate <color=#D91414>Sonority</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#D91414>120 points</color>. In <color=#D91414>Attacker Mode</color>, tapping Signature button consumes <color=#D91414>30 Sonority</color> to cast <color=#D91414>Jade Bloom</color>, dealing Physical DMG to the target. A successful hit triggers <color=#D91414>Ultima Slash</color>. While casting Jade Bloom, gains Super Armor and can dodge attacks. Consecutive casting of Jade Bloom increases its Base DMG by <color=#D91414>50%</color> each time, up to a maximum of <color=#D91414>2</color> stacks. Once the maximum damage is reached, subsequent casting will maintain this highest damage. Each casting grants <color=#D91414>5</color> Signature Energy. Consecutive casting doubles the amount of Signature Energy gained, up to a maximum of <color=#D91414>40</color> Energy per casting.\\n- <color=#D91414>Jade Bloom</color> deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG. A successful hit <color=#D91414>triggers Ultima Slash</color>.\\n- <color=#D91414>Jade Bloom: Full</color>: When <color=#D91414>Sonority</color> reaches its maximum, cast to trigger one <color=#D91414>Phoenix Tail Dragon Fragrance</color>.\\n- <color=#D91414>Jade Bloom: Play</color>: After casting <color=#D91414>the fourth Basic Attack/Blue 3-Ping Orbs</color>, a <color=#D91414>Chime Mark</color> will briefly appear. During this time, casting <color=#D91414>Jade Bloom</color> will cast a clone to attack together, dealing <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG.', 4: 'Within the <color=#D91414>Lunartone Field</color>, activating <color=#D91414>Jade Bloom: Full</color> will trigger <color=#D91414>Ethereal Symphony</color>. This will send out shockwaves, drawing nearby enemies, dealing Ultima Slash DMG and applying 1 stack of <color=#D91414>Dream Mark</color> to each target. This mark can stack up to 3 times on a single target. At the same time, gains 1 stack of <color=#D91414>Frost on Bamboo</color>, which can stack up to 3 times. By dodging <color=#D91414>Ethereal Symphony</color>, Hanying: Solacetune enters the Matrix.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG.', 5: 'Basic Attacks against enemies with the <color=#D91414>Dream Mark</color> will cast <color=#D91414>Ringing</color>. Once cast, Super Armor is activated. On hit, all <color=#D91414>Dream Mark</color> stacks on the target and all stacks of inherent <color=#D91414>Frost on Bamboo</color> are consumed. The attack deals Ultima Slash DMG based on the number of <color=#D91414>Dream Mark</color> stacks and restores Signal Orbs based on the number of <color=#D91414>Frost on Bamboo</color> stacks.\\n- <color=#D91414>Ringing</color> deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG. A successful hit <color=#D91414>triggers Ultima Slash</color>.\\n- The Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Ringing</color> increases by <color=#D91414>0%/150%/300%</color> based on the number of consumed <color=#D91414>Dream Mark</color> stacks.\\n- Recover <color=#D91414>2/3/4</color> Signal Orbs based on the number of consumed <color=#D91414>Frost on Bamboo</color> stacks.', 6: 'Certain skills build up <color=#D91414>Sharp Reserve</color>. <color=#D91414>Sharp Reserve</color> can be passed on to the next character affected by Ultima Slash effect, up to a maximum of <color=#D91414>999</color> points.\\n- When <color=#D91414>Sharp Reserve</color> reaches <color=#D91414>100</color> points, the next skill with a <color=#D91414>Ultima Slash</color> effect that hits an enemy will consume <color=#D91414>100 points of Sharp Reserve</color> to trigger a <color=#D91414>Ultima Slash</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>400%</color> Ultima Slash DMG.\\n- Gains 1 point of <color=#D91414>Truewill</color> each time it triggers, up to a maximum of <color=#D91414>90</color> points.'}

BriefDes: {1: 'Increases Physical DMG of all members by <color=#D91414>10%</color>. Increases DMG of all Tank Omniframes in the team by <color=#D91414>5%</color>.'}
