Title: {1: 'Wandering Starburst: <color=#0d70bc>Sword Shield in Hand + Tap Basic Attack</color>', 2: 'Thunder Vortex: <color=#0d70bc>Shield Axe in Hand + Tap Basic Attack</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Performs alternating attacks with the <color=#D91414>Sword Shield</color>, dealing Lightning DMG.', 2: 'Attacks with the <color=#D91414>Shield Axe</color>, dealing Lightning DMG. If there are sufficient <color=#D91414>Starlight Points</color>, consuming them during the attack will grant <color=#D91414>Overload</color> and release extra <color=#D91414>Flowing Light</color>, dealing Lightning DMG while granting Super Armor and DMG Reduction.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Perform alternating attacks with the <color=#D91414>Sword Shield</color>, dealing a total of <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>{0}%</color></color> Lightning DMG.', 2: 'Attacks with the <color=#D91414>Shield Axe</color>, dealing Lightning DMG. If there are sufficient <color=#D91414>Starlight Points</color>, consuming them during the attack will grant <color=#D91414>Overload</color>, dealing Lightning DMG while granting Super Armor and DMG Reduction.\\n- Deals a total of <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG.\\n- If there are sufficient <color=#D91414>Starlight Points</color>, extra <color=#D91414>Flowing Light</color> will be released. Each attack consumes <color=#D91414>10/25/30/35</color> <color=#D91414>Starlight Points</color>, granting <color=#D91414>30/75/90/105</color> <color=#D91414>Overload</color> and <color=#D91414>3/7/9/11</color> Signature Energy, and deals an extra <color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{3}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{4}%</color> Lightning DMG while granting Super Armor and <color=#D91414>60%</color> DMG Reduction. The maximum <color=#D91414>Overload</color> is <color=#D91414>300</color> points.'}

Title: {1: 'Cosmic Starstrike: <color=#0d70bc>80 Signature Energy + Sword Shield in Hand + Tap Signature</color>', 2: 'Starshard Slash: <color=#0d70bc>80 Signature Energy + Shield Axe in Hand + Tap Signature</color>', 3: 'Thunderfire Domain'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Combine the weapon into a Shield Axe and perform a slash on enemies, dealing Lightning DMG. During the attack, <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> is triggered, and the weapon automatically switches back to the Sword Shield after the attack. If the <color=#D91414>Field Ultralimit</color> effect is active when casting this skill, its duration is reset.', 2: 'Attacks enemies with the Shield Axe, dealing Lightning DMG. During the attack, <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> is triggered, and the weapon automatically switches back to the Sword Shield after the attack. If the <color=#D91414>Field Ultralimit</color> effect is active when casting this skill, its duration is reset.', 3: 'After casting <color=#D91414>Cosmic Starstrike</color> or <color=#D91414>Starshard Slash</color>, leaves the weapon on the battlefield, dealing continuous damage and weakening enemies.'}
SpecificDes: {1: "Combines the weapon into a Shield Axe and performs a slash on enemies, dealing damage. During the attack, <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> is triggered, and the weapon automatically switches back to the Sword Shield after the attack. If the <color=#D91414>Field Ultralimit</color> effect is active when casting this skill, its duration is refreshed.\\n- Deals a total of <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG.\\n- If the <color=#D91414>Blazing Mark</color> is active when casting this skill, the <color=#D91414>Blazing Mark</color> will be cleared, and <color=#D91414>Cosmic Starstrike: Burn</color> will be cast instead. Turns <color=#D91414>Combustible state</color> into <color=#D91414>Ignition state</color> of equal stacks, dealing <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Ignition DMG. Gains the <color=#D91414>Ember Mark</color> for <color=#D91414>15</color>s.\\n- If the <color=#D91414>Ember Mark</color> is active upon leaving the battle, the mark's duration is refreshed to 15s. Duration resets every time the effect is triggered.", 2: 'Attack enemies with the Shield Axe, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG. During the attack, <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> is triggered, and the weapon automatically switches back to the Sword Shield after the attack. If the <color=#D91414>Field Ultralimit</color> effect is active when casting this skill, its duration is reset.', 3: 'After casting <color=#D91414>Cosmic Starstrike</color> or <color=#D91414>Starshard Slash</color>, leaves the weapon on the battlefield, dealing continuous damage and weakening enemies.\\n- The domain deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG per second for <color=#D91414>12</color>s. Duration resets every time it is triggered.\\n- If the <color=#D91414>Blazing Mark</color> is active when casting this skill, the domain will instead deal <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Ignition DMG per second for <color=#D91414>12</color>s. Duration resets every time it is triggered.'}

Title: {1: 'Orbital Interference: <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Deals damage and weakens enemies.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Deals damage and weakens enemies.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG upon the first hit and applies a <color=#D91414>Turbulence Interference</color> effect that reduces Lightning Resistance by <color=#D91414>25%</color> for <color=#D91414>8</color>s. Deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Lightning DMG per second for the following 8s.\\n- If the <color=#D91414>Ember Mark</color> is active when casting this skill, it will instead deal <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Ignition DMG upon the first hit and apply a <color=#D91414>Scorching Invasion</color> effect that reduces Fire Resistance by <color=#D91414>25%</color> for <color=#D91414>8</color>s. Deals <color=#D91414>{3}%</color> Ignition DMG per second for the following 8s.'}

Title: {1: 'Meteoric Doom: <color=#0d70bc>Shield Axe in Hand + At Least 100 points of Overload or Starlight + Press and Hold Basic Attack</color>', 2: 'Blazing Rift: <color=#0d70bc>During Inferno Cyclone + Release Yellow Orb or Starlight Points are depleted During Inferno Cyclone</color>', 3: 'Structural Meltdown', 4: 'Hyper Mecha', 5: 'Effect: Ignition'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Consumes all <color=#D91414>Overload</color> and <color=#D91414>Starlight Points</color> to cast <color=#D91414>Meteoric Doom</color>, pulling nearby enemies and triggering Matrix if it is not on cooldown. Becomes <color=#D91414>Invincible</color> while casting and it is not allowed to cast <color=#D91414>Decisive Detonation!</color>. Deals Lightning DMG and grants Signature Energy.', 2: 'Immediately switches the weapon to the <color=#D91414>Sword Shield</color>, dealing Ignition DMG and triggering Matrix if it is not on cooldown. Gains Super Armor and DMG Reduction while this skill is cast. Upon first casting, gains an enhanced effect.', 3: 'When Startrail deals damage using the Shield Axe, enemies will be weakened.', 4: 'When Startrail switches to the Shield Axe, gains a Shield. The Shield is removed when switching back to the Sword Shield. Upon entering battle each time, gains a Signal Orb.', 5: 'Combustible: Combustible Charges will add Combustible stacks, up to 20 stacks.\\nIgnition: Ignited units take Ignition DMG based on the Ignition stacks (Tank Skills will not be triggered) every second for 10s.\\n- The subsequent unit will inherit the Combustible/Ignition status of the last unit on the battlefield upon its death.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Consumes all <color=#D91414>Overload</color> and <color=#D91414>Starlight Points</color> to cast <color=#D91414>Meteoric Doom</color>, pulling nearby enemies and triggering Matrix if it is not on cooldown. Becomes <color=#D91414>Invincible</color> while casting and it is not allowed to cast <color=#D91414>Decisive Detonation!</color>. Deals Lightning DMG and grants Signature Energy.\\n- Deals a total of <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG and gains <color=#D91414>30</color> Signature Energy.\\n- Consumes all <color=#D91414>Starlight Points</color> when this skill is cast, converting them into an equal amount of <color=#D91414>Overload</color>.\\n- For every <color=#D91414>15</color> points of <color=#D91414>Overload</color> consumed, the Base DMG of this <color=#D91414>Meteoric Doom</color> increases by <color=#D91414>3%</color>.', 2: 'Immediately switches the weapon to the <color=#D91414>Sword Shield</color>, dealing Ignition DMG and triggering Matrix if it is not on cooldown. Gains Super Armor and DMG Reduction while this skill is cast. Upon first casting, gains an enhanced effect.\\n- Deals a total of <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ignition DMG. Gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>80%</color> DMG Reduction while this skill is cast.\\n- Upon first casting, <color=#D91414>Blazing Rift</color> is enhanced, granting <color=#D91414>12</color> Signature Energy. Additionally, for each <color=#D91414>5</color> <color=#D91414>Starlight Points</color> consumed by <color=#D91414>Inferno Cyclone</color>, the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Blazing Rift</color> increases by <color=#D91414>10%</color>. After casting <color=#D91414>Decisive Detonation!</color>, the next <color=#D91414>Blazing Rift</color> will be granted an enhanced effect again.', 3: 'When Startrail deals damage using the <color=#D91414>Shield Axe</color>, enemies will be weakened.\\n- Applies a <color=#D91414>Turbulence Interference</color> effect to enemies, reducing their Lightning Resistance by <color=#D91414>25%</color> for <color=#D91414>2</color>s.\\n- If a <color=#D91414>Blazing Mark</color> is active when dealing damage, it will instead apply a <color=#D91414>Scorching Invasion</color> effect to enemies, reducing their Fire Resistance by <color=#D91414>25%</color> for <color=#D91414>2</color>s.', 4: 'When Startrail switches to the Shield Axe, gains a Shield equal to <color=#D91414>30%</color> of the maximum HP. The Shield is removed when switching back to the Sword Shield. Upon entering battle each time, gains a Signal Orb.', 5: 'Combustible: Every <color=#D91414>250</color> Combustible Charges will add <color=#D91414>1</color> Combustible stack, up to 20 stacks.\\nIgnition: Ignited units take Ignition DMG equal to <color=#D91414>Ignition stacks x30%</color> (Tank Skills will not be triggered) every second for 10s.\\n- The subsequent unit will inherit the Combustible/Ignition status of the last unit on the battlefield upon its death.'}

Title: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.1: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at S5 Rank</color></color>', 2: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.2: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SS Rank</color></color>'}
BriefDes: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Switching to the Shield Axe and casting Meteoric Doom, Blazing Rift, Cosmic Starstrike, or Starshard Slash will activate all available QTEs.</color>', 2: '<color=#99a3b1>Automatically uses a QTE when exiting the battle. After casting Red/Blue Orb Combo 2, tapping the Red/Blue Orb again will directly cast the corresponding Combo 2. Base DMG increases for Aetherstrike, Red/Blue Orb Combo 2, and Flowing Light. Base DMG of Inferno Cyclone increases. When casting Meteoric Doom, gains extra Overload and the Base DMG of that specific cast of Meteoric Doom increases. Gains Signature Energy the first time Shield Axe is switched on upon entering the battle.</color>'}
SpecificDes: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Switching to the Shield Axe and casting Meteoric Doom, Blazing Rift, Cosmic Starstrike, or Starshard Slash will activate all available QTEs.</color>', 2: '<color=#99a3b1>Automatically uses a QTE when exiting the battle. After casting Red/Blue Orb Combo 2, tapping on the Red/Blue Orb again will directly cast the corresponding Combo 2. Aetherstrike and Red/Blue Orb Combo 2 Base DMG increase by 60%. Flowing Light Base DMG increases by 100%. Inferno Cyclone Base DMG increases by 110%. If Meteoric Doom is cast and consumes 100 points of Starlight, gains 50 extra points of Overload. This instance of Meteoric Doom increases its Base DMG by 50%. Gains 15 Signature Energy the first time Shield Axe is switched on upon entering the battle.</color>'}

Title: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.1: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SS3 Rank</color></color>', 2: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.2: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SSS Rank</color></color>'}
BriefDes: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Resistance Reduction of Turbulence Interference and Scorching Invasion increases. Base DMG of Meteoric Doom and Blazing Rift increases. Inferno Cyclone applies Combustible Charge faster.</color>', 2: '<color=#99a3b1>Resistance Reduction of Turbulence Interference and Scorching Invasion increases. Consuming Overload with Meteoric Doom increases the Base DMG of the next Starshard Slash. The number of Combustible stacks on the target increases the Base DMG of Cosmic Starstrike: Burn. The first time Decisive Detonation! is cast in a battle, gains extra Starlight Points. The first time the phase 4 of Flowing Light is cast, gains extra Signature Energy. The cooldown for switching between characters is reduced by 3s for all characters in the team. This effect does not stack with other effects of the same type.</color>'}
SpecificDes: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Resistance Reduction of Turbulence Interference and Scorching Invasion increases by 10%. Base DMG of Meteoric Doom increases by 100%, and Base DMG of Blazing Rift increases by 60%. Inferno Cyclone applies Combustible Charge 100% faster.</color>', 2: '<color=#99a3b1>Resistance Reduction of Turbulence Interference and Scorching Invasion increases by 10%. Each time Meteoric Doom consumes 75 points of Overload, the next casting of Starshard Slash increases its Base DMG by 25%. Stacks are cleared when separating the Shield Axe. For each 5 stacks of Combustible on the target, casting Cosmic Starstrike: Burn increases its Base DMG by 16%. Upon entering the battle, casting Decisive Detonation! for the first time grants 100 points of Starlight. The phase 4 of the first Flowing Light cast grants 16 extra points of Signature Energy. Cooldown time for switching between all characters in the team reduces by 3s. This effect does not stack with other effects of the same type.</color>'}

Triggers a special ability based on <color=#D91414>Observation Notes</color> during the process.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Hits the target with the knee, dealing Nihil DMG. Gains <color=#D91414>Phantom Points</color> and <color=#D91414>Collapse Points</color> after casting. Triggers a special ability based on <color=#D91414>Observation Notes</color> during the process.\\n- After casting, gains <color=#D91414>10/20/30 Phantom Points</color> and <color=#D91414>15/30/45 Collapse Points</color> based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Nihil DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- Gains Super Armor during the process.', 2: 'Stomps the target, dealing Nihil DMG. Gains <color=#D91414>Phantom Points</color> and <color=#D91414>Collapse Points</color> after casting and can immediately cast the 4th hit of <color=#D91414>Phantom Annihilation</color>. Triggers a special ability based on <color=#D91414>Observation Notes</color> during the process.\\n- After casting, gains <color=#D91414>10/20/30 Phantom Points</color> and <color=#D91414>15/30/45 Collapse Points</color> based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Nihil DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- Gains Super Armor during the process.'}

Title: {1: 'Ethereal Mirage: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Yellow Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Ishmael: Parhelion has only 1 Yellow Orb always fixed on the far right. Tap to make Ishmael to cast <color=#D91414>Forbidden Realm</color>, dealing Nihil DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: "Ishmael: Parhelion has only 1 Yellow Orb always fixed on the far right. Tap to cast <color=#D91414>Forbidden Realm</color>, dealing Nihil DMG.\\n- Gains <color=#D91414>12 Signature Energy</color> after casting.\\n- Casting the skill will be regarded as a 3-Ping and deal <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Nihil DMG. \\n- <color=#D91414>Forbidden Realm</color> lasts <color=#D91414>6s</color>. When there is <color=#D91414>Forbidden Realm</color>, <color=#D91414>Phantom Annihilation's</color> Base DMG increases by <color=#D91414>100%</color>.\\n- No Yellow Orb will be consumed after casting, but the skill will enter a <color=#D91414>20-second</color> cooldown."}

Title: {1: 'Circling Stars: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Blue Orb</color>', 2: 'Core Blast: <color=#0d70bc>During Circling Stars + Tap Blue Orb</color>', 3: 'Cosmic Afterglow: <color=#0d70bc>Wanderer Form + Press and Hold Dodge</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Summons twin-star projection to attack the target, dealing Nihil DMG. Gains <color=#D91414>Collapse Points</color> after casting.', 2: 'Detonates the star projection to deal Nihil DMG. Gains <color=#D91414>Collapse Points</color> after casting.', 3: 'Gathers energy and fires at the target, dealing Nihil DMG. After casting, gains <color=#D91414>Collapse Points</color> based on the Blue Orbs consumed.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Summons twin-star projection to attack the target, dealing Nihil DMG. Gains <color=#D91414>Collapse Points</color> after casting.\\n- After casting, gains <color=#D91414>15/30/45 Collapse Points</color> based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Nihil DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.', 2: 'Detonates the star projection to deal Nihil DMG. Gains <color=#D91414>Collapse Points</color> after casting.\\n- After casting, gains <color=#D91414>15/30/45 Collapse Points</color> based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Nihil DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.', 3: 'Gathers energy and fires at the target, dealing Nihil DMG. After casting, gains <color=#D91414>Collapse Points</color> based on the Blue Orbs consumed.\\n- Gains <color=#D91414>15 Collapse Points</color> per Blue Orb consumed. Max 6 Blue Orbs can be consumed.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Nihil DMG.'}

Title: {1: 'Nebula Flow: <color=#0d70bc>Wanderer Form + Tap Basic Attack</color>', 2: 'Dazzling Starfall: <color=#0d70bc>Dominator Form + Tap Basic Attack</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Summons substance projection to attack the target, dealing Nihil DMG. When there is <color=#D91414>Forbidden Realm</color>, Ishmael can follow up with 4 Basic Attacks.', 2: 'Summons the star projection to attack the target, dealing Nihil DMG. Gains <color=#D91414>Phantom Points</color> after casting.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Summons substance projection to attack the target, dealing Nihil DMG. When there is <color=#D91414>Forbidden Realm</color>, Ishmael can follow up with 4 Basic Attacks.\\n- Basic Attacks deal <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Nihil DMG in total.\\n- When there is <color=#D91414>Forbidden Realm</color>, the follow-up Basic Attacks deal <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Nihil DMG in total.', 2: 'Summons the star projection to attack the target, dealing Nihil DMG after casting. Gains <color=#D91414>Phantom Points</color> after casting.\\n- Gains <color=#D91414>10/20/30/30/60 Phantom Points</color> after casting.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Nihil DMG in total.\\n- Tap Red Orb after the 4th hit of Basic Attack to cast <color=#D91414>Broken Order </color>.'}

Title: {1: 'Prime Entity: <color=#0d70bc>30 Signature Energy + Tap Signature</color>', 2: 'Silent Punishment: <color=#0d70bc>90 Signature Energy + Tap Signature</color>', 3: 'Hyperspace Realm'}
BriefDes: {1: "Casts Signature and connects to her high-dimensional self, entering the <color=#D91414>Dominator Form</color> and dealing Nihil DMG. Meanwhile, triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color>. If <color=#D91414>Field Ultralimit</color> is active while casting, refreshes the duration. After casting, triggers Matrix if it's not on cooldown and a special ability based on <color=#D91414>Observation Notes</color>, leaving a <color=#D91414>Hyperspace Realm</color> on the battlefield.", 2: 'Shatters the reality and reforms the universe, dealing Nihil DMG and exiting the <color=#D91414>Dominator Form</color>. Meanwhile, triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color>. Leaves a <color=#D91414>Hyperspace Realm</color> on the battlefield after casting.', 3: 'Leaves a <color=#D91414>Hyperspace Realm</color> on the battlefield after casting <color=#D91414>Signature - Prime Entity</color> or <color=#D91414>Signature - Silent Punishment</color>, dealing Nihil DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: "Casts Signature and connects to her high-dimensional self, entering the <color=#D91414>Dominator Form</color> and dealing Nihil DMG. Meanwhile, triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color>. If <color=#D91414>Field Ultralimit</color> is active while casting, refreshes the duration. After casting, triggers Matrix if it's not on cooldown and a special ability based on <color=#D91414>Observation Notes</color>, leaving a <color=#D91414>Hyperspace Realm</color> on the battlefield.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Nihil DMG.\\n- Causes different effects based on <color=#D91414>Observation Notes</color>.", 2: 'Shatters the reality and reforms the universe, dealing Nihil DMG and exiting the <color=#D91414>Dominator Form</color>. Meanwhile, triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color>. Leaves a <color=#D91414>Hyperspace Realm</color> on the battlefield after casting.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Nihil DMG.', 3: 'Leaves a <color=#D91414>Hyperspace Realm</color> on the battlefield after casting <color=#D91414>Signature - Prime Entity</color> or <color=#D91414>Signature - Silent Punishment</color>, dealing Nihil DMG.\\n- <color=#D91414>Hyperspace Realm</color> deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Nihil DMG to enemies in it for <color=#D91414>12s</color>. Duration resets every time it is triggered.'}

Title: {1: 'QTE: <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Kicks the Keystaff to hit the target, dealing Nihil DMG. After casting, triggers a special ability based on <color=#D91414>Observation Notes</color>.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Kicks the Keystaff to hit the target, dealing Nihil DMG. After casting, triggers a special ability based on <color=#D91414>Observation Notes</color>.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Nihil DMG.\\n- Causes different effects based on <color=#D91414>Observation Notes</color>.'}

Title: {1: 'Observation Notes', 2: 'Parhelion Arc', 3: 'Mirage Phantom: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Dodge Repeatedly</color>', 4: 'Dimensional Collapse <color=#0d70bc>Dominator Form + Have the Collapse Mark + Press and Hold Dodge</color>', 5: 'Agitated Beacon'}
BriefDes: {1: "Ishmael: Parhelion determines her ability based on <color=#D91414>Observation Notes</color>. <color=#D91414>Observation Notes'</color> ability will <color=#D91414>be enhanced along with the appearance of other Constructs</color>.", 2: "When Ishmael: Parhelion is in the <color=#D91414>Wanderer Form</color>, all Signal Orbs will turn into Blue Orbs. When she's in the <color=#D91414>Dominator Form</color>, all Signal Orbs will become Red Orbs.", 3: 'Casts projection to deal Nihil DMG when dodging. Tap Dodge repeatedly to cast <color=#D91414>Phantom Orbit</color>. When in the <color=#D91414>Dominator Form</color>, casts <color=#D91414>Phantom Annihilation</color> at the cost of <color=#D91414>30 Phantom Points</color>, dealing Nihil DMG. <color=#D91414>Phantom Annihilation</color> will deal more damage, restore <color=#D91414>Signature Energy</color>, and not consume Dodge Gauge value. Gains the <color=#D91414>Collapse Mark</color> after casting the 5th hit of <color=#D91414>Phantom Annihilation</color>.', 4: "Gathers energy and shatters the target's space. Pulls in nearby enemy units and deals Nihil DMG, gaining Signature Energy. <color=#D91414>Collapse Points</color> can amplify the damage.", 5: "When in the <color=#D91414>Dominator Form</color>, Ishmael: Parhelion's Base DMG Efficiency dealt to Equilibrium Field increases by <color=#D91414>100%</color>."}
SpecificDes: {1: "Ishmael: Parhelion determines her ability based on <color=#D91414>Observation Notes</color>. <color=#D91414>Observation Notes'</color> ability will <color=#D91414>be enhanced along with the appearance of other Constructs</color>.\\n- When there's only one elemental Tank on team, Ishmael: Parhelion will become the Amplifier of that element.\\n- When there's only one elemental Support/Amplifier, she will become the Tank of that element.", 2: "When Ishmael: Parhelion is in the <color=#D91414>Wanderer Form</color>, all Signal Orbs will turn into Blue Orbs. When she's in the <color=#D91414>Dominator Form</color>, all Signal Orbs will become Red Orbs.", 3: 'Casts projection to deal Nihil DMG when dodging. Tap Dodge repeatedly to cast <color=#D91414>Phantom Orbit</color>. When in the <color=#D91414>Dominator Form</color>, casts <color=#D91414>Phantom Annihilation</color> at the cost of <color=#D91414>30 Phantom Points</color>, dealing Nihil DMG. <color=#D91414>Phantom Annihilation</color> will deal more damage, restore <color=#D91414>Signature Energy</color>, and not consume Dodge Gauge value. Gains the <color=#D91414>Collapse Mark</color> after casting the 5th hit of <color=#D91414>Phantom Annihilation</color>.\\n- Casts projection to deal <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Nihil DMG when dodging.\\n- <color=#D91414>Phantom Points</color> are capped at <color=#D91414>150</color>.\\n- Casting <color=#D91414>Phantom Orbit</color> in the <color=#D91414>Wanderer Form</color> will deal <color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{3}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{4}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{5}%</color> Nihil DMG.\\n- Casting <color=#D91414>Phantom Orbit</color> in the <color=#D91414>Dominator Form</color> will pull in nearby enemy units and deal <color=#D91414>{6}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{7}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{8}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{9}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{10}%</color> Nihil DMG.\\n- Casting <color=#D91414>Phantom Annihilation</color> in the <color=#D91414>Dominator Form</color> will pull in nearby enemy units, deal <color=#D91414>{11}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{12}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{13}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{14}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{15}%</color> Nihil DMG, and restore <color=#D91414>12 Signature Energy</color>.\\n- Becomes Invincible when casting <color=#D91414>Phantom Annihilation</color>.\\n- If there are enough Dodge Gauge value, becomes Invincible when casting <color=#D91414>Phantom Orbit</color>. Otherwise, gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>50%</color> DMG Reduction when casting <color=#D91414>Phantom Orbit</color>.', 4: "Gathers energy and shatters the target's space. Pulls in nearby enemy units and deals Nihil DMG, gaining Signature Energy. <color=#D91414>Collapse Points</color> can amplify the damage.\\n- <color=#D91414>Collapse Points</color> are capped at <color=#D91414>360</color>. Each <color=#D91414>Collapse Point</color> amplifies the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Dimensional Collapse by 0.5% </color>.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Nihil DMG.\\n- Becomes Invincible and cannot cast <color=#D91414>Signature - Silent Punishment</color> during the process.\\n- Gains <color=#D91414>15 Signature Energy</color> after casting.", 5: "When in the <color=#D91414>Dominator Form</color>, Ishmael: Parhelion's Base DMG Efficiency dealt to Equilibrium Field increases by <color=#D91414>100%</color>."}

BriefDes: {1: 'Increases Nihil DMG of all members by <color=#D91414>10%</color>. Increases DMG of all Observers in the team by <color=#D91414>10%</color>.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Increases Nihil DMG of all members by <color=#D91414>10%</color>. Increases DMG of all Observers in the team by <color=#D91414>10%</color>.'}

BriefDes: {1: "Gains different abilities based on <color=#D91414>Observation Notes</color>:\\n- When Ishmael is Tank: Attacks reduce the target's Extra DMG Reduction.\\n- When Ishmael is Amplifier: All switched-in members gain extra ATK. Ishmael: Parhelion's DMG Bonus of the corresponding element increases."}
SpecificDes: {1: "Gains different abilities based on <color=#D91414>Observation Notes</color>:\\n- When Ishmael is Tank: Attacks reduce the target's Extra DMG Reduction by <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> for <color=#D91414>5</color>s.\\n- When Ishmael is Fire or Dark Amplifier: All switched-in members gain an extra <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> ATK. Ishmael: Parhelion's DMG Bonus of the corresponding element increases by <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> for <color=#D91414>10</color>s.\\n- When Ishmael is Amplifier of other elements: All switched-in members gain an extra <color=#D91414>{3}%</color> ATK. Ishmael: Parhelion's DMG Bonus of the corresponding element increases by <color=#D91414>{4}%</color> for <color=#D91414>10</color>s."}

SpecificDes: {1: 'Gains 3 Signal Orbs when entering battle.'}

Title: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.1: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SS3 Rank</color></color>', 2: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.2: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SSS Rank</color></color>'}
BriefDes: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Upon casting Cosmic Afterglow for the first time on the battlefield, gains 180 Collapse Points and the Collapse Mark. Enhances the effects based on the special ability Observation Notes triggered.</color>', 2: "<color=#99a3b1>Collapse Points' damage amplification effect increases by 50%. Title: {1: 'Shape Break: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Red Orb - Shape Break</color>', 2: 'Soul Capture: <color=#0d71bc>Tap Red Orb - Soul Capture</color>', 3: 'Spiritual Judgement: <color=#0d72bc>Tap Red Orb - Spiritual Judgement</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Launches a follow-up attack at the enemy, dealing Dark DMG, and pulls in enemies, gaining Super Armor and DMG Reduction. Triggers Matrix if it is not on cooldown.', 2: 'Launches a follow-up attack at the enemy with the Moon Umbrella, dealing Dark DMG, and pulls in enemies, gaining Super Armor and DMG Reduction. Triggers Matrix if it is not on cooldown.', 3: 'Dashes back and forth and attacks the enemy, dealing Dark DMG, enhancing <color=#D91414>Card Rank</color>, and pulling in enemies within a large area, during which time becomes <color=#D91414>Invincible</color> and unable to cast <color=#D91414>Invitation to a Radiant Dream</color>. Triggers Matrix if it is not on cooldown.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Launches a follow-up attack at the enemy, dealing <color=#D91414>60%</color> Dark DMG, and pulls in enemies, gaining Super Armor and DMG Reduction. Triggers Matrix if it is not on cooldown.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Dark DMG based on orbs pinged by <color=#D91414>Silk Threading</color>.', 2: 'Launches a follow-up attack at the enemy with the Moon Umbrella, dealing <color=#D91414>60%</color> Dark DMG, and pulls in enemies, gaining Super Armor and DMG Reduction. Triggers Matrix if it is not on cooldown.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Dark DMG based on orbs pinged by <color=#D91414>Blade Drawing</color>.', 3: 'Dashes back and forth and attacks the enemy, dealing Dark DMG, enhancing <color=#D91414>Card Rank</color>, and pulling in enemies within a large area, during which time becomes <color=#D91414>Invincible</color> and unable to cast <color=#D91414>Invitation to a Radiant Dream</color>. Triggers Matrix if it is not on cooldown.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Dark DMG based on the number of orbs pinged by <color=#D91414>Shadow Breaking</color>. If it is a 3-Ping, enhances <color=#D91414>Card Rank</color> <color=#D91414>twice</color> more.'}

Title: {1: 'Silk Threading: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Yellow Orb</color>', 2: 'Blade Drawing: <color=#0d70bc>During Silk Threading Combo + Tap Yellow Orb</color>', 3: 'Shadow Breaking: <color=#0d70bc>During Blade Drawing Combo + Tap Yellow Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Throws out the Shadow Card, dealing Dark DMG and entering the <color=#D91414>Silk Threading Combo</color>.', 2: 'Converts the Shadow Card to a blade and exits the <color=#D91414>Silk Threading Combo</color>, dealing Dark DMG and entering the <color=#D91414>Blade Drawing Combo</color>.', 3: 'Kicks the enemy, dealing Dark DMG and exiting the <color=#D91414>Blade Drawing Combo</color>.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Throws out the Shadow Card, dealing Dark DMG and entering the <color=#D91414>Silk Threading Combo</color>.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Dark DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.', 2: 'Converts the Shadow Card to a blade and exits the <color=#D91414>Silk Threading Combo</color>, dealing Dark DMG and entering the <color=#D91414>Blade Drawing Combo</color>.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Dark DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- Gains <color=#D91414>10</color> bonus Signature Energy if causes a 3-Ping.', 3: 'Kicks the enemy, dealing Dark DMG and exiting the <color=#D91414>Blade Drawing Combo</color>.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Dark DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- Gains <color=#D91414>10</color> bonus Signature Energy if causes a 3-Ping.'}

Title: {1: 'Turning Steps: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Blue Orb</color>', 2: 'Chassé: <color=#0d70bc>During Turning Combo + Tap Blue Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Throws out the Hat of Trickery and enters the <color=#D91414>Turning Combo</color>, pulling in enemies, dealing Dark DMG, and gaining Yellow Orb(s).', 2: 'Throws out the hat to attack the enemy continuously and exits the <color=#D91414>Turning Combo</color>, dealing Dark DMG. Meanwhile, gains Super Armor, DMG Reduction, Yellow Orb(s), and Signature Energy.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Throws out the Hat of Trickery and enters the <color=#D91414>Turning Combo</color>, pulling in enemies, dealing Dark DMG, and gaining Yellow Orb(s).\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Dark DMG and gains <color=#D91414>1/2/3</color> Yellow Orb(s) above the Orb Gauge based on the number of orbs pinged.', 2: 'Throws out the hat to attack the enemy continuously and exits the <color=#D91414>Turning Combo</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>50%</color> Dark DMG. Meanwhile, gains Super Armor, DMG Reduction, Yellow Orb(s), and Signature Energy.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Dark DMG and <color=#D91414>1/2/3</color> Yellow Orb(s) above the Orb Gauge based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- Gains <color=#D91414>20</color> bonus Signature Energy, which can only be triggered once upon entering the battlefield. Casting <color=#D91414>Dreamfall Showdown</color> will reset the trigger attempt.'}

Title: {1: 'Umbrella Strike: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Basic Attack</color>', 2: 'Flow Attack: <color=#0d70bc>Dodge + Tap Basic Attack</color>', 3: 'Night Embrace: <color=#0d70bc>During Crazy Gamble + No Less Than 3 Yellow Orbs + Press and Hold Basic Attack</color>', 4: 'Turnaround: <color=#0d70bc>Matrix Not on Cooldown + Tap Dodge When Not Dragging Joystick</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Attacks with the Moon Umbrella, dealing Dark DMG.', 2: 'Throws out Shadow Cards to attack, dealing Dark DMG. And the following Basic Attack will be from Phase 4.', 3: "Launches an upward strike and casts <color=#D91414>Alarming Daybreak</color>, gaining the <color=#D91414>Joker's Mark</color> and dealing Plasma Beam DMG. Then, continuously spends Yellow Orbs to slash the enemy, dealing Plasma Beam DMG, gaining Electric Charge and Signature Energy, and enhancing <color=#D91414>Card Rank</color>. Gains Super Armor and DMG Reduction and triggers Matrix if it is not on cooldown.", 4: 'Blocks with the Moon Umbrella. If success, triggers Matrix if it is not on cooldown. Can be followed by a Basic Attack to counterattack and deal Dark DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Attacks with the Moon Umbrella, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG.', 2: 'Throws out Shadow Cards to attack, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG. And the following Basic Attack will be from Phase 4.', 3: "Launches an upward strike and casts <color=#D91414>Alarming Daybreak</color>, gaining the <color=#D91414>Joker's Mark</color> and dealing Plasma Beam DMG. Then, continuously spends Yellow Orbs to slash the enemy, dealing Plasma Beam DMG, gaining Electric Charge and Signature Energy, and enhancing <color=#D91414>Card Rank</color>. Gains Super Armor and DMG Reduction and triggers Matrix if it is not on cooldown.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Plasma Beam DMG through <color=#D91414>Alarming Daybreak</color> and restores HP equal to <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> of ATK, gaining the <color=#D91414>Joker's Mark</color>, <color=#D91414>160</color> Electric Charge, and <color=#D91414>10</color> Signature Energy. Gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>60%</color> DMG Reduction.\\n- Each orb consumed during the slash will trigger <color=#D91414>Mysterious Vanishment</color> once, dealing <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Plasma Beam DMG and granting <color=#D91414>10</color> Signature Energy and <color=#D91414>120</color> Electric Charge. Gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>60%</color> DMG Reduction.\\n- When Basic Attack is released, or all Signal Orbs are consumed, casts <color=#D91414>Return to Silence</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>{3}%</color> Plasma Beam DMG, during which time, becomes <color=#D91414>Invincible</color> and unable to cast <color=#D91414>Invitation to a Radiant Dream</color>. If <color=#D91414>Mysterious Vanishment</color> has already been cast <color=#D91414>6</color> times in a row, automatically casts <color=#D91414>Return to Silence</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>{4}%</color> Plasma Beam DMG instead, gaining <color=#D91414>60</color> bonus Signature Energy and <color=#D91414>120</color> bonus Electric Charge, and enhancing <color=#D91414>Card Rank twice</color>.\\n- During <color=#D91414>Night Embrace</color>, enhances <color=#D91414>Card Rank once</color> more for each <color=#D91414>3</color> Signal Orbs consumed, or when casting <color=#D91414>Return to Silence</color>.\\n- The <color=#D91414>Joker's Mark</color> lasts <color=#D91414>15s</color>. Duration resets when Lilith is switched out.", 4: 'Blocks with the Moon Umbrella. If success, triggers Matrix if it is not on cooldown. Can be followed by a Basic Attack to counterattack and deal Dark DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG.'}

Title: {1: 'Nighttime Encounter: <color=#0d70bc>Not During Crazy Gamble + 55 Signature Energy + Tap Signature</color>', 2: 'Dreamfall Showdown: <color=#0d70bc>During Crazy Gamble + 130 Signature Energy + Tap Signature</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Lays out a Card Spread to enter <color=#D91414>Crazy Gamble</color> and draws <color=#D91414>5</color> <color=#D91414>Hole Cards</color>, dealing Dark DMG. Inserts the Yellow Orb(s) in the Orb Gauge and gains <color=#D91414>3</color> bonus Yellow Orbs. Gains up to <color=#D91414>9</color> Yellow Orbs upon entering the battlefield. Triggers Time Lag Calculation.', 2: 'Throws out all Shadow Cards, dealing damage. Increases Base DMG based on the current <color=#D91414>Card Rank</color> and exits <color=#D91414>Crazy Gamble</color>. Triggers Time Lag Calculation. Leaves behind a <color=#D91414>Realm of Lingering Enjoyment</color>, restoring HP to ally units within it over time and converting unused Yellow/Red Orb(s) to Blue Orb(s).'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Lays out a Card Spread to enter <color=#D91414>Crazy Gamble</color> and draws <color=#D91414>5</color> <color=#D91414>Hole Cards</color>, dealing Dark DMG. Inserts the Yellow Orb(s) in the Orb Gauge and gains <color=#D91414>3</color> bonus Yellow Orbs. Gains up to <color=#D91414>9</color> Yellow Orbs upon entering the battlefield. Triggers Time Lag Calculation.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG.', 2: "Throws out all Shadow Cards, dealing damage. Increases Base DMG based on the current <color=#D91414>Card Rank</color> and exits <color=#D91414>Crazy Gamble</color>. Triggers Time Lag Calculation. Leaves behind a <color=#D91414>Realm of Lingering Enjoyment</color>, restoring HP to ally units within it over time and converting unused Yellow/Red Orb(s) to Blue Orb(s).\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG.\\n- If Lilith has the <color=#D91414>Joker's Mark</color>, deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Plasma Beam DMG instead and removes the <color=#D91414>Joker's Mark</color>. If cast at Max Electric Charge, triggers the Electric Storm Flash Status.\\n- Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Dreamfall Showdown</color> increases by <color=#D91414>175%/200%/225%/250%/275%</color> at <color=#D91414>Card Rank</color> <color=#D91414>C/B/A/S/SS</color>.\\n- Leaves behind a <color=#D91414>12-second</color> <color=#D91414>Realm of Lingering Enjoyment</color> afterward, restoring HP equal to <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> of Lilith: Daemonissa's ATK per second to ally units in it."}

Title: {1: 'QTE— <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Deals damage and heals.'}
SpecificDes: {1: "Deals damage and heals.\\n- Deals a total of <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG.\\n- If Lilith has the <color=#D91414>Joker's Trickery</color>, deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Plasma Beam DMG instead.\\n- Restores HP equal to <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> of ATK."}

Title: {1: 'Body Trick', 2: 'Hand Trick', 3: 'Shadow Trick', 4: 'Card Trick', 5: 'Effect: Plasma Beam'}
BriefDes: {1: "Lilith gains a Red Orb upon casting <color=#D91414>Joker's Trickery</color>. And she can only have one Red Orb. Casting <color=#D91414>Shadow's Guile</color> after a Yellow Orb 3-Ping will enhance the <color=#D91414>Card Rank</color> and grant Signature Energy.", 2: 'Ally units healed by Lilith: Daemonissa will be enhanced. Lilith heals herself upon casting <color=#D91414>Invitation to a Radiant Dream</color>.', 3: "When a character on team is in the Electric Storm Flash status, Lilith: Daemonissa will be regarded as she has the <color=#D91414>Joker's Mark</color>.", 4: 'Lilith: Daemonissa gains one Signal Orb upon triggering the Matrix.', 5: 'Effect Charging: Electric Charge is capped at 1000 points.'}
SpecificDes: {1: "Immediately gains 1 Red Orb after casting <color=#D91414>Joker's Trickery</color>. Max 1 Red Orb. Casting <color=#D91414>Shadow's Guile</color> after a Yellow Orb 3-Ping will enhance <color=#D91414>Card Rank</color> and grant Signature Energy.\\n- Casting <color=#D91414>Silk Threading/Blade Drawing/Shadow Breaking</color> through a Yellow Orb 3-Ping will provide <color=#D91414>20/20/30</color> stackable Signature Energy for the next <color=#D91414>Shadow's Guile</color>. Max <color=#D91414>70</color> Signature Energy. Signature Energy will be cleared when Lilith exits <color=#D91414>Crazy Gamble</color>.\\n- The first <color=#D91414>Shadow's Guile</color> cast after a Yellow Orb 3-Ping will enhance <color=#D91414>Card Rank</color> <color=#D91414>once</color>.\\n- Casting <color=#D91414>Silk Threading/Blade Drawing/Shadow Breaking</color> will grant <color=#D91414>Red Orb - Shape Break/Red Orb - Soul Capture/Red Orb - Spiritual Judgement</color> respectively. Max 1 Red Orb. When getting a duplicate, it will refresh the Red Orb type based on the previous Yellow Orb skill. If you already have <color=#D91414>Red Orb - Spiritual Judgement</color>, it will not refresh before consumption.", 2: "Ally units healed by Lilith: Daemonissa will be enhanced. Lilith heals herself upon casting <color=#D91414>Invitation to a Radiant Dream</color>.\\n- Ally units healed by Lilith: Daemonissa will gain the <color=#D91414>Dark Radiation</color> effect which boosts their Dark DMG by <color=#D91414>20%</color> for <color=#D91414>8s</color>. Duration resets every time the effect is triggered.\\n- If Lilith: Daemonissa has <color=#D91414>Joker's Mark</color>, ally units will gain the <color=#D91414>Lightning Surge</color> effect instead, which boosts their Lightning DMG by <color=#D91414>20%</color> for <color=#D91414>8s</color>. Duration resets every time the effect is triggered.\\n- Lilith restores HP equal to <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> of her ATK upon casting <color=#D91414>Invitation to a Radiant Dream</color>.", 3: "When a character on team is in the Electric Storm Flash status, Lilith: Daemonissa will be regarded as she has the <color=#D91414>Joker's Mark</color>.", 4: 'Lilith: Daemonissa gains one Signal Orb upon triggering the Matrix.\\n- If it is during <color=#D91414>Crazy Gamble</color>, gains a Yellow Orb. If not, gains a Blue Orb instead.', 5: 'Effect Charging: The Electric Charge is capped at 1000.\\n- Effect Activated: Character with the Plasma Beam Effect enters the Electric Storm Flash status, launching lightning bolt strikes at nearby enemies every 2s and dealing <color=#D91414>800%</color> Plasma Beam DMG (without triggering Tank Class Skills) for 12s.'}

BriefDes: {1: 'All members gain <color=#D91414>10%</color> ATK. Amplifiers deal <color=#D91414>5%</color> more Dark DMG and Plasma Beam DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'All members gain <color=#D91414>10%</color> ATK. Amplifiers deal <color=#D91414>5%</color> more Dark DMG and Plasma Beam DMG.'}

BriefDes: {1: "All members' ATK and Amplifiers' Elemental DMG Bonus increase when being switched in."}
SpecificDes: {1: "When switched in, all members gain <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> ATK, and Amplifiers deal <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Elemental DMG for <color=#D91414>10</color>s. When there is the <color=#D91414>Joker's Mark</color>, Lilith: Daemonissa's corresponding element will be regarded as Lightning."}

Title: {1: 'Gains 3 Signal Orbs when entering battle.'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Gains 3 Signal Orbs when entering battle.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Gains 3 Signal Orbs when entering battle.'}

Title: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.1: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at S5 Rank</color></color>', 2: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.2: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SS Rank</color></color>'}
BriefDes: {1: "<color=#99a3b1>Casting Night Embrace, Shadow's Guile, or Dreamfall Showdown will activate all available QTEs.</color>", 2: "<color=#99a3b1>Orbs consumed by Joker's Trickery will increase the Base DMG of the next Shadow's Guile. Yellow Orbs spent during Night Embrace will increase the Base DMG of Night Embrace - Return to Silence.</color>"}
SpecificDes: {1: "<color=#99a3b1>Casting Night Embrace, Shadow's Guile, or Dreamfall Showdown will activate all available QTEs.</color>", 2: "<color=#99a3b1>Each Signal Orb spent by Joker's Trickery will increase the following Shadow's Guile's Base DMG. The 1st to 3rd Signal Orbs pinged will each increase Base DMG by 20%, while the 4th to 9th will each increase by 3%. All 9 orbs will increase Base DMG by a total of 78% altogether. Casting Shadow's Guile or Dreamfall Showdown will clear the enhancement effect. Each Yellow Orb spent during the Night Embrace will increase the Base DMG of Night Embrace - Return to Silence by 20% for this time.</color>"}

Title: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.1: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SS3 Rank</color></color>', 2: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.2: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SSS Rank</color></color>'}
BriefDes: {1: "<color=#99a3b1>Ally units healed by Lilith: Daemonissa will gain an enhanced Dark Radiation effect. If Lilith has the Joker's Mark, they will gain a bonus Electroradium Transformation effect. Base DMG of Joker's Trickery, Night Embrace - Alarming Daybreak, and Night Embrace - Mysterious Vanishment increases.</color>", 2: "<color=#99a3b1>When all members are switched in, cooldown of QTE Skills will be reset. Meanwhile, ally units healed by Lilith: Daemonissa will gain an enhanced Dark Radiation effect. If Lilith has the Joker's Mark, they will gain a bonus Electroradium Transformation effect. Lilith will also deal more damage based on the current Card Rank when casting Dreamfall Showdown.</color>"}
SpecificDes: {1: "<color=#99a3b1>Ally units healed by Lilith: Daemonissa gain another 10% Dark Radiation effect. If Lilith has the Joker's Mark, they will also gain a 10% Electroradium Transformation effect. Base DMG of Joker's Trickery increases by 120%. Base DMG of Night Embrace - Alarming Daybreak and Night Embrace - Mysterious Vanishment increases by 80%.</color>", 2: "<color=#99a3b1>When all members are switched in, cooldown of QTE Skills will be reset. Meanwhile, ally units healed by Lilith: Daemonissa will gain another 10% Dark Radiation effect. If Lilith has the Joker's Mark, they will gain a bonus 10% Electroradium Transformation effect. Lilith will also deal 190% Dark DMG 4 times when casting Dreamfall Showdown. If she has the Joker's Mark, deals 70% Plasma Beam DMG instead. If she casts it at Card Rank C/B/A/S/SS, deals an additional 3/4/5/6/8 times the damage.</color>"}

Title: {1: 'Lv.1: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SS3 Rank</color>', 2: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.2: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SSS Rank</color></color>'}

Title: {1: 'Rhythmic Piercing: <color=#0d70bc>Solo + Tap Blue Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: "Selena's Blue Orbs are always fixed to the right end. This can only be cast after Selena enters <color=#D91414>Solo</color>. Moves quickly among enemies, dealing Physical DMG. Gains <color=#D91414>Signature Energy</color> after casting. Gains <color=#D91414>Variation Points</color> as well if in the <color=#D91414>Flow State</color>."}
SpecificDes: {1: "Selena's Blue Orbs are always fixed to the right end. This can only be cast after Selena enters <color=#D91414>Solo</color>. Moves quickly among enemies, dealing Physical DMG. Gains <color=#D91414>Signature Energy</color> after casting. Gains <color=#D91414>Variation Points</color> as well if in the <color=#D91414>Flow State</color>.\\n- When casting this, deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG and gains <color=#D91414>12 Signature Energy</color>.\\n- Gains <color=#D91414>30 Variation Points</color> as well if in the <color=#D91414>Flow State</color>.\\n- When there are <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color>, deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Glaciation DMG instead.\\n- Becomes Invincible and cannot cast Signature in the process.\\n- No Blue Orbs will be consumed after casting."}

Title: {1: 'Intro: <color=#0d70bc>Holding the Rapier + Tap Basic Attack</color>', 2: 'Inverse Chord: <color=#0d70bc>Flow State + Tap Basic Attack</color>', 3: 'Echoing Melody: <color=#0d70bc>Press and Hold Basic Attack</color>', 4: 'Inverted Divisi: <color=#0d70bc>Holding the Rapier + 1 Musical Note + Tap Dodge</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Wields the Bowstring Rapier to attack the target continuously, dealing Physical DMG.', 2: 'Plays music to attack the target, dealing Physical DMG.', 3: 'Press and hold Basic Attack to make Selena hold her rapier vertically, charge shortly, and then thrust at the enemy, dealing Physical DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>Signature Energy</color>. During any ping, press and hold Basic Attack to cast this quickly.', 4: 'When Selena is <color=#D91414>holding her rapier</color>, tap Dodge to cast this skill quickly at the cost of 1 <color=#D91414>Musical Note</color>. Selena will thrust forward quickly to deal Physical DMG. With enough <color=#D91414>Musical Notes</color>, tap Dodge to cast this again. Then, tap Basic Attack to follow up with the 5th hit of <color=#D91414>Basic Attack - Intro</color>.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Wields the Bowstring Rapier to attack the target continuously, dealing Physical DMG.\\n- Basic Attacks deal a total of <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG. Gains a total of <color=#D91414>50 Glaciation Value</color> in the process.\\n- When launching the 5th hit, gains Super Armor, 1 extra Signal Orb, and 1 <color=#D91414>Musical Note</color>.', 2: 'Plays music to attack the target, dealing Physical DMG.\\n- Basic Attacks deal a total of <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG. Gains a total of <color=#D91414>40 Glaciation Value</color> in the process.', 3: 'Press and hold Basic Attack to make Selena hold her rapier vertically, charge shortly, and then thrust at the enemy, dealing Physical DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>Signature Energy</color>. During any ping, press and hold Basic Attack to cast this quickly.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG. Gains <color=#D91414>12 Signature Energy</color> after casting.\\n- When there are <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color>, deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Glaciation DMG instead.\\n- When cast by pressing and holding Basic Attack, it will consume <color=#D91414>Musical Notes</color> over time and then increase Base DMG by <color=#D91414>50%</color>/<color=#D91414>100%</color>/<color=#D91414>200%</color> according to the number of <color=#D91414>Musical Notes</color> consumed. Selena can block incoming attacks when charging. Upon a successful block, she will spend all <color=#D91414>Musical Notes</color> to cast this skill. Triggers Matrix if it is not on cooldown.', 4: 'When Selena is <color=#D91414>holding her rapier</color>, tap Dodge to cast this skill quickly at the cost of 1 <color=#D91414>Musical Note</color>. Selena will thrust forward quickly to deal Physical DMG. With enough <color=#D91414>Musical Notes</color>, tap Dodge to cast this again. Then, tap Basic Attack to follow up with the 5th hit of <color=#D91414>Basic Attack - Intro</color>.\\n- Gains Super Armor and can dodge incoming attacks in the process. A successful dodge will trigger Matrix if it is not on cooldown.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG. Gains <color=#D91414>5 Signature Energy</color> after casting.'}

Title: {1: 'Rainy Prelude: <color=#0d70bc>60 Signature Energy + Tap/Press and Hold Signature</color>', 2: 'Majestic Interlude: <color=#0d70bc>Flow State + 90 Signature Energy + Tap Signature</color>', 3: 'Note of Termination: <color=#0d70bc>Grand Finale + 90 Signature Energy + Tap Signature</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: "Selena prepares to perform, enters the <color=#D91414>Flow State</color>, and deals Physical DMG. Triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> in the process. Immediately resets Matrix's cooldown after casting. In the <color=#D91414>Flow State</color>, gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>Variation Points</color> over time.", 2: 'Selena gives a magnificent performance, dealing Physical DMG and exiting the <color=#D91414>Flow State</color>. Triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> in the process.', 3: 'Selena performs her finale, dealing Physical DMG and exiting <color=#D91414>Grand Finale</color>. Triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> in the process. Gains 2 stacks of <color=#D91414>Noise</color> after casting. When there is <color=#D91414>Noise</color>, Selena will not be able to cast <color=#D91414>Signature - Note of Termination</color> and will cast <color=#D91414>Signature - Majestic Interlude</color> instead. Removes 1 stack of <color=#D91414>Noise</color> every time when entering the battlefield or casting <color=#D91414>Signature - Majestic Interlude</color>.'}
SpecificDes: {1: "Selena prepares to perform, enters the <color=#D91414>Flow State</color>, and deals Physical DMG. Triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> in the process. Immediately resets Matrix's cooldown after casting. In the <color=#D91414>Flow State</color>, gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>Variation Points</color> over time.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG.\\n- If cast by pressing and holding Basic Attack with 10 <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color>, it will generate <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color>.\\n- Gains 3 <color=#D91414>Variation Points</color> every second.", 2: 'Selena gives a magnificent performance, dealing Physical DMG and exiting the <color=#D91414>Flow State</color>. Triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> in the process.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG.\\n- When there are <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color>, deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Glaciation DMG instead. Ends <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> and triggers <color=#D91414>Ice Burst</color> after casting.\\n- Clears all <color=#D91414>Melody Points</color> and <color=#D91414>Variation Points</color> and removes 1 stack of <color=#D91414>Noise</color> after casting.', 3: 'Selena performs her finale, dealing Physical DMG and exiting <color=#D91414>Grand Finale</color>. Triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> in the process. Gains 2 stacks of <color=#D91414>Noise</color> after casting. When there is <color=#D91414>Noise</color>, Selena will not be able to cast <color=#D91414>Signature - Note of Termination</color> and will cast <color=#D91414>Signature - Majestic Interlude</color> instead. Removes 1 stack of <color=#D91414>Noise</color> every time when entering the battlefield or casting <color=#D91414>Signature - Majestic Interlude</color>.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG.\\n- When there are <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color>, deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Glaciation DMG instead. Ends <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> and triggers <color=#D91414>Ice Burst</color> after casting.\\n- Clears all <color=#D91414>Melody Points</color> and <color=#D91414>Variation Points</color> and gains 3 Signal Orbs after casting.'}

Title: {1: 'QTE: <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Selena spins and dances to attack the target, dealing Physical DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Selena spins and dances to attack the target, dealing Physical DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG.'}

Title: {1: 'Solo Realm', 2: 'Concerto Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Flow State + Tap Concerto Orb</color>', 3: 'Melodic Outburst: <color=#0d70bc>Flow State + 60 Melody Points + Press and Hold Dodge</color>', 4: 'Grand Finale: <color=#0d70bc>Flow State + 100 Variation Points</color>', 5: 'Effect: Glaciation'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Selena normally attacks <color=#D91414>with her rapier</color>. In the <color=#D91414>Flow State</color>, she will attack <color=#D91414>with the cello</color> instead. She cannot enter the Matrix by dodging. It can only be triggered by <color=#D91414>Basic Attack - Echoing Melody</color>/<color=#D91414>Basic Attack - Inverted Divisi</color>. Enters <color=#D91414>Solo</color> upon entering the Matrix triggered by herself.', 2: 'In the <color=#D91414>Flow State</color>, 6 Signal Orbs will be converted to <color=#D91414>Concerto Orbs</color>. During the <color=#D91414>Flow State</color>, Selena can only obtain and use <color=#D91414>Concerto Orbs</color>. After casting this skill, deals Physical DMG and gains <color=#D91414>Musical Note(s)</color>, <color=#D91414>Variation Point(s)</color>, <color=#D91414>Melody Point(s)</color>, and <color=#D91414>Signature Energy</color>. Regains other Signal Orbs at the end of the <color=#D91414>Flow State</color>.', 3: 'In the <color=#D91414>Flow State</color>, Selena can accumulate <color=#D91414>Melody Points</color> by casting <color=#D91414>Concerto Orbs</color>, up to <color=#D91414>60</color>. Meanwhile, spends <color=#D91414>60 Melody Points</color> and summons a clone to attack, dealing Physical DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>Variation Points</color> and <color=#D91414>Signature Energy</color>.', 4: 'In the <color=#D91414>Flow State</color>, Selena can accumulate <color=#D91414>Variation Points</color> by casting specific skills, up to <color=#D91414>100</color>. At Max <color=#D91414>Variation Points</color>, Selena will enter <color=#D91414>Grand Finale</color> and immediately gain <color=#D91414>90 Signature Energy</color>.', 5: 'Some of the skills can fill the <color=#D91414>Glaciation Gauge</color>. When the gauge is full, consume it to cast <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice</color>, dealing Glaciation DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color>. Casting certain skills will consume all <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color> to form <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color>, dealing Glaciation DMG to nearby enemies. While <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> persist, dealing Glaciation DMG will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Accumulation</color>, which deals additional Glaciation DMG and gains <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>. When <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> expire, they will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Burst</color> to deal Glaciation DMG based on the current <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>. The <color=#D91414>Glaciation Gauge</color>, <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color>, <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> and <color=#D91414>Congelation</color> can transfer to the next character with Effect: Glaciation.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Selena normally attacks <color=#D91414>with her rapier</color>. In the <color=#D91414>Flow State</color>, she will attack <color=#D91414>with the cello</color> instead. She cannot enter the Matrix by dodging. It can only be triggered by <color=#D91414>Basic Attack - Echoing Melody</color>/<color=#D91414>Basic Attack - Inverted Divisi</color>. Enters <color=#D91414>Solo</color> upon entering the Matrix triggered by herself.', 2: 'In the <color=#D91414>Flow State</color>, 6 Signal Orbs will be converted to <color=#D91414>Concerto Orbs</color>. During the <color=#D91414>Flow State</color>, Selena can only obtain and use <color=#D91414>Concerto Orbs</color>. After casting this skill, deals Physical DMG and gains <color=#D91414>Musical Note(s)</color>, <color=#D91414>Variation Point(s)</color>, <color=#D91414>Melody Point(s)</color>, and <color=#D91414>Signature Energy</color>. Regains other Signal Orbs at the end of the <color=#D91414>Flow State</color>.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG.\\n- Gains 1 <color=#D91414>Musical Note</color> for each 3 <color=#D91414>Concerto Orbs</color> consumed.\\n- When there are <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color>, deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Glaciation DMG instead.\\n- Gains <color=#D91414>5 Variation Points</color>, <color=#D91414>10 Melody Points</color>, and <color=#D91414>5 Signature Energy</color> after casting.', 3: 'In the <color=#D91414>Flow State</color>, Selena can accumulate <color=#D91414>Melody Points</color> by casting <color=#D91414>Concerto Orbs</color>, up to <color=#D91414>60</color>. Meanwhile, spends <color=#D91414>60 Melody Points</color> and summons a clone to attack, dealing Physical DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>Variation Points</color> and <color=#D91414>Signature Energy</color>.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG.\\n- When there are <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color>, deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Glaciation DMG instead.\\n- Becomes Invincible and cannot cast Signature in the process. Gains <color=#D91414>30 Variation Points</color> and <color=#D91414>60 Signature Energy</color> after casting.', 4: 'In the <color=#D91414>Flow State</color>, Selena can accumulate <color=#D91414>Variation Points</color> by casting specific skills, up to <color=#D91414>100</color>. At Max <color=#D91414>Variation Points</color>, Selena will enter <color=#D91414>Grand Finale</color> and immediately gain <color=#D91414>90 Signature Energy</color>.\\n- Removes all <color=#D91414>Melody Points</color> upon entering <color=#D91414>Grand Finale</color>.\\n- <color=#D91414>Grand Finale</color> lasts 7s. After entering the Grand Finale, Selena will attack <color=#D91414>with the rapier</color> instead and will automatically cast <color=#D91414>Signature - Majestic Interlude</color> at the end.\\n- During <color=#D91414>Grand Finale</color>, Signal Orbs are infinite.\\n- Clears all <color=#D91414>Musical Notes</color> at the end of <color=#D91414>Grand Finale</color>.', 5: 'Some of the skills can fill the <color=#D91414>Glaciation Gauge</color>. When the gauge is full, consume it to cast <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice</color>, dealing Glaciation DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color>. Casting certain skills will consume all <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color> to form <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color>, dealing Glaciation DMG to nearby enemies. While <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> persist, dealing Glaciation DMG will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Accumulation</color>, which deals additional Glaciation DMG and gains <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>. When <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> expire, they will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Burst</color> to deal Glaciation DMG based on the current <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>. The <color=#D91414>Glaciation Gauge</color>, <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color>, <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> and <color=#D91414>Congelation</color> can transfer to the next character with Effect: Glaciation.\\n- At <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Glaciation Value</color>, casts <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice</color> to deal <color=#D91414>100%</color> Glaciation DMG and generate <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layer</color>. Max <color=#D91414>10 Layers</color>.\\n- When having more than <color=#D91414>0</color> <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color>, certain skills can consume all <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color> to form <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>180%</color> Glaciation DMG. When forming <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color>, every <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layer</color> consumed will extend their duration by <color=#D91414>1</color>s.\\n- While <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> persist, dealing Glaciation DMG will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Accumulation</color>, which deals <color=#D91414>100%</color> Glaciation DMG in a large area and gains <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>. This can only trigger <color=#D91414>once</color> every <color=#D91414>0.25</color>s.\\n- When <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> expire, it will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Burst</color> to deal <color=#D91414>100%</color> Glaciation DMG in a large area. For every <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Congelation</color> owned, the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Ice Burst</color> increases by <color=#D91414>9%</color>, up to <color=#D91414>10000</color> <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>.'}

Title: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.1: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at S5 Rank</color></color>', 2: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.2: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SS Rank</color></color>'}
BriefDes: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Casting Basic Attack - Echoing Melody, Melodic Outburst, or Signature - Majestic Interlude/Signature - Note of Termination will activate all available QTEs. Triggers all available QTEs upon being switched in.</color>', 2: '<color=#99a3b1>Immediately gains 60 Melody Points when casting Signature - Rainy Prelude. After casting Melodic Outburst, every time when casting Concerto Orb(s), deals double DMG until the end of the Flow State. Base DMG of Signature - Majestic Interlude/Signature - Note of Termination increases by 30%. After casting Signature - Majestic Interlude/Signature - Note of Termination and exiting the battlefield, enters Lingering Echoes, launching an attack every 2s to deal 2000% Physical DMG. Exits Lingering Echoes after 4 attacks.</color>'}

Title: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.1: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SS3 Rank</color></color>', 2: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.2: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SSS Rank</color></color>'}
BriefDes: {1: "<color=#99a3b1>When there are 60 Melody Points, Concerto Orbs' Variation Points acquisition efficiency doubles. Each Musical Note consumed will increase the Base DMG of the next Melodic Outburst by 20%, up to 100%. Casting Signature - Majestic Interlude/Signature - Note of Termination will increase the Base DMG of QTEs by 500% throughout the battle.</color>", 2: '<color=#99a3b1>Gains 1 Musical Note, 12 Signature Energy, and 1 Signal Orb upon entering the battlefield. Musical Notes are capped at 5 instead. When performing a ping to cast Basic Attack - Echoing Melody, converts maximum 6 Signal Orbs to Musical Notes. With 4/5 Musical Notes, increases Base DMG of Basic Attack - Echoing Melody to 300%/600% instead. During Lingering Echoes, Selena deals 100% more Extra DMG.</color>'}
