Title: {1: 'Shadow Slash: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Red Orb</color>', 2: 'Spin Cleave: <color=#0d70bc>At least 1 Cluster Orb + During Shadow Slash + Tap Red Orb</color>', 3: 'Kinetic Load: <color=#0d70bc>Press and hold Red Orb to charge + Absurdum Points fully charged</color>', 4: 'Kindled Blaze: <color=#0d70bc>Press and hold Red Orb to charge + Absurdum Points partially charged</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Hurls the gunsword toward the target, dealing Dark DMG.', 2: 'Spins around and swings the gunsword at the target, dealing Dark DMG.', 3: 'Enters <color=#D91414>Charge Stance</color>, then unleashes a sword strike upon release, dealing Dark DMG.', 4: 'Enters <color=#D91414>Charge Stance</color>, then unleashes a sword strike upon release, dealing Ignition DMG and applying Combustible Charges.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Hurls the gunsword toward the target, dealing Dark DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Dark DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.', 2: 'Spins around and swings the gunsword at the target, dealing Dark DMG.\\n- For every Cluster Orb pinged, casts this skill again to deal <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG.', 3: 'Enters <color=#D91414>Charge Stance</color>, then unleashes a sword strike upon release, dealing Dark DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{3}%</color> Dark DMG and recovers <color=#D91414>2/3/4/5</color> Signature Energy after pinging <color=#D91414>0/1/2/3</color> orbs.', 4: 'Enters <color=#D91414>Charge Stance</color>, then unleashes a sword strike upon release, dealing Ignition DMG and applying Combustible Charges.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{3}%</color> Ignition DMG, applies <color=#D91414>1250</color> Combustible Charges, and restores <color=#D91414>2/3/4/5</color> Signature Energy after pinging <color=#D91414>0/1/2/3</color> orbs. When <color=#D91414>Absurdum Points</color> are not fully charged, Jetavie continuously gains <color=#D91414>Super Armor</color>.'}

Title: {1: 'Flare Shot: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Yellow Orb</color>', 2: "Sniper's Perch: <color=#0d70bc>Press and hold Yellow Orb to charge</color>"}
BriefDes: {1: 'Leaps backward to spray a barrage of bullets, dealing Dark DMG.', 2: 'Leaps backward to enter <color=#D91414>Charge Stance</color>, then fires a shot upon release, dealing Dark DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Leaps backward to spray a barrage of bullets, dealing Dark DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Dark DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.', 2: 'Leaps backward to enter <color=#D91414>Charge Stance</color>, then fires a shot upon release, dealing Dark DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{3}%</color> Dark DMG and recovers <color=#D91414>2/3/4/5</color> Signature Energy after pinging <color=#D91414>0/1/2/3</color> orbs.'}

Title: {1: 'Shaded Radiance: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Blue Orb</color>', 2: 'Sundered Pith: <color=#0d70bc>Press and hold Blue Orb to charge</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Flicks the gunsword upward, firing at the target and dealing Dark DMG.', 2: 'Enters <color=#D91414>Charge Stance</color> while wielding the gunsword to fire continuously, then steps back upon release to deal Dark DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Flicks the gunsword upward, firing at the target and dealing Dark DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Dark DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.', 2: 'Enters <color=#D91414>Charge Stance</color> while wielding the gunsword to fire continuously, then steps back upon release to deal Dark DMG.\\n- Each burst of shots deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG.\\n- Stepping back deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{3}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{4}%</color> Dark DMG and recovers <color=#D91414>2/3/4/5</color> Signature Energy after pinging <color=#D91414>0/1/2/3</color> orbs.'}

Title: {1: 'Iteration: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Basic Attack</color>', 2: 'Continuation: <color=#0d70bc>Press and hold Basic Attack to charge</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Fires at the target while performing combat maneuvers, dealing Dark DMG.', 2: 'Enters <color=#D91414>Charge Stance</color> while wielding the gunsword to fire continuously at the target, dealing Dark DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Fires at the target while performing combat maneuvers, dealing Dark DMG.\\n- Basic Attack deals a total of <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG.', 2: 'Enters <color=#D91414>Charge Stance</color> while wielding the gunsword to fire continuously at the target, dealing Dark DMG.\\n- Each burst of shots deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG.'}

Title: {1: 'Constant Current: <color=#0d70bc>100 Signature Energy + Tap Signature</color>', 2: 'Tectonic Revolt: <color=#0d70bc>In Panoptic Segmentation + 100 Signature Energy + Tap Signature</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Jetavie enters the <color=#D91414>Panoptic Segmentation</color> Mode, dealing Dark DMG to nearby targets in a large area and summoning a great sword to assist in the attack.', 2: 'Jetavie leaps into the air and plunges down to strike the target on the ground, dealing damage before exiting the <color=#D91414>Panoptic Segmentation</color> Mode.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Jetavie enters the <color=#D91414>Panoptic Segmentation</color> Mode, dealing Dark DMG to nearby targets in a large area and summoning a great sword to assist in the attack.\\n- <color=#D91414>Constant Current</color> deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG in total.', 2: "Jetavie leaps into the air and plunges down to strike the target on the ground, dealing damage before exiting the <color=#D91414>Panoptic Segmentation</color> Mode.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG in total.\\n- If Jetavie has <color=#D91414>Coreflame Mark</color>, casts <color=#D91414>Tectonic Revolt: Burn</color> instead, dealing <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Ignition DMG, removing the target's Ignition status, and inflicting additional Ignition DMG equal to <color=#D91414>Ignition stacks x<color=#D91414>{2}%</color></color>."}

Title: {1: 'QTE: <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Flicks the gunsword upward, firing at the target and dealing Dark DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Flicks the gunsword upward, firing at the target and dealing Dark DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG in total.'}

Title: {1: 'Cluster Analysis', 2: 'Reflection Chain: <color=#0d70bc>During Kinetic Load enhanced by Cluster Orbs + Press and hold/Tap Basic Attack</color>', 3: 'Flaming Gush: <color=#0d70bc>During Kindled Blaze enhanced by Cluster Orbs + Press and hold/Tap Basic Attack</color>', 4: 'Forbidden Borders: <color=#0d70bc>Charge Stance + Release + Successful Dodge</color>', 5: 'Sector Reconfiguration', 6: 'Overflux Surge: <color=#0d70bc>During sword attacks + Tap Basic Attack repetitively</color>', 7: 'Diffusive Function: <color=#0d70bc>During sword attacks + Dodge + Tap/Press and hold Basic Attack</color>', 8: 'Metamorphic Encoding: <color=#0d70bc>During sword attacks + Press and hold Basic Attack to charge</color>', 9: 'Effect: Ignition'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Signal Orbs gained are converted into <color=#D91414>Cluster Orbs</color>. When not in the <color=#D91414>Panoptic Segmentation</color> Mode, Jetavie can only cast Yellow or Blue Orb Skills. After she enters <color=#D91414>Panoptic Segmentation</color>, Red Orb Skills will be available. When entering <color=#D91414>Charge Stance</color> by pinging Signal Orbs, continuously restores Signature Energy, up to <color=#D91414>40</color>. Pinging <color=#D91414>Cluster Orbs</color> enhances the corresponding Charged Skill, up to <color=#D91414>3</color> times. When Extreme Dodge is triggered by pressing Dodge, gains <color=#D91414>30</color> Load Points instead of entering Matrix. When Dodge Gauge is empty, she can consume <color=#D91414>10</color> Load Points to perform a Dodge.', 2: 'Dashes toward the target and delivers a slashing attack, dealing Dark DMG while restoring Signature Energy.', 3: 'Leaps down from above to slash the target, converting Combustible into Ignition of equal stacks, dealing Ignition DMG and restoring Signature Energy.', 4: 'While in Charge Stance, Jetavie can dodge attacks upon release. A successful dodge increases Extra DMG Bonus of the Charged Skill by <color=#D91414>30%</color>. While charging Red Orb Skills, a successful dodge additionally returns <color=#D91414>2</color> Cluster Orbs.', 5: 'While in Charge Stance, consumes <color=#D91414>250</color> Dodge Gauge to block each incoming attack. If Dodge Gauge is insufficient, consumes <color=#D91414>10</color> Load Points per block instead.', 6: 'Wields the greatsword to continuously attack the target, dealing Dark DMG.', 7: 'During sword attacks, quickly transitions into casting <color=#D91414>Crystalline Impact</color> on the target, dealing Ignition DMG and applying Combustible Charges.', 8: 'During sword attacks, quickly transitions into casting <color=#D91414>Kinetic Load/Kindled Blaze</color> on the target, dealing Dark DMG.', 9: 'Combustible: Every <color=#D91414>250</color> Combustible Charges will add <color=#D91414>1</color> Combustible stack, up to 20 stacks.\\nIgnition: Ignited units take Ignition DMG equal to <color=#D91414>Ignition stacks x30%</color> (Tank Skills will not be triggered) every second for 10s.\\n- Upon the death of the last unit on the battlefield, subsequent units will inherit its Combustible/Ignition status.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Signal Orbs gained are converted into <color=#D91414>Cluster Orbs</color>. When not in the <color=#D91414>Panoptic Segmentation</color> Mode, Jetavie can only cast Yellow or Blue Orb Skills. After she enters <color=#D91414>Panoptic Segmentation</color>, Red Orb Skills will be available. When entering <color=#D91414>Charge Stance</color> by pinging Signal Orbs, continuously restores Signature Energy, up to <color=#D91414>40</color>. Pinging <color=#D91414>Cluster Orbs</color> enhances the corresponding Charged Skill, up to <color=#D91414>3</color> times. When Extreme Dodge is triggered by pressing Dodge, gains <color=#D91414>30</color> Load Points instead of entering Matrix. When Dodge Gauge is empty, she can consume <color=#D91414>10</color> Load Points to perform a Dodge.', 2: 'Dashes toward the target and delivers a slashing attack, dealing Dark DMG while restoring <color=#D91414>80</color> Signature Energy.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG in total.', 3: 'Leaps down from above to slash the target, converting Combustible into Ignition of equal stacks, dealing Ignition DMG and restoring <color=#D91414>80</color> Signature Energy.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ignition DMG in total. Jetavie gains <color=#D91414>Coreflame Mark</color> for <color=#D91414>10</color>s. Duration resets every time it is triggered.', 4: 'While in Charge Stance, Jetavie can dodge attacks upon release. A successful dodge increases Extra DMG Bonus of the Charged Skill by <color=#D91414>30%</color>. During <color=#D91414>Kinetic Load</color> or <color=#D91414>Kindled Blaze</color>, a successful dodge additionally returns <color=#D91414>2</color> Cluster Orbs.', 5: 'While in Charge Stance, consumes <color=#D91414>250</color> Dodge Gauge to block each incoming attack. If Dodge Gauge is insufficient, consumes <color=#D91414>10 Load Points</color> per block instead.', 6: 'Wields the greatsword to continuously attack the target, dealing Dark DMG.\\n- Basic Attack deals a total of <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG.', 7: 'During sword attacks, quickly transitions into casting <color=#D91414>Crystalline Impact</color> on the target, dealing Ignition DMG and applying Combustible Charges.\\n- By tapping Dodge, deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ignition DMG and applies <color=#D91414>1250</color> Combustible Charges in total.\\n- After pressing and holding Dodge, releases to deal <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Ignition DMG and applies <color=#D91414>2500</color> Combustible Charges in total.', 8: 'During sword attacks, quickly transitions into casting <color=#D91414>Kinetic Load/Kindled Blaze</color> on the target, dealing damage. <color=#D91414>Kinetic Load/Kindled Blaze</color> cast this way cannot be followed up with other attacks.\\n- Charges partially to cast <color=#D91414>Kindled Blaze</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ignition DMG in total.\\n- Charges fully to cast <color=#D91414>Kinetic Load</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Dark DMG in total.', 9: 'Combustible: Every <color=#D91414>250</color> Combustible Charges will add <color=#D91414>1</color> Combustible stack, up to 20 stacks.\\nIgnition: Ignited units take Ignition DMG equal to <color=#D91414>Ignition stacks x30%</color> (Tank Skills will not be triggered) every second for 10s.\\n- Upon the death of the last unit on the battlefield, subsequent units will inherit its Combustible/Ignition status.'}

Title: {1: 'Rising Flames: <color=#0d70bc>Not in Rising Flames Combo + Tap Red Orb</color>', 2: 'Searing Current: <color=#0d70bc>During Rising Flames Combo + Tap Red Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Vera: Geiravor wields her lance to attack, dealing Fire DMG and restoring HP.\\n- Each set of Red Orbs pinged extends the duration of <color=#D91414>Absolute Pyre</color> and grants <color=#D91414>Rekindled Doom</color>.\\n- If <color=#D91414>Penal Immersion</color> is active, Vera: Geiravor instead deals Darkflow DMG and gains Darkflow Reserve.', 2: 'Vera: Geiravor continues to attack the enemy with her lance, dealing Fire DMG and restoring HP.\\n- Each set of Red Orbs pinged extends the duration of <color=#D91414>Absolute Pyre</color> and grants <color=#D91414>Rekindled Doom</color>.\\n- If <color=#D91414>Penal Immersion</color> is active, Vera: Geiravor instead deals Darkflow DMG and gains Darkflow Reserve.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Vera: Geiravor wields her lance to attack, dealing Fire DMG and entering the <color=#D91414>Rising Flames Combo</color>.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Fire DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- Restores <color=#D91414>2%</color>/<color=#D91414>5%</color>/<color=#D91414>10%</color> of max HP based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- Each set of Red Orbs pinged extends <color=#D91414>Absolute Pyre</color> by <color=#D91414>1s</color>, capping at a maximum duration of <color=#D91414>10s</color>.\\n- Each Red Orb pinged grants <color=#D91414>10</color> <color=#D91414>Rekindled Doom</color>, up to <color=#D91414>60</color>.\\n- If <color=#D91414>Penal Immersion</color> is active, Vera: Geiravor instead deals <color=#D91414>{3}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{4}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{5}%</color> Darkflow DMG and gains <color=#D91414>200</color> Darkflow Reserve for every <color=#D91414>1</color> Red Orb pinged.', 2: 'Vera: Geiravor continues to attack the enemy with her lance, dealing Fire DMG and exiting the <color=#D91414>Rising Flames Combo</color>.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Fire DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- Restores <color=#D91414>2%</color>/<color=#D91414>5%</color>/<color=#D91414>10%</color> of max HP based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- Each set of Red Orbs pinged extends <color=#D91414>Absolute Pyre</color> by <color=#D91414>1s</color>, capping at a maximum duration of <color=#D91414>10s</color>.\\n- Each Red Orb pinged grants <color=#D91414>10</color> <color=#D91414>Rekindled Doom</color>, up to <color=#D91414>60</color>.\\n- If <color=#D91414>Penal Immersion</color> is active, Vera: Geiravor instead deals <color=#D91414>{3}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{4}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{5}%</color> Darkflow DMG and gains <color=#D91414>200</color> Darkflow Reserve for every <color=#D91414>1</color> Red Orb pinged.'}

Title: {1: 'Yellow Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Tempered in Midnight automatically clears all Yellow Orbs</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'During <color=#D91414>Untamed Impulse</color>, pinging Blue Orbs generates Yellow Orbs.\\n- <color=#D91414>Shadowhunt Tremor</color> can generate Yellow Orbs.\\n- <color=#D91414>Tempered in Midnight</color> automatically clears all Yellow Orbs.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'During <color=#D91414>Untamed Impulse</color>, every <color=#D91414>3</color> Blue Orbs pinged generates <color=#D91414>2</color> Yellow Orbs.\\n- <color=#D91414>Tempered in Midnight</color> automatically clears all Yellow Orbs.\\n- A maximum of <color=#D91414>6</color> Yellow Orbs can be held.'}

Title: {1: 'Blue Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Blue Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Vera: Geiravor unleashes sweeping attacks, dealing Fire DMG.\\n- Every <color=#D91414>3</color> Blue Orbs pinged generates <color=#D91414>2</color> Yellow Orbs.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Vera: Geiravor unleashes sweeping attacks, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Fire DMG.\\n- Every <color=#D91414>3</color> Blue Orbs pinged generates <color=#D91414>2</color> Yellow Orbs.'}

Title: {1: 'Flash Break: <color=#0d70bc>During Untamed Impulse + Tap Basic Attack</color>', 2: 'Inverse Edge: <color=#0d70bc>During Last Blaze + Tap Basic Attack</color>', 3: 'Ashen Dance: <color=#0d70bc>During Last Blaze + Tap Dodge to Block + Tap Basic Attack repetitively</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'During <color=#D91414>Untamed Impulse</color>, Basic Attacks deal Fire DMG.', 2: "During <color=#D91414>Last Blaze</color>, Basic Attacks deal Fire DMG.\\n- Basic Attacks convert the current <color=#D91414>Final Embers</color> into Vera: Geiravor's HP.\\n- If <color=#D91414>Penal Immersion</color> is active, Vera: Geiravor instead deals Darkflow DMG.", 3: "By tapping Basic Attack right before an enemy attack hits or after successfully blocking through a Dodge in place, Vera: Geiravor can perform a counterattack, dealing Fire DMG.\\n- <color=#D91414>Ashen Dance</color> coverts the current <color=#D91414>Final Embers</color> into Vera: Geiravor's HP.\\n- If <color=#D91414>Penal Immersion</color> is active, Vera: Geiravor instead deals Darkflow DMG."}
SpecificDes: {1: 'During <color=#D91414>Untamed Impulse</color>, Basic Attacks deal <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG.', 2: "During <color=#D91414>Last Blaze</color>, Basic Attacks deal <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG.\\n- Each Basic Attack converts <color=#D91414>2%</color> of the current <color=#D91414>Final Embers</color> into Vera: Geiravor's HP.\\n- If <color=#D91414>Penal Immersion</color> is active, Vera: Geiravor instead deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Darkflow DMG.", 3: 'By tapping Basic Attack right before an enemy attack hits or after successfully blocking through a Dodge in place, Vera: Geiravor can perform a counterattack, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG. This can be cast up to <color=#D91414>3 times</color>. Tap Basic Attack when hit (excluding knockbacks) to instantly counterattack.\\n- Every time Vera: Geiravor casts <color=#D91414>Ashen Dance</color>, coverts <color=#D91414>5%</color> of the current <color=#D91414>Final Embers</color> into her HP.\\n- If <color=#D91414>Penal Immersion</color> is active, Vera: Geiravor instead deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Darkflow DMG.'}

Title: {1: 'Tempered in Midnight: <color=#0d70bc>45 Signature Energy + Tap/Press and Hold Signature</color>', 2: 'Scorched in Void: <color=#0d70bc>During Last Blaze + 120 Signature Energy + Tap Signature</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Channels her battle resolve into the lance, dealing Fire DMG. This skill automatically clears all existing Yellow Orbs and grants an equal number of Red Orbs. In the casting process, triggers Time Lag Calculation and enters <color=#D91414>Last Blaze</color>. After casting <color=#D91414>Tempered in Midnight</color>, Vera: Geiravor triggers Matrix if it is not on cooldown.\\n- Based on the number of Yellow Orbs cleared, converts a portion of current HP into <color=#D91414>Final Embers</color> and gains the <color=#D91414>Absolute Pyre</color> effect.\\n- If this skill is cast by pressing and holding Signature, activates <color=#D91414>Penal Immersion</color>, gains Darkflow Reserve, and deals Darkflow DMG instead.', 2: 'Swings the dual blades in a war dance move, dealing Fire DMG. When casting this skill, triggers Time Lag Calculation before exiting <color=#D91414>Last Blaze</color> and entering <color=#D91414>Untamed Impulse</color>. After casting, ignites <color=#D91414>Evernight Flame</color>, continuously restoring HP to allies within it.\\n- After casting <color=#D91414>Scorched in Void</color>, converts all existing Red Orbs into Blue Orbs.\\n- If <color=#D91414>Penal Immersion</color> is active, Vera: Geiravor instead deals Darkflow DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Channels her battle resolve into the lance, dealing Fire DMG. This skill automatically clears all existing Yellow Orbs and grants an equal number of Red Orbs. In the casting process, triggers Time Lag Calculation and enters <color=#D91414>Last Blaze</color>. After casting <color=#D91414>Tempered in Midnight</color>, Vera: Geiravor triggers Matrix if it is not on cooldown.\\n- Vera: Geiravor can store up to <color=#D91414>45</color> Signature Energy, with the limit increasing to <color=#D91414>120</color> after she enters <color=#D91414>Last Blaze</color>.\\n- Based on <color=#D91414>1/2/3/4/5/6</color> Yellow Orbs cleared, converts <color=#D91414>15%</color>/<color=#D91414>30%</color>/<color=#D91414>45%</color>/<color=#D91414>60%</color>/<color=#D91414>75%</color>/<color=#D91414>90%</color> of current HP into <color=#D91414>Final Embers</color> and gains the <color=#D91414>Absolute Pyre</color> effect. <color=#D91414>Absolute Pyre</color> increases her Base DMG by <color=#D91414>10%</color>/<color=#D91414>20%</color>/<color=#D91414>30%</color>/<color=#D91414>40%</color>/<color=#D91414>50%</color>/<color=#D91414>60%</color> for <color=#D91414>4</color>s.\\n- If Vera: Geiravor already has <color=#D91414>Final Embers</color> and <color=#D91414>Absolute Pyre</color>, casting <color=#D91414>Tempered in Midnight</color> clears the existing <color=#D91414>Final Embers</color> and <color=#D91414>Absolute Pyre</color> and grants them again.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG.\\n- If this skill is cast by pressing and holding Signature, activates <color=#D91414>Penal Immersion</color>, gains <color=#D91414>200</color> Darkflow Reserve, and deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Darkflow DMG instead.', 2: "Swings the dual blades in a war dance move, dealing Fire DMG. When casting this skill, triggers Time Lag Calculation before exiting <color=#D91414>Last Blaze</color> and entering <color=#D91414>Untamed Impulse</color>. After casting, ignites <color=#D91414>Evernight Flame</color>, continuously restoring HP to allies within it.\\n- After casting <color=#D91414>Scorched in Void</color>, converts all existing Red Orbs into Blue Orbs.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG.\\n- If <color=#D91414>Penal Immersion</color> is active, Vera: Geiravor instead deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Darkflow DMG. Exiting <color=#D91414>Last Blaze</color> removes <color=#D91414>Penal Immersion</color>.\\n- After casting, ignites <color=#D91414>Evernight Flame</color>, restoring HP equal to <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> of Vera: Geiravor's max HP per second to allies within it for <color=#D91414>12</color>s."}

Title: {1: 'QTE: <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Deals damage and heals.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Vera: Geiravor swings her weapon, dealing damage and restoring HP.\\n- Deals a total of <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG.\\n- If there is <color=#D91414>at least 1 Darkflow stack</color>, deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Darkflow DMG instead.\\n- Restores HP equal to <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> of max HP.'}

Title: {1: 'Schism Strike', 2: 'Shadowhunt Tremor: <color=#0d70bc>During Untamed Impulse + Press and Hold Basic Attack</color>', 3: 'Hellfire Crucible: <color=#0d70bc>During Last Blaze + 20 Rekindled Doom + Press and Hold Basic Attack</color>', 4: 'Razor Whirlwind: <color=#0d70bc>During Last Blaze + After Hellfire Crucible Combo + 20 Rekindled Doom + Press and Hold Basic Attack</color>', 5: 'Rending Ravage: <color=#0d70bc>During Last Blaze + After Razor Whirlwind Combo + 20 Rekindled Doom + Press and Hold Basic Attack</color>', 6: "Dawnbreaker's Rush", 7: 'Nocturne Incineration', 8: 'Effect: Darkflow'}
BriefDes: {1: 'During <color=#D91414>Untamed Impulse</color>, Vera: Geiravor can cast only Blue Orbs, and her Basic Attacks generate only Blue Orbs.\\n- After entering <color=#D91414>Last Blaze</color>, she can cast only Red Orbs, and her Basic Attacks generate only Red Orbs.\\n- Upon entering <color=#D91414>Last Blaze</color>, retains any unused Blue Orbs from <color=#D91414>Untamed Impulse</color>.\\n- Upon exiting <color=#D91414>Last Blaze</color>, converts all existing Red Orbs into Blue Orbs.\\n- When exiting the battlefield during <color=#D91414>Last Blaze</color>, clears all existing Blue and Red Orbs, then gains Blue Orbs upon re-entry.\\n- Each cast of <color=#D91414>QTE - Infernal Silhouette</color> additionally increases her Base DMG the next time she enters <color=#D91414>Absolute Pyre</color>.', 2: 'Vera: Geiravor strikes the enemy with her lance, dealing Fire DMG. Gains Super Armor and Signature Energy while casting this skill.', 3: 'Vera: Geiravor wields her lance to attack, dealing Fire DMG and entering the <color=#D91414>Hellfire Crucible</color> Combo. Gains Super Armor while casting this skill.\\n- Based on the number of Yellow Orbs cleared by <color=#D91414>Tempered in Midnight</color>, converts <color=#D91414>Final Embers</color> into HP.\\n- If <color=#D91414>Penal Immersion</color> is active, Vera: Geiravor instead deals Darkflow DMG and gains Darkflow Reserve.', 4: "Flames erupt from the tip of Vera: Geiravor's lance as she exits the <color=#D91414>Hellfire Crucible</color> Combo, dealing Fire DMG and entering the <color=#D91414>Razor Whirlwind</color> Combo. Gains Super Armor while casting this skill.\\n- Based on the number of Yellow Orbs cleared by <color=#D91414>Tempered in Midnight</color>, converts <color=#D91414>Final Embers</color> into HP.\\n- If <color=#D91414>Penal Immersion</color> is active, Vera: Geiravor instead deals Darkflow DMG and gains Darkflow Reserve.", 5: 'Vera: Geiravor swings her lance with relentless battle resolve, dealing Fire DMG and exiting the <color=#D91414>Razor Whirlwind</color> Combo. Gains Super Armor while casting this skill.\\n- Based on the number of Yellow Orbs cleared by <color=#D91414>Tempered in Midnight</color>, converts <color=#D91414>Final Embers</color> into HP.\\n- If <color=#D91414>Penal Immersion</color> is active, Vera: Geiravor instead deals Darkflow DMG and gains Darkflow Reserve.', 6: 'When Vera: Geiravor takes damage during <color=#D91414>Last Blaze</color>, converts HP lost into <color=#D91414>Final Embers</color>.\\n- Gains <color=#D91414>DMG Reduction</color> based on the current <color=#D91414>Final Embers</color>.\\n- Converts all <color=#D91414>Final Embers</color> into HP at the end of battle.', 7: 'Allies healed by Vera: Geiravor gain an enhancement effect.\\n- Converting <color=#D91414>Final Embers</color> into HP does not count as healing.', 8: 'Accumulating Darkflow Reserve grants Darkflow stacks. Characters with the Darkflow Effect will gain a <color=#D91414>Darkflow Aura</color> based on the current Darkflow stacks, dealing a small amount of Darkflow DMG over time to enemies and reducing their HP recovery. When the Darkflow stacks reach the threshold, the Aura upgrades, increasing its area of effect and dealing massive Darkflow DMG to enemies within the area.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'During <color=#D91414>Untamed Impulse</color>, Vera: Geiravor can cast only Blue Orbs, and her Basic Attacks generate only Blue Orbs.\\n- After entering <color=#D91414>Last Blaze</color>, she can cast only Red Orbs, and her Basic Attacks generate only Red Orbs.\\n- Upon entering <color=#D91414>Last Blaze</color>, retains any unused Blue Orbs from <color=#D91414>Untamed Impulse</color>.\\n- Upon exiting <color=#D91414>Last Blaze</color>, converts all existing Red Orbs into Blue Orbs.\\n- When exiting the battlefield during <color=#D91414>Last Blaze</color>, clears all existing Blue and Red Orbs, then gains <color=#D91414>2</color> Blue Orbs upon re-entry.\\n- Each cast of <color=#D91414>QTE - Infernal Silhouette</color> additionally increases her Base DMG by <color=#D91414>25%</color> the next time she enters <color=#D91414>Absolute Pyre</color>, up to <color=#D91414>50%</color>.', 2: 'Vera: Geiravor strikes the enemy with her lance, dealing Fire DMG. Gains Super Armor while casting this skill.\\n- When casting a partially charged <color=#D91414>Shadowhunt Tremor</color>, deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG, gains <color=#D91414>12</color> Signature Energy, and restores <color=#D91414>50%</color> of max HP.\\n- When casting a fully charged <color=#D91414>Shadowhunt Tremor</color>, deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Fire DMG, gains <color=#D91414>24</color> Signature Energy, and restores <color=#D91414>100%</color> of max HP.', 3: 'Vera: Geiravor wields her lance to attack, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG and entering the <color=#D91414>Hellfire Crucible</color> Combo. Gains <color=#D91414>10</color> Signature Energy and Super Armor in the process. Casting this skill consumes <color=#D91414>20</color> <color=#D91414>Rekindled Doom</color>.\\n- Based on the number of Yellow Orbs cleared by <color=#D91414>Tempered in Midnight</color>, converts <color=#D91414>Final Embers</color> into HP.\\n- When <color=#D91414>1</color>/<color=#D91414>2</color>/<color=#D91414>3</color>/<color=#D91414>4</color> Yellow Orbs are cleared by <color=#D91414>Tempered in Midnight</color>, converts <color=#D91414>10%</color>/<color=#D91414>15%</color>/<color=#D91414>20%</color>/<color=#D91414>25%</color> of the current <color=#D91414>Final Embers</color> into her HP.\\n- When <color=#D91414>5</color>/<color=#D91414>6</color> Yellow Orbs are cleared by <color=#D91414>Tempered in Midnight</color>, converts <color=#D91414>Final Embers</color> equal to <color=#D91414>10%</color>/<color=#D91414>15%</color> of her max HP into her HP.\\n- If <color=#D91414>Penal Immersion</color> is active, Vera: Geiravor instead deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Darkflow DMG and gains <color=#D91414>200</color> Darkflow Reserve.', 4: "Flames erupt from the tip of Vera: Geiravor's lance as she exits the <color=#D91414>Hellfire Crucible</color> Combo, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG and entering the <color=#D91414>Razor Whirlwind</color> Combo. Gains <color=#D91414>20</color> Signature Energy and Super Armor in the process. Casting this skill consumes <color=#D91414>20</color> <color=#D91414>Rekindled Doom</color>.\\n- Based on the number of Yellow Orbs cleared by <color=#D91414>Tempered in Midnight</color>, converts <color=#D91414>Final Embers</color> into HP.\\n- When <color=#D91414>1</color>/<color=#D91414>2</color>/<color=#D91414>3</color>/<color=#D91414>4</color> Yellow Orbs are cleared by <color=#D91414>Tempered in Midnight</color>, converts <color=#D91414>20%</color>/<color=#D91414>30%</color>/<color=#D91414>40%</color>/<color=#D91414>50%</color> of the current <color=#D91414>Final Embers</color> into her HP.\\n- When <color=#D91414>5</color>/<color=#D91414>6</color> Yellow Orbs are cleared by <color=#D91414>Tempered in Midnight</color>, converts <color=#D91414>Final Embers</color> equal to <color=#D91414>15%</color>/<color=#D91414>20%</color> of her max HP into her HP.\\n- If <color=#D91414>Penal Immersion</color> is active, Vera: Geiravor instead deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Darkflow DMG and gains <color=#D91414>400</color> Darkflow Reserve.", 5: 'Vera: Geiravor swings her lance with relentless battle resolve, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG and exiting the <color=#D91414>Razor Whirlwind</color> Combo. Gains <color=#D91414>70</color> Signature Energy and Super Armor in the process. Casting this skill consumes <color=#D91414>20</color> <color=#D91414>Rekindled Doom</color>.\\n- Based on the number of Yellow Orbs cleared by <color=#D91414>Tempered in Midnight</color>, converts <color=#D91414>Final Embers</color> into HP.\\n- When <color=#D91414>1</color>/<color=#D91414>2</color>/<color=#D91414>3</color>/<color=#D91414>4</color> Yellow Orbs are cleared by <color=#D91414>Tempered in Midnight</color>, converts <color=#D91414>30%</color>/<color=#D91414>50%</color>/<color=#D91414>70%</color>/<color=#D91414>90%</color> of the current <color=#D91414>Final Embers</color> into her HP.\\n- When <color=#D91414>5</color>/<color=#D91414>6</color> Yellow Orbs are cleared by <color=#D91414>Tempered in Midnight</color>, converts <color=#D91414>Final Embers</color> equal to <color=#D91414>50%</color>/<color=#D91414>55%</color> of her max HP into her HP.\\n- If <color=#D91414>Penal Immersion</color> is active, Vera: Geiravor instead deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Darkflow DMG and gains <color=#D91414>1000</color> Darkflow Reserve.', 6: 'When Vera: Geiravor takes damage during <color=#D91414>Last Blaze</color>, converts <color=#D91414>20%</color> of HP lost into <color=#D91414>Final Embers</color>.\\n- The value of <color=#D91414>Final Embers</color> gained cannot exceed her max HP.\\n- Gains <color=#D91414>DMG Reduction</color> based on the current <color=#D91414>Final Embers</color>.\\n- When the current value of <color=#D91414>Final Embers</color> is below <color=#D91414>50%</color> of max HP, gains <color=#D91414>20%</color> DMG Reduction.\\n- When the current value of <color=#D91414>Final Embers</color> is below <color=#D91414>75%</color> but no less than <color=#D91414>50%</color> of max HP, gains <color=#D91414>50%</color> DMG Reduction.\\n- When the current value of <color=#D91414>Final Embers</color> is no less than <color=#D91414>75%</color> of max HP, gains <color=#D91414>75%</color> DMG Reduction.\\n- After being generated, <color=#D91414>Final Embers last for 5s</color> before starting to decrease. This countdown resets when <color=#D91414>Final Embers</color> are converted into HP or new <color=#D91414>Final Embers</color> are generated.\\n- Converts all <color=#D91414>Final Embers</color> into HP at the end of battle.', 7: 'Allies healed by Vera: Geiravor gain the <color=#D91414>Fire Tempered</color> effect that increases Fire DMG by <color=#D91414>20%</color> for <color=#D91414>8</color>s. Duration resets every time it is triggered.\\n- If there is <color=#D91414>at least 1 Darkflow stack</color>, allies healed by her instead gain the <color=#D91414>Dark Radiation</color> effect that increases Dark DMG by <color=#D91414>20%</color> for <color=#D91414>8</color>s. Duration resets every time it is triggered.\\n- Converting <color=#D91414>Final Embers</color> into HP does not count as healing.', 8: 'Every <color=#D91414>200</color> Darkflow Reserve grants 1 Darkflow stack, up to a maximum of 15. Characters with the Darkflow Effect will gain a Darkflow Aura based on the current Darkflow stacks, dealing a small amount of Darkflow DMG over time to enemies and reducing their HP recovery. When the Darkflow stacks reach the threshold, the Aura upgrades, increasing its area of effect and dealing massive Darkflow DMG to enemies within the area.\\n- At <color=#D91414>1/3/6/10/15</color> stacks: Deals <color=#D91414>100%/200%/400%/800%/1600%</color> Darkflow DMG, then deals <color=#D91414>20%/40%/60%/80%/100%</color> Darkflow DMG per second, reducing enemy HP recovery by <color=#D91414>10%/20%/30%/50%/100%</color>.'}

BriefDes: {1: 'Increases ATK of all members by <color=#D91414>10%</color>. Increases Fire DMG and Darkflow DMG of all Amplifiers in the team by <color=#D91414>5%</color>.'}

BriefDes: {1: "All members' ATK and Amplifiers' Elemental DMG Bonus increase when being switched in."}
SpecificDes: {1: "All switched-in members gain an extra <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>{0}%</color></color> ATK and <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>{1}%</color></color> Elemental DMG Bonus of the Amplifier's element for <color=#D91414>10</color>s. If there is <color=#D91414>at least 1 Darkflow stack</color>, Vera: Geiravor's corresponding element will be regarded as Dark."}

Title: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.1: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at S5 Rank</color></color>', 2: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.2: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SS Rank</color></color>'}
BriefDes: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Casting Shadowhunt Tremor, Hellfire Crucible, Razor Whirlwind, Rending Ravage, or Scorched in Void will activate all available QTEs.</color>', 2: '<color=#99a3b1>Pinging Blue Orbs generates 50% more Yellow Orbs.\\n- Casting a fully charged Shadowhunt Tremor automatically pings existing Blue Orbs.\\n- When Absolute Pyre is active, Scorched in Void deals additional damage based on the number of Yellow Orbs cleared by Tempered in Midnight.</color>'}
SpecificDes: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Casting Shadowhunt Tremor, Hellfire Crucible, Razor Whirlwind, Rending Ravage, or Scorched in Void will activate all available QTEs.</color>', 2: '<color=#99a3b1>Pinging Blue Orbs generates 50% more Yellow Orbs. Every 1 Blue Orb pinged generates 1 Yellow Orb.\\n- Casting a fully charged Shadowhunt Tremor automatically pings a maximum of 3 existing Blue Orbs.\\n- When Absolute Pyre is active, Scorched in Void deals damage 1/1/2/2/3/3 more times based on 1/2/3/4/5/6 Yellow Orbs cleared by Tempered in Midnight.</color>'}

Title: {1: 'Lv.1: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at S5 Rank</color>', 2: 'Lv.2: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SS Rank</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Casting <color=#D91414>Shadowhunt Tremor</color>, <color=#D91414>Hellfire Crucible</color>, <color=#D91414>Razor Whirlwind</color>, <color=#D91414>Rending Ravage</color>, or <color=#D91414>Scorched in Void</color> will activate all available QTEs.', 2: 'Pinging Blue Orbs generates <color=#D91414>50%</color> more Yellow Orbs.\\n- Casting a fully charged <color=#D91414>Shadowhunt Tremor</color> automatically pings existing Blue Orbs.\\n- When <color=#D91414>Absolute Pyre</color> is active, <color=#D91414>Scorched in Void</color> deals additional damage based on the number of Yellow Orbs cleared by <color=#D91414>Tempered in Midnight</color>.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Casting <color=#D91414>Shadowhunt Tremor</color>, <color=#D91414>Hellfire Crucible</color>, <color=#D91414>Razor Whirlwind</color>, <color=#D91414>Rending Ravage</color>, or <color=#D91414>Scorched in Void</color> will activate all available QTEs.', 2: 'Pinging Blue Orbs generates <color=#D91414>50%</color> more Yellow Orbs. Every <color=#D91414>1</color> Blue Orb pinged generates <color=#D91414>1</color> Yellow Orb.\\n- Casting a fully charged <color=#D91414>Shadowhunt Tremor</color> automatically pings a maximum of <color=#D91414>3</color> existing Blue Orbs.\\n- When <color=#D91414>Absolute Pyre</color> is active, <color=#D91414>Scorched in Void</color> deals damage <color=#D91414>1/1/2/2/3/3</color> more times based on <color=#D91414>1/2/3/4/5/6</color> Yellow Orbs cleared by <color=#D91414>Tempered in Midnight</color>.'}

SpecificDes: {1: 'Casting <color=#D91414>Shadowhunt Tremor</color>, <color=#D91414>Hellfire Crucible</color>, <color=#D91414>Razor Whirlwind</color>, <color=#D91414>Rending Ravage</color>, or <color=#D91414>Scorched in Void</color> will activate all available QTEs.', 2: 'Pinging Blue Orbs generates <color=#D91414>50%</color> more Yellow Orbs. Every <color=#D91414>1</color> Blue Orb pinged generates <color=#D91414>1</color> Yellow Orb.\\n- Casting a fully charged <color=#D91414>Shadowhunt Tremor</color> automatically pings a maximum of <color=#D91414>3</color> existing Blue Orbs.\\n- When <color=#D91414>Absolute Pyre</color> is active, <color=#D91414>Scorched in Void</color> deals damage <color=#D91414>1/1/2/2/3/3</color> more times based on <color=#D91414>1/2/3/4/5/6</color> Yellow Orbs cleared by <color=#D91414>Tempered in Midnight</color>.'}

Title: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.1: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SS3 Rank</color></color>', 2: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.2: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SSS Rank</color></color>'}
BriefDes: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Allies healed by Vera: Geiravor gain Fire Tempered with its effect increased.\\n- If there is at least 1 Darkflow stack, allies healed by her additionally gain the Cinder Implosion effect.\\n- When Absolute Pyre is active, Rending Ravage deals additional damage based on the number of Yellow Orbs cleared by Tempered in Midnight.</color>', 2: '<color=#99a3b1>Whenever a member is switched in, cooldown of all QTE Skills will be reset.\\n- Allies healed by Vera: Geiravor gain Fire Tempered with its effect increased.\\n- If there is at least 1 Darkflow stack, allies healed by her additionally gain the Cinder Implosion effect.\\n- Every time she enters the battlefield, additionally gains Yellow Orbs and Signature Energy. Upon first entering Last Blaze, additionally gains Signature Energy and Rekindled Doom.\\n- Pinging Blue Orbs additionally grants Signature Energy.\\n- When Absolute Pyre is active, Base DMG of Shadowhunt Tremor, Hellfire Crucible, Razor Whirlwind, and Rending Ravage increases.</color>'}
SpecificDes: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Allies healed by Vera: Geiravor gain Fire Tempered with its effect increased by 10%.\\n- If there is at least 1 Darkflow stack, allies healed by her additionally gain a 10% Cinder Implosion effect.\\n- When Absolute Pyre is active,Rending Ravage deals damage 1/1/2/2/3/3 more times based on 1/2/3/4/5/6 Yellow Orbs cleared by Tempered in Midnight.</color>', 2: '<color=#99a3b1>Whenever a member is switched in, cooldown of all QTE Skills will be reset.\\n- Allies healed by Vera: Geiravor gain Fire Tempered with its effect increased by 10%.\\n- If there is at least 1 Darkflow stack, allies healed by her additionally gain a 10% Cinder Implosion effect. Every time she enters the battlefield, additionally gains 3 Yellow Orbs and 10 Signature Energy. Upon first entering Last Blaze, additionally gains 10 Signature Energy and 30 Rekindled Doom.\\n- Pinging a set of Blue Orbs additionally grants 12 Signature Energy.\\n- When Absolute Pyre is active, Base DMG of Shadowhunt Tremor, Hellfire Crucible, Razor Whirlwind, and Rending Ravage increases by 50%.</color>'}

Title: {1: 'Lv.1: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SS3 Rank</color>', 2: 'Lv.2: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SSS Rank</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Allies healed by Vera: Geiravor gain <color=#D91414>Fire Tempered</color> with its effect increased.\\n- If there is <color=#D91414>at least 1 Darkflow stack</color>, allies healed by her additionally gain the <color=#D91414>Cinder Implosion</color> effect.\\n- When <color=#D91414>Absolute Pyre</color> is active, <color=#D91414>Rending Ravage</color> deals additional damage based on the number of Yellow Orbs cleared by <color=#D91414>Tempered in Midnight</color>.', 2: 'Whenever a member is switched in, cooldown of all QTE Skills will be reset.\\n- Allies healed by Vera: Geiravor gain <color=#D91414>Fire Tempered</color> with its effect increased.\\n- If there is <color=#D91414>at least 1 Darkflow stack</color>, allies healed by her additionally gain the <color=#D91414>Cinder Implosion</color> effect.\\n- <color=#D91414>Every time she enters the battlefield</color>, additionally gains <color=#D91414>Yellow Orbs</color> and <color=#D91414>Signature Energy</color>. Upon first entering <color=#D91414>Last Blaze</color>, additionally gains <color=#D91414>Signature Energy</color> and <color=#D91414>Rekindled Doom</color>.\\n- Pinging Blue Orbs additionally grants <color=#D91414>Signature Energy</color>.\\n- When <color=#D91414>Absolute Pyre</color> is active, Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Shadowhunt Tremor</color>, <color=#D91414>Hellfire Crucible</color>, <color=#D91414>Razor Whirlwind</color>, and <color=#D91414>Rending Ravage</color> increases.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Allies healed by Vera: Geiravor gain <color=#D91414>Fire Tempered</color> with its effect increased by <color=#D91414>10%</color>.\\n- If there is <color=#D91414>at least 1 Darkflow stack</color>, allies healed by her additionally gain a <color=#D91414>10%</color> <color=#D91414>Cinder Implosion</color> effect.\\n- When <color=#D91414>Absolute Pyre</color> is active, <color=#D91414>Rending Ravage</color> deals damage <color=#D91414>1/1/2/2/3/3</color> more times based on <color=#D91414>1/2/3/4/5/6</color> Yellow Orbs cleared by <color=#D91414>Tempered in Midnight</color>.', 2: 'Whenever a member is switched in, cooldown of all QTE Skills will be reset.\\n- Allies healed by Vera: Geiravor gain <color=#D91414>Fire Tempered</color> with its effect increased by <color=#D91414>10%</color>.\\n- If there is <color=#D91414>at least 1 Darkflow stack</color>, allies healed by her additionally gain a <color=#D91414>10%</color> <color=#D91414>Cinder Implosion</color> effect. <color=#D91414>Every time she enters the battlefield</color>, additionally gains <color=#D91414>3 Yellow Orbs</color> and <color=#D91414>10</color> <color=#D91414>Signature Energy</color>. Upon first entering <color=#D91414>Last Blaze</color>, additionally gains <color=#D91414>10</color> <color=#D91414>Signature Energy</color> and <color=#D91414>30</color> <color=#D91414>Rekindled Doom</color>.\\n- Pinging a set of Blue Orbs additionally grants <color=#D91414>12</color> <color=#D91414>Signature Energy</color>.\\n- When <color=#D91414>Absolute Pyre</color> is active, Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Shadowhunt Tremor</color>, <color=#D91414>Hellfire Crucible</color>, <color=#D91414>Razor Whirlwind</color>, and <color=#D91414>Rending Ravage</color> increases by <color=#D91414>50%</color>.'}

Title: {1: 'Void Slash: <color=#0d70bc>Wielding Yamato + Tap Red Orb</color>', 2: 'Weapon Switching: <color=#0d70bc>Without Yamato + Tap Red Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Vergil slashes with Yamato and slows enemy unit down, dealing Ultima Slash DMG (higher Ultima Slash DMG when in SDT Form). Recovers a total of <color=#D91414>100/200/300 points of SDT</color> over time. Gains Super Armor during 3-Pings.\\n- During end lag, tap Basic Attack to make Vergil cast Rapid Slash (regarded as a Basic Attack), dealing Ultima Slash DMG (higher Ultima Slash DMG when in SDT Form) and restoring a total of <color=#D91414>150 points of SDT</color> over time. Vergil gains Super Armor meanwhile.', 2: 'Vergil switches his weapon to Yamato.\\n-Vergil enters the battlefield with Yamato.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Vergil slashes with Yamato and slows enemy unit down, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG (<color=#D91414>{3}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{4}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{5}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG when in SDT Form). Recovers a total of <color=#D91414>100/200/300 points of SDT</color> over time. Gains Super Armor during 3-Pings.\\n- During end lag, tap Basic Attack to make Vergil cast Rapid Slash (regarded as a Basic Attack), dealing <color=#D91414>{6}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG (<color=#D91414>{7}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG when in SDT Form) and restoring a total of <color=#D91414>150 points of SDT</color> over time. Vergil gains Super Armor meanwhile.\\n- When cast with no Devil Soul owned, Vergil cannot gain <color=#D91414>Signature Energy/SDT</color>.', 2: 'Vergil switches his weapon to Yamato.\\n-Vergil enters the battlefield with Yamato.'}

Title: {1: 'Kick 13: <color=#0d70bc>Wielding Beowulf + Tap Yellow Orb</color>', 2: 'Weapon Switching: <color=#0d70bc>Without Beowulf + Tap Yellow Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Vergil kicks and deals Physical DMG (higher Physical DMG when in SDT form). Recovers a total of <color=#D91414>50/100/150 points of SDT</color> over time. Gains Super Armor during 3-Pings.\\n- During end lag, press and hold Basic Attack to make Vergil cast Rising Sun (regarded as a Basic Attack), dealing Physical DMG (higher Physical DMG when in SDT Form) and restoring <color=#D91414>150 points of SDT</color>. Vergil gains Super Armor meanwhile.\\n- Casting Rising Sun will make the next Judgment Cut End deal Physical DMG instead.', 2: 'Vergil switches his weapon to Beowulf.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Vergil kicks and deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG (<color=#D91414>{3}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{4}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{5}%</color> Physical DMG when in SDT form). Recovers a total of <color=#D91414>50/100/150 points of SDT</color> over time. Gains Super Armor during 3-Pings.\\n- During end lag, press and hold Basic Attack to make Vergil cast Rising Sun (regarded as a Basic Attack), dealing <color=#D91414>{6}%</color> Physical DMG (<color=#D91414>{7}%</color> Physical DMG when in SDT Form) and restoring <color=#D91414>150 points of SDT</color>. Vergil gains Super Armor meanwhile.\\n- Casting Rising Sun will make the next Judgment Cut End deal Physical DMG instead.\\n- When cast with no Devil Soul owned, Vergil cannot gain <color=#D91414>Signature Energy/SDT</color>.', 2: 'Vergil switches his weapon to Beowulf.'}

Title: {1: 'Drive: <color=#0d70bc>Wielding Mirage Edge + Tap Blue Orb</color>', 2: 'Weapon Switching: <color=#0d70bc>Without Mirage Edge + Tap Blue Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Vergil launches a reverse grip slash, dealing Ultima Slash DMG (higher Ultima Slash DMG when in SDT Form) and restoring a total of <color=#D91414>50/100/150 points of SDT</color> over time. Gains Super Armor during 3-Pings.\\n- During end lag, press and hold Basic Attack to charge and cast Over Drive (regarded as a Basic Attack), restoring <color=#D91414>150 points of SDT</color>, dealing Ultima Slash DMG (higher Ultima Slash DMG when in SDT Form) based on Charge Level 0-3 and accumulating <color=#D91414>100/300/400/600 Sharp Reserve</color> for the team. Vergil gains Super Armor meanwhile.', 2: 'Vergil switches his weapon to Mirage Edge.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Vergil launches a reverse grip slash, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG (<color=#D91414>{3}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{4}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{5}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG when in SDT Form) and restoring a total of <color=#D91414>50/100/150 points of SDT</color>. Gains Super Armor during 3-Pings.\\n- During end lag, press and hold Basic Attack to charge and cast Over Drive (regarded as a Basic Attack), restoring <color=#D91414>150 points of SDT</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>{6}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{7}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{8}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{9}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG (<color=#D91414>{10}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{11}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{12}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{13}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG when in SDT Form) based on Charge Level 0-3 and accumulating <color=#D91414>100/300/400/600 Sharp Reserve</color> for the team. Vergil gains Super Armor meanwhile.\\n- When cast with no Devil Soul owned, Vergil cannot gain <color=#D91414>Signature Energy/SDT</color>.', 2: 'Vergil switches his weapon to Mirage Edge.'}

Title: {1: 'Yamato Combo: <color=#0d70bc>With Yamato + Tap Basic Attack</color>', 2: 'Beowulf Combo: <color=#0d70bc>With Beowulf + Tap Basic Attack</color>', 3: 'Mirage Edge Combo: <color=#0d70bc>With Mirage Edge + Tap Basic Attack</color>', 4: 'Million Stab: <color=#0d70bc>Wielding Mirage Edge + Move Joystick + Dodge + Press and hold Basic Attack OR During the end lag of a two-hit combo + Quickly tap Basic Attack</color>', 5: 'Aerial Strike: <color=#0d70bc>Midair + Tap Basic Attack</color>', 6: 'Dodge Combo: <color=#0d70bc>Dodge + Tap Basic Attack</color>', 7: 'Jump: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Jump</color>', 8: 'Upper Slash: <color=#0d70bc>With Yamato/Mirage Edge + Ground + Press and Hold Jump</color>', 9: 'Beowulf - Uppercut: <color=#0d70bc>With Beowulf + Press and Hold Jump</color>', 10: 'Plunge Strike: <color=#0d70bc>Midair + Tap Jump</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Launches 3 attacks with Yamato, dealing Ultima Slash DMG (higher Ultima Slash DMG when in SDT Form). Keep tapping Basic Attack afterward to follow up with a vertical slash, dealing Ultima Slash DMG (higher Ultima Slash DMG when in SDT Form). Keep tapping Basic Attack afterward in SDT Form to follow up with a triple slash, dealing Ultima Slash DMG. If SDT Form ends during the process, then deals less Ultima Slash DMG.\\n- If Vergil is in SDT Form, each of the abovementioned Basic Attack will consume 1 Devil Soul (and restore 2 Devil Souls in Matrix status), increase Base DMG, and restore <color=#D91414>14 Signature Energy and 30 JCE Points.</color>\\nShortly pause after the 3 attacks and tap Basic Attack to follow up with a chain slash, dealing Ultima Slash DMG (higher Ultima Slash DMG when in SDT Form). Tap Basic Attack afterward to follow up with a horizontal slash, dealing Ultima Slash DMG (higher Ultima Slash DMG when in SDT Form).', 2: 'Launches 4 attacks with Beowulf, or 5 attacks if in SDT Form. Vergil can charge during each of these attacks and deal Physical DMG (higher Physical DMG when in SDT Form) based on Charge Level 0-3.\\n- If Vergil is in SDT Form, each of these attacks will restore <color=#D91414>9 Signature Energy and 5/10/20/30 JCE Points (based on Charge Level)</color>.', 3: 'Launches a two-hit combo with Mirage Edge, dealing Ultima Slash DMG (higher Ultima Slash DMG when in SDT Form). (Each hit restores <color=#D91414>30 JCE Points</color>.) Keep tapping Basic Attack afterward to follow up with a thrust, dealing Ultima Slash DMG (higher Ultima Slash DMG when in SDT Form).', 4: 'Casts up to 2 chain stabs, with each stab dealing Ultima Slash DMG. Automatically follows up with a finishing stab afterward, dealing Ultima Slash DMG. If Vergil is in SDT Form, each chain stab will deal Ultima Slash DMG and trigger an Ultima Slash. Meanwhile, each chain stab can consume 1 Devil Soul (and restore 2 Devil Souls in Matrix status), increase Base DMG, and restore <color=#D91414>11 Signature Energy and 15 JCE Points</color>. If Vergil is in SDT Form, keep pressing or quickly tapping Basic Attack after the 2 chain stabs to increase the number of chain stabs. Vergil will deal more Ultima Slash DMG and restore <color=#D91414>11 Signature Energy</color> through the finishing stab in SDT Form.', 5: 'Vergil launches an aerial attack. <color=#D91414>Yamato - Aerial Rave</color> deals Ultima Slash DMG (higher Ultima Slash DMG when in SDT Form). <color=#D91414>Beowulf - Aerial Lunar Phase</color> deals Physical DMG (higher Physical DMG when in SDT Form). <color=#D91414>Mirage Edge - Helm Breaker Slash</color> deals Ultima Slash DMG (higher Ultima Slash DMG when in SDT Form).', 6: 'Vergil dodges and then attacks. <color=#D91414>Yamato - Rapid Slash</color> deals Ultima Slash DMG (higher Ultima Slash DMG when in SDT Form). <color=#D91414>Beowulf - Lunar Phase</color> deals Physical DMG (higher Physical DMG when in SDT Form). <color=#D91414>Mirage Edge - Stinger</color> deals Ultima Slash DMG (higher Ultima Slash DMG when in SDT Form). Recovers Dodge Gauge after casting.', 7: 'Vergil jumps. Deals Physical DMG when carrying Beowulf.', 8: 'Vergil casts an upper slash. If carrying Yamato, deals Ultima Slash DMG (higher Ultima Slash DMG when in SDT Form). If carrying Mirage Edge, deals Ultima Slash DMG (higher Ultima Slash DMG when in SDT Form).', 9: 'Casts a Rising Attack with Beowulf. Launches Enhanced Beast Uppercut/Rising Dragon/Dragon Breaker/Enhanced Dragon Breaker respectively based on Charge Level 0-3, dealing Physical DMG (higher Physical DMG when in SDT Form). When casting Dragon Breaker/Enhanced Dragon Breaker in SDT Form, casts Dragon Breaker 2/Enhanced Dragon Breaker 2 instead, dealing Physical DMG, which cannot be interrupted. If SDT Form ends during the process, then deals less Physical DMG instead.\\n- Casting Dragon Breaker 2/Enhanced Dragon Breaker 2 in SDT Form will restore <color=#D91414>24 Signature Energy and 40/80 JCE Points</color> and consume up to 7 Devil Souls (and restore 3 Devil Souls in Matrix status), with each Devil Soul consumed increasing Base DMG and restoring <color=#D91414>6 Signature Energy and 10 JCE Points</color>.', 10: 'Vergil casts a plunge attack. <color=#D91414>Yamato - Aerial Cleave</color> deals Ultima Slash DMG (higher Ultima Slash DMG when in SDT Form). <color=#D91414>Beowulf - Starfall</color> deals Physical DMG (higher Physical DMG when in SDT Form). <color=#D91414>Mirage Edge - Helm Breaker Cleave</color> deals Ultima Slash DMG (higher Ultima Slash DMG when in SDT Form).'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Launches 3 attacks with Yamato, dealing a total of <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG (or a total of <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG when in SDT Form). Keep tapping Basic Attack afterward to follow up with a vertical slash, dealing <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG (<color=#D91414>{3}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG when in SDT Form). Keep tapping Basic Attack afterward in SDT Form to follow up with a triple slash, dealing <color=#D91414>{4}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG. If SDT Form ends during the process, then deals <color=#D91414>{5}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG instead.\\n- If Vergil is in SDT Form, each of the abovementioned Basic Attack will consume 1 Devil Soul (and restore 2 Devil Souls in Matrix status), increase Base DMG by <color=#D91414>100%</color>, and restore <color=#D91414>14 Signature Energy and 30 JCE Points.</color>\\nShortly pause after the 3 attacks and tap Basic Attack to follow up with a chain slash, dealing <color=#D91414>{6}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG (<color=#D91414>{7}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG when in SDT Form). Tap Basic Attack afterward to follow up with a horizontal slash, dealing <color=#D91414>{8}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG (<color=#D91414>{9}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG when in SDT Form).', 2: 'Launches 4 attacks with Beowulf, or 5 attacks if in SDT Form. Vergil can charge during each of these attacks and deal <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{3}%</color> Physical DMG (<color=#D91414>{4}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{5}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{6}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{7}%</color> Physical DMG when in SDT Form) based on Charge Level 0-3.\\n- If Vergil is in SDT Form, each of these attacks will restore <color=#D91414>9 Signature Energy and 5/10/20/30 JCE Points (based on Charge Level)</color>.', 3: 'Launches a two-hit combo with Mirage Edge, dealing a total of <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG (or a total of <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG when in SDT Form. Each hit restores <color=#D91414>30 JCE Points</color>.) Keep tapping Basic Attack afterward to follow up with a thrust, dealing <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG (<color=#D91414>{3}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG when in SDT Form).', 4: 'Casts up to 2 chain stabs, with each stab dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG. Automatically follows up with a finishing stab afterward, dealing <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG. If Vergil is in SDT Form, each chain stab will deal <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG and trigger an Ultima Slash. Meanwhile, each chain stab can consume 1 Devil Soul (and restore 2 Devil Souls in Matrix status), increase Base DMG by <color=#D91414>100%</color>, and restore <color=#D91414>11 Signature Energy and 15 JCE Points</color>. If Vergil is in SDT Form, keep pressing or quickly tapping Basic Attack after the 2 chain stabs to increase the number of chain stabs. Vergil will deal <color=#D91414>{3}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG and restore <color=#D91414>11 Signature Energy</color> through the finishing stab in SDT Form.', 5: 'Vergil launches an aerial attack. <color=#D91414>Yamato - Aerial Rave</color> deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG (<color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG when in SDT Form). <color=#D91414>Beowulf - Aerial Lunar Phase</color> deals <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG (<color=#D91414>{3}%</color> Physical DMG when in SDT Form). <color=#D91414>Mirage Edge - Helm Breaker Slash</color> deals <color=#D91414>{4}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG (<color=#D91414>{5}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG when in SDT Form).', 6: 'Vergil dodges and then attacks. <color=#D91414>Yamato - Rapid Slash</color> deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG (<color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG when in SDT Form). <color=#D91414>Beowulf - Lunar Phase</color> deals <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG (higher <color=#D91414>{3}%</color> DMG when in SDT Form). <color=#D91414>Mirage Edge - Stinger</color> deals <color=#D91414>{4}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG (<color=#D91414>{5}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG when in SDT Form). Recovers 250 Dodge Gauge within 2.5s after casting.', 7: 'Vergil jumps. Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG when carrying Beowulf.', 8: 'Vergil casts an upper slash. If carrying Yamato, deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG (<color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG when in SDT Form). If carrying Mirage Edge, dealing <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG (<color=#D91414>{3}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG when in SDT Form).', 9: 'Casts a Rising Attack with Beowulf. Launches Beast Uppercut/Rising Dragon/Dragon Breaker/Enhanced Dragon Breaker respectively based on Charge Level 0-3, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{3}%</color> Physical DMG (<color=#D91414>{4}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{5}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{6}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{7}%</color> Physical DMG when in SDT Form). When casting Dragon Breaker/Enhanced Dragon Breaker in SDT Form, casts Dragon Breaker 2/Enhanced Dragon Breaker 2 instead, dealing <color=#D91414>{8}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{9}%</color> Physical DMG, which cannot be interrupted. If SDT Form ends during the process, then deals <color=#D91414>{10}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{11}%</color> Physical DMG instead.\\n- Casting Dragon Breaker 2/Enhanced Dragon Breaker 2 in SDT Form will restore <color=#D91414>24 Signature Energy and 40/80 JCE Points</color> and consume up to 7 Devil Souls (and restore 3 Devil Souls in Matrix), with each Devil Soul consumed increasing Base DMG by <color=#D91414>100%</color> and restoring <color=#D91414>6 Signature Energy and 10 JCE Points</color>.', 10: 'Vergil casts a plunge attack. <color=#D91414>Yamato - Aerial Cleave</color> deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG (<color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG when in SDT Form). <color=#D91414>Beowulf - Starfall</color> deals <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG (<color=#D91414>{3}%</color> Physical DMG when in SDT Form). <color=#D91414>Mirage Edge - Helm Breaker Cleave</color> deals <color=#D91414>{4}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG (<color=#D91414>{5}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG when in SDT Form).'}

Title: {1: 'Sin Devil Trigger: <color=#0d70bc>Not in SDT Form + 300 Points of SDT + Tap Signature</color>', 2: 'Judgment Cut End: <color=#0d70bc>90 Signature Energy + Not in SDT Form, Press and hold Signature/In SDT Form, tap Signature</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Vergil unleashes the power of the devil blood and enters SDT Form, causing a DT Burst, dealing Ultima Slash DMG, and triggering <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color>. In SDT Form, Vergil will have greatly enhanced strength, speed, special abilities, <color=#D91414>gain Super Armor, and deal more damage through all skills</color>. However, he will not be able to restore Devil Souls or Signature Energy through Basic Attacks in SDT Form.\\n- In SDT Form, Vergil consumes <color=#D91414>20 points of SDT</color> every second and cannot restore SDT. He will automatically exit SDT Form at 0 SDT.\\n- Casting this skill will not interrupt any Basic Attack.', 2: "Vergil casts his Ultimate Ability, shattering space and time, clearing all SDT, and dealing Ultima Slash DMG (higher Ultima Slash DMG when in SDT Form). Triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> meanwhile.\\n- Each JCE Point will increase Judgment Cut End's Base DMG, up to <color=#D91414>300</color> Points.\\n- Judgment Cut End will always consume the remaining Truewill and deal bonus Ultima Slash DMG per Truewill consumed."}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Vergil unleashes the power of the devil blood and enters SDT Form, causing a DT Burst, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG, and triggering <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color>. In SDT Form, Vergil will have greatly enhanced strength, speed, special abilities, <color=#D91414>gain Super Armor, and deal more damage through all skills</color>. However, he will not be able to restore Devil Souls or Signature Energy through Basic Attacks or pinging orbs in SDT Form.\\n- In SDT Form, Vergil consumes <color=#D91414>20 points of SDT</color> every second and cannot restore SDT. He will automatically exit SDT Form at 0 SDT.\\n- Casting this skill will not interrupt any Basic Attack.', 2: "Vergil casts his Ultimate Ability, shattering space and time, clearing all SDT, and dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG (<color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG when in SDT Form). Triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> meanwhile.\\n- Each JCE Point will increase Judgment Cut End's Base DMG by <color=#D91414>0.6%</color>, up to <color=#D91414>300</color> Points.\\n- Judgment Cut End will always consume the remaining Truewill and deal bonus <color=#D91414>360%</color> Ultima Slash DMG per Truewill consumed."}

Title: {1: 'Judgment Cut: <color=#0d70bc>With Yamato + Press and Hold Red Orb/Basic Attack/Jump + Release Button</color>', 2: 'Round Trip: <color=#0d70bc>With Mirage Edge + Press and Hold Blue Orb/Basic Attack/Jump Until Weapon Glows + Release Button</color>', 3: 'Doppelganger', 4: 'Air Trick: <color=#0d70bc>Ground + Locked-on Enemy + Not Push Joystick + Press and Hold Dodge</color>', 5: 'Provocation: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Core Passive Bar</color>', 6: 'Mirage Blades: <color=#0d70bc>Netherworld Arm Not Charged + Tap Netherworld Arm</color>', 7: 'Blistering/Heavy Rain Blades: <color=#0d70bc>Netherworld Arm Charged + Push/Not Push Joystick + Tap Netherworld Arm</color>', 8: 'Storm/Spiral Blades: <color=#0d70bc>Netherworld Arm Charged + Push/Not Push Joystick + Press and Hold Netherworld Arm</color>', 9: 'Effect: Ultima Slash'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Casts Judgment Cut after performing the corresponding action, dealing Ultima Slash DMG.\\nWhen Vergil is in SDT Form, Judgment Cut has a bigger range and deals more Ultima Slash DMG. Meanwhile, he can spend up to 3 Devil Souls and restore <color=#D91414>7 Signature Energy and 5 JCE Points</color> per Devil Soul consumed.\\n- When team has more than 3 Truewill and Vergil is in SDT Form, Judgment Cut will consume <color=#D91414>3 Truewill</color>, have higher Base DMG, deal fixed Ultima Slash DMG, and restore <color=#D91414>25 JCE Points</color>.\\n- Release the corresponding button when the weapon glows to cast Precise Judgment Cut, up to 3 times. If Vergil is in SDT Form, keep holding Basic Attack to cast Judgment Cut continuously, and consuming Devil Souls is regarded as Precise Judgment Cut. Precise Judgment Cuts can be cast at a faster speed.', 2: 'Throws out Mirage Edge after the corresponding action, dealing Ultima Slash DMG (higher Ultima Slash DMG when in SDT Form).\\n- Casting a Mirage Edge skill after throwing the blade out will call it back in priority.', 3: 'In SDT Form, Vergil will launch joint attacks with his Doppelganger. Each joint attack deals Ultima Slash DMG.', 4: 'Vergil quickly approaches the locked-on enemy.', 5: 'Vergil taunts the enemy, dealing Ultima Slash DMG.', 6: 'Deals Ultima Slash DMG with Mirage Blades.\\n- This skill can be cast without any Netherworld Arm equipped.', 7: 'Blistering: Deals Ultima Slash DMG (higher Ultima Slash DMG when carrying Netherworld Arm - Mirage Blades).\\nHeavy Rain: Deals Ultima Slash DMG and slows enemy unit down. Deals more Ultima Slash DMG when carrying Netherworld Arm - Mirage Blades.\\n- Equipping a Netherworld Arm other than Mirage Blades will trigger the corresponding active skill.', 8: "Storm: Deals Ultima Slash DMG. Deals more Ultima Slash DMG when carrying Netherworld Arm - Mirage Blades.\\nSpiral: Deals Ultima Slash DMG. Deals more Ultima Slash DMG when carrying Netherworld Arm - Mirage Blades.\\n- Equipping a Netherworld Arm that is not Mirage Blades will trigger the Netherworld Arm's Active Skill.", 9: 'Certain skills build up <color=#D91414>Sharp Reserve</color>. <color=#D91414>Sharp Reserve</color> can be passed on to the next character affected by Ultima Slash effect, up to <color=#D91414>999</color> points.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Casts Judgment Cut after performing the corresponding action, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG.\\nWhen Vergil is in SDT Form, Judgment Cut has a bigger range and deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG. Meanwhile, he can spend up to 3 Devil Souls and restore <color=#D91414>7 Signature Energy and 5 JCE Points</color> per Devil Soul consumed.\\n- When team has more than 3 Truewill and Vergil is in SDT Form, Judgment Cut will consume <color=#D91414>3 Truewill</color>, have <color=#D91414>30%</color> higher Base DMG, deal fixed <color=#D91414>600%</color> Ultima Slash DMG, and restore <color=#D91414>25 JCE Points</color>.\\n- Release the corresponding button when the weapon glows to cast Precise Judgment Cut, up to 3 times. If Vergil is in SDT Form, keep holding Basic Attack to cast Judgment Cut continuously, and consuming Devil Souls is regarded as Precise Judgment Cut. Precise Judgment Cuts can be cast at a faster speed.', 2: 'Throws out Mirage Edge after the corresponding action, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG (<color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG when in SDT Form).\\n- Casting a Mirage Edge skill after throwing the blade out will call it back in priority.', 3: 'In SDT Form, Vergil will launch joint attacks with his Doppelganger. Each joint attack deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG.', 4: 'Vergil quickly approaches the locked-on enemy.', 5: 'Vergil taunts the enemy, dealing <color=#D91414>1%</color> Ultima Slash DMG.', 6: 'Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG with Mirage Blades.\\n- This skill can be cast without any Netherworld Arm equipped.', 7: 'Blistering: Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG (<color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG when carrying Netherworld Arm - Mirage Blades).\\nHeavy Rain: Deals <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG and slows enemy unit down. Deals <color=#D91414>{3}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG when carrying Netherworld Arm - Mirage Blades.\\n- Equipping a Netherworld Arm other than Mirage Blades will trigger the corresponding active skill.', 8: "Storm: Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG. Deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG when carrying Netherworld Arm - Mirage Blades.\\nSpiral: Deals <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG. Deals <color=#D91414>{3}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG when carrying Netherworld Arm - Mirage Blades.\\n- Equipping a Netherworld Arm that is not Mirage Blades will trigger the Netherworld Arm's Active Skill.", 9: 'Certain skills build up <color=#D91414>Sharp Reserve</color>. <color=#D91414>Sharp Reserve</color> can be passed on to the next character affected by Ultima Slash effect, up to <color=#D91414>999</color> points.\\n- When <color=#D91414>Sharp Reserve</color> reaches <color=#D91414>100</color> points, the next skill with <color=#D91414>Ultima Slash</color> effect that hits an enemy will consume <color=#D91414>100 points of Sharp Reserve</color> to trigger a <color=#D91414>Ultima Slash</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>400%</color> Ultima Slash DMG.\\n- Gains 1 point of <color=#D91414>Truewill</color> each time it triggers, up to <color=#D91414>90</color> points.'}

BriefDes: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Casting Sin Devil Trigger and Judgment Cut End will activate all available QTEs.</color>', 2: '<color=#99a3b1>Restores 3 Devil Souls when switched in.\\nVergil gains CRIT DMG when in SDT Form.\\nAfter casting Judgment Cut End and exiting the battlefield, launches an attack at nearby enemies once every 2s (up to 4 times), dealing Physical DMG.</color>'}
SpecificDes: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Casting Sin Devil Trigger and Judgment Cut End will activate all available QTEs.</color>', 2: '<color=#99a3b1>Restores 3 Devil Souls when switched in.\\nVergil gains 20% CRIT DMG when in SDT Form.\\nAfter casting Judgment Cut End and exiting the battlefield, launches an attack at nearby enemies once every 2s (up to 4 times), dealing 4000% Physical DMG.</color>'}

Title: {1: 'Lv.1: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at S5 Rank</color>', 2: 'Lv.2: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SS Rank</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Casting <color=#D91414>Sin Devil Trigger</color> and <color=#D91414>Judgment Cut End</color> will activate all available QTEs.', 2: 'Restores 3 Devil Souls when switched in.\\nVergil gains CRIT DMG when in SDT Form.\\nAfter casting <color=#D91414>Judgment Cut End</color> and exiting the battlefield, launches an attack at nearby enemies once every 2s (up to 4 times), dealing Physical DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Casting <color=#D91414>Sin Devil Trigger</color> and <color=#D91414>Judgment Cut End</color> will activate all available QTEs.', 2: 'Restores 3 Devil Souls when switched in.\\nVergil gains <color=#D91414>20%</color> CRIT DMG when in SDT Form.\\nAfter casting <color=#D91414>Judgment Cut End</color> and exiting the battlefield, launches an attack at nearby enemies once every 2s (up to 4 times), dealing <color=#D91414>4000%</color> Physical DMG.'}

Title: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.1: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SS3 Rank</color></color>', 2: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.2: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SSS Rank</color></color>'}
BriefDes: {1: "<color=#99a3b1>Doppelganger's joint attacks gain an Extra DMG Bonus.\\nAfter Judgment Cut End is cast, QTE: Judgment Cut Fall's Base DMG will increase throughout the battle.</color>", 2: "<color=#99a3b1>Each JCE Point will increase Judgment Cut End's Base DMG. Judgment Cut End will deal additional Ultima Slash DMG per Truewill consumed.</color>"}
SpecificDes: {1: "<color=#99a3b1>Doppelganger's joint attacks gain a 200% Extra DMG Bonus.\\nAfter Judgment Cut End is cast, QTE: Judgment Cut Fall's Base DMG will increase by 1000% throughout the battle.</color>", 2: "<color=#99a3b1>Each JCE Point will increase Judgment Cut End's Base DMG by 0.6%. Judgment Cut End will deal an additional 120% Ultima Slash DMG per Truewill consumed.</color>"}

Title: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.1: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SSS3 Rank</color></color>', 2: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.2: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SSS6 Rank</color></color>', 3: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.3: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SSS+ Rank</color></color>'}
BriefDes: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Signature Moves and additional damage dealt by Judgment Cut End at the cost of Truewill gain an Extra DMG Bonus.</color>', 2: '<color=#99a3b1>Basic Attacks, Judgment Cuts, and follow-up damage dealt by Judgment Cuts at the cost of Truewill gain an Extra DMG Bonus.</color>', 3: '<color=#99a3b1>Vergil gains an additional Extra DMG Bonus in the SDT Form.</color>'}
SpecificDes: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Signature Moves and additional damage dealt by Judgment Cut End at the cost of Truewill gain a 30% Extra DMG Bonus.</color>', 2: '<color=#99a3b1>Basic Attacks, Judgment Cuts, and follow-up damage dealt by Judgment Cuts at the cost of Truewill gain a 50% Extra DMG Bonus.</color>', 3: '<color=#99a3b1>In SDT Form, Vergil gains a 20% Extra DMG Bonus.</color>'}
