Title: {1: 'Weapon Switching: <color=#0d70bc>Without Devil Sword Dante + Tap Red Orb</color>', 2: 'Stinger: <color=#0d70bc>With Devil Sword Dante + Tap Red Orb</color>', 3: 'Million Stab: <color=#0d70bc>With Devil Sword Dante + During Stinger + Tap Red Orb</color>', 4: 'Over Drive: <color=#0d70bc>With Devil Sword Dante + Press and Hold Red Orb</color>', 5: 'Helm Breaker: <color=#0d70bc>Midair + With Devil Sword Dante + Tap Red Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Switches to Devil Sword Dante.', 2: 'Lunges forward, while summoning <color=#D91414>Conjured Swords</color> to attack the enemy. Deals Fire DMG and gains <color=#D91414>DT</color> upon cast.', 3: 'Rapidly performs multiple forward stabs, while summoning <color=#D91414>Conjured Swords</color> to attack the enemy. Deals Fire DMG and gains <color=#D91414>DT</color> upon cast.', 4: 'Swings the sword multiple times to unleash shockwaves, consuming Signal Orbs over time, while summoning <color=#D91414>Conjured Swords</color> to attack the enemy. Deals Fire DMG and gains <color=#D91414>DT</color> upon cast.', 5: 'Performs a downward slash, dealing Fire DMG while summoning <color=#D91414>Conjured Swords</color> to attack the enemy. Gains <color=#D91414>DT</color> upon cast.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Switches to Devil Sword Dante.', 2: 'Lunges forward, while summoning <color=#D91414>Conjured Swords</color> to attack the enemy. Deals Fire DMG and gains <color=#D91414>DT</color> upon cast.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Fire DMG based on the number of orbs pinged. If no Signal Orbs are pinged, deals <color=#D91414>{3}%</color> Fire DMG and gains <color=#D91414>60</color> <color=#D91414>DT</color>.', 3: 'Rapidly performs multiple forward stabs, while summoning <color=#D91414>Conjured Swords</color> to attack the enemy. Deals Fire DMG and gains <color=#D91414>DT</color> upon cast.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Fire DMG based on the number of orbs pinged. If no Signal Orbs are pinged, deals <color=#D91414>{3}%</color> Fire DMG and gains <color=#D91414>60</color> <color=#D91414>DT</color>.', 4: 'Swings the sword multiple times to unleash shockwaves, consuming Signal Orbs over time, while summoning <color=#D91414>Conjured Swords</color> to attack the enemy. Deals Fire DMG and gains <color=#D91414>DT</color> upon cast.\\n- At Lv.1 charge, deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Fire DMG based on the number of orbs pinged. If no Signal Orbs are pinged, deals <color=#D91414>{3}%</color> Fire DMG and grants <color=#D91414>60</color> <color=#D91414>DT</color>.\\n- At Lv.2 charge, deals <color=#D91414>{4}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{5}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{6}%</color> Fire DMG based on the number of orbs pinged. If no Signal Orbs are pinged, deals <color=#D91414>{7}%</color> Fire DMG and grants <color=#D91414>60</color> <color=#D91414>DT</color>.', 5: 'Performs a downward slash, dealing Fire DMG while summoning <color=#D91414>Conjured Swords</color> to attack the enemy. Gains <color=#D91414>DT</color> upon cast.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Fire DMG based on the number of orbs pinged. If no Signal Orbs are pinged, deals <color=#D91414>{3}%</color> Fire DMG and gains <color=#D91414>60</color> <color=#D91414>DT</color>.'}

Title: {1: 'Red Hot Night - Charge: <color=#0d70bc>Tap/Press and Hold Yellow Orb</color>', 2: 'Red Hot Night - Burst: <color=#0d70bc>Press and Hold and Release Yellow Orb</color>', 3: 'Set Hat: <color=#0d70bc>Midair + Tap Yellow Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Puts on Dr. Faust and starts charging, obtaining <color=#D91414>DT</color>. While charging, automatically consumes Signal Orbs. Triggers Matrix if it is not on cooldown and gains Super Armor and DMG Reduction.', 2: 'Consumes all <color=#D91414>DT</color>, pulling in enemies and summoning meteors that slam onto them, dealing Fire DMG. Dante is Invincible while casting this move, and will gain Signature Energy.', 3: 'Throws out Dr. Faust, dealing Fire DMG. Gains <color=#D91414>DT</color> upon cast.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Puts on Dr. Faust and starts charging, obtaining <color=#D91414>DT</color>. While charging, automatically consumes Signal Orbs. Triggers Matrix if it is not on cooldown and gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>99%</color> DMG Reduction.\\n- For every <color=#D91414>0.3</color>s charged, gains <color=#D91414>30</color> <color=#D91414>DT</color>.\\n- Pings up to <color=#D91414>12</color> Signal Orbs.', 2: 'Consumes all <color=#D91414>DT</color>, pulling in enemies and summoning meteors that slam onto them, dealing Fire DMG. Dante is Invincible while casting this move.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG. For every <color=#D91414>3</color> Signal Orbs pinged during <color=#D91414>Red Hot Night - Charge</color>, deals an additional <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Fire DMG.', 3: 'Throws out Dr. Faust, dealing Fire DMG. Gains <color=#D91414>DT</color> upon cast.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Fire DMG based on the number of orbs pinged. If no Signal Orbs are pinged, deals <color=#D91414>{3}%</color> Fire DMG and gains <color=#D91414>60</color> <color=#D91414>DT</color>.\\n- Casts the skill again to retrieve Dr. Faust and deal <color=#D91414>{4}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{5}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{6}%</color> Fire DMG to enemies it previously hit based on the number of orbs pinged. If no Signal Orbs are pinged, deals <color=#D91414>{7}%</color> Fire DMG and gains <color=#D91414>60</color> <color=#D91414>DT</color>'}

Title: {1: 'DSD Combo: <color=#0d70bc>Wielding Devil Sword Dante + Tap Basic Attack</color>', 2: 'Balrog Combo: <color=#0d70bc>Wielding Balrog + Tap Basic Attack</color>', 3: 'SDT Combo: <color=#0d70bc>SDT Form + Tap Basic Attack</color>', 4: 'Dance Macabre: <color=#0d70bc>With Devil Sword Dante + Press and Hold Basic Attack</color>', 5: 'Real Impact: <color=#0d70bc>With Balrog + Press and Hold Basic Attack</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Attacks with Devil Sword Dante, dealing Fire DMG while summoning <color=#D91414>Conjured Swords</color> to attack the enemy.', 2: 'Attacks with Balrog, dealing Fire DMG.', 3: 'Attacks the target, dealing Fire DMG.', 4: 'Performs multiple attacks with Devil Sword Dante, dealing Fire DMG while summoning <color=#D91414>Conjured Swords</color> to attack the enemy.', 5: 'Charges and releases the Rising Dragon, dealing DMG while summoning <color=#D91414>Conjured Swords</color> to attack the enemy.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Attacks with Devil Sword Dante, dealing Fire DMG while summoning <color=#D91414>Conjured Swords</color> to attack the enemy.\\n- Deals a total of <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG.\\n- When cast midair, deals a total of <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Fire DMG.', 2: 'Attacks with Balrog, dealing Fire DMG.\\n- Deals a total of <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG while summoning <color=#D91414>Conjured Swords</color> to attack the enemy.\\n- When cast midair, deals a total of <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Fire DMG.', 3: 'Attacks the target, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG.', 4: 'Performs multiple attacks with Devil Sword Dante, dealing Fire DMG while summoning <color=#D91414>Conjured Swords</color> to attack the enemy.\\n- If <color=#D91414>DT</color> is not full when casting, deals a total of <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG.\\n- If <color=#D91414>DT</color> is full when casting, consumes <color=#D91414>all DT</color> to pull in targets and deal a total of <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Fire DMG. Gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>80%</color> DMG Reduction but cannot cast <color=#D91414>Sin Devil Trigger</color> in the process. Gains <color=#D91414>50</color> Signature Energy and <color=#D91414>200</color> Judgement Points after casting. If Dante possesses a <color=#D91414>Devilsword Mark</color> when casting, Base DMG increases by <color=#D91414>100%</color>.\\n- <color=#D91414>DT</color> is capped at <color=#D91414>120</color> points.', 5: 'Charges and releases the Rising Dragon, dealing DMG while summoning <color=#D91414>Conjured Swords</color> to attack the enemy.\\n- If <color=#D91414>DT</color> is not full when casting, deals a total of <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Fire DMG. If Dante possesses an <color=#D91414>Ignition Mark</color>, deals <color=#D91414>{3}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{4}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{5}%</color> Ignition DMG instead.\\n- If <color=#D91414>DT</color> is full when casting, consumes <color=#D91414>all DT</color> to pull in targets and deal a total of <color=#D91414>{6}%</color> Fire DMG. If Dante possesses an <color=#D91414>Ignition Mark</color> when casting, deals <color=#D91414>{7}%</color> Ignition DMG instead and applies <color=#D91414>1000</color> points of Combustible Charge. Gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>80%</color> DMG Reduction but cannot cast <color=#D91414>Sin Devil Trigger</color> in the process. Gains <color=#D91414>50</color> Signature Energy and <color=#D91414>200</color> Judgement Points after casting.\\n- <color=#D91414>DT</color> is capped at <color=#D91414>120</color> points.'}

Title: {1: 'Sin Devil Trigger: <color=#0d70bc>With 125 Signature Energy + Human Form + Tap Signature</color>', 2: 'SDT - Finishing Move: <color=#0d70bc>125 Energy + Human Form + Press and Hold Signature</color>', 3: 'SDT - Sin Inferno: <color=#0d70bc>With 125 Signature Energy + SDT Form + Tap Signature</color>', 4: 'SDT - Final Judgement: <color=#0d70bc>With 125 Signature Energy + SDT Form + Judgement Points above 800 + Tap Signature</color>', 5: 'Judgement Points'}
BriefDes: {1: "Devil Sword Dante gets summoned and pierces through Dante, activating Dante's <color=#D91414>SDT Form</color> and dealing Fire DMG. <color=#D91414>DT</color> is converted into <color=#D91414>SDT</color>, immediately filling <color=#D91414>SDT Gauge</color>. Triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> when casting.", 2: 'Consumes all <color=#D91414>Judgement Points</color>, dealing DMG and clearing all <color=#D91414>DT</color>. Triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> when casting.', 3: 'Leaps into the air and slams onto the ground, consuming all <color=#D91414>Judgement Points</color>, dealing DMG. Triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> when casting. If <color=#D91414>Field Ultralimit</color> is active while casting, resets its duration.', 4: 'Passes judgement on the enemy, consuming all <color=#D91414>Judgement Points</color> and dealing DMG. Triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> when casting. If <color=#D91414>Field Ultralimit</color> is active while casting, resets its duration.', 5: 'When casting <color=#D91414>SDT - Sin Inferno</color> or <color=#D91414>SDT - Final Judgement</color>, gain additional effects based on <color=#D91414>Judgement Points</color> consumed.'}
SpecificDes: {1: "Devil Sword Dante gets summoned and pierces through Dante, activating Dante's <color=#D91414>SDT Form</color> and dealing Fire DMG. <color=#D91414>DT</color> is converted into <color=#D91414>SDT</color>, immediately filling <color=#D91414>SDT Gauge</color>. Triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> when casting.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG. If Dante possesses an <color=#D91414>Ignition Mark</color>, deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Ignition DMG instead.\\n- While <color=#D91414>SDT Form</color> is active, Dante gains Super Armor. Tap Core Passive Bar to make Dante exit <color=#D91414>SDT Form</color>.", 2: 'Consumes all <color=#D91414>Judgement Points</color>, dealing DMG and clearing all <color=#D91414>DT</color>. Triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> when casting.\\n-When casting <color=#D91414>SDT - Sin Inferno</color>, if Dante possesses <color=#D91414>800</color> or more <color=#D91414>Judgment Points</color>, <color=#D91414>SDT - Final Judgement</color> will be cast instead.', 3: 'Leaps into the air and slams onto the ground, consuming all <color=#D91414>Judgement Points</color>, dealing DMG. Triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> when casting. If <color=#D91414>Field Ultralimit</color> is active while casting, resets its duration.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG.\\n- If Dante possesses an <color=#D91414>Ignition Mark</color>, deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Ignition DMG instead and converts all <color=#D91414>Combustible</color> into <color=#D91414>Ignition</color> of equal stacks.\\n- If <color=#D91414>SDT Form</color> is active when casting, exits the form immediately and all <color=#D91414>SDT</color> will be cleared.\\n- Upon casting, removes <color=#D91414>Devilsword Mark</color> and <color=#D91414>Ignition Mark</color>.', 4: 'Passes judgement on the enemy, consuming all <color=#D91414>Judgement Points</color> and dealing DMG. Triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> when casting. If <color=#D91414>Field Ultralimit</color> is active while casting, resets its duration.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG.\\n- If Dante possesses an <color=#D91414>Ignition Mark</color>, deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Ignition DMG instead and converts all <color=#D91414>Combustible</color> into <color=#D91414>Ignition</color> of equal stacks.\\n- If <color=#D91414>SDT Form</color> is active when casting, exits the form immediately and all <color=#D91414>SDT</color> will be cleared.\\n- Upon casting, removes <color=#D91414>Devilsword Mark</color> and <color=#D91414>Ignition Mark</color>.', 5: 'When casting <color=#D91414>SDT - Sin Inferno</color> or <color=#D91414>SDT - Final Judgement</color>, gains additional effects based on <color=#D91414>Judgement Points</color> consumed.\\n- Every <color=#D91414>5</color> <color=#D91414>Judgement Points</color> spent increases the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>SDT - Sin Inferno</color> and <color=#D91414>SDT - Final Judgement</color> by <color=#D91414>0.75%</color>.\\n- If Dante possesses an <color=#D91414>Ignition Mark</color>, every <color=#D91414>5</color> <color=#D91414>Judgement Points</color> spent increases the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>SDT - Sin Inferno</color> and <color=#D91414>SDT - Final Judgement</color> by <color=#D91414>0.24%/0.48%/0.72%/0.96%/1.2%</color> when there are <color=#D91414>4/8/12/16/20</color> stacks of <color=#D91414>Ignition</color>.\\n- If cast at full <color=#D91414>Judgement Points</color>, Base DMG of <color=#D91414>SDT - Final Judgement</color> increases by <color=#D91414>50%</color>. If Dante possesses an <color=#D91414>Ignition Mark</color>, Base DMG increases by <color=#D91414>80%</color> instead.\\n- <color=#D91414>Judgement Points</color> are capped at <color=#D91414>1000</color>.'}

Title: {1: 'QTE— <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Swings the sword to attack the target, dealing Fire DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Swings the sword to attack the target, dealing a total of <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG.'}

Title: {1: 'Devil Arm Energy', 2: 'Devil Arms Mastery', 3: 'SDT', 4: 'Royal Guard: <color=#0d70bc>Do Not Move Joystick + Dodge</color>', 5: 'Trickster: <color=#0d70bc>Move Joystick + Press and Hold Dodge</color>', 6: 'High Time: <color=#0d70bc>Human Form + Tap Jump</color>', 7: 'Fire Weapons - <color=#0d70bc>Tap Fire Weapons</color>', 8: 'Provocation: <color=#0d70bc>Human Form + Aerial + Press and Hold Core Passive Bar</color>', 9: 'Conjured Swords', 10: 'Effect: Ignition'}
BriefDes: {1: 'When consuming Signal Orbs via <color=#D91414>Devil Sword Dante</color>, <color=#D91414>Dr. Faust</color>, or <color=#D91414>Balrog</color>, or when casting <color=#D91414>DSD Combo</color> and <color=#D91414>Balrog Combo</color>, gain <color=#D91414>Devil Arm Energy</color>. When <color=#D91414>Devil Arm Energy</color> is full, <color=#D91414>Devil Arm Energy</color> will be consumed to enhance the effects of <color=#D91414>Dance Macabre</color>, <color=#D91414>Real Impact</color>, and <color=#D91414>Red Hot Night</color>.', 2: 'Gains <color=#D91414>3</color> Energy Orbs upon entering the battlefield. When possessing different marks, Dante gains different enhancement effects.', 3: 'Spends <color=#D91414>SDT</color>, dealing DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>Judgment Points</color>. Triggers Matrix if it is not on cooldown.', 4: "Blocks an enemy's attack. Pressing and holding Dodge continuously depletes Dodge Gauge. Release the block to deal Fire DMG in retaliation.", 5: 'When cast on the ground, blinks above the enemy.', 6: 'Jumps upward. When cast midair, press and hold to blink to the ground below the enemy.', 7: 'Shoots the enemy, dealing Fire DMG.', 8: 'Throws a rose at the enemy.', 9: 'Summons <color=#D91414>Conjured Swords</color> to deal Fire DMG.', 10: 'Combustible: Every <color=#D91414>250</color> Combustible Charges will add <color=#D91414>1</color> Combustible stack, up to 20 stacks.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'When pinging Signal Orbs via <color=#D91414>Devil Sword Dante</color>, <color=#D91414>Dr. Faust</color>, or <color=#D91414>Balrog</color>, or when casting <color=#D91414>DSD Combo</color> or <color=#D91414>Balrog Combo</color>, gains <color=#D91414>Devil Arm Energy</color>. When <color=#D91414>Devil Arm Energy</color> is full, spends <color=#D91414>Devil Arm Energy</color> to enhance the effects of <color=#D91414>Dance Macabre</color>, <color=#D91414>Real Impact</color>, and <color=#D91414>Red Hot Night</color>.\\n- A complete <color=#D91414>DSD Combo</color>/<color=#D91414>Balrog Combo</color> grants <color=#D91414>4/1</color> points of <color=#D91414>Devil Arm Energy</color> respectively.\\n- When casting <color=#D91414>Devil Sword Dante</color>/<color=#D91414>Dr. Faust - Set Hat</color>/<color=#D91414>Balrog</color>, gains <color=#D91414>1/2/6</color> points of <color=#D91414>Devil Arm Energy</color> based on the number of orbs pinged. For every Signal Orb pinged during <color=#D91414>Dr. Faust: Red Hot Night - Charge</color>, gains <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Devil Arm Energy</color>.\\n- When casting <color=#D91414>Dance Macabre</color> with <color=#D91414>full DT</color>, if <color=#D91414>Devil Arm Energy</color> is full, spends all of it and gains <color=#D91414>40</color> Signature Energy, <color=#D91414>400</color> <color=#D91414>Judgement Points</color>, and a <color=#D91414>Devilsword Mark</color>.\\n- When casting <color=#D91414>Real Impact</color> with <color=#D91414>full DT</color>, if <color=#D91414>Devil Arm Energy</color> is full, spends all of it and gains <color=#D91414>40</color> Signature Energy, <color=#D91414>400</color> <color=#D91414>Judgement Points</color>, and an <color=#D91414>Ignition Mark</color>.\\n- When casting <color=#D91414>Dr. Faust: Red Hot Night - Burst</color>, if <color=#D91414>DT</color> is full, spends all <color=#D91414>Devil Arm Energy</color> and gains <color=#D91414>25</color> <color=#D91414>Judgement Points</color> for <color=#D91414>every</color> Devil Arm Energy spent, and the Base DMG of this cast of <color=#D91414>Dr. Faust: Red Hot Night - Burst</color> and the next cast of <color=#D91414>Sin Devil Trigger</color> increases by <color=#D91414>12.5%</color>, up to <color=#D91414>150%</color>. When cast at maximum charge, gains an additional <color=#D91414>28</color> Signature Energy.\\n- Up to <color=#D91414>12</color> <color=#D91414>Devil Arm Energy</color> can be possessed at a time.', 2: 'Gains <color=#D91414>3</color> Signal Orbs upon entering battle. Dante gains different enhancements when he possesses different Marks.\\n- <color=#D91414>Devilsword Mark</color>: Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Dance Macabre</color> at full <color=#D91414>DT</color>, <color=#D91414>SDT - Sin Stinger</color>, <color=#D91414>SDT - The Luce</color>, and <color=#D91414>SDT - Demolition</color> increases by <color=#D91414>100%</color>.\\n- <color=#D91414>Ignition Mark</color>: For every stack of <color=#D91414>Ignition</color> on the enemy, Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Real Impact</color> at full <color=#D91414>DT</color>, <color=#D91414>SDT - Sin Stinger</color>, <color=#D91414>SDT - The Luce</color>, and <color=#D91414>SDT - Demolition</color> increases by <color=#D91414>5%</color>. When dealing DMG to enemies with <color=#D91414>Ignition</color>, extends the duration of <color=#D91414>Ignition</color> by <color=#D91414>0.9s</color>. Triggers up to once per enemy, with trigger count resetting when the enemy is inflicted with <color=#D91414>Ignition</color> once again.\\n- Dante can only possess one Mark at a time.', 3: 'Spends <color=#D91414>SDT</color>, dealing DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>Judgement Points</color>. Upon cast, triggers Matrix if it is not on cooldown.\\n- Press and hold Red/Blue Orbs to cast SDT Skills. Every <color=#D91414>30</color> points of <color=#D91414>SDT</color> spent grants <color=#D91414>38</color> Signature Energy and <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Judgement Points</color>.\\n- Press and hold Red Orbs to cast <color=#D91414>SDT - Sin Stinger</color>, gathering nearby targets and dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG. If Dante possesses an <color=#D91414>Ignition Mark</color> upon casting, deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Ignition DMG and gains <color=#D91414>1000</color> points of Combustible Charge instead. Gains <color=#D91414>80%</color> DMG Reduction while casting.\\n- Press and hold Blue Orbs to cast <color=#D91414>SDT - The Luce</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Fire DMG. If Dante possesses an <color=#D91414>Ignition Mark</color> upon casting, deals <color=#D91414>{3}%</color> Ignition DMG and gains <color=#D91414>1000</color> points of Combustible Charge instead. Gains <color=#D91414>80%</color> DMG Reduction while casting.\\n- When there are <color=#D91414>120</color> points of <color=#D91414>SDT</color>, tap Yellow Orbs to spend all <color=#D91414>SDT</color> to cast <color=#D91414>SDT - Demolition</color>, gaining <color=#D91414>152</color> Signature Energy and <color=#D91414>400</color> <color=#D91414>Judgement Points</color>. <color=#D91414>SDT - Demolition</color> gathers targets in a large area and deals <color=#D91414>{4}%</color> Fire DMG. If Dante possesses an <color=#D91414>Ignition Mark</color> upon casting, deals <color=#D91414>{5}%</color> Ignition DMG and gains <color=#D91414>4000</color> points of Combustible Charge instead. Gains <color=#D91414>80%</color> DMG Reduction while casting.\\n- <color=#D91414>SDT</color> is capped at <color=#D91414>120</color> points.', 4: "Blocks an enemy's attack. Pressing and holding Dodge continuously depletes Dodge Gauge. Release the block to deal Fire DMG in retaliation.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG. If released right when an enemy is attacking, triggers a Royal Release instead, dealing <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Fire DMG.\\n- While pressing and holding Dodge, consumes <color=#D91414>60</color> Dodge Gauge every second.", 5: 'When cast on the ground, blinks above the enemy.', 6: 'Jumps upward. When cast midair, press and hold to blink to the ground below the enemy.\\n- If held when casting on the ground, launches an enemy into the air instead, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG.\\n- When in midair, Dodge Gauge refills <color=#D91414>300%</color> faster.', 7: 'Shoots the enemy, dealing Fire DMG.\\n- If cast on the ground in <color=#D91414>Human Form</color> while using Devil Sword Dante, deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Fire DMG. If cast while using Balrog, deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Fire DMG. If pushing the joystick upon casting, deals <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Fire DMG instead.\\n- If cast midair in <color=#D91414>Human Form</color> while using Devil Sword Dante, deals <color=#D91414>{3}%</color> Fire DMG. If pushing the joystick upon casting, deals <color=#D91414>{4}%</color> Fire DMG instead. If cast while using Balrog, deals <color=#D91414>{5}%</color> Fire DMG.\\n- If <color=#D91414>SDT Form</color> is active when casting, deals <color=#D91414>{6}%</color> Fire DMG.', 8: 'Throws a rose at the enemy.', 9: 'Summons <color=#D91414>Conjured Swords</color> to deal <color=#D91414>1%</color> Fire DMG.\\n- When in <color=#D91414>Human Form</color>, tapping Core Passive Bar summons <color=#D91414>Conjured Swords</color> that launch the enemy into the air. If pushing the joystick upon casting, <color=#D91414>Conjured Swords</color> thrust at the enemy instead.', 10: 'Combustible: Every <color=#D91414>250</color> Combustible Charges will add <color=#D91414>1</color> Combustible stack, up to 20 stacks.\\n- Ignition: Ignited units take Ignition DMG equal to <color=#D91414>Ignition stacks x30%</color> every second (Tank Skills will not be triggered) for 10s.\\n- The subsequent unit will inherit the Combustible/Ignition status of the last unit on the battlefield upon its death.'}

BriefDes: {1: 'Increases Fire DMG and Ignition DMG of all team members. Increases ATK of all Attackers in the team.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Increases Fire DMG and Ignition DMG of all members by <color=#D91414>10%</color>. Increases ATK of all Attackers in the team by <color=#D91414>10%</color>.'}

Gains Super Armor during the process.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Dark DMG and gains <color=#D91414>1/2/3</color> <color=#D91414>Commandment</color> and <color=#D91414>1/2/5</color> stacks of <color=#D91414>Prayer</color> based on the number of orbs pinged.'}

Title: {1: 'Dawnbreak: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Yellow Orb</color>', 2: 'Lightwalker: <color=#0d70bc>Dawnbreak Combo + Tap Yellow Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Swings the greatsword multiple times to attack the enemy, dealing Raydiance DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>Commandment</color> and <color=#D91414>Raydiance Value</color>. Gains Super Armor during so. Casts this skill consecutively to begin the <color=#D91414>Dawnbreak Combo</color>.', 2: 'Steps up with a horizontal slash, dealing Raydiance DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>Commandment</color> and <color=#D91414>Raydiance Value</color>. Gains Super Armor during so.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Swings the greatsword multiple times to attack the enemy, dealing Raydiance DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>Commandment</color> and <color=#D91414>Raydiance Value</color>. Gains Super Armor during so. Casts this skill consecutively to begin the <color=#D91414>Dawnbreak Combo</color>.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Raydiance DMG and gains <color=#D91414>1/2/3</color> <color=#D91414>Commandment</color> and <color=#D91414>30/60/100</color> <color=#D91414>Raydiance Value</color> based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- Tapping Yellow Orb the moment Bianca: Crepuscule lands will cast <color=#D91414>Dawnbreak</color> again and begin the <color=#D91414>Dawnbreak Combo</color>.', 2: 'Steps up with a horizontal slash, dealing Raydiance DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>Commandment</color> and <color=#D91414>Raydiance Value</color>. Gains Super Armor during so.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Raydiance DMG and gains <color=#D91414>1/2/3</color> <color=#D91414>Commandment</color> and <color=#D91414>30/60/100</color> <color=#D91414>Raydiance Value</color> based on the number of orbs pinged.'}

Title: {1: 'Whip Dance: <color=#0d70bc>Twilight Form + Tap/Press and Hold Blue Orb</color>', 2: 'Devouring Sky: <color=#0d70bc>Twilight Form + Tap/Press and Hold Tidal Orb</color>', 3: 'Sword Dance: <color=#0d70bc>Radiance Form + Tap/Press and Hold Blue Orb</color>', 4: 'Shattering Sky: <color=#0d70bc>Radiance Form + Tap/Press and Hold Tidal Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Lashes the enemy continuously, cosuming <color=#D91414>Commandment</color> over time, dealing Dark DMG, and pulling in nearby enemies, during which time gains <color=#D91414>80%</color> DMG Reduction and Super Armor. Gains Signature Energy, <color=#D91414>Prayer</color> stacks, and <color=#D91414>Severed Sea</color> stacks.', 2: 'Leaps up and shatters the space with the whip, dealing Dark DMG and gaining the <color=#D91414>Tidal Mark</color>, Signature Energy, and <color=#D91414>Prayer</color> stacks, during which time becomes <color=#D91414>Invincible</color> and unable to cast <color=#D91414>Signature</color>.', 3: 'Wields the greatsword to attack the enemy, spending <color=#D91414>Commandment</color> over time, dealing Raydiance DMG, and pulling in nearby enemies, during which time gains <color=#D91414>80%</color> DMG Reduction and Super Armor. Gains Signature Energy, <color=#D91414>Severed Sea</color> stacks, and <color=#D91414>Raydiance Value</color>.', 4: 'Leaps up into midair and performs a heavy slash at the enemy, dealing Raydiance DMG, gaining the <color=#D91414>Tidal Mark</color>, Signature Energy, <color=#D91414>Prayer</color> stacks, and <color=#D91414>Raydiance Value</color>, during which time becomes <color=#D91414>Invincible</color> and unable to launch <color=#D91414>Signature Move</color>.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Lashes the enemy continuously, cosuming <color=#D91414>Commandment</color> over time, dealing Dark DMG, and pulling in nearby enemies, during which time gains <color=#D91414>80%</color> DMG Reduction and Super Armor. Gains Signature Energy, <color=#D91414>Prayer</color> stacks, and <color=#D91414>Severed Sea</color> stacks.\\n- If the skill is fully cast, deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG, then immediately casts <color=#D91414>Whip Dance - Rapid Thorn</color>. If you release Blue Orb in the process, immediately casts <color=#D91414>Whip Dance - Rapid Thorn</color> as well. If attacked during the process, automatically moves in the direction of the joystick and becomes Invincible for <color=#D91414>0.2</color>s.\\n- <color=#D91414>Whip Dance - Rapid Thorn</color> consumes <color=#D91414>2</color> <color=#D91414>Commandment</color> and deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Dark DMG at most.\\n- <color=#D91414>Each</color> point of <color=#D91414>Commandment</color> consumed grants <color=#D91414>1</color> Signature Energy, <color=#D91414>5</color> stacks of <color=#D91414>Prayer</color>, and <color=#D91414>1</color> stack of <color=#D91414>Severed Sea</color>.\\n- Could dodge incoming attacks when casting <color=#D91414>Whip Dance - Rapid Thorn</color>. When dodging an attack successfully, gains Super Armor and becomes Invincible for <color=#D91414>2</color>s.\\n- Max <color=#D91414>9</color> <color=#D91414>Severed Sea</color> stacks. At max stacks, Blue Orbs will be converted to <color=#D91414>Tidal Orbs</color>.', 2: 'Leaps up and shatters the space with the whip, dealing Dark DMG and gaining the <color=#D91414>Tidal Mark</color>, Signature Energy, and <color=#D91414>Prayer</color> stacks, during which time becomes <color=#D91414>Invincible</color> and unable to cast <color=#D91414>Signature</color>.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG, then casts <color=#D91414>Devouring Sky - Collapsing Twilight</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Dark DMG and gaining the <color=#D91414>Tidal Mark</color>, <color=#D91414>54</color> Signature Energy, and <color=#D91414>55</color> stacks of <color=#D91414>Prayer</color>.', 3: 'Wields the greatsword to attack the enemy, spending <color=#D91414>Commandment</color> over time, dealing Raydiance DMG, and pulling in nearby enemies, during which time gains <color=#D91414>80%</color> DMG Reduction and Super Armor. Gains Signature Energy, <color=#D91414>Severed Sea</color> stacks, and <color=#D91414>Raydiance Value</color>.\\n-At full <color=#D91414>Commandment</color>, casts <color=#D91414>Sword Dance - Rising Slash</color>, triggering Matrix if it is not on cooldown, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Raydiance DMG, and gaining <color=#D91414>200</color> Raydiance Value. Then, casts <color=#D91414>Sword Dance - Thousand Flash</color>, which, when fully cast, dealing <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Raydiance DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>300</color> Raydiance Value.\\n-If the <color=#D91414>Raydiance Gauge</color> is full when <color=#D91414>Sword Dance - Rising Slash</color> is cast, enters the <color=#D91414>Radiant Baptism Form</color>.\\n- Casting <color=#D91414>Sword Dance - Rising Slash</color> when having <color=#D91414>Radiant Crown</color> stacks can consume up to <color=#D91414>2</color> stacks of <color=#D91414>Radiant Crown</color>. <color=#D91414>Each</color> stack consumed deals extra <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Raydiance DMG and grants <color=#D91414>15</color> stacks of <color=#D91414>Prayer</color>.\\n- Casting <color=#D91414>Sword Dance</color> when having <color=#D91414>Radiant Crown</color> can consume up to <color=#D91414>5</color> stacks of <color=#D91414>Radiant Crown</color>. <color=#D91414>Each</color> stack consumed deals extra <color=#D91414>{3}%</color> Raydiance DMG and grants <color=#D91414>15</color> stacks of <color=#D91414>Prayer</color>.\\n- Consumes <color=#D91414>Commandment</color> over time during <color=#D91414>Sword Dance</color>. <color=#D91414>Each</color> point consumed grants <color=#D91414>2</color> Signature Energy and <color=#D91414>1</color> stack of <color=#D91414>Severed Sea</color>.\\n- Max <color=#D91414>9</color> <color=#D91414>Severed Sea</color> stacks. At max stacks, Blue Orbs will be converted to <color=#D91414>Tidal Orbs</color>.', 4: 'Leaps up into midair and performs a heavy slash at the enemy, dealing Raydiance DMG, gaining the <color=#D91414>Tidal Mark</color>, Signature Energy, <color=#D91414>Prayer</color> stacks, and <color=#D91414>Raydiance Value</color>, during which time becomes <color=#D91414>Invincible</color> and unable to launch <color=#D91414>Signature Move</color>.\\n- After dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Raydiance DMG, casts <color=#D91414>Shattering Sky: Collapse of Radiance</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Raydiance DMG, gaining the <color=#D91414>Tidal Mark</color>, <color=#D91414>54</color> Signature Energy, and <color=#D91414>200</color> <color=#D91414>Raydiance Value</color>.\\n- Casting <color=#D91414>Shattering Sky</color> when having <color=#D91414>Radiant Crown</color> stacks can consume up to <color=#D91414>3</color> stacks of <color=#D91414>Radiant Crown</color>. <color=#D91414>Each</color> stack consumed deals extra <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Raydiance DMG and grants <color=#D91414>15</color> stacks of <color=#D91414>Prayer</color>.'}

Title: {1: 'Alternating Lashes: <color=#0d70bc>Twilight Form + Tap Basic Attack</color>', 2: 'Whirling Lashes: <color=#0d70bc>Twilight Form + Press and Hold Basic Attack</color>', 3: 'Corrosive Chain: <color=#0d70bc>Light up the Sacred Mark + Press and Hold Basic Attack</color>', 4: 'Piercing Anchor: <color=#0d70bc>Twilight Form + Any Red 3-Ping + Tap Basic Attack</color>', 5: 'Radiant Blade: <color=#0d70bc>Radiance Form + Tap Basic Attack</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'The lashblade attacks the enemy with alternating strikes, dealing Dark DMG.', 2: 'Unleashes whirling lashes to attack the enemy, dealing Dark DMG.', 3: 'Dashes to the enemy and attacks with the chain, during which time Bianca could dodge. Then, delivers a palm strike at the enemy, dealing Dark DMG at the cost of all <color=#D91414>Commandment</color> and gaining Signature Energy.', 4: 'Uses the whip to pierce and pull the enemy, dealing Dark DMG.', 5: 'Uses the greatsword to attack the enemy, dealing Raydiance DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'The lashblade attacks the enemy with alternating strikes, dealing Dark DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG in total.\\n- After the 3rd strike, tap Basic Attack continuously to perform the 4th and 5th strikes repeatedly. Signal Orb Recovery efficiency increases by <color=#D91414>100%</color> during so.\\n- Tapping Basic Attack again during the end lag of the 3rd, 4th, and 5th strike will cast <color=#D91414>Alternating Lashes - True Strike</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Dark DMG.', 2: 'Unleashes whirling lashes to attack the enemy, dealing Dark DMG.\\n- When fully cast, deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG in total. Signal Orb Recovery efficiency increases by <color=#D91414>100%</color> during so. When the maximum duration is reached, casts <color=#D91414>Whirling Lashes - Backstep Shadow Strike</color> automatically and deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Dark DMG.\\n- Releasing Basic Attack during the skill will cast <color=#D91414>Whirling Lashes - Shadow Strike</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Dark DMG.\\n- <color=#D91414>250</color> Dodge is consumed when casting <color=#D91414>Whirling Lashes - Shadow Strike</color> or <color=#D91414>Whirling Lashes - Backstep Shadow Strike</color> to perform a dodge. Upon a successful dodge, gains Super Armor for <color=#D91414>2</color>s, <color=#D91414>80%</color> DMG Reduction, and <color=#D91414>250</color> Dodge.', 3: 'Dashes to the enemy and attacks with the chain, during which time Bianca could dodge. Then, delivers a palm strike at the enemy, dealing Dark DMG at the cost of all <color=#D91414>Commandment</color> and gaining Signature Energy.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG in total. Release Basic Attack precisely upon landing to perform the palm strike in advance.\\n- Spends all <color=#D91414>Commandment</color>. <color=#D91414>Each</color> point spent grants <color=#D91414>5</color> Signature Energy. When <color=#D91414>9</color> <color=#D91414>Commandment</color> is consumed in one go, it will grant extra <color=#D91414>15</color> Signature Energy.', 4: 'Uses the whip to pierce and pull the enemy, dealing Dark DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG in total.', 5: 'Uses the greatsword to attack the enemy, dealing Raydiance DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Raydiance DMG in total.'}

Title: {1: 'Shadow Strangle: <color=#0d70bc>120 Signature Energy + Twilight Form + Tap Signature</color>', 2: 'Ember Extinction: <color=#0d70bc>120 Signature Energy + Radiance Form + Tap Signature</color>', 3: 'Echoing Howl', 4: 'Dirge of Apocalypse'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Summons a thorned chain to shackle the enemy, dealing Dark DMG. Triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> while casting. Gains <color=#D91414>1</color> Signal Orb afterward. Casting the skill when having the <color=#D91414>Field Ultralimit</color> effect will refresh the duration.', 2: 'Pulls out the greatsword and detonates the space, dealing Raydiance DMG. If the <color=#D91414>Raydiance Gauge</color> is full, immediately enters the <color=#D91414>Radiant Baptism Form</color>. Triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> while casting. Gains <color=#D91414>1</color> Signal Orb afterward. Casting the skill when having the <color=#D91414>Field Ultralimit</color> effect will refresh the duration.', 3: "When casting <color=#D91414>Shadow Strangle</color> or <color=#D91414>Ember Extinction</color>, consumes all <color=#D91414>Prayer</color> stacks to enhance the attack's damage.", 4: 'Shatters the space and summons the greatsword to attack the enemy, dealing Raydiance DMG. Triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> while casting. Casting the skill when having the <color=#D91414>Field Ultralimit</color> effect will refresh the duration.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Summons a thorned chain to shackle the enemy, dealing Dark DMG. Triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> while casting. Then, gains <color=#D91414>1</color> Signal Orb. Casting the skill when having the <color=#D91414>Field Ultralimit</color> effect will refresh the duration.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG in total. When having the <color=#D91414>Tidal Mark</color>, consumes it and deals extra <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Dark DMG.', 2: 'Draws the greatsword and detonates the space, dealing Raydiance DMG. If the <color=#D91414>Raydiance Gauge</color> is full, immediately enters the <color=#D91414>Radiant Baptism Form</color>. Triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> while casting. Gains <color=#D91414>1</color> Signal Orb afterward. Casting the skill when having the <color=#D91414>Field Ultralimit</color> effect will refresh the duration.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Raydiance DMG in total. When having the <color=#D91414>Tidal Mark</color>, consumes it and deals extra <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Raydiance DMG.', 3: "When casting <color=#D91414>Shadow Strangle</color> or <color=#D91414>Ember Extinction</color>, consumes all <color=#D91414>Prayer</color> stacks to enhance the attack's damage.\\n- Each stack of <color=#D91414>Prayer</color> consumed will increase the <color=#D91414>Shadow Strangle's</color> Base DMG by <color=#D91414>0.8%</color>.\\n- Each stack of <color=#D91414>Prayer</color> consumed will increase the <color=#D91414>Ember Extinction's</color> Base DMG by <color=#D91414>1.6%</color>.\\n- Max <color=#D91414>150</color> <color=#D91414>Prayer</color> stacks. Casting <color=#D91414>Shadow Strangle</color> or <color=#D91414>Ember Extinction</color> at max stacks will grant a set of 3-Ping Orbs. Casting <color=#D91414>Shadow Strangle</color> at max stacks will activate the <color=#D91414>Sacred Mark</color>.", 4: 'Shatters the space and summons the greatsword to attack the enemy, dealing Raydiance DMG. Triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> while casting. Casting the skill when having the <color=#D91414>Field Ultralimit</color> effect will refresh the duration.\\n- In the <color=#D91414>Radiant Baptism Form</color>, switch Bianca: Crepuscule in to immediately cast <color=#D91414>Raydiance Judgment</color> and deal <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Raydiance DMG. When some enemies meet certain conditions, tap <color=#D91414>Basic Attack</color> to cast <color=#D91414>Enhanced Raydiance Judgment</color> and deal extra <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Raydiance DMG.'}

Title: {1: 'QTE— <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Summons the greatsword to attack the target, dealing DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Summons the greatsword to attack the target, dealing DMG.\\n- In <color=#D91414>Twilight Form</color>, deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG in total.\\n- In <color=#D91414>Radiance Form</color>, deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Raydiance DMG in total.'}

Title: {1: 'Flow Divert', 2: 'Commandment', 3: 'Abyssal Expansion: <color=#0d70bc>Twilight Form + Press and Hold Dodge</color>', 4: 'Repelling Guard: <color=#0d70bc>Radiance Form + Press and Hold Dodge</color>', 5: 'Effect: Raydiance'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Bianca: Crepuscule enters the battlefield in the Twilight Form. In the Twilight Form, she can only use Red or Blue Orbs. In the Radiance Form, she can only use Yellow or Blue Orbs.', 2: 'Casting certain skills grants <color=#D91414>Commandment</color>. When <color=#D91414>Commandment</color> is full, Blue Orbs are activated.', 3: 'In the Twilight Form, Bianca: Crepuscule cannot trigger the Matrix by successfully dodging attacks, but you can press and hold Dodge to make her perform space simulation and activate <color=#D91414>Abyssal Domain</color>.', 4: 'Pressing and holding Dodge in Radiance Form will enter <color=#D91414>Repelling Guard - Charge</color>, during which Bianca: Crepuscule continuously gains <color=#D91414> Commandment</color> and Super Armor. When she is attacked during <color=#D91414>Repelling Guard - Charge</color>, Dodge Gauge is consumed to dodge automatically, up to <color=#D91414>1</color> time, and Matrix cannot be triggered. Afterward, attacks will instead be blocked automatically, and Bianca gains 20% DMG Reduction when blocking. When the maximum duration is reached or Dodge is manually released, Bianca casts the corresponding skill and deals Raydiance DMG.', 5: 'Accumulates <color=#D91414>Raydiance Gauge</color>. When the gauge is full, Bianca can trigger <color=#D91414>Radiant Baptism</color> through some skills and gain <color=#D91414>10</color> stacks of <color=#D91414>Radiant Crown</color>. Some skills consume <color=#D91414>Radiant Crown</color> stacks and grant enhancements while triggering <color=#D91414>Radiant Embrace</color> to deal Raydiance DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Bianca: Crepuscule enters the battlefield in Twilight Form. She can only ping Red Orbs and the Blue Orb in Twilight Form, and she can only ping Yellow Orbs and the Blue Orb in Radiance Form.\\n- Form shift triggered by tapping the Core Passive Bar: Shifting to Twilight Form deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG. Shifting to Radiance Form deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Raydiance DMG.\\n- Form shift triggered by pressing and holding the Core Passive Bar: Shifting to Twilight Form deals <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Dark DMG. Shifting to Radiance Form deals <color=#D91414>{3}%</color> Raydiance DMG.\\n- A form shift will clear <color=#D91414>Commandment</color>, <color=#D91414>Severed Sea</color> stacks, the <color=#D91414>Tidal Mark</color>, and <color=#D91414>Prayer</color> stacks.\\n- Bianca: Crepuscule will pull in nearby enemies when consuming <color=#D91414>Radiant Crown</color> stacks.', 2: 'Casting certain skills grants <color=#D91414>Commandment</color>. When <color=#D91414>Commandment</color> is full, Blue Orbs are activated.\\n- Max <color=#D91414>9</color> <color=#D91414>Commandment</color>.', 3: "In the Twilight Form, Bianca: Crepuscule cannot trigger the Matrix by successfully dodging attacks, but you can press and hold Dodge to make her perform space simulation and activate <color=#D91414>Abyssal Domain</color>.\\n- <color=#D91414>Abyssal Domain</color> has a <color=#D91414>12</color>-second cooldown.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Dark DMG in total when <color=#D91414>Abyssal Domain</color> is active. When <color=#D91414>Abyssal Domain</color> disappears, detonates the space and casts <color=#D91414>Abyssal - Twilight Fall</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Dark DMG and pulling in nearby enemies.\\n- Red Orbs can be entered <color=#D91414>3</color> times when <color=#D91414>Abyssal Domain</color> is active. Each time when Red Orbs are entered, deals <color=#D91414>{2}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{3}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{4}%</color> Dark DMG and gains <color=#D91414>1/2/3</color> <color=#D91414>Abyssal Value</color>, <color=#D91414>1/2/3</color> <color=#D91414>Commandment</color>, and <color=#D91414>1/2/5</color> stacks of <color=#D91414>Prayer</color> based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- Max <color=#D91414>9</color> <color=#D91414>Abyssal Value</color>. The <color=#D91414>Abyssal - Twilight Fall</color> cast this time will consume all <color=#D91414>Abyssal Value</color>. <color=#D91414>Each</color> point consumed grants <color=#D91414>1</color> Signature Energy and <color=#D91414>3</color> stacks of <color=#D91414>Prayer</color> and increases the attack's Base DMG by <color=#D91414>8%</color>, up to <color=#D91414>72%</color>. If having <color=#D91414>9</color> <color=#D91414>Abyssal Value</color> when casting the skill, gains extra <color=#D91414>3</color> Signature Energy and <color=#D91414>8</color> stacks of <color=#D91414>Prayer</color>.", 4: 'Pressing and holding Dodge in Radiance Form will enter <color=#D91414>Repelling Guard - Charge</color>, during which Bianca: Crepuscule continuously gains <color=#D91414> Commandment</color> and Super Armor. When she is attacked during <color=#D91414>Repelling Guard - Charge</color>, Dodge Gauge is consumed to dodge automatically, up to <color=#D91414>1</color> time, and Matrix cannot be triggered. Afterward, attacks will instead be blocked automatically, and Bianca gains <color=#D91414>20%</color> DMG Reduction when blocking. When the maximum duration is reached or Dodge is manually released, Bianca casts the corresponding skill and deals Raydiance DMG.\\n- If Dodge is manually released, Bianca casts <color=#D91414>Repelling Guard - Dodge</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Raydiance DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>60</color> <color=#D91414>Raydiance Value</color>. When the maximum duration is reached, Bianca instead casts <color=#D91414>Repelling Guard - Spiral Slash</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Raydiance DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>120</color> <color=#D91414>Raydiance Value</color>.\\n- If the <color=#D91414>Raydiance Gauge</color> is full when casting <color=#D91414>Repelling Guard - Dodge</color> or <color=#D91414>Repelling Guard - Spiral Slash</color>, Bianca enters the <color=#D91414>Radiant Baptism Form</color>.\\n- Bianca can dodge when casting <color=#D91414>Repelling Guard - Dodge</color> or <color=#D91414>Repelling Guard - Spiral Slash</color>. Upon a successful dodge, gains Super Armor for <color=#D91414>2</color>s, <color=#D91414>80%</color> DMG Reduction, and <color=#D91414>250</color> Dodge.', 5: 'Accumulates <color=#D91414>Raydiance Gauge</color>. When the gauge is full, Bianca can enter <color=#D91414>Radiant Baptism Form</color> through some skills and gain <color=#D91414>10</color> stacks of <color=#D91414>Radiant Crown</color>. Some skills consume <color=#D91414>Radiant Crown</color> stacks and grant enhancements while triggering <color=#D91414>Radiant Embrace</color> to deal Raydiance DMG.\\n- <color=#D91414>Raydiance Gauge</color> is capped at <color=#D91414>1000</color> points.\\n- <color=#D91414>Radiant Embrace</color> deals <color=#D91414>330%</color> Raydiance DMG.'}

Title: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.1: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at S5 Rank</color></color>', 2: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.2: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SS Rank</color></color>'}
BriefDes: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Expanding the Abyssal Domain or casting Devouring Sky, Shattering Sky, Shadow Strangle, or Ember Extinction will activate all available QTEs.</color>', 2: "<color=#99a3b1>After casting Shadow Strangle, when switching out, enters Departed Mode. Launches an attack every 2s, dealing 2000% Dark DMG. If Prayer stacks are full when casting Shadow Strangle, deals 1 additional instance of 2000% Dark DMG. Exits this mode after 4 attacks. When first casting Devouring Sky or Shattering Sky upon entering the battlefield, gains a set of 3-Ping Orbs. When first casting Abyssal Expansion upon entering the battlefield, gains extra Signature Energy. Each Abyssal Value increases Abyssal - Twilight Fall Base DMG. Sword Dance's Base DMG increases.</color>"}
SpecificDes: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Expanding the Abyssal Domain or casting Devouring Sky, Shattering Sky, Shadow Strangle, or Ember Extinction will activate all available QTEs.</color>', 2: "<color=#99a3b1>After casting Shadow Strangle, when switching out, enters Departed Mode. Launches an attack every 2s, dealing 2000% Dark DMG. If Prayer stacks are full when casting Shadow Strangle, deals 1 additional instance of 2000% Dark DMG. Exits this mode after 4 attacks. When first casting Devouring Sky or Shattering Sky upon entering the battlefield, gains a set of 3-Ping Orbs. When first casting Abyssal Expansion upon entering the battlefield, gains 15 Signature Energy. Each Abyssal Value increases Abyssal Expansion - Twilight Fall Base DMG by 15%. Sword Dance's Base DMG increases by 80%.</color>"}

Title: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.1: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SS3 Rank</color></color>', 2: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.2: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SSS Rank</color></color>'}
BriefDes: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>After casting Shadow Strangle, Twilight Form QTE Base DMG increases by 1000% throughout the battle. During Devouring Sky and Shattering Sky, can input an additional set of Signal Orbs. Based on the number of orbs pinged, Base DMG of Devouring Sky - Collapsing Twilight or Shattering Sky - Collapsing Radiance cast this time increases. Signal Orbs consumed this way will be refunded when the next Shadow Strangle or Ember Extinction is cast.</color>', 2: '<color=#99a3b1>During Departed Mode, when Bianca: Crepuscule is in Twilight Form, Extra DMG increases by 100%. Each Prayer stack increases the damage of the Shadow Strangle or Ember Extinction cast this time.</color>'}
SpecificDes: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>After casting Shadow Strangle, Twilight Form QTE Base DMG increases by 1000% throughout the battle. During Devouring Sky, can input an additional set of Signal Orbs. Based on the number of orbs pinged, Base DMG of Devouring Sky - Collapsing Twilight cast this time increases by 60%/120%/180%. During Shattering Sky, can input an additional set of Signal Orbs, increasing the Base DMG of Shattering Sky - Collapsing Radiance cast this time by 40%/80%/120%. Signal Orbs consumed this way will be refunded when the next Shadow Strangle or Ember Extinction is cast.</color>', 2: '<color=#99a3b1>During Departed Mode, when Bianca: Crepuscule is in Twilight Form, Extra DMG increases by 100%. Each Prayer stack increases the damage of the Shadow Strangle or Ember Extinction cast this time by 0.009x, up to 1.35x.</color>'}

Title: {1: 'Lv.1: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SS3 Rank</color>', 2: 'Lv.2: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SSS Rank</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'After casting <color=#D91414>Shadow Strangle</color>, <color=#D91414>Twilight Form</color> QTE Base DMG increases by <color=#D91414>1000%</color> throughout the battle. During <color=#D91414>Devouring Sky</color> and <color=#D91414>Shattering Sky</color>, can input an additional set of Signal Orbs. Based on the number of orbs pinged, Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Devouring Sky - Collapsing Twilight</color> or <color=#D91414>Shattering Sky - Collapsing Radiance</color> cast this time increases. Signal Orbs consumed this way will be refunded when the next <color=#D91414>Shadow Strangle</color> or <color=#D91414>Ember Extinction</color> is cast.', 2: 'During <color=#D91414>Departed Mode</color>, when Bianca: Crepuscule is in <color=#D91414>Twilight Form</color>, Extra DMG increases by 100%. Each <color=#D91414>Prayer</color> stack increases the damage of the <color=#D91414>Shadow Strangle</color> or <color=#D91414>Ember Extinction</color> cast this time.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'After casting <color=#D91414>Shadow Strangle</color>, <color=#D91414>Twilight Form</color> QTE Base DMG increases by <color=#D91414>1000%</color> throughout the battle. During <color=#D91414>Devouring Sky</color>, can input an additional set of Signal Orbs. Based on the number of orbs pinged, Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Devouring Sky - Collapsing Twilight</color> cast this time increases by <color=#D91414>60%/120%/180%</color>. During <color=#D91414>Shattering Sky</color>, can input an additional set of Signal Orbs, increasing the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Shattering Sky - Collapsing Radiance</color> cast this time by <color=#D91414>40%/80%/120%</color>. Signal Orbs consumed this way will be refunded when the next <color=#D91414>Shadow Strangle</color> or <color=#D91414>Ember Extinction</color> is cast.', 2: 'During <color=#D91414>Departed Mode</color>, when Bianca: Crepuscule is in <color=#D91414>Twilight Form</color>, Extra DMG increases by 100%. Each <color=#D91414>Prayer</color> stack increases the damage of the <color=#D91414>Shadow Strangle</color> or <color=#D91414>Ember Extinction</color> cast this time by <color=#D91414>0.009</color>x, up to <color=#D91414>1.35</color>x.'}

Title: {1: 'Red Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Auto Combo</color>', 2: 'Strands Separation: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Red Orb</color>', 3: 'Tangling Corruption: <color=#0d70bc>Strands Separation Combo + Tap Red Orb</color>', 4: 'Ripping Blades: <color=#0d70bc>Tangling Corruption Combo + Tap Red Orb</color>', 5: 'Shearing: <color=#0d70bc>Ripping Blades Combo + Tap Red Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Automatically casts the next combo at the end of a Red Orb Skill.', 2: 'Slashes the enemy with the scissors, pulling in nearby enemies and dealing Physical DMG.\\nPress and hold Signature to automatically ping Red Orbs, dealing Ultima Slash DMG and triggering an Ultima Slash.', 3: 'Slashes the enemy with the scissors, pulling in nearby enemies and dealing Physical DMG.\\nPress and hold Signature to automatically ping Red Orbs, dealing Ultima Slash DMG and triggering an Ultima Slash.', 4: 'Performs a powerful slash at the enemy with the scissors, pulling in nearby enemies and dealing Physical DMG.\\nPress and hold Signature to automatically ping Red Orbs, dealing Ultima Slash DMG and triggering an Ultima Slash.', 5: 'Performs powerful slashes from multiple directions at the enemy with the scissors, pulling in nearby enemies and dealing Physical DMG.\\nPress and hold Signature to automatically ping Red Orbs, dealing Ultima Slash DMG and triggering an Ultima Slash.\\n<color=#D91414>Shearing</color> will be cast during the subsequent combo as the final Red Orb Skill.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Automatically casts the next combo at the end of a Red Orb Skill.', 2: 'Slashes the enemy with the scissors, pulling in nearby enemies and dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG.\\nPress and hold Signature to automatically ping Red Orbs, dealing <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG and triggering an Ultima Slash.', 3: 'Slashes the enemy with the scissors, pulling in nearby enemies and dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG.\\nPress and hold Signature to automatically ping Red Orbs, dealing <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG and triggering an Ultima Slash.', 4: 'Performs a powerful slash at the enemy with the scissors, pulling in nearby enemies and dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG.\\nPress and hold Signature to automatically ping Red Orbs, dealing <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG and triggering an Ultima Slash.', 5: 'Performs powerful slashes from multiple directions at the enemy with the scissors, pulling in nearby enemies and dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG.\\nPress and hold Signature to automatically ping Red Orbs, dealing <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG and triggering an Ultima Slash.\\n<color=#D91414>Shearing</color> will be cast during the subsequent combo as the final Red Orb Skill.'}

Title: {1: 'Yellow Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Yellow Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Leaps up and performs a rotary cutting on nearby enemies, dealing Physical DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>Cutting Edge</color>.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Leaps up and performs a rotary cutting on nearby enemies, dealing Physical DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>Cutting Edge</color>.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG and gains <color=#D91414>5/10/15</color> <color=#D91414>Cutting Edge</color> based on the number of orbs pinged.'}

Title: {1: 'Blue Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Blue Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Throws out the scissors, pulling in nearby enemies, dealing Physical DMG to enemies on the path, and gaining <color=#D91414>Cutting Edge</color>.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Throws out the scissors, pulling in nearby enemies, dealing Physical DMG to enemies on the path, and gaining <color=#D91414>Cutting Edge</color>.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG and gains <color=#D91414>5/10/15</color> <color=#D91414>Cutting Edge</color> based on the number of orbs pinged.'}

Title: {1: 'Swift Snipping: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Basic Attack</color>', 2: 'Focused Rending: <color=#0d70bc>At Least 15 Cutting Edge + Press and Hold Basic Attack</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Launches cross attacks at the enemy, dealing Physical DMG.', 2: 'Consumes all <color=#D91414>Cutting Edge</color> and charges forward with the scissors, dealing damage and gaining Signature Energy and Sharp Reserve based on Cutting Edge consumed.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Launches cross attacks at the enemy, dealing Physical DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG in total.', 2: "Consumes all <color=#D91414>Cutting Edge</color> and charges forward with scissors to deal damage based on <color=#D91414>Cutting Edge</color> consumed, while gaining Signature Energy and Sharp Reserve.\\n- Consuming <color=#D91414>15</color> <color=#D91414>Cutting Edge</color> deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG and grants <color=#D91414>75</color> <color=#D91414>Sharp Reserve</color>.\\n- Consuming <color=#D91414>16-30</color> <color=#D91414>Cutting Edge</color> deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Physical DMG and grants <color=#D91414>150</color> <color=#D91414>Sharp Reserve</color>.\\n- Consuming <color=#D91414>31-45</color> <color=#D91414>Cutting Edge</color> deals <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG and grants <color=#D91414>300</color> <color=#D91414>Sharp Reserve.</color>.\\n- Each <color=#D91414>Cutting Edge</color> consumed grants <color=#D91414>1</color> Signature Energy and increases <color=#D91414>Focused Rending's</color> Base DMG by <color=#D91414>1%</color>."}

Title: {1: 'Rampant Shears: <color=#0d70bc>Silent Consent + At Least 80 Signature Energy + Tap Signature</color>', 2: 'Severing Bite: <color=#0d70bc>Rampant Disaster + At least 3 Devouring Etch stacks + Tap Signature, or auto-cast when Signature Energy is depleted</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Puts on a muzzle and enters <color=#D91414>Rampant Disaster</color>, dealing Physical DMG to nearby enemies. While <color=#D91414>Rampant Disaster</color> is active, gains Super Armor, DMG Reduction, and infinite Red Orbs. When taking hits, Dodge Gauge is consumed first to become immune to that attack. <color=#D91414>Staccato Slash</color> and <color=#D91414>Severing Bite</color> always deal critical hits. If CRIT Rate ≥75%, these hits will gain a CRIT DMG Bonus. Each Red Orb ping grants 1 stack of <color=#D91414>Devouring Etch</color>, up to <color=#D91414>5</color> stacks. <color=#D91414>Rampant Disaster</color> drains Signature Energy at an increasing rate. If <color=#D91414>Rampant Disaster</color> is interrupted, refunds the Signature Energy required to cast <color=#D91414>Rampant Shears</color>. During this time, <color=#D91414>press and hold Signature</color> to automatically ping Signal Orbs, gain <color=#D91414>Shattered Silk</color>, and make <color=#D91414>Staccato Slash</color> and <color=#D91414>Severing Bite</color> deal Ultima Slash DMG instead.', 2: 'Consumes all <color=#D91414>Devouring Etch stacks</color> and <color=#D91414>Signature Energy</color> to perform the final cutting on the enemy, dealing Physical DMG. When having <color=#D91414>Shattered Silk</color>, consumes Truewill to deal Ultima Slash DMG and deal extra Ultima Slash DMG based on the Truewill consumed, during which time triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> and exits <color=#D91414>Rampant Disaster</color>.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Puts on a mask and enters <color=#D91414>Rampant Disaster</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG to surroundings. While <color=#D91414>Rampant Disaster</color> is active, gains Super Armor, <color=#D91414>50%</color> DMG Reduction, and infinite Red Orbs. When taking hits, <color=#D91414>250</color> Dodge Gauge is consumed first to become immune to that attack. <color=#D91414>Staccato Slash</color> and <color=#D91414>Severing Bite</color> always deal critical strikes. If <color=#D91414>CRIT Rate ≥75%</color>, these critical strikes will gain an additional <color=#D91414>30% CRIT DMG Bonus</color>. Each Red Orb ping grants 1 stack of <color=#D91414>Devouring Etch</color>, up to <color=#D91414>5</color> stacks. <color=#D91414>Rampant Disaster</color> drains Signature Energy at an increasing rate. If <color=#D91414>Rampant Disaster</color> is interrupted, refunds the Signature Energy required to cast <color=#D91414>Rampant Shears</color>. During this time, <color=#D91414>press and hold Signature</color> to automatically ping Signal Orbs, gain <color=#D91414>Shattered Silk</color>, and make <color=#D91414>Staccato Slash</color> and <color=#D91414>Severing Bite</color> deal Ultima Slash DMG instead.\\n- <color=#D91414>Rampant Disaster</color> consumes <color=#D91414>1</color> Signature Energy every <color=#D91414>0.1</color>s, plus an additional <color=#D91414>0.5</color> Signature Energy every <color=#D91414>0.1</color>s.', 2: "Consumes all <color=#D91414>Devouring Etch stacks</color> and <color=#D91414>Signature Energy</color> to perform the final cutting on the enemy, dealing Physical DMG. When having <color=#D91414>Shattered Silk</color>, consumes Truewill to deal Ultima Slash DMG and deal extra Ultima Slash DMG based on the Truewill consumed, during which time triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> and exits <color=#D91414>Rampant Disaster</color>.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG in total. When having <color=#D91414>Shattered Silk</color>, consumes Truewill to deal <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Ultima Slash DMG, dealing <color=#D91414>65%</color> extra Ultima Slash DMG for <color=#D91414>each point</color> of Truewill consumed. Max <color=#D91414>12</color> Truewill can be consumed. Each <color=#D91414>Devouring Etch stack</color> will increase <color=#D91414>Severing Bite's</color> Extra DMG by <color=#D91414>10%</color>."}

Title: {1: 'QTE: <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Launches a thrust attack at the enemy from midair, dealing Physical DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Launches a thrust attack at the enemy from midair, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG.'}

Title: {1: 'Silent Rampancy', 2: 'Final Rite', 3: 'Converging Edge: <color=#0d70bc>Press and hold Dodge to enter Disentangle</color>', 4: 'Purgatory Shear: <color=#0d70bc>Press and hold Dodge to enter Disentangle, then release Dodge</color>', 5: 'Effect: Ultima Slash'}
BriefDes: {1: 'While in <color=#D91414>Silent Consent</color>, only Blue and Yellow Orbs can be used. Under <color=#D91414>Rampant Disaster</color>, only Red Orbs can be used.', 2: 'When casting Yellow or Blue Orb skills, <color=#D91414>Converging Edge</color> grants <color=#D91414>Cutting Edge</color>. Casting <color=#D91414>Purgatory Shear or Focused Rending</color> consumes all <color=#D91414>Cutting Edge</color> and increases the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Purgatory Shear and Focused Rending</color> based on <color=#D91414>Cutting Edge</color> consumed.', 3: "Press and hold Dodge to enter <color=#D91414>Disentangle</color> and gain <color=#D91414>Cutting Edge</color> over time. When the status is active, gains Super Armor, becomes unable to restore Dodge Gauge, and can trigger Block once. Gains brief Invincibility after successful Block. During <color=#D91414>Disentangle</color>, automatically performs 3-Pings and increases <color=#D91414>Purgatory Shear's</color> damage.", 4: 'Press and hold Dodge to enter <color=#D91414>Disentangle</color>, then release Dodge to unleash a powerful slash, which consumes all <color=#D91414>Cutting Edge</color> to deal Physical DMG based on <color=#D91414>Cutting Edge</color> consumed. Grants Signature Energy and Sharp Reserve.', 5: 'Certain skills build up <color=#D91414>Sharp Reserve</color>. <color=#D91414>Sharp Reserve</color> can be passed on to the next character affected by Ultima Slash effect, up to <color=#D91414>999</color> points.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'While in <color=#D91414>Silent Consent</color>, only Blue and Yellow Orbs can be used. Under <color=#D91414>Rampant Disaster</color>, only Red Orbs can be used.', 2: 'Whenever a Yellow or Blue Orb skill is cast, <color=#D91414>Converging Edge</color> grants <color=#D91414>Cutting Edge</color>. Casting <color=#D91414>Purgatory Shear</color> or <color=#D91414>Focused Rending</color> will consume all <color=#D91414>Cutting Edge</color> and increase the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Purgatory Shear</color> and <color=#D91414>Focused Rending</color> based on the <color=#D91414>Cutting Edge</color> consumed.\\n- Each Yellow or Blue Orb grants <color=#D91414>5</color> <color=#D91414>Cutting Edge</color>, and each point of <color=#D91414>Cutting Edge</color> increases the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Purgatory Shear</color> and <color=#D91414>Focused Rending</color> by <color=#D91414>1%</color>.', 3: 'Press and hold Dodge to enter <color=#D91414>Disentangle</color> and gain <color=#D91414>Cutting Edge</color> over time. When the status is active, gains Super Armor, becomes unable to restore Dodge Gauge, and can trigger Block once. Gains brief Invincibility after successful Block. During <color=#D91414>Disentangle</color>, automatically performs 3-Pings and provides an Extra DMG Bonus to <color=#D91414>Purgatory Shear</color>.\\n- Each 3-Ping provides a <color=#D91414>45%</color> Extra DMG Bonus to <color=#D91414>Purgatory Shear</color>. Max <color=#D91414>2</color> 3-Pings can be performed.', 4: 'Press and hold Dodge to enter <color=#D91414>Disentangle</color>. Then, release to dodge, launch a powerful slash, and consume all <color=#D91414>Cutting Edge</color>, dealing Physical DMG and gaining Signature Energy and Sharp Reserve based on the <color=#D91414>Cutting Edge</color> consumed.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG and gains <color=#D91414>75</color> <color=#D91414>Sharp Reserve</color> for <color=#D91414>0-15</color> <color=#D91414>Cutting Edge</color> consumed.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Physical DMG and gains <color=#D91414>150</color> <color=#D91414>Sharp Reserve</color> for <color=#D91414>16-30</color> <color=#D91414>Cutting Edge</color> consumed.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG and gains <color=#D91414>300</color> <color=#D91414>Sharp Reserve</color> for <color=#D91414>31-45</color> <color=#D91414>Cutting Edge</color> consumed.\\n- <color=#D91414>Each point</color> of <color=#D91414>Cutting Edge</color> consumed grants <color=#D91414>1</color> Signature Energy and increases the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Purgatory Shear</color> by <color=#D91414>1%</color>.', 5: 'Certain skills build up <color=#D91414>Sharp Reserve</color>. <color=#D91414>Sharp Reserve</color> can be passed on to the next character affected by Ultima Slash effect, up to <color=#D91414>999</color> points.\\n- When <color=#D91414>Sharp Reserve</color> reaches <color=#D91414>100</color> points, the next skill with <color=#D91414>Ultima Slash</color> effect that hits an enemy will consume <color=#D91414>100 points of Sharp Reserve</color> to trigger a <color=#D91414>Ultima Slash</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>400%</color> Ultima Slash DMG.\\n- Gains 1 point of <color=#D91414>Truewill</color> each time it triggers, up to <color=#D91414>90</color> points.'}

SpecificDes: {1: 'Casting <color=#D91414>Rampant Shears</color> and <color=#D91414>Severing Bite</color> will activate all available QTEs. Title: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.1: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SS3 Rank</color></color>', 2: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.2: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SSS Rank</color></color>'}
BriefDes: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>The Extra DMG Bonus granted for Purgatory Shear by performing 3-Pings during Converging Edge now increases. Restores a set of 3-Ping Orbs after casting Severing Bite.</color>', 2: "<color=#99a3b1>After casting Purgatory Shear by consuming at least 31 Cutting Edge, refunds Cutting Edge and increases Purgatory Shear's Base DMG. When Focused Rending successfully consumes at least 30 Cutting Edge, refunds 3 random Signal Orbs and increases Focused Rending's Base DMG. During Rampant Disaster, each Red Orb ping grants bonus Signature Energy.</color>"}
SpecificDes: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>The Extra DMG Bonus granted for Purgatory Shear by performing 3-Pings during Converging Edge now increases by 45% more. Restores a set of 3-Ping Orbs after casting Severing Bite.</color>', 2: "<color=#99a3b1>After casting Purgatory Shear by consuming at least 31 Cutting Edge, refunds 15 Cutting Edge and increases Purgatory Shear's Base DMG by 75%. When Focused Rending successfully consumes at least 30 Cutting Edge, refunds 3 random Signal Orbs and increases Focused Rending's Base DMG by 100%. During Rampant Disaster, each Red Orb ping grants 12 more Signature Energy.</color>"}
