Title: {1: 'Lateral Restraint: <color=#0d70bc>Execution Airborne + Tap Red Orb</color>', 2: 'Piercing Thorn: <color=#0d70bc>Lateral Restraint Combo + Tap Red Orb</color>', 3: 'Flamefall: <color=#0d70bc>Piercing Thorn Combo + Tap Red Orb</color>', 4: 'Rampant March: <color=#0d70bc>Execution Grounded + Tap Red Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Veronica: Aegis swings her Lance, dealing Physical DMG and entering <color=#D91414>Lateral Restraint Combo</color>.\\n- When having <color=#D91414>Searing Sight</color>, deals Ignition DMG instead. Pinging Red Orbs inflicts <color=#D91414>Combustible Charges</color> and grants <color=#D91414>Rekindle</color>.\\n- Manually pinging Red Orbs converts them to White Orbs stored in the secondary orb slot.\\n- Manually pinging Red Orbs grants <color=#D91414>Purge Value</color>.', 2: 'Veronica: Aegis spins forward and slashes at enemies, dealing Physical DMG and entering <color=#D91414>Piercing Thorn Combo</color>.\\n- When having <color=#D91414>Searing Sight</color>, deals Ignition DMG instead. Pinging Red Orbs inflicts <color=#D91414>Combustible Charges</color> and grants <color=#D91414>Rekindle</color>.\\n- Manually pinging Red Orbs converts them to White Orbs stored in the secondary orb slot.\\n- Manually pinging Red Orbs grants <color=#D91414>Purge Value</color>.', 3: 'Veronica: Aegis strikes enemies with her Lance, dealing Physical DMG and exiting <color=#D91414>Piercing Thorn Combo</color>.\\n- When having <color=#D91414>Searing Sight</color>, deals Ignition DMG instead. Pinging Red Orbs inflicts <color=#D91414>Combustible Charges</color> and grants <color=#D91414>Rekindle</color>.\\n- Manually pinging Red Orbs converts them to White Orbs stored in the secondary orb slot.\\n- Manually pinging Red Orbs grants <color=#D91414>Purge Value</color>.', 4: 'Veronica: Aegis performs consecutive forward thrusts with her Lance, dealing Physical DMG.\\n- When having <color=#D91414>Searing Sight</color>, deals Ignition DMG instead. Pinging Red Orbs inflicts <color=#D91414>Combustible Charges</color> and grants <color=#D91414>Rekindle</color>.\\n- Manually pinging Red Orbs converts them to White Orbs stored in the secondary orb slot.\\n- Manually pinging Red Orbs grants <color=#D91414>Purge Value</color>.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Veronica: Aegis swings her Lance, dealing DMG and entering <color=#D91414>Lateral Restraint Combo</color>.\\n- Can only be cast while airborne during <color=#D91414>Execution</color>. Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- When having <color=#D91414>Searing Sight</color>, deals <color=#D91414>{3}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{4}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{5}%</color> Ignition DMG instead. Each <color=#D91414>3</color> manually pinged Red Orbs inflict <color=#D91414>250</color> <color=#D91414>Combustible Charges</color> and grant <color=#D91414>3</color> stacks of <color=#D91414>Rekindle</color>.\\n- Every 3 manually pinged Red Orbs can be converted to 2 White Orbs stored in the secondary orb slot.\\n- Each manually pinged Red Orb grants <color=#D91414>10</color> <color=#D91414>Purge Value</color>. Manually pinging 3 sets of Red Orbs grants an additional <color=#D91414>10</color> <color=#D91414>Purge Value</color>.', 2: 'Veronica: Aegis spins forward and strikes at the enemy, dealing DMG and entering <color=#D91414>Piercing Thorn Combo</color>.\\n- Can only be cast while airborne during <color=#D91414>Execution</color>. Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- When having <color=#D91414>Searing Sight</color>, deals <color=#D91414>{3}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{4}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{5}%</color> Ignition DMG instead. Each <color=#D91414>3</color> manually pinged Red Orbs inflict <color=#D91414>250</color> <color=#D91414>Combustible Charges</color> and grant <color=#D91414>3</color> stacks of <color=#D91414>Rekindle</color>.\\n- Every 3 manually pinged Red Orbs can be converted to 2 White Orbs stored in the secondary orb slot.\\n- Each manually pinged Red Orb grants <color=#D91414>10</color> <color=#D91414>Purge Value</color>. Manually pinging 3 sets of Red Orbs grants an additional <color=#D91414>10</color> <color=#D91414>Purge Value</color>.', 3: 'Veronica: Aegis strikes the enemies with her Lance, dealing DMG and exiting <color=#D91414>Piercing Thorn Combo</color>.\\n- Can only be cast while airborne during <color=#D91414>Execution</color>. Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- When having <color=#D91414>Searing Sight</color>, deals <color=#D91414>{3}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{4}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{5}%</color> Ignition DMG instead. Each <color=#D91414>3</color> manually pinged Red Orbs inflict <color=#D91414>250</color> <color=#D91414>Combustible Charges</color> and grant <color=#D91414>3</color> stacks of <color=#D91414>Rekindle</color>.\\n- Every 3 manually pinged Red Orbs can be converted to 2 White Orbs stored in the secondary orb slot.\\n- Each manually pinged Red Orb grants <color=#D91414>10</color> <color=#D91414>Purge Value</color>. Manually pinging 3 sets of Red Orbs grants an additional <color=#D91414>10</color> <color=#D91414>Purge Value</color>.', 4: 'Veronica: Aegis performs consecutive forward thrusts with her Lance, dealing DMG.\\n- Can only be cast while grounded during <color=#D91414>Execution</color>. Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- When having <color=#D91414>Searing Sight</color>, deals <color=#D91414>{3}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{4}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{5}%</color> Ignition DMG instead. Each <color=#D91414>3</color> manually pinged Red Orbs inflict <color=#D91414>250</color> <color=#D91414>Combustible Charges</color> and grant <color=#D91414>3</color> stacks of <color=#D91414>Rekindle</color>.\\n- Every 3 manually pinged Red Orbs can be converted to 2 White Orbs stored in the secondary orb slot.\\n- Each manually pinged Red Orb grants <color=#D91414>10</color> <color=#D91414>Purge Value</color>. Manually pinging 3 sets of Red Orbs grants an additional <color=#D91414>10</color> <color=#D91414>Purge Value</color>.'}

Title: {1: 'Severing Domain: <color=#0d70bc>During Adjudication + 100 Chaos Value + Tap Yellow Orb</color>', 2: 'Torrential Blast: <color=#0d70bc>During Execution + Purge Value ≥ 1 + Press and Hold Yellow Orb</color>', 3: 'Heavy Edge: <color=#0d70bc>Execution Airborne + Tap Yellow Orb</color>', 4: 'Piercing Judgment: <color=#0d70bc>Execution Grounded + Tap Yellow Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Veronica: Aegis charges briefly before slamming the ground, dealing Physical DMG, gaining Signature Energy, and healing herself.', 2: 'Veronica: Aegis leaps forward and charges into enemies, continuously consuming <color=#D91414>Purge Value</color> to deal Physical DMG, healing herself, becoming <color=#D91414>Invincible</color> during the process, gaining Signature Energy, and triggering Matrix if it is not on cooldown.\\n- When having <color=#D91414>Searing Sight</color>, deals Ignition DMG instead, inflicts <color=#D91414>Combustible Charges</color>, and gains <color=#D91414>Rekindle</color>.\\n- When casting, continuously converts White Orbs in the secondary orb slot to Blue Orbs.', 3: 'Veronica: Aegis slashes toward the ground, dealing Physical DMG and clearing all Red Orbs.\\n- When having <color=#D91414>Searing Sight</color>, deals Ignition DMG instead, inflicts <color=#D91414>Combustible Charges</color>, and gains <color=#D91414>Rekindle</color>.\\n- Gains Signature Energy when casting. Gains Signature Energy equal to the number of Red Orbs cleared.\\n- Clearing a certain number of Red Orbs in a single attempt grants <color=#D91414>Sin Mark</color>, enhancing <color=#D91414>Piercing Judgment</color>.', 4: 'Veronica: Aegis leaps up and plunges down with her Lance to strike enemies, dealing Physical DMG.\\n- When having <color=#D91414>Sin Mark</color>, casting consumes all <color=#D91414>Purge Value</color>, triggers Matrix if it is not on cooldown, and clears <color=#D91414>Sin Mark</color>.\\n- When having <color=#D91414>Searing Sight</color>, deals Ignition DMG instead. When having <color=#D91414>Sin Mark</color>, casting consumes all <color=#D91414>Purge Value</color> to deal Ignition DMG; casting also inflicts <color=#D91414>Combustible Charges</color> and grants <color=#D91414>Rekindle</color>, triggers Matrix if it is not on cooldown, and clears <color=#D91414>Sin Mark</color>.\\n- Gains Signature Energy when casting. When having <color=#D91414>Sin Mark</color>, casting grants additional Signature Energy.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Veronica: Aegis charges briefly before slamming the ground, dealing Physical DMG.\\n- Can be cast when having <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Chaos Value</color>. Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG, gains <color=#D91414>24</color> Signature Energy, and recovers HP equal to <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> ATK.', 2: 'Veronica: Aegis leaps forward and charges into enemies, continuously consuming <color=#D91414>Purge Value</color> to deal DMG and healing herself and becoming <color=#D91414>Invincible</color> during the process.\\n- Can be cast when <color=#D91414>Purge Value ≥ 1</color>.\\n- When fully cast with maximum <color=#D91414>Purge Value</color>, the charge phase deals a total of <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG; the finishing blow deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Physical DMG, and triggers Matrix if it is not on cooldown.\\n- When having <color=#D91414>Searing Sight</color> and fully cast with maximum <color=#D91414>Purge Value</color>, the charge phase deals a total of <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Ignition DMG instead; the finishing blow deals <color=#D91414>{3}%</color> Ignition DMG instead, and triggers Matrix if it is not on cooldown. Every <color=#D91414>50</color> <color=#D91414>Purge Value</color> consumed inflicts <color=#D91414>250</color> <color=#D91414>Combustible Charges</color>; Every <color=#D91414>20</color> <color=#D91414>Purge Value</color> consumed grants <color=#D91414>1</color> stack of <color=#D91414>Rekindle</color>. The first cast of <color=#D91414>Torrential Blast</color> after entering <color=#D91414>Execution</color> inflicts an additional <color=#D91414>250</color> <color=#D91414>Combustible Charges</color> and grants <color=#D91414>1</color> stack of <color=#D91414>Rekindle</color>.\\n- The first cast of <color=#D91414>Torrential Blast</color> after entering <color=#D91414>Execution</color> restores HP equal to <color=#D91414>{4}%</color> ATK.\\n- When fully cast with maximum <color=#D91414>Purge Value</color>, the charge phase grants a total of <color=#D91414>36</color> Signature Energy. The finishing blow of the first cast of <color=#D91414>Torrential Blast</color> after entering <color=#D91414>Execution</color> grants an additional <color=#D91414>18</color> Signature Energy.\\n- When casting <color=#D91414>Torrential Blast</color>, continuously converts White Orbs in the secondary orb slot to an equal number of Blue Orbs, up to <color=#D91414>6</color> Blue Orbs per deployment.', 3: 'Veronica: Aegis slashes toward the ground, dealing DMG and clearing all Red Orbs.\\n- Can only be cast while airborne during <color=#D91414>Execution</color>. Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG.\\n- When having <color=#D91414>Searing Sight</color>, deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Ignition DMG instead, inflicts <color=#D91414>250</color> <color=#D91414>Combustible Charges</color>, and grants <color=#D91414>2</color> stacks of <color=#D91414>Rekindle</color>.\\n- Casting <color=#D91414>Heavy Edge</color> grants <color=#D91414>18</color> Signature Energy. Gains Signature Energy equal to the number of Red Orbs cleared, up to <color=#D91414>36</color>.\\n- Clearing <color=#D91414>9 or more</color> Red Orbs in a single attempt grants <color=#D91414>Sin Mark</color>, enhancing <color=#D91414>Piercing Judgment</color>. Gains up to <color=#D91414>2</color> <color=#D91414>Sin Marks</color> upon entering battle.', 4: 'Veronica: Aegis leaps up and plunges down with her Lance to strike enemies, dealing DMG.\\n- Can only be cast while grounded during <color=#D91414>Execution</color>. Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG. When having <color=#D91414>Sin Mark</color>, casting consumes all current <color=#D91414>Purge Value</color> to deal <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Physical DMG instead, triggers Matrix if it is not on cooldown, and removes <color=#D91414>Sin Mark</color>.\\n- When having <color=#D91414>Searing Sight</color>, deals <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Ignition DMG instead. When having <color=#D91414>Sin Mark</color>, casting consumes all current <color=#D91414>Purge Value</color> to deal <color=#D91414>{3}%</color> Ignition DMG instead, inflicts <color=#D91414>500</color> <color=#D91414>Combustible Charges</color> and grants <color=#D91414>3</color> stacks of <color=#D91414>Rekindle</color>, triggers Matrix if it is not on cooldown, and removes <color=#D91414>Sin Mark</color>.\\n- Casting <color=#D91414>Piercing Judgment</color> grants <color=#D91414>18</color> Signature Energy. When having <color=#D91414>Sin Mark</color>, casting grants an additional <color=#D91414>18</color> Signature Energy.'}

Title: {1: 'Coiling Horn: <color=#0d70bc>During Adjudication+ Tap Blue Orb</color>', 2: 'Bone Lock: <color=#0d70bc>Coiling Horn Combo + Tap Blue Orb</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Veronica: Aegis gathers energy and charges forward to strike enemies, dealing Physical DMG, entering <color=#D91414>Coiling Horn Combo</color>, and gaining <color=#D91414>Chaos Value</color>.', 2: 'Veronica: Aegis further concentrates energy to continuously pull enemies within range, dealing Physical DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>Chaos Value</color>.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Veronica: Aegis gathers energy and charges forward to strike enemies, dealing Physical DMG and entering <color=#D91414>Coiling Horn Combo</color>.\\n- Can only be cast during <color=#D91414>Adjudication</color>. Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- Enters <color=#D91414>Coiling Horn Combo</color>. Gains <color=#D91414>15</color> <color=#D91414>Chaos Value</color> per Blue Orb consumed. Each 3-Ping grants an additional <color=#D91414>5</color> <color=#D91414>Chaos Value</color>.', 2: 'Veronica: Aegis further concentrates energy to continuously pull enemies, dealing Physical DMG.\\n- Can only be cast during <color=#D91414>Adjudication</color>. Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{1}%</color>/<color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Physical DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.\\n- Exits <color=#D91414>Coiling Horn Combo</color>. Gains <color=#D91414>15</color> <color=#D91414>Chaos Value</color> per Blue Orb consumed. Each 3-Ping grants an additional <color=#D91414>5</color> <color=#D91414>Chaos Value</color>.'}

Title: {1: 'Chaotic Scales: <color=#0d70bc>During Adjudication+ Tap Basic Attack</color>', 2: 'Unified Order: <color=#0d70bc>Execution Grounded + Tap Basic Attack</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: "During <color=#D91414>Adjudication</color>, Veronica: Aegis's Basic Attacks deal Physical DMG.", 2: "During <color=#D91414>Execution</color>, Veronica: Aegis's Basic Attacks deal Physical DMG.\\n- When having <color=#D91414>Searing Sight</color>, deals Ignition DMG instead.\\n- Basic Attacks restore <color=#D91414>Purge Value</color>.\\n- When casting <color=#D91414>Unified Order</color> after dodging without moving the joystick, the attack starts from the second hit."}
SpecificDes: {1: "During <color=#D91414>Adjudication</color>, Veronica: Aegis's Basic Attacks deal a total of <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG.", 2: "During <color=#D91414>Execution</color>, Veronica: Aegis's Basic Attacks deal a total of <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG.\\n- When having <color=#D91414>Searing Sight</color>, deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Ignition DMG instead.\\n- Each Basic Attack hit restores <color=#D91414>2</color> <color=#D91414>Purge Value</color>.\\n- When casting <color=#D91414>Unified Order</color> after dodging without moving the joystick, the attack starts from the second hit."}

Title: {1: 'Blazing Desolation: <color=#0d70bc>During Adjudication + 60 Energy + Tap/Press and Hold Signature</color>', 2: 'Ruinous Ember: <color=#0d70bc>During Execution + 90 Signature Energy + Tap Signature</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Veronica: Aegis leaps into the air and arms herself. When casting, triggers Time Lag Calculation and enters <color=#D91414>Execution</color>, gaining Red Orbs and dealing Physical DMG.\\n- When casting by holding the button, deals Ignition DMG instead and gains <color=#D91414>Searing Sight</color>.', 2: 'Veronica: Aegis transforms into dragon form and crashes into the ground, dealing Physical DMG. Triggers Time Lag Calculation when casting, then exits <color=#D91414>Execution</color> and enters <color=#D91414>Adjudication</color>. Leaves behind <color=#D91414>Vital Void</color> after casting, continuously restoring HP for allied units within and granting <color=#D91414>Ignition stacks</color> to targets in <color=#D91414>Ignition status</color>.\\n- When having <color=#D91414>Searing Sight</color>, deals Ignition DMG instead and clears <color=#D91414>Searing Sight</color>. Converts <color=#D91414>Rekindle</color> into corresponding stacks of <color=#D91414>Ember Mark</color>. Converts <color=#D91414>Combustible</color> into equal stacks of <color=#D91414>Ignition</color>. If already in <color=#D91414>Ignition</color>, refreshes the current <color=#D91414>Ignition</color> duration.\\n- If having <color=#D91414>Field Ultralimit</color> when casting, refreshes its duration.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Veronica: Aegis leaps into the air and arms herself. When casting, triggers Time Lag Calculation and enters <color=#D91414>Execution</color>, gaining <color=#D91414>9</color> Red Orbs.\\n- Deals a total of <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG in 3 hits.\\n- When casting by holding the button, deals a total of <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Ignition DMG instead, and gains <color=#D91414>Searing Sight</color>.', 2: "Veronica: Aegis transforms into dragon form and crashes into the ground, dealing DMG. Triggers Time Lag Calculation when casting, then exits <color=#D91414>Execution</color> and enters <color=#D91414>Adjudication</color>. Leaves behind <color=#D91414>Vital Void</color> after casting, continuously restoring HP for allied units within.\\n- Deals a total of <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG in 5 hits.\\n- When having <color=#D91414>Searing Sight</color>, deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Ignition DMG instead and clears <color=#D91414>Searing Sight</color>. Converts <color=#D91414>Rekindle</color> into corresponding stacks of <color=#D91414>Ember Mark</color> for <color=#D91414>24</color>s. Duration resets every time it is triggered. Converts <color=#D91414>Combustible</color> into equal stacks of <color=#D91414>Ignition</color>. If already in <color=#D91414>Ignition</color>, refreshes the current <color=#D91414>Ignition</color> duration. The first cast upon entering the field grants <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Ignition stack</color> per second to targets in <color=#D91414>Ignition</color>, up to <color=#D91414>8</color> times.\\n- If having <color=#D91414>Field Ultralimit</color> when casting, refreshes its duration.\\n- After casting, leaves behind <color=#D91414>Vital Void</color> that lasts for <color=#D91414>12</color>s, restoring HP equal to <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> of Veronica: Aegis's ATK per second for allied units within."}

Title: {1: 'QTE— <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Deals damage and heals.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Deals damage and heals.\\n- Deals a total of <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG.\\n- If having <color=#D91414>Ember Mark</color>, deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Ignition DMG instead.\\n- Restores HP equal to <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> of ATK.'}

Title: {1: 'Raid Support', 2: 'Blazing Star: <color=#0d70bc>Execution Airborne + Tap or Press and Hold Dodge When Not Moving Joystick / Press and Hold Dodge When Moving Joystick</color>', 3: 'Molten Blaze', 4: 'Relit', 5: 'Effect: Ignition'}
BriefDes: {1: 'During <color=#D91414>Adjudication</color>, only Blue Orbs and Yellow Orb can be used. Basic attacks only generate Blue Orbs.\\n- During <color=#D91414>Execution</color>, only Red Orbs and Yellow Orb can be used. Basic attacks only generate Red Orbs.\\n- When entering <color=#D91414>Execution</color>, unused Blue Orbs from <color=#D91414>Adjudication</color> are retained and <color=#D91414>Chaos Value</color> is cleared.\\n- When exiting <color=#D91414>Execution</color>, unused Red Orbs are cleared and <color=#D91414>Sin Mark</color> is removed.', 2: 'Veronica: Aegis wields her Lance to perform consecutive thrusts in the air, dealing Physical DMG and recovering Red Orbs.\\n- When having <color=#D91414>Searing Sight</color>, deals Ignition DMG instead.\\n- When casting <color=#D91414>Blazing Star</color>, a dodge check will be performed. Successfully dodging will trigger Matrix if it is not on cooldown.', 3: 'Ally units healed by Veronica: Aegis gain an enhancement effect.', 4: 'Each stack of <color=#D91414>Ember Mark</color> increases Ignition Effect Base DMG.', 5: 'Combustible: Combustible Charges will add Combustible stacks, up to 20 stacks.\\nIgnition: Ignited units take Ignition DMG based on the Ignition stacks (Tank Skills will not be triggered) every second for 10s.\\n- The subsequent unit will inherit the Combustible/Ignition status of the last unit on the battlefield upon its death.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'During <color=#D91414>Adjudication</color>, only Blue Orbs and Yellow Orb can be used. Basic attacks only generate Blue Orbs.\\n- During <color=#D91414>Execution</color>, only Red Orbs and Yellow Orb can be used. Basic attacks only generate Red Orbs.\\n- When entering <color=#D91414>Execution</color>, unused Blue Orbs from <color=#D91414>Adjudication</color> are retained and <color=#D91414>Chaos Value</color> is cleared.\\n- When exiting <color=#D91414>Execution</color>, unused Red Orbs are cleared and <color=#D91414>Sin Mark</color> is removed.\\n- When <color=#D91414>exiting the battlefield</color>, <color=#D91414>Rekindle</color> stacks and <color=#D91414>Chaos Value</color> are retained, <color=#D91414>Searing Sight</color> is removed, and <color=#D91414>Purge Value</color> and White Orbs in the secondary orb slot are cleared.\\n- <color=#D91414>Chaos Value</color> cap is <color=#D91414>100</color>. Can cast <color=#D91414>Severing Domain</color> when Chaos Value reaches <color=#D91414>100</color>.\\n- <color=#D91414>Purge Value</color> cap is <color=#D91414>100</color>. Can cast <color=#D91414>Torrential Blast</color> when <color=#D91414>Purge Value is at least 1</color>.', 2: 'Veronica: Aegis wields her Lance to perform consecutive thrusts in the air, dealing DMG and recovering Red Orbs.\\n- Can only be cast while airborne during <color=#D91414>Execution</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Physical DMG.\\n- When having <color=#D91414>Searing Sight</color>, deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Ignition DMG instead.\\n- Each cast recovers 1 Red Orb.\\n- When casting <color=#D91414>Blazing Star</color>, a dodge check will be performed. Successfully dodging will trigger Matrix if it is not on cooldown.', 3: 'Allies healed by Veronica: Aegis gain the <color=#D91414>Ultralimit Torque</color> effect that increases Physical DMG by <color=#D91414>20%</color> for <color=#D91414>8</color>s. Duration resets every time it is triggered.\\n- When the team has <color=#D91414>Ignition</color> effect, allies healed by Veronica: Aegis instead gain the <color=#D91414>Fire Tempered</color> effect that increases Fire DMG by <color=#D91414>20%</color> for <color=#D91414>8</color>s. Duration resets every time it is triggered.', 4: 'Each stack of <color=#D91414>Ember Mark</color> increases Ignition Effect Base DMG by <color=#D91414>5%</color>. Stacks up to <color=#D91414>15</color> times.', 5: 'Combustible: Every <color=#D91414>250</color> Combustible Charges will add <color=#D91414>1</color> Combustible stack, up to 20 stacks.\\n- Ignition: Ignited units take Ignition DMG equal to <color=#D91414>Ignition stacks x30%</color> every second (Tank Skills will not be triggered) for 10s.\\n- The subsequent unit will inherit the Combustible/Ignition status of the last unit on the battlefield upon its death.'}

BriefDes: {1: 'Increases ATK of all members by <color=#D91414>10%</color>. Increases Physical DMG and Ignition DMG of all Amplifiers in the team by <color=#D91414>5%</color>.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Increases ATK of all members by <color=#D91414>10%</color>. Increases Physical DMG and Ignition DMG of all Amplifiers in the team by <color=#D91414>5%</color>.'}

BriefDes: {1: "All switched-in members gain an extra ATK and Elemental DMG Bonus of the Amplifier's element."}
SpecificDes: {1: "All switched-in members gain an extra <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> ATK and <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Elemental DMG Bonus of the Amplifier's element for <color=#D91414>10</color>s. If the team has the <color=#D91414>Ignition</color> effect, Veronica: Aegis' corresponding element will be regarded as Fire."}

Title: {1: 'Gains 3 Signal Orbs when entering battle.'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Gains 3 Signal Orbs when entering battle.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Gains 3 Signal Orbs when entering battle.'}

Title: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.1: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at S5 Rank</color></color>', 2: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.2: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SS Rank</color></color>'}
BriefDes: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Casting Severing Domain or Ruinous Ember will activate all available QTEs.</color>', 2: '<color=#99a3b1>Casting Blazing Desolation deals additional DMG.\\n- Consuming Red Orbs generates additional White Orbs and stores them in the secondary orb slot. When switching in and casting Torrential Blast, up to 9 White Orbs can be converted to Blue Orbs.\\n- When having Ember Mark or Searing Sight, deals additional Ignition DMG per second while in Ignition status. This DMG is affected by Ember Mark stacks (effective even when Veronica: Aegis is on standby).</color>'}
SpecificDes: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Casting Severing Domain or Ruinous Ember will activate all available QTEs.</color>', 2: '<color=#99a3b1>Casting Blazing Desolation deals 3 additional instances of DMG.\\n- Every 3 Red Orbs consumed generates 1 additional White Orb and stores it in the secondary orb slot. When switching in and casting Torrential Blast, up to 9 White Orbs can be converted to Blue Orbs.\\n- When having Ember Mark or Searing Sight, deals 1 additional instance of Ignition DMG per second equal to Ignition stacks x50% while in Ignition status. This DMG is affected by Ember Mark stacks (effective even when Veronica: Aegis is on standby).</color>'}

Title: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.1: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SS3 Rank</color></color>', 2: '<color=#99a3b1>Lv.2: <color=#0d70bc>Unlocked at SSS Rank</color></color>'}
BriefDes: {1: "<color=#99a3b1>The Ultralimit Torque effect applied to allies by Veronica: Aegis' healing is enhanced.\\n- When the team has the Ignition effect, allies healed by Veronica: Aegis additionally gain the Blazing Wrath effect.\\n- After casting Severing Domain, enters Execution. Base DMG of Torrential Blast, Heavy Edge, and Piercing Judgment when having Sin Mark increases.</color>", 2: "<color=#99a3b1>Whenever a member is switched in, cooldown of all QTE Skills will be reset.\\n- The Ultralimit Torque effect applied to allies by Veronica: Aegis' healing is enhanced.\\n- When the team has the Ignition effect, allies healed by Veronica: Aegis additionally gain the Blazing Wrath effect.\\n- Gains additional Signature Energy and Chaos Value when switching in.\\n- When having Ember Mark or Searing Sight, deals additional Ignition DMG per second while in Ignition status. This DMG is affected by Ember Mark stacks (effective even when Veronica: Aegis is on standby).\\n- Consuming Purge Value allows Ruinous Ember to deal additional DMG. This enhancement resets when exiting the battlefield or after casting Ruinous Ember.</color>"}
SpecificDes: {1: "<color=#99a3b1>The Ultralimit Torque effect applied to allies by Veronica: Aegis' healing is enhanced by 10%.\\n- When the team has the Ignition effect, allies healed by Veronica: Aegis additionally gain a 10% Blazing Wrath effect.\\n- After casting Severing Domain, enters Execution. Base DMG of Torrential Blast, Heavy Edge, and Piercing Judgment when having Sin Mark increases by 100%.</color>", 2: "<color=#99a3b1>Whenever a member is switched in, cooldown of all QTE Skills will be reset.\\n- The Ultralimit Torque effect applied to allies by Veronica: Aegis' healing is enhanced by 10%.\\n- When the team has the Ignition effect, allies healed by Veronica: Aegis additionally gain a 10% Blazing Wrath effect.\\n- Gains an additional 24 Signature Energy and 100 Chaos Value when switching in.\\n- When having Ember Mark or Searing Sight, deals 2 additional instances of Ignition DMG per second equal to Ignition stacks x50% while in Ignition status. This DMG is affected by Ember Mark stacks (effective even when Veronica: Aegis is on standby).\\n- Every 25 Purge Value consumed by Veronica: Aegis allows Ruinous Ember to deal 1 additional instance of DMG when cast (up to 4 additional instances). This enhancement resets when exiting the battlefield or after casting Ruinous Ember.</color>"}

Title: {1: 'Lightning Plume: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Basic Attack</color>', 2: 'Reckoning: <color=#0d70bc>During Dream Dive + Tap Basic Attack</color>', 3: 'Chain Light: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Dodge</color>', 4: 'Roaming Light: <color=#0d70bc>During Dream Dive + Move Joystick + Tap Dodge</color>', 5: 'Jade Shatter: <color=#0d70bc>During Dream Dive + No Joystick Movement + Tap Dodge</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Attacks enemies, dealing Lightning DMG.', 2: 'Attacks enemies, dealing Lightning DMG.', 3: 'Casts a lightning chain that links enemies and drops Flash Thunder on the last hit enemy, dealing Lightning DMG. If <color=#D91414>Flying Blades</color> are present, calls down Swift Thunder, dealing Lightning DMG.', 4: 'Releases a shattered mirror that tracks enemies, dealing Lightning DMG.', 5: 'Blocks enemy attacks. When successful, tap Basic Attack to counterattack, dealing Lightning DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Attacks the enemy, dealing Lightning DMG.\\n- Deals a total of <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG.\\n- During the 5th hit, press and hold Basic Attack to charge. When fully charged, casts <color=#D91414>Telescopic Strike</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Lightning DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Flying Blade</color> and <color=#D91414>600 Darkflow Reserve</color>.', 2: 'Attacks enemies, dealing Lightning DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG in total.', 3: 'Casts a lightning chain that links enemies and drops Flash Thunder on the last hit enemy, dealing Lightning DMG. If <color=#D91414>Flying Blades</color> are present, calls down Swift Thunder, dealing Lightning DMG.\\n- The lightning chain links up to 4 enemies, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG. Flash Thunder deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Lightning DMG.\\n- Swift Thunder deals <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Lightning DMG.', 4: 'Casts a shattered mirror that tracks enemies, dealing Lightning DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG.', 5: 'Blocks enemy attacks. When successful, tap Basic Attack to counterattack, dealing Lightning DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG in total.\\n- Gains 1 Blue Orb after a successful counterattack.'}

Title: {1: 'Dream Dive: <color=#0d70bc>80 Signature Energy + Tap Signature</color>', 2: 'Mirrored Renewal: <color=#0d70bc>During Dream Dive + 100 Signature Energy + Tap Signature</color>', 3: 'Delicate Heart'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Inverts the world and falls into the mirror, dealing Lightning DMG, converting Red and Yellow Orbs into equal amounts of Blue Orbs, clearing all <color=#D91414>Flying Blades</color>, and triggering <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> while casting. When cast with <color=#D91414>10 Darkflow stacks</color>, consumes <color=#D91414>10 Darkflow stacks</color> to deal Darkflow DMG instead, then enters <color=#D91414>Darkcross Form</color>. Exits <color=#D91414>Darkcross Form</color> when switched out.', 2: 'Shatters the mirror, dealing DMG, converting Blue Orbs and <color=#D91414>White Orbs</color> into equal amounts of Red and Yellow Orbs, and gaining a set of Signal Orbs. Rearranges the Signal Orbs into 3-Pings. Triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> when casting. If <color=#D91414>Field Ultralimit</color> is active when cast, refreshes its duration.', 3: "When casting <color=#D91414>Signature - Mirrored Renewal</color>, consumes all stacks of <color=#D91414>Delicate Heart</color> to enhance this Signature's effects."}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Inverts the world and falls into the mirror, dealing Lightning DMG, converting Red and Yellow Orbs into equal amounts of Blue Orbs, clearing all <color=#D91414>Flying Blades</color>, and triggering <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> when casting. When cast with <color=#D91414>10 Darkflow stacks</color>, consumes <color=#D91414>10 Darkflow stacks</color> to deal Darkflow DMG instead, then enters <color=#D91414>Darkcross Form</color>. Exits <color=#D91414>Darkcross Form</color> when switching out.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Darkflow DMG.', 2: 'Shatters the mirror, dealing DMG, converting Blue Orbs and <color=#D91414>White Orbs</color> into equal amounts of Red and Yellow Orbs, and gaining a set of Signal Orbs. Rearranges the Signal Orbs into 3-Pings. Triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> when casting. If <color=#D91414>Field Ultralimit</color> is active when cast, refreshes its duration.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG.\\n- When in <color=#D91414>Darkcross Form</color>, deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Darkflow DMG. Exits <color=#D91414>Darkcross Form</color> after casting. If cast with <color=#D91414>12 stacks of Delicate Heart</color>, deals additional <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Darkflow DMG and gains <color=#D91414>1200 Darkflow Reserve</color>.', 3: "When casting <color=#D91414>Signature - Mirrored Renewal</color>, consumes all stacks of <color=#D91414>Delicate Heart</color> to enhance this Signature.\\n- <color=#D91414>Each</color> stack consumed increases this <color=#D91414>Signature - Mirrored Renewal</color>'s Base DMG by <color=#D91414>7.5%</color>. When <color=#D91414>12</color> stacks are consumed, gains an additional <color=#D91414>10%</color> increase and <color=#D91414>1</color> Signal Orb.\\n- Max <color=#D91414>12 stacks of Delicate Heart</color>."}

Title: {1: 'QTE: <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Detonates the target, dealing Lightning DMG.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Detonates the target, dealing Lightning DMG.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG.\\n- When Limpidity leaves the battlefield, gains <color=#D91414>10</color> <color=#D91414>Sonance</color> per second. After accumulating <color=#D91414>150</color> Sonance, the next QTE cast will be replaced by <color=#D91414>Celestial Eulogy</color>, which pulls in nearby enemies and deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Lightning DMG.\\n- After casting <color=#D91414>Celestial Eulogy</color>, gains <color=#D91414>1</color> additional Signal Orb when switched in next time.\\n- <color=#D91414>Sonance</color> is capped at <color=#D91414>150</color>.'}

Title: {1: 'QTE: <color=#0d70bc>Tap QTE</color>'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Detonates the target, dealing Lightning DMG. When casting <color=#D91414>Celestial Eulogy</color>, the camera focuses on Liv: Limpidity. All characters become briefly unresponsive, and <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> triggers.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Detonates the target, dealing Lightning DMG. When casting <color=#D91414>Celestial Eulogy</color>, the camera focuses on Liv: Limpidity. All characters become briefly unresponsive, and <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> triggers.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG.\\n- When Limpidity leaves the battlefield, gains <color=#D91414>10</color> <color=#D91414>Sonance</color> per second. After accumulating <color=#D91414>150</color> Sonance, the next QTE cast will be replaced by <color=#D91414>Celestial Eulogy</color>, which pulls in nearby enemies and deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Lightning DMG.\\n- After casting <color=#D91414>Celestial Eulogy</color>, gains <color=#D91414>1</color> additional Signal Orb when switched in next time.\\n- <color=#D91414>Sonance</color> is capped at <color=#D91414>150</color>.'}

Title: {1: 'First Light', 2: 'Heavenly Flash: <color=#0d70bc>4 Flying Blades + Press and Hold Dodge</color>', 3: 'Mirror Flight: <color=#0d70bc>During Dream Dive + Tap Mirror Blade Orb</color>', 4: 'Dawn Dream: <color=#0d70bc>During Dream Dive + Flow Points ≥50 + Press and Hold Basic Attack or Mirror Blade Orb</color>', 5: 'Stacked Light: <color=#0d70bc>During Dream Dive + Press and Hold Dodge</color>', 6: 'Effect: Darkflow'}
BriefDes: {1: 'Gains a set of 3-Ping Orbs every time upon entering battle.', 2: 'Summons a massive lightning strike to attack. When casting, can trigger lightning chain and gather enemies, dealing DMG; triggers Matrix if it is not on cooldown. Consumes all <color=#D91414>Flying Blades</color> and gains <color=#D91414>45</color> Signature Energy. Also gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>70%</color> DMG Reduction when casting.', 3: 'During Dream Dive, the rightmost slot of the Signal Orb bar is fixed as <color=#D91414>Mirror Blade Orb</color>. When repeatedly tapping the <color=#D91414>Mirror Blade Orb</color>, consumes <color=#D91414>White Orbs</color> to deal DMG and gain <color=#D91414>Flow Points</color>, <color=#D91414>Delicate Heart</color>, and Signature Energy. Also gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>50%</color> DMG Reduction when casting.', 4: 'Leaps into the air to pull in enemies and crush them, consuming <color=#D91414>Flow Points</color> to deal DMG and gain <color=#D91414>Delicate Heart</color> and Signature Energy. Invincible when casting.', 5: 'Continuously launches shattered mirror attacks, dealing Lightning DMG. Pressing and holding Dodge automatically pings Signal Orbs during this time, up to <color=#D91414>4</color> times, then detonates enemies and casts <color=#D91414>Thousand Rays</color>, dealing Lightning DMG, while gaining enhancement effects based on the number of orbs pinged. Gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>70%</color> DMG Reduction when casting. <color=#D91414>Stacked Light</color> can only be cast once during Dream Dive.', 6: 'Every <color=#D91414>200</color> Darkflow Reserve gained grants 1 Darkflow stack, up to 15 stacks. Characters with the Darkflow Effect will gain a Darkflow Aura based on the current Darkflow stacks, dealing a small amount of Darkflow DMG over time to enemies and reducing their HP recovery. When the Darkflow stacks reach the threshold, the Aura upgrades, increasing its area of effect and dealing massive Darkflow DMG to enemies within the area.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Gains a set of 3-Ping Orbs every time upon entering battle.', 2: 'Summons a massive lightning strike to attack. When casting, can trigger lightning chain and gather enemies, dealing DMG; triggers Matrix if it is not on cooldown. Consumes all <color=#D91414>Flying Blades</color> and gains <color=#D91414>45</color> Signature Energy. Also gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>70%</color> DMG Reduction when casting.\\n- Deals <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG.', 3: 'During Dream Dive, the rightmost slot of the Signal Orb bar is fixed as <color=#D91414>Mirror Blade Orb</color>. When repeatedly tapping the <color=#D91414>Mirror Blade Orb</color>, consumes <color=#D91414>White Orbs</color> to deal DMG and gain <color=#D91414>Flow Points</color>, <color=#D91414>Delicate Heart</color>, and Energy. Also gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>50%</color> DMG Reduction when casting.\\n- Deals a total of <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG.\\n- Each <color=#D91414>White Orb</color> consumed grants <color=#D91414>25</color> <color=#D91414>Flow Points</color> and <color=#D91414>25</color> <color=#D91414>Sonance</color>.\\n- Based on the number of Signature Points cast, gains <color=#D91414>6/6/9/9</color> <color=#D91414>Signature Energy</color> and <color=#D91414>1/1/2/2</color> stacks of <color=#D91414>Delicate Heart</color>.\\n- When in <color=#D91414>Darkcross Form</color>, deals a total of <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Darkflow DMG instead.', 4: 'Leaps into the air to pull in enemies and crush them, consuming <color=#D91414>Flow Points</color> to deal DMG and gain <color=#D91414>Delicate Heart</color> and Signature Energy. Invincible when casting.\\n- Consumes <color=#D91414>50</color> <color=#D91414>Flow Points</color> to cast <color=#D91414>Startled Dream</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>2</color> stacks of <color=#D91414>Delicate Heart</color> and <color=#D91414>8</color> Signature Energy. When in <color=#D91414>Darkcross Form</color>, deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Darkflow DMG instead.\\n- During <color=#D91414>Startled Dream</color>, press and hold <color=#D91414>Basic Attack</color> to consume another <color=#D91414>50</color> <color=#D91414>Flow Points</color> and cast <color=#D91414>Light Seeker</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Lightning DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>4</color> stacks of <color=#D91414>Delicate Heart</color>, <color=#D91414>40</color> Signature Energy, and <color=#D91414>1</color> Signal Orb. When in <color=#D91414>Darkcross Form</color>, deals <color=#D91414>{3}%</color> Darkflow DMG instead.\\n- <color=#D91414>Flow Points</color> is capped at <color=#D91414>100</color>.', 5: "Continuously launches shattered mirror attacks, dealing Lightning DMG. Pressing and holding Dodge automatically pings Signal Orbs during this time, up to <color=#D91414>4</color> times, then detonates enemies and casts <color=#D91414>Thousand Rays</color>, dealing Lightning DMG, while gaining enhancement effects based on the number of orbs pinged. Gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>70%</color> DMG Reduction when casting. Can only cast <color=#D91414>Stacked Light</color> once during Dream Dive.\\n- Sustained attacks deal <color=#D91414>{0}%</color> Lightning DMG. <color=#D91414>Thousand Rays</color> deals <color=#D91414>{1}%</color> Lightning DMG.\\n- When in <color=#D91414>Darkcross Form</color>, sustained attacks deal <color=#D91414>{2}%</color> Darkflow DMG and <color=#D91414>Thousand Rays</color> deals <color=#D91414>{3}%</color> Darkflow DMG.\\n- Each Signal Orb consumed increases this <color=#D91414>Thousand Rays</color>'s Base DMG by <color=#D91414>20%</color>. When consuming 3-Ping Orbs, gains <color=#D91414>2</color> additional Signature Energy and <color=#D91414>1</color> stack of <color=#D91414>Delicate Heart</color>.\\n- <color=#D91414>White Orbs</color> will be prioritized during the skill. Can consume <color=#D91414>2</color> <color=#D91414>White Orbs</color> at once, which are treated as one 3-Ping Orb set. When fewer than <color=#D91414>2</color> <color=#D91414>White Orbs</color> are available, can consume <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>White Orb</color>, which is treated as <color=#D91414>1</color> Signal Orb.\\n- If <color=#D91414>12</color> Signal Orbs are pinged during the skill, gains <color=#D91414>1</color> Signal Orb after casting.", 6: 'Every <color=#D91414>200</color> Darkflow Reserve grants 1 Darkflow stack, up to a maximum of 15. Characters with the Darkflow Effect will gain a Darkflow Aura based on the current Darkflow stacks, dealing a small amount of Darkflow DMG over time to enemies and reducing their HP recovery. When the Darkflow stacks reach the threshold, the Aura upgrades, increasing its area of effect and dealing massive Darkflow DMG to enemies within the area.\\n- At <color=#D91414>1/3/6/10/15</color> stacks: Deals <color=#D91414>100%/200%/400%/800%/1600%</color> Darkflow DMG, then deals <color=#D91414>20%/40%/60%/80%/100%</color> Darkflow DMG per second, reducing enemy HP recovery by <color=#D91414>10%/20%/30%/50%/100%</color>.'}

BriefDes: {1: 'Increases Lightning DMG and Darkflow DMG of all members by <color=#D91414>10%</color>. Increases ATK of all Attackers in the team by <color=#D91414>10%</color>.'}
SpecificDes: {1: 'Increases Lightning DMG and Darkflow DMG of all members by <color=#D91414>10%</color>. Increases ATK of all Attackers in the team by <color=#D91414>10%</color>.'}

SpecificDes: {1: '<color=#99a3b1>Casting Heavenly Flash, Dawn Dream, or Signature - Mirrored Renewal will activate all available QTEs.</color>', 2: '<color=#99a3b1>When entering battle, gains 4 Flying Blades and 24 Signature Energy when first casting Heavenly Flash.
